Summary: Nice 2bhk kids suite but its a good 30 minute walk to disneyland and a 20 minute bus ride, though bus stop are right outside the frequency not great, this is an old property and a very bug property woth just 1 elavtor working which consumes lot of your time, even the staircase was far, the bathrooms door locks was not working properly,  the safety locker also did not work. Breakfast was nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Saved us from the worst Christmas!
Summary: We booked a Disney trip for our kids for Christmas, with plans to fly out Christmas Day. Susan, at the front desk, helped with all of our pre plans, found us a grocery store and a list of places to eat for our Christmas dinner. She went above and beyond and we were so excited! When our flight was cancelled, and we decided to drive 12 hours to Disney, the hotel made sure we were accommodated for our 4 am arrival time, with a super express check in. The whole week the staff was amazing, helpful and always willing to get what you needed. Susan at the front desk, is our new favorite person. She made our trip a success. We loved our stay! Thank you.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall, we had a satisfactory stay at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area/Garden Grove, although shortening the name of the hotel would help.  The hotels in this area are so similarly named, it can confuse the Uber driver. The good:  So many hotels call their rooms 'suites', when they are only a single room with a partial divider or have a small sitting area next to the bed.  This hotel has actual suites, with separate bedrooms, and even 2 bathrooms in their 2 bedroom suites.  Excellent for a family of 6, and hard to find.  The breakfast area is excellent.  It was spacious and kept very clean and well stocked by the attendants.  The variety of hot and cold items had something that every member of our family enjoyed, including those of us with gluten sensitivities.  Desk and
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love staying there. My nieces played a tournament at the American Sports Center that was a mile away and the 2-bd suite was a perfect fit for our weekend stay. It was a 1-King bdrm and the other room had 2 twin beds including the sofa bed in the living room. There is also a full kitchen microwave, full-sized fridge, dishwasher, and stove with an oven. All of this and we still had plenty of room in the suite to have guest over. If you are a parent of Club Volleyball players or any travel sport and you need that one hotel, well I highly recommend this Residence Inn in Garden Grove. Aside from the suite itself they have an on-site laundry room, 24hr gym and a great patio set up by the pool. The customer service is simply amazing and genuinely given. Those front desk agents are so
Manager Response: none

Summary: We celebrated our granddaughter‘s 16th birthday at Disneyland. Susan ensured that our accommodations as well as our stay were second to none!! Our family enjoyed a full buffet breakfast each morning that started our day fully charged and ready for new adventures.. Thank you Susan you are the absolute best!!!
Room tip: You will not be able to beat the full delicious buffet each morning!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Susan is simply the best. To write this review makes me emotional. She’s not like anyone I’ve met In customer service. She is the reason I come here as often as I do. She makes my vacation a restful one. Susan appreciates my business and it shows every time I show up. Everything she’s does makes me wanna keep bringing my business back.  15 vacations a year and %85 of them is at this hotel. And the staff is amazing Rick, Melissa and countless others. Way to go Rick for hiring such an amazing staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I Am Shocked, No Way this is a Marriott
Summary: When I arrived the first night and picked a bed, the bed was pressed against the wall and i found multiple things of boogers spread on the wall by my head that i had to clean myself. Then found that the bathroom was not clean, picture included! I even wiped pee off the toilet seat itself when i went to use it for the very first time!   We complained to the front desk very nicely and asked them to come clean it. Two hours later we asked again, nothing. It wasn’t until we got in contact with the cleaning manager did they send someone an hour later to clean.   Later we saw bugs in the kitchen climbing over the counter.   I was shocked I have only had good experiences at Marriott and have deeply appreciated how their main goal is cleanliness, this did not meet Marriott standards and
Manager Response: @emmarich7- I'm so sorry to hear about your experience with us.  I can guarantee, we take pride in the service we deliver and the condition of this room was below our standard.  I am reviewing your concerns now with my Director of Rooms.  Again, I'm very sorry for the trouble, but thankful that you did bring this to our attention.  Wishing you the best in your future travels.

Summary: My family spent the entire day at DL for my 6 year old's birthday before finally checking in to the Residence Inn on Sunday, September 25. It was going to be a quick stay, just to rest before going to CA Adventure in the morning. When I checked in, Leo was there to greet us. Our quick rest here really was the highlight because of Leo, especially since DL was rather disappointing. She accommodated my family, especially making my son feel special for his bday by gifting him a mickey mouse stuffy. I always prefer to stay at the RI because of the  bigger space, but this is the first time I've checked into one where I was really made to feel like I was coming home. No better customer service skills than making people feel at home. Thank you Leo, for your people skills and being able
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was very clean, newly renovated in 2020.  The customer service was exceptional.  Each person helping us from checkin, to changing to different rooms to accommodate our family, to food service was excellent.  Lea, Susan, and Stephanie were the best.  Breakfast had a good spread of hot and cold foods.  We had scrambled eggs, sausages, breakfast potatoes, fresh fruits, breads, croissants, cereal, oatmeal.  There was something for everyone.  The eating area was cleaned regularly and the food was replenished really fast.  The location was great.  There was plenty of parking.  I plan to stay here next time I visit Garden Grove.  We went to Little Saigon, Christ Cathedral, Long Beach, Covina.  The location was convenient for us. It was close to many entertainment , and
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at Residence Inn Garden Grove for 4 nights. We had a two bedroom suite, the kids loved having their own space! Rooms were clean and spacious. We ate at the breakfast buffet before heading out for our activities…the dining area was spacious and many options at the buffet! The shuttle to Disneyland is at the hotel next door which made things easy. Many dining options in the area and a Target nearby as well. We enjoyed our stay and will definitely stay here next time!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking time out of your day to provide us with feedback. We hope to see you back one day!

Summary: I spent 5 days here to work a show at the Convention Center. The breakfast was yummy and abundant to fill me up each day.  The room was a little dated but clean and comfy.  Housekeeping was great too. The part that stuck out is the fantastic service! The team was sweet and nice and the little hellos and welcome backs as I came home at night were great.  It was hot so I ubered and the cars came quickly and it was only about $10 to and from the convention center. I’d definitely return!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review us. We appreciate the feedback and hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Service that makes you come back!
Summary: Being someone who travels often it is so refreshing to have a property that delivers amazing service consistently visit after visit.  Susan at the front is AMAZING! Genuine, friendly and helpful we always look forward to our visits knowing Susan will be there to take care of our needs. She is one of the reasons we will continue to stay at residence inn garden grove. Thank you Susan!!   J. Ignacio
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your feedback and hope we have the opportunity to host you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Wonderful breakfast, comfortable beds, terrific staff
Summary: My family very much enjoyed our stay at the Rez Inn Anaheim Garden Grove.  We came to California go to Knotts Berry Farm.  While this Rez Inn is not the closest to Knotts, the accommodating staff, the bedroom configuration (family 2 bedroom with 2 queens in one room and a king in the other, 2 bathrooms) made it a comfortable set up for our family.  Susan, who I believe is a front desk manager, was amazing at getting us set up ahead of time.  She was in touch with the GM, who was very accommodating. The kiddie pool was enjoyed by our littlest, the regular heated pool by the rest of my kids.  The breakfast variety was terrifc. They have three waffle makers going, and space indoors and out to eat.  Ana, a kitchen attendant, spent a lot of time with me, going over what was and
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking time out of your day to provide us with feedback. We hope to see you back one day!

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay for our family vacation
Summary: The room was large with beds for everyone. There was a little kitchen with a refrigerator, stove/oven, microwave, sink, dishwasher, and some dishes and utensils, so we didn't have to eat out for every meal. There were many hot and cold choices for breakfast. The bus to Disney is just a half-block walk. The hotel staff is super helpful and friendly. We stayed for five days and loved it!
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your feedback and hope we have the opportunity to host you again in the future!

Summary: The hotel stay was excellent. clean spacious suite this my 3rd stay at this hotel in past few years and it will definitely not be the last. What really took my stay over the top was exceptional reception by "Susan" at the check in counter. HI Susan thanks for being a wonderful Host.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking time out of your day to provide us with direct feedback! In addition, thank you very much for staying with us!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, with a few negative points
Summary: Front staff is very friendly and helpfull. Room is spacious and clean.  Waterpressure in the showers coud be better. Airconditioning very loud, but worked perfectly. Beds very comfortable.  NIce swimmingpool and surroundings. Overpriced parking.  Walking distance to Disney a bit too far for us. There is a shuttlebus, but not always reliable or full when you want to return at the end of the day.  Breakfast ok for american standards.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your feedback! Thanks for staying with us!

Summary Heading: If you are looking for the best hotel in the area, look no further!!
Summary: We always stay here when we visit and based on our latest stay, we’ll keep coming back for many years to come. Their staff is so kind to our son Paul, and always goes out of their way to make us feel like we’re at home. The front desk staff, especially Susan and all of the other girls make our stay comfortable and always go above and beyond the call of duty to make sure we have everything we need and more. The maintenance guys Jeff and Hymee came into our room to put a new shower mat down and tighten the screws on the toilet seat because one of the housekeepers let them know we needed them fixed. Jeff asked if there was anything else we needed and I told him they could come back any time to make minor repairs so the room was in good condition for the next guest. Jeff said they
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking time out of your day to provide us with feedback. We hope to see you back one day!

Summary: No way this property is over a 3!  Old and run down. Rooms were sketchy. I’m using plural because the first room they gave us looked like a dog had ripped apart the sofa and the AC wasn’t working (which staff and maintenance knew.) Also, none of the TVs were working. Thankfully they moved us to the same floor plan with working AC. Bathrooms are a little cringey but were decent in size. Bedding was subpar. The pull out sofa mattress was so bad my nephew literally had a spring mark on his back! The elevators were a joke. Used the stairs often despite the stairwells being disgusting. But hey, free breakfast buffet! The staff was very nice and as accommodating as possible and it is only a $7-12 Uber ride from Disney and Angel stadium. I chose this hotel because they partner with
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your recent stay at the Residence Inn Garden Grove. Feedback from our guests is vitally important in our mission to be the first choice of the world’s travelers. We want you as our guest and are hopeful that you will afford us the opportunity to provide lodging services in the future. Thanks for your ongoing loyalty and understanding.

Summary Heading: Older, but remodeled property with excellent service
Summary: The hotel is older, but the customer service is top notch. Namely, Susan, who I was on the phone with the morning-of. I was asking for 2 pack-and-plays and the possibility of an early check-in because we were arriving before 4pm and it would be great to have both my kids take a nap in the room around 1pm. She was able to make all of that happen and more! I am super grateful for her help and to Residence Inn for housing our family for a wonderful weeklong Disneyland trip.   Regarding the room itself, the AC in the room was nice and cold the whole week. Our bedroom had a massive air-intake for the fan or the AC, which was quite loud when it clicked on, so it kept us up at night at times. The space in these rooms are incomparable to anywhere else. Sure, the rooms are a little
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your feedback and hope we have the opportunity to host you again in the future!

Summary: This place was amazing for our entire family! Not only was the staff very friendly, but the facilities were amazing. The breakfast was superb. Much better than The Element Hotel in Anaheim and more affordable. I highly recommend this place!
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your feedback and hope we have the opportunity to host you again in the future!

Summary: My family stayed at this hotel in June 2022. After three wonderful days at Disneyland we came back to our room at 11:00 pm and immediately realized our hotel room had been robbed. The thieves dumped all of our belongings and took many items including the keys to my rental car and my rental car! Our room was on the second floor and there were stairs next to my room that led down to an external door that opened from the outside. The door logs showed that someone opened the door from inside the room at 7:00 pm I’m assuming using an under the door wire available on the internet for $12. The parking lot and inside the hotel does not have cameras. The hotel manager was helpful and suggested that the loss prevention department at Island Hospitality would provide compensation. When
Manager Response: @robynjackson1- I'm terribly sorry this occurred during your stay with us.  We will cooperate fully with the police department if they conduct an investigation.  The team here sincerely wishes you and your family the very best in your future travels.

Summary: Our family has been to this hotel twice this year, we are continually impressed by the staff and the professionalism of the team.  This property is what we would call near-ish Disneyland. It is far enough that we still drive and park at Disneyland for the day, however, if you are keen there is an effective public transit station immediately outside the hotel that will take you directly to the parks. It is walkable, though a really long one.  You simply cant ask for a better value at this price point. The hotel is clean, the amenities are well stocked, and anything you might need is immediately available by asking the front desk staff for assistance. Breakfast is what you would expect from a suite style continental, and laundry facilities are generous.  My advice to all ...
Manager Response: @BigJetAirliner- thank you for your honest and amazing review.  It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we can't wait to see you again!

Summary: The staff is amazing!!! Has a lot of amenities of a 5 star but I cannot give it a 5 star. Unfortunately I believed the reviews. Rooms are outdated. For what you are paying. Not clean at all vents in my room didn’t work and one of the kids rooms had ants on the bed. The adult room bed made me itch alot. So this out ways the other good things it offers. Also Pool disgusting not clean and peeling on bottom could feel it. Not enough clean towels.  Never staying here again. Also reviews are all miss leading
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience while staying with us. Your experience that you unfortunately encountered is below our standard.    Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and I sincerely apologize for failing to meet your expectations. I have shared your feedback with the appropriate leadership team to ensure the necessary guidelines are in place and reviewed to prevent these issues from occurring in the future.  I hope you choose to stay with us again when your travels bring you back to the area.  Sincerely, RICARDO HERNANDEZ Front Office Manager  anaheimrifom@ih-corp.com

Summary: Hotel is a 3 star for sure but has all the amenities we needed for a Disney trip.   Pros: Hotel grounds/rooms  are clean  Nice pool area with ping pong and basketball court Breakfast was decent and good enough lots of selection.  Friendly staff  Lots of amenities around for shopping and eating Bbq was convenient  Suite  with kitchen for families   Cons: No daily house keeping Only a few lounge chairs by pool  Not walking distance to Disney Shuttle is confusing ( we ended up taking Ubers for 7$) Rooms are dated
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I took a quick trip to Disney just for one night and got lucky enough to catch a deal here. We were impressed by the customer service and the amenities I will certainly stay here again in the future. This was perfect for my family of five!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Super Clean Hotel with Very Friendly Staff!
Summary: Super clean hotel and very friendly staff! We were really impressed with all of the staff at this location. Given the number of people that come through on their way to Disneyland, it was impressive to see how friendly everyone was. I especially want to mention the great staff that run the breakfast in the morning. They do an excellent job, deal with a lot of people every day, and are helpful and have a smile. Thanks! We’ll definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wanted to stay closer to Knott’s Berry Farm for this trip but changed to Residence Inn last minute due to poor reviews for the original hotel booked. Sooo glad we switched even though we had an extra 15-20 min drive! Everyone was so nice from the get go! I called 2 hrs before we checked in at 8pm and asked for our two rooms to be on the same floor since we were with Grandpa and our 4 year old. They weren’t together at first but she made it happen and our rooms were right across from each other upon arrival!  Lani was very sweet and helpful on Wednesday morning. We enjoyed the heated pool and hot tub in the evening after all day at Knott’s, except that the bottom of the pool looks dirty but seems to be damaged or scratched more than dirty? Could use some fixing up for sure.  Lots
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing our hotel for your stay and all the kind words regarding our staff. We are delighted that we exceeded your expectations and hope we get to welcome you back on your next visit!

Summary: After traveling on a late flight and our previous hotel accommodations turning us away due to not having our reservation. We booked Residence Marriott and the front desk agent who checked us in was extremely kind and helpful!   Breakfast was amazing every morning. The attendant kept the breakfast area extremely clean. Room was clean and very spacious for us three adults.  At check out Susan H. Helped us at the front desk and she was extremely helpful and very personable.  Guest service is excellent! I will be returning just because the guest service was outstanding.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing our hotel for your stay. We are delighted that we exceeded your expectations and hope we get to welcome you back on your next visit soon!

Summary Heading: The staff will blow you away!!
Summary: I cannot say enough about Susan and the entire staff at this hotel. Their customer service is beyond outstanding!! Our flights in and out were at really awkward times, and our room was ready to go when we arrived really early and we were also given a nice upgrade. They have a free hot breakfast buffet every morning which is such a money saver. It does get crowded in the morning before everyone leaves for the park, but nothing unmanageable. The rooms are super clean and nice, and well equipped with what you need. The short walk to the bus to the park was easy and convenient, arriving every 30 mins. The pool area is really nice and they hot tub is huge! If you want a great place to stay close to the park, and in walking distance of great restaurants - stay at this property. Most
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your feedback and we are so glad to hear that we have exceeded your expectations in customer service during your stay. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I had a great stay at the residence inn. Susan at the front desk was so helpful. I had to be somewhere at a certain time and she was able to check us in earlier. We felt very welcomed. She was respectful towards me and my guest.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking time out of your day to provide us with feedback. We hope to see you back one day!

Summary: Susan was the most fantastic person I've ever worked with in the hospitality industry. I felt heard and taken care of from the moment we first spoke. She and the staff immediately understood our needs and made sure to do whatever it took to accommodate our family. Taking our 2-year-old son to Disneyland for the first time was amazing but it started with knowing we had a great place to stay. The room was great and spacious. It was clean. Our son made it home in minutes. The breakfast was great too.   When we come back for another trip to Disneyland there is no other hotel we will pick. We know we have a family of great people here that will make sure our trip is fun and memorable. Thank you Susan and the rest of the team for taking great care of us!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking time out of your day to provide us with direct feedback! In addition, thank you very much for staying with us!

Summary: Stephanie Jose Maria and Verónica provided amazing service the room was very clean kept up to date very close to Disney parking was perfect food was also very high-quality timely and service extremely attentive would definitely come back it’s a place for families
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review us. We appreciate the feedback and hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We came with a large group of high school students from LVA. Our rooms were ready when we arrived (we even arrived earlier than expected). They were gracious and happy to assist us and help when the students had questions. Lani was pleasant and efficient. We will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review us. We appreciate the feedback and hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Overall good, but needs some improvements
Summary: Overall we had a great stay at this hotel.   Pros: The breakfast had a huge selection, which was great!  The 2 bedroom suites are awesome for families Great location to target to stock up on snacks and lots of places to eat close by The ART bus worked every time for us and didn't take too long to get to Disney There are grills, a firepit and lots of tables/seating outside which was nice at night to unwind or to eat some takeout! Also a basketball court was fun!  Cons: -Our kitchen in our suite had no cookie sheet (so there was not one pan we could use in the oven) and no tea kettle despite being provided tea bags?  -Our room definitely needed some work. The sliding door to the two twin room was SO loud and so hard to slide. Didn't work great trying to get kids to bed or having
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay!

Summary Heading: Better than expected based on reviews.
Summary: I booked this hotel as part of a Disney package as a good neighbor hotel, THEN I checked reviews. Reviews were a mixed bag, but most said that the property needed renovation. Okay, it's not a 5 star hotel. Maybe a solid 3.75. staff were incredibly helpful and kind. Breakfast was very good, and the pool area was nice. There is a fire pit, and two gas grills for guest use. There's a basketball court, and ping pong table outside in the veranda. All were in good repair.  The room was clean and well equipped. We brought a fire TV stick and connected to the free wireless. TVs in each bedroom and one in the shared space. 5 of us had plenty of space. Family of four with an additional family member who got her own room and private bathroom. Both bedrooms were clean and NOT DATED with
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your feedback and hope we have the opportunity to host you again in the future!

Summary: We booked late and one of the few suites we could find was here. Reading the recent reviews I was hesitant to book but took the chance. We did not regret it. We had a great stay. For sure the hotel would benefit from a renovation but staff was very friendly and efficient. We did not have any problems with our room. Pool and gym filled their purpose. The location is good, walking distance to Disneyland and plenty of restaurants within a block. Only two elevators so it queues up at times. Dogs are welcome.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking time out of your day to provide us with feedback. We hope to see you back one day!

Summary: Picked this hotel since we had a great experience when we stayed here years ago. This time around it’s way different. Let’s start with the good:  - Front Desk was really nice (Lani and the other gal). Some parking fees comped.   - I booked 4 rooms and 3 out of the four were upgraded to a Kid’s Two Bedroom Suite. I’m Titanium Elite.   - Breakfast is decent and plentiful but could be very busy   - Close to Disneyland and paid shuttle bus is available   Now the bad:  - Hotel is a bit dated. Lobby and Bar is nice. Breakfast area is huge. Elevators are a bit rugged.   Room 302  We were assigned at Room 302. Arrived and the room was warm so I turned the temp low for the AC. We got to the hotel very late and slept and we thought it was the initial setting. Woke up in the morning and
