Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to better serve you in the future.

Summary: I was really pleased with our stay!  My daughter has severe food allergies and Lourdes went ABOVE AND BEYOND to help us identify what she could and could not eat. She spent a lot of time with us and made our breakfast special!!  Best service ever!! She was amazing!!!  The hotel room was nice and well priced. My only concern were that half of the dishes that were in the cabinets and drawers were dirty and had leftover food on them.  That grossed me out.  Overall, I would come back again but would bring my own paper plates and utensils. :)
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am pleased to hear that our staff went above and beyond to assist you with foods that were safe for your daughter. I am sorry, however, to hear that you experienced an issue with the dishes in the room. I want to assure you this will be addressed with the staff and corrected moving forward. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you again on a future trip to Southern California.

Summary Heading: Front desk person Alex and Mix person Luis were exceptional
Summary: We are staying at the Marriott Residence Inn for business and pleasure. When we were greeted by Alex at the front desk, he was very courteous, friendly and took great care of us. We booked a standard room for a couple of days and then switch to a two room suite after just a couple of days when our kids join. Instead of inconveniencing us with having to change rooms (especially since we are travel agents too) he checked the system to make sure there were plenty of two room suites available and got us into one right away. This makes our stay so much easier not having to pack and move to another room. Thanks Alex for making this trip even more pleasurable for us.  We will definitely recommend this property to our clients.    Luis at the Mix Monday night was wonderful.  He was very
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your review with us. I am very pleased to know our staff went above and beyond to ensure you and your party had an excellent stay with us. I appreciate the feedback on both employees and will be sure to share your comments with them and their respective managers. Thank you again for choosing our hotel and we hope to see you again soon on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We came here for our Family Vacation to Disney Land and could not have asked for a more family friendly and comfortable experience.  The breakfast always launches our day with a hearty meal and this trip the evening social has been the perfect light meal to end our day on. Great Job to "The mix" and Luis, as well as the rest of the Staff here at Residence Inn Marriott, Great amenities at very reasonable rates!
Manager Response: Troy J, thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to know you enjoyed your time with us and that the hot breakfast helps to get you and your family through the day! I appreciate you taking a moment to recognize the efforts of some of our staff as well and want to assure you I will share your feedback with him and our entire management staff. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to have you as our guests again soon!

Summary Heading: Best customer service at breakfast by Lulu and at the evening Mix with Luis!
Summary: I could not have asked for better staff at the front desk with Alex, Keesha, Krystal and all the others too numerous to count...they are the best, including Walter and Haley. Everyone has made me feel at home. I would like to thank the entire team! This is very close to Disneyland, sometimes feels like summer camp in the dining room and watch out for little ones in the parking lot- they are very excited to be here! A very pleasant place to stay in CA.
Manager Response: Mary T,  Thank you so much for the review. I can't tell you how much I appreciate your kind words about our team. We hope to see you again soon.  Chris D General Manager

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay, room was spacious , close to Disneyland, affordable. My only concern was that a family tried to break in to our room at 10 pm at night . They stated they had just checked in and were given our room. Checked with front desk but no one had been checked in. Security was prompt to respond. We were glad to check out 2 days later.
Manager Response: Rosa B,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. I am sorry to hear that someone tried to get into your room. The safety of our guests is very important to us. I will be reviewing this situation with my team to ensure this has been addressed. This is not normal at our hotel and I hope if you are the area again you will give us another chance to prove this was an isolated incident. Thank you so much for staying with us.  Chris D  General Manager

Summary Heading: Good hotel but could use some improvement
Summary: The hotel was good overall with average facilities expected of RI.  Staff was outstanding. Temp control was average but not too bad.  We got a suite and it was nicely furnished and clean.  Comfortable bed.  Two TVs. One bathroom that was in the bedroom so do not expect privacy if sharing the suite. View was OK and it was noisy. I didn't find good places nearby to eat and is in a more run down area compared to some other nearby places.  Breakfast was really low quality and evening snacks what alarmed me. Given it is a resort, there were tons of kids picking from a big bowl of chips. Salsa looked in poor shape and i think there was cheese. All recipes for a serious outbreak. I strongly advise hotel management to take a look at food and food hygiene principles.
Manager Response: Kalalia,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort.  I would like to thank you for your review and feedback.  I will be passing on your information to the appropriate departments to ensure the correction of your concerns.  Thank you again for your feedback and for being our guest.

Summary: I have stayed here off and on.  Every stay has been flawless and the staff is the best. Whether its Kesha, Haley, Alex, Gemma, Morgan, or Marie at the front.  The kitchen staff is one of the best I've seen in a while, especially Lourdes who reminds me of "the grandmother you wish everyone had."  Yep, she's just that cool.  I will never fail to mention the Director of Magic (Sales) better known as Wilma.  She operates in absolute professionalism and in my opinion, the Marriott brand is blessed to have her in sales.  The property though does sale itself with the cleanliness, the staff, and the great breakfast.  This is one of my "go to" properties.  You would be foolish not to make it one of yours!!!!!
Manager Response: srtravlr, thank you for being our guest. I sincerely appreciate the recognition of each and every one of the associates you mentioned and I will make sure that your comments are shared with each of them. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we look forward to the opportunity to have you as our guest again soon.

Summary: It's difficult for me to give a 5 star rating, however this hotel deserves it. Room was spacious and comfy! Breakfast was delicious with options for everybody. I needed a large pan to cook a meal for my baby, after a phone call was provided in 15 minutes. Disneyland is close, 10 minutes drive. The other plus is that is walking distance to restaurants such as outback and Crab Schack. I really recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to know you felt we earned a five star review! I am very happy to hear you found the breakfast to be full of variety and options for your whole family and that our location proved to be perfect for your needs. I appreciate you sharing your review with us and it is my sincere hope that we may have the opportunity to have you as our guest again in the future.

Summary: Great hotel with wonderful staff.  Has shuttle to Disneyland right outside the doors (Ed is awesome...just ask our girls), a hot breakfast to start the day off right and a small snack some evenings.  Definately will book here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your review with us. I am pleased to know you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to having you as our guest again on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Conference Trip, but previewing for upcoming Disney Trip...
Summary: This was a gem of a find when I couldn't get into the Hyatt at the convention rate for the meetings I was attending!  Literally 20 steps from the side door to the ballroom entrance I needed at the Hyatt.  This hotel is overall quite clean, has a great room and kitchenette set-up, a super varied and delicious breakfast, and an extremely friendly and accomodating front desk staff.  When we arrived at the hotel around 10 AM knowing the chance of getting into a room was non-existent, we were welcomed to leave our bags at the desk so we could begin exploring.  The attendant took our number & called by 1:30 to tell us our room was available (check-in wasn't until 4).  Upon leaving, we were given a 1:00 checkout to allow us to finish our meetings with our convention next door, which I
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love Residence Inns as they are a GREAT value. However, this RI definitely stands out because of their staff and location. From check in, we were greeted and taken care of by Keesha. She was extremely friendly and always smiling. She even remembered my name the next day! Alex was awesome as well. Very knowledgeable about Disneyland and was eager to help assist with our questions.  Room was clean and comfortable. Best part is all rooms have full kitchens which really helps if you're traveling on a budget as you can make your own meals or if you want to heat up some leftovers. Also, they have a FULL breakfast buffet with a large variety of items.   Target is right across the street and there are several restaurants within walking distance. If you're here for Disney, you don't
Manager Response: none

Summary: We always stayed here as money permits.  This place is definitely a 5 star place but on the pricey side during the summer and most peak times.  The rooms are clean and the staff are always friendly and helpful.  You are practically next to Disney.  Parking can get bad if you come back late from the park.  Always felt safe there.  Lower the price and we will always stay there.  :)
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to having you as our guests again soon.

Summary: Booked hotel, add says self parking. Get here at check in and parking is billed to your card at a $15 per night rate. No gate no protected lot. Just another unexpected charge for staying at this average hotel. Deceptive at best
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am sorry to hear you experienced an issue with your stay with us regarding the parking fees at the hotel. I will certainly share your comments with our entire management staff to ensure that these fees are being communicated to each of our guests consistently. We appreciate you being our guest and hope we have an opportunity to better serve you on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed during thanksgiving week, the proximity to everything was great. Hotel is well kept, breakfast was great every morning. Staff were very accommodating.  The pool could have been warmer did not feel heated at all, also the patio heater never seemed to work. One wish would be to have a balcony, that would have been awesome to see the fireworks @ Disney that way, we still had a good view, but a balcony would have been the icing on the cake. We only used heat in the suite and it was really quite loud and leaked in our room. Overall, our 2 bdrm suite was perfect for our needs. If we were to go to Anaheim again we would stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. we truly appreciate you choosing our hotel as well as sharing your experiences with us. I am sorry to hear you experienced an issue with the patio heater during your time with us, but I will be certain to have our maintenance team service the heater as soon as possible. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great for family trip to Disneyland
Summary: This was a perfect place for a family trip to Disneyland. The staff was helpful and friendly, they serve a decent breakfast with plenty of hot and cold options, clean rooms and best of all, good price and close to Disneyland! I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends who don't want to pay high prices of some of the other local hotels.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We loved the Residence Inn.  The breakfast was more than adequate but does get busy. Its a little over a mile to the main entrance so it might not be close enough for many people to walk.  We had a large group, so we would pile everyone into one van and drop them at the park.  The driver then would return to the Residence Inn and park and then run the mile back to the park.  Great way to get your morning run in and get the blood going.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Check in went well. Staff friendly and accommodating. Hotel, while clean, has areas that need minor attention. Grout in tub/shower too wide and looks sloppy. . Elevator flooring needs to be replaced. However the room was very clean and quiet. Towels and sheets were clean. Didn't like the $15.00 per day parking fee. However , we would go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. We appreciate you choosing our hotel  for your recent stay and appreciate the feedback on your room. I will ensure that your comments and concerns are shared with our management team and addressed immediately where possible. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Excellent customer service, Lourdes in the breakfast area was a wonderful lady who was always helpful and took care of anything we needed.  She recommended a wonderful place to visit,  Seal Beach.  Seal beach was a very wonderful little town with local shops feel like old town America and had a great experience at the Hennessy restaurant.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent Customer Service, Housekeeping And Rooms Need A Makeover
Summary: The hotel is a little further down Harbor Blvd which means you save quite a bit on your room. The breakfast each morning is great and the front desk staff was excellent answering any questions you have and they were always happy to help. Hotel Cleanliness - Trash behind dressers, counters not clean, showers dirty. I am not expecting this to be the Ritz Carlton, but with all the hotels in the area and this being a family type hotel with an apartment type setting this should not be an issue. There are missing locks on door, paint scraping off walls, cabinets that need major help etc. I know most people reading this would say it's no big deal because you spend most of your day in the park so who really cares. I just think if you are a good neighbor hotel there should be some higher
Manager Response: techskills02,  Thank you for staying with us at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort.  I am sorry we were unable to meet your expectation regarding the room cleanliness and facilitate the proximity from the Disney parks. The challenges you mentioned have been passed on to the appropriate departments and will make a dedicated effort to correct them. We appreciate your feedback and once again thank you for being our guest.  Walter Maldonado Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: 2 bedroom apartment for party of 4 adults and 2 children (1 teen, 1 almost)
Summary: This hotel is excellent for families going to Disneyland. Large breakfast buffet, with lots of choices and this is varied daily. Rooms were nice with a full size refrigerator and stove, includes a dishwasher also, ample lounge for relaxing and watching TV. Plentiful range of different restaurants in the immediate vicinity and also order in menu provided. Very close to parks with shuttles from directly outside the hotel. I had a 2 bedroom unit with a king bed and 2 queen beds. We were located on the third floor and had a slightly restricted view of the nightly Disneyland fireworks, obviously higher floors would have an even better view of these. The staff were very obliging from our first contact until our checkout, and could not do anymore to assist, including providing a
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff is what made my three month+ stay exceptional. I would recommend to everyone. I would have stayed for another 3 months however the room rates were nonnegotiable and I was relocated to another property nearby.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The free breakfast was fantastic!  The staff was friendly.  The room (2 bdrm) was large and adequate for a family of 6.  I thought charging for use of the business center and printers was petty considering how much we paid for the accommodations.  Marriott needs to take a page from their newly acquired Starwood properties (Sheraton in particular) and not charge their guests for use of computers and printing things like boarding passes and tickets to theme parks.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The lobby and staff were welcoming and pleasant but the guestroom I had was anything but.  There was an overwhelming mold odor and general lack of cleanliness. In addition the furniture as well as the carpeting were worn out and dirty. There are many hotels in Aneheim and I would strongly recommend choosing a different property.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very sorry to hear your experience was clearly below your expectations. Please know that our customers experience at the hotel is a top priority and will be sharing your concerns with the appropriate department heads to ensure your concerns are addressed and corrected.

Summary: Great hotel, room was comfortable and clean. My kids loved the bunkbeds on their side of the hotel room.Hot Breakfast was good and included with the room. I would definitely stay there again. Colorful Kids dining area was great for my busy 4 year old.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel. I am very pleased to know you and your family had a great time with us and we sincerely hope to see you and your family again soon on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: Large, clean rooms with kitchenette. Excellent value and quality.  Hotel was quiet.  So works for business use.  Families visiting local attractions will appreciate the kitchenette to heat foods.  Pool did not have lifeguard, so parents must take care.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place definitely has its stuff together. Check it only took me 3 minutes and went directly to our room that was very large,  very clean and everyone had their own TV! The little ones in the kids room with 2 twin beds, the older one sleeping on the pull out queen and me and my husband in our own separate room with a king-size bed and our own bathroom! SCORE! Very quiet and definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel. I am very pleased to know you enjoyed your stay with us and that your check in was very quick and easy. I appreciate you taking a moment to share your review with us and hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guest again on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Residence Inn, Garden Grove, California, USA
Summary: Residence Inn have the best customer service of any hotel I have stayed in.  Particularly Maria in Reception whose assistance on the phone before our visit and during our stay was outstanding.  Also one of the Managers who handled a plumbing problem and went out of his way to make our stay enjoyable and address all our needs.  Also Lourdes, a kitchen assistant, who made me pancakes this morning, such a lovely kind lady with the best smile.  This is my secind visit to the Residence Inn and it is the best hotel in the Disneyland area, very family friendly, clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I spent 2 weeks in a 2 bedroom suite at the Residence Inn Garden Grove. Upon arrival we were greeted warmly we received early check in and were upgraded immediately. The hotel staff were accommodating and we felt very welcome. The complementary breakfast was nice with lots of options and they have a light evening meal on Monday and Tuesdays and a desert bar on Wednesdays. The customer service is outstanding!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to hear your stay with us was exceptional and that you found the service and friendliness of our staff to exceed your expectations. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: The first night was good, but each night there after we didn't have a wash cloth. The breakfast always had scrambled eggs and the only thing they changed was the meat no bacon just turkey sausage the breakfast needs a lot of improvement. The room was clean
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing a review of your stay with us. I am sorry to hear you experienced issues with us during your stay, but want to assure you that your concerns have been shared with our management staff to ensure these items are addressed, and where possible, corrected. I appreciate you being our guest and sincerely hope we may have an opportunity to better serve you on a future trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay for Famiy  Disneyland trip!
Summary: We have stayed here many times. We enjoy the spacious rooms and amazing customer service. Luis Gutierrez helped us out and had awesome customer service with our whole family. The rooms are clean with plenty of space for our family, even when we have drop in visitors.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a returning guest. I am very pleased to know you enjoyed your stay with us, yet again and appreciate your comments about the efforts of our staff. I will be certain to share you comments with him and his department manager personally. Thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Family vacation from BC Canada to Disneyland
Summary: Check-in was easy and although they don't start until late we were able to get in a couple of hours early.  Lobby is wonderful (has coffee and ice water available all day), pool area and outdoor area great as well.  Got to our room and loved the spacious size of the room.  After a few hours (and after unpacking) we noticed a giant wet spot near the master bathroom.  We informed hotel and they checked it out and said it wasn't a maintenance issue.  That area in the room however smelt horrible for the rest of the trip but since we were in the parks the majority of the time we didn't bother trying to switch.  The room was also needing many repairs (rust in bathtub, wall paper peeling, dirty grout).  Not quite what you expect with the Marriott name.  The hide-a-bed is a joke.  When
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am sorry to hear that you experienced several issues with the room and services provided at the hotel. I want to assure you that your feedback is valued and appreciated and that your concerns have been shared with our entire management staff to ensure each concern is addressed. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we may have the opportunity to better serve you on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The breakfast offering was diverse, plentiful, and well laid out. The eating area was huge, and there was an outside area as well. They also had TVs hung so that you could hang out in the area for a bit and catch up on some news before you started the day. In addition, the staff throughout the hotel was very kind. I found the 2 room suites to be a great idea for families coming to the area for various attractions with separate bedroom/bathrooms for the kids.
Manager Response: Thank you foe bring our guest. We truly appreciate you taking a few moments to share a review of your stay with us and we are pleased to know you enjoyed your time at the hotel. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope to see you again on a future trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: This resort was excellent close to shops, Disneyland and lots of restaurants The staff were so friendly and it was spotlessly clean Breakfast was included and the swimming pools and spa were a hit after a big day out
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am pleased to know you found the location and the cleanliness of the hotel as well as the staff service to exceed your expectations. I appreciate you taking a moment to share your review with us and truly hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guests again soon!

Summary: The staff at the Residence Inn Anaheim were perfect! My family fell victim to a so called Uber Driver who charged us $500 USD for a cab ride from LAX to Anaheim! When we asked the staff if this was a correct amount to be charged, they replied NO, you have been ripped off! Apparently this happens a lot to overseas visitors. (We are from Australia). Without even batting an eyelid, one staff member had already refunded us $200 USD off of our stay! Incredible! Another staff member saw how upset my wife was and moved our check in time from 4:00pm to 2:00pm. They had the cleaning staff get straight into cleaning so our room would be ready early for us! Now that's service! The rooms were awesum! Ducted heating and aircon, 2 bathrooms, really comfy beds, a great view and a really yummy
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very sorry to hear your time in Southern California started off poorly, but I am very pleased to know our staff helped to right the wrongs and provide you with an excellent Disneyland experience. I greatly appreciate your review and I truly hope we will have the opportunity to see you again on a future visit to the US and Southern California.

Summary: We came down with my family (4), my parents and my wife's parents.  The first rooms we were given were not to our liking, but the people at the front desk were VERY accommodating and kind.  We moved rooms after the first night without any great issue.  For my wife and I, we are not super keen on sleeping in the same room as our kids, so we originally booked the one bedroom unit (put the kids to sleep in the bedroom and transfer to pull out later).  The kids (who are used to sleeping on a pull out in our place in Whistler) mentioned that the pull out couch wasn't that comfortable, so we inquired about the two bedroom units at the front desk.  They allowed us to go look at a room to see if we liked it, we did, and so we moved there.  The additional space definitely was more
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your family vacation. I am pleased to hear that our staff was able to get you and your family into exactly the type of room needed to make your vacation comfortable and memorable. We appreciate you being our guest and look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: They made it a very special visit
Summary: I went with my family to celebrate two birthdays - mine and my niece's, who turned 4 years old.   We went to Disneyland - the location was easy, there is a shuttle close by that will take you right to the main gate for all parks for a small fee.  The hotel front desk was welcoming, accommodating, friendly, and very helpful. The rooms were cozy, spacious, and clean - in fact, we loved the housecleaning staff.  The morning of my niece's 4th birthday, we met downstairs to have breakfast - they provide a nice buffet with the usual eggs, breakfast meats, fruit, waffles and pancakes stations, and an additional treat, like sausage gravy and biscuits.  One of the housekeeping staffers overheard me wishing the birthday princess a happy 4th birthday.  After we had seated, three lovely
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing a review of your stay with us. I am pleased to know you had an exceptional stay with us and found the hotel to exceed your expectations. I also appreciate your mention of the extra efforts of our kitchen staff. I want to assure you that your comments have been shared with all three of them as well as our management team as a whole. We appreciate you being our guest and sincerely hope to see you again on a future trip to Garden Grove!

Summary: I stayed here for 6 nights last week whilst attending the American College of Phlebology conference at a nearby venue. Apart from an issue with the toilet leaking and flooding overnight, it was a really enjoyable experience. In fact I was extremely impressed with how prompt the leak was dealt with and I was offered an upgrade to a better room without hesitation.  Breakfasts were plentiful and the extra evening snacks including the BBQ on Thursday were a pleasant surprise. I have nothing but praise for the staff who were all friendly and helpful and my check in and welcome were gratefully received after long travel from the UK. I would definitely stay here again - highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your review with us. I am sorry to hear you experienced a maintenance issue while with us, but I am very pleased to hear that our staff handled the situation quickly, efficiently and above your expectations and allowed you to fully enjoy your stay with us. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again on a future trip to Southern California.

Summary: Within walking distance to all sorts of activities and restaurants. Great location! Clean and comfortable rooms with a nice kitchen. Plenty of activities at the hotel as well if you just want to relax. Basketball, Ping-Pong and a nice swimming pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel and for being our guest. We appreciate your review and are pleased to know you found the hotel to be clean, comfortable and in a location that suited your needs. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Lots of surprises with this visit! When we arrived, we found that our room had been upgraded from a 2 queen bedroom to a 1 king bedroom with adjoining kids bunk bed room and kitchenette! Not only was the breakfast buffet wonderful, with lots of food options, but we also were surprised to find that the hotel offered different evenings with free dinner or desserts! An added treat was the fact that because we went through Get Away Today for our reservations, we were extended free parking at the hotel for the length of our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and thank you for your review. I am pleased to know your stay was filled with pleasant surprises and that you enjoyed your time with us. I hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guest again soon!

Summary: Our room was clean, comfortable and quiet. We enjoyed the complimentary breakfast two mornings and it was delicious. There is an inexpensiveness shuttle outside the hotel that runs every 20 minutes to Disneyland, but we did not use. Nice assortment of choices. Would definitively stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us. We appreciate you taking a moment to share your feedback with us and are pleased to know you had an enjoyable stay. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you again on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: The staff was very knowledge and friendly. We were always greeted upon arrive and departure. Our issue is the rooms and tvs need to be updated. The BBQ on Thursday was nice the only issue is I got food poisoning from it. I believe it was from the pasta salad since it was sitting out for a while.
Manager Response: Dear C3394JPchris,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at our hotel. I am glad you felt the staff took good care of you and was knowledgeable about the area. I am sorry to hear that you got food poisoning while you were in town. We have reached out to you by phone and are hoping we can connect to get some further information. We do everything we can to ensure the safety of our guests and will also be reaching out to other guests who ate during the same time to get as much information as possible. Thank you again for staying with us and writing a review, we hope to see you again when you are in the area.

Summary: We loved our stay at this hotel.  The breakfast was great, the staff was helpful and attentive, the rooms were very accommodating . We would absolutely recommend and stay there again when  visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean and comfortable. Good breakfast and snacks. Staff is friendly and helpful. Good location to Disney and restaurants. I recommend this place and would stay there again. Nice hot tub and pool. Child friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! I am very pleased to know you found the hotel to be clean and comfortable and our staff providing excellent service for you and your family. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we look forward to having you as our guest again soon.

Summary: I just returned from a 6 night stay at this hotel.  I was traveling with my daughter and her husband and their 4 children.  We spent a total of 3 days at Disneyland, one day at the beach and one day at Sea World. The accommodations are nice, enough room for everyone to move around.  The beds were a bit on the hard side, not real comfortable.  It was clean and well maintained, and all of the staff were friendly and helpful. The thing that impressed me were the extra details!  Mon thru Wed they serve something a little extra in the evenings i.e. s'mores one night, hot dogs another, etc.  They also had face painting for the children one morning, at no extra charge.  One evening the kids could write a letter to their favorite Disney character & a response is suppose to be mailed to
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest.  We are pleased to know you and your family enjoyed the extra space in our two bedroom suites and that it helped to make your Disneyland vacation more enjoyable. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope to have you as our guests again soon.

Summary: The place is clean. We got the nice view which we can see the pool outside. The kids enjoyed the swimming pool! There is a hot water spa were we can stay for a little bit before going to the swimming pool. The breakfast is good! A lot of choices. Each day has something new [food]! I never had tamales and bacon from other place that we stayed b4. There were sundae bar and bbq grill for the guest too!! I was WOW! We been spoiled.. I'd like to thank the staff who help us when we check in to find rooms for 9 people thats affordable!.. Surely I will make reservation to residence inn next time. Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate your comments on the our breakfast, cleanliness and overall staff service. I am happy to hear we were able to provide the perfect accommodations for your entire party and hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guests again soon.

Summary Heading: from almost perfect to boring average
Summary: First of all let me highlight the pros of this hotel welcoming staff, excellent location and price.  our stay started in early october when there seemed to be different managing policy resulting in attention to mimimum details selecting breakfast items then suddenly an incredible downgrading as if a universal spending review was decided to make clients run away. the breakfast became the same for two or sometimes three consecutive days lacking minimum creative changes. strawberry sauce used for waffles disappeared then the gluten free toast too leaving only bagles for gluten intollerant persons. tortilla and sour sauce were no more available and if you decide to follow a healthy low fat diet the simple boiled eggs were no more offered. the thursday bbq became a memory from the
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am sorry to hear your recent experience did not fully meet your expectations. I sincerely appreciate your feedback and want to assure you that your comments will be shared with our entire management staff. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we may have the opportunity to have you as our guest again on a future visit to Southern California.

Summary Heading: Excellent staff and best price in town
Summary: Best value for the money when attending a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center. Staff was quick to respond to any needs. They made great recommendations for places to eat. The hotel is older but well-maintained.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to know that during your time with us, you found our staff service to be excellent, the restaurant recommendations to be spot on and the hotel to be a great value overall. Thank you again for being our guest and we sincerely hope to have you as our guest again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Top Class Service, Top Class Breakfast, Top Class Everything!
Summary: My family and I visited Los Angeles for the first time last year for my birthday (Nov 2015) and we wanted a hotel that could promise a safe place to stay with Wi-Fi and breakfast. It exceeded those expectations by lengths we didn't think were possible.  At times we would have questions to the staff such as where to find hotels in San Diego or good restaurants and they would give top class service, any time of the day.  Additionally, my wife wanted to organize a surprise on the morning of my birthday and they organized cake and balloons in no time, and had once again proved that they were a great hotel. The stay was an experience unlike any other as we additionally got to see the beautiful fireworks from Disneyland outside our window every night.  Yet again, we felt loved, it was
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to know our staff was able to help make your special occasion memorable. We appreciate you being our guest and look forward to seeing you again on a future trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: Room was fair. Dirty carpets in room and hall ways.  Uncomfortable beds. Housekeeping forgot to clean our room. Breakfast fair. Just expected more from Marriott! Hate paying for parking on their private lot when they don't provide any kind of security! Ask them why they charge and nobody knows.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for your feedback from your recent stay. I want to assure you your feedback is important to us and want to assure you your comments will be shared with our entire management staff and actions taken immediately to correct your concerns.

Summary: This place never disappoints. Rooms are good size. The staff is always very helpful. We like to see familiar faces. It really is like a second home. Lourdes has always been fabulous at breakfast. Attentive and is great with the guests. You can tell she loves people and must like her job. She really goes out of her way to help guests. We like he fact that we can pop pizza in the oven or order Pizza Hut from across the street.  The pool and jacuzzi are always a welcome site after the park all day.  There are closer Marriott properties but none with the service and staff this one has. If you want a place that will make a family feel welcome ... look no further. This is the place!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel and for taking a moment to share a review with us. I appreciate your comments on our staff service. I want to assure you I have shared your comments with her as well as her entire department. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: We stayed for 7 nights. We had a great stay. The pool was great, we enjoyed the evening snacks and breakfast. The shuttle to Disneyland was on time and quick. Our room was well kept. Our housekeeper folded our children's blankets into swans. Nice extra touch.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent stay. I am very pleased to hear that our staff service, breakfast and evening snacks and the shuttle to Disneyland all helped to make your stay with us so enjoyable. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you again on a future trip to Disneyland.

Summary: One of my best experiences as a frequent business traveler. Staff and manager were extremely friendly and they try their best to make our stay satisfactory. The room was very clean - cleaner than most of the residence inn. The location is very convenient. Full disclosure: I'm a gold member.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest, and a Rewards member. We appreciate your feedback and am happy to know our staff, our room cleanliness and the hotels location all met, or exceeded, your expectations and we hope to have you as our guests again soon on a future visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Excellent staff, food,  and rooms! Lourdes, Luis, and Maria were amazing and made my birthday feel special! They made us feel very welcome and made great food! Thank you! We will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am pleased to know you had a great birthday getaway and our staff helped to make it so memorable. I will be certain to share your comments with our kitchen staff and their manager. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we look forward to having you as our guests again soon.

Summary: the place is great, overall excellent experience. friendly cheerful staff is the first, the last and the continous memory that stays with you. good location in a vibrant area so near to Disneyland . great value for money and amazing happy hour
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. as well as taking a moment to share a review of your stay with us. I am very pleased to know our staff service and their cheerful attitude helped to make your stay with us memorable. I appreciate you choosing our hotel for your stay and sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again soon on your next trip to the Magic Kingdom.

Summary: At first I thought about the distance being far to walk, but the hotel setting and complimentary breakfast is what I loved! They offer shuttle service to Disney only thing is you would have to pay an extra cost for it. But overall I give this hotel a 5
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent Disneyland get away. I am pleased to know you enjoyed your time with us and found the hotel, its location and the included breakfast to exceed your expectations. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you and your family again soon on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: We were there for Chapman University Parent's weekend (one of the few who were not there for Disney).  I picked this hotel specifically because it was brand new and looked lovely in pictures and it didn't disappoint.  We had a beautiful 1 bedroom king suite which was perfect for my husband, myself and our 14 year old.  This hotel is easy access to Disney, close to everything else Orange County offers.  The lobby is spacious and lovely.  There is a minimart at the hotel-where we got a free item because my husband is a Marriott Platinum Premier.  On the corner is a CVS that is also a fully stocked grocery store.  There is also a Coffee Bean across the street.  The breakfast in the morning is great with something for everyone. Hot and cold items, make your own waffles, coffee with
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad you had an excellent time in Anaheim and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The staff at this hotel is very friendly and helpful. The rooms were nice. We were happy with the set up. For a family of 5, 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms was wonderful. We had a nice view of the pool and our room was quiet and clean. The room didn't seem too dated, maybe a little but nothing bad. The beds were comfortable and made daily. The only complaint with our room was a lack of bedding.   The major disappointment for us was the breakfast. It was mostly the same thing everyday and very basic and bland. I am not a picky eater but found it hard to eat there everyday.   Our other disappointment was the temperature of the pool. The weather was very hot during our stay and after long days at Disneyland we looked forward to a swim. Unfortunately the pool was way too cold to swim.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your feedback with us. I appreciate your comments and will ensure they are shared with our entire management staff. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Hotel has everything you need and more!   We had a two bedroom suite for 4 adults and 2 kids. Lots of room. We didn't have to use the sofa bed so not sure if it was comfortable.  Beds were comfortable. Good variety of pillows.   Great hot breakfast included with lots of variety. They even offered free 'snacks' 3 evenings we were there. Hamburgers/hot dogs etc.....nothing fancy but beats cooking or paying a fortune to eat out!  Great pool area was nice to relax by the pool or in the hot tub after a long day walking. Pool was a little cool for me but the kids enjoyed it.  Kids had fun with table tennis and basketball court as well.   Room had everything we needed. Had to request more dishes but they brought them up right away. Handy to have ice machine in room but was noisy so we
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. I am very pleased to know you enjoyed your time with us and that the services and amenities of the hotel fully met your expectations. I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on a future trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: This is nice, new modern hotel. Room was great, with a full size fridge, microwave, dishes and everything. We had five adults in one room, the only thing tight was the bathroom area. Staff was great, front desk a little busy with the Disney crowd, but our maid Tomasa Espinosa was awesome and kept our room neat and orderly. All in all, a great stay. Oh, the hot breakfast was great two of our three days.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you being our guest.

Summary: We picked this hotel for location, suite size and free breakfast. Everything has met our expectations.  The evening snacks and barbecue was an added bonus.  The hotel is clean and staff are pleasant. If we bring the grandkids back again we would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent stay. I am pleased to know you found our location, room size and amenities all met your expectations. I am also pleased to know you enjoyed one of our seasonal BBQ's. I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you, and hopefully your grand kids, on a future stay at the hotel.

Summary: This is probably my third review of this property and I stand behind my previous comments.  I cannot say enough good things about this place.   Just to add to it.  On this particular stay. I casually mentioned at the front desk during check in that the purpose of this trip was for my daughter's 6th birthday.  The next day, the staff hand created a birthday present that they gave her.  That alone made this her "best birthday every!"  It is personal touches like this from their outstanding staff that makes this property as strong as it is.  Kudos again to the front desk staff.  YOU GUYS ARE THE BEST ;)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am very pleased to know the staff was able to recognize your daughters birthday and make your trip to Disney extra special. I appreciate you sharing your comments in your review and I will be certain to share your review with our entire Front Office staff. We hope to see you all again soon!

Summary: While the hotel was lovely, and the amenities fabulous- it was a lady named Lourdes who - every morning - went above and beyond to make sure our family was happy and taken care of! No matter what we needed - she was always eager to help with a big smile! She made our trip - and the Marriott group should know what a treasure they have in her!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am thrilled to know that our staff went above and beyond to ensure you had an excellent start and the "Best Experience Ever". I will be certain that your comments are shared not only with her, but our entire staff. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Full kitchen suite and convenient location
Summary: Love Marriott and as a rewards member, always enjoy the consistency of quality of all Marriott's at which I've stayed and the perks of being a reward member (Free wifi). This hotel was clean, nicely furnished and at a very convenient location. Staff was friendly and helpful. Loved that there was a full kitchen and free breakfast. The only thing I was displeased with was the state of the mattress on the sofa bed. It was so lumpy that I had to use the couch cushions on top of the mattress to make it usable
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent vacation. I am very pleased to know our staff, cleanliness and overall service met your expectations during your stay. Thank you for being a Rewards member, we sincerely appreciate your loyalty and hope to see you again soon on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: Great buffet breakfast every morning. Offered free dinners 3 nights. Had smores 1 night. Laundry facilities. Rooms clean and big. Friendly staff. Bus to Disney right in front of hotel. Lots of restaurants in walking distance of hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am delighted to know that your stay with us was a five star experience and truly appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences with us. We hope to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: This rating is only based on this recent trip only.  My family and I usually book this hotel, however this time I was not impressed. The room was not as clean and food was. Or at its best either. I'm thinking they may be short staff?
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel again. I am sorry to hear we feel short of your expectations during this stay. I want to assure you that your concerns have been shared with our entire leadership team to ensure this past experience is an isolated instance and is corrected. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The lobby, hotel, and room were very clean.  The staff was  friendly, helpful, and, knowledgeable! Even the security guard! Everything was great from the room to the parking.  They even are pet friendly! We arrived early and were accommodated! We were very happy!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate you choosing our hotel as well as taking a moment to share a review of your stay with us. I am pleased to hear you had a great stay with us and sincerely hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guest again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Rooms were clean. Breakfast was okay. Easy to get to Disneyland but not free. No airport shuttles.  Night time snacks and movies not every night. Kitchen was well stocked with utensils for cooking.  Hide a bed uncomfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel and for taking a moment to share your review with us. I am pleased to know you found the cleanliness and the in-room kitchens to meet your expectations. We appreciate you being our guest and hope to see you again on your next trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: The staff was very friendly. We celebrated my daughters birthday and the staff gave her a gift. The room was clean and the beds comfortable. They have complimentary coffee all day. The breakfast was very good with Waffles,eggs,sausage,oatmeal, bagels,juices,fruit ....We will definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to know our staff went above and beyond to recognize your daughters birthday and make your trip a little more memorable.I appreciate you taking a few moments to share your review with us and we sincerely hope to see you again on a future trip to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Spacious rooms, equipped kitchen, great for families.
Summary: Enjoyable stay, convenient kitchen, nice having separate rooms. Rooms needed painting. Bathrooms need to be worked on. Found some hair in one of the baths. Rooms were well cleaned every day. Breakfasts had a good variety, recommend a better quality of food though.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. We appreciate the feedback on your stay and the suite you stayed in. I am sorry to hear that attention was needed regarding the paint in your room, but rest assured I have advised our maintenance staff to the concerns and the issues have been corrected. Thank you for being our guest and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guest again soon.

Summary: Good location with easy access to all the things we needed. Helpful and friendly staff, even made small gift for our sons 8th birthday on arrival! Family friendly, good breakfast selection, and shuttles/buses right outside.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very happy to hear that our staff went above and beyond for you and your family and helped recognize your son's birthday. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and sincerely hope we may have the opportunity to have you as our guest again soon.

Summary: Had a great stay!  Very friendly and helpful staff.  Generous late checkout policy.  Nice pool and exercise room.  Never ran out of food at the breakfast bar and even supplied a light dinner on Monday and Tuesday.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences while with us. I am pleased to know you enjoyed your stay with us and I hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip Orange County.

Summary: Large rooms, awesome breakfast buffet, great facility and the best staff that goes above and beyond to make sure you are enjoying your stay while visiting Disneyland and the area. I attended the social gathering 3 days in a row and it was a lot of fun. The room was spacious and very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel. I am very pleased to hear that our staff, rooms and breakfast buffet all helped to make your stay with us such an excellent experience. I truly hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guest again soon on a future trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: First off, the staff was just delightful, every single person we came in contact with was so accommodating, kind, warm and welcoming.  HAYLEY, who worked with us from the start of our trip, to the day we checked out, went above and beyond to make us feel welcomed and cared about!!!  She is just a lovely person and my 2 year old daughter, still asked to go back and see the nice lady, Hayley! We were so touched by her kindness and sweet welcome basket she gave us!!! Residence Inn is so lucky to have her!!!   Our room was a 2 bedroom suite with living room and kitchen in the center between rooms. The amenities were home away from home. The room and bathrooms were very clean and beds were comfortable. The room was very spacious with lots of room and more to spare, being that we had
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for the kind words about our staff member. I am very please she helped you, and your daughter, have such an enjoyable stay with us. I will be certain to share your comments about your stay with our entire staff and your comments about her performance with her personally. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guest again soon!

Summary: The room was good enough for a family of six with two bathrooms,  lot of space so comfortable close to everything the only disappointed with the breakfast,  poor quality, I think they could do better the host at night shif was amazing,  he did x for us an outstanding service and we slways feel welcome and giving us a big smile!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to share your experiences while with us. I appreciate your feedback on your breakfast experience and will be certain to share your comments with the manager for that department. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to sunny Southern California!

Summary Heading: Better to stay elsewhere -- not up to Marriott standards
Summary: Thank goodness I only stayed there for one night, but it was a very poor night.  I'm a Marriott gold member and regularly stay for business.  This place doesn't fit the bill.  Here are few of the highlights.  1.  Noisy 2.  Staff can't answer basic questions or assist with the basics 3.  Things don't work.  Unless you want maintenance to keep coming to the room for basic services expected of much lower cost motels, don't go there.  It's not kept up. 4.  Bed was not comfortable -- or maybe it was the noise and problems that led to a sleepless night. 5.  I didn't get a bill either under the door or at checkout.  It was not uploaded promptly to the Marriott site.  I had to call to get it and only then found out I was over-billed.  I don't remember this ever happening at a Marriott.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort. We appreciate your feedback, and will address the challenges with the departments involved with utmost importance. Please understand the issues faced were an isolated incident but i do understand the frustrations which can happen. We always appreciate opportunities to rectify any situations before going on a public forum, as is we appreciate your feedback and coordinate our efforts accordingly.

Summary: Fairly basic hotel. Friendly helpful staff. Breakfast ordinary. Not many places to eat around hotel especially for vegetarians. We were not driving so dependent on public transport. Which was fine to Disneyland but uncertain anywhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking a moment to share your experiences with us. We hope to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: If you are looking for an economical accomodations this is the place.  Great staff and very clean.  The location was good easy to get around.   The staff made our visit to the area even more memorable they greeted us every time we came in and were interested in how our day was.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences while with us. I am very pleased to know that we exceeded your expectations for cleanliness and that you had an enjoyable stay with us. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Wonderful family hotel! Wonderful staff! Great pool area! We always stay at this property because with the grandchildren it is perfect. The 2. Bedroom units are great for families with children or families traveling with extended family members.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to share a review of your stay with us. I am pleased to know you had an enjoyable time at the hotel and sincerely hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to sunny Southern California!

Summary Heading: The best place to stay for a week at Dinsey!
Summary: Our room was clean and comfortable. The full kitchen was so nice to have! The staff are friendly and helpful. The breakfast is Incredible! We were blown away by the options. The perfect way to start out a long day.  And the snack hour they provide was an extra bonus!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences while with us and I am pleased to know you had an enjoyable stay with us. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: The Garden Grove area is great for a trip to Disney: Target across the street, many restaurant and fast food options, and a nice neighborhood with some higher end hotels. What we loved about the Residence Inn was the free breakfast buffet with the usual items but also extras like Brie cheese, tortillas to fill with breakfast items including spinach, several oatmeal toppings etc. The suites also have a FULL kitchen complete with a full size fridge, dishwasher,dishes, oven so that you can make complete meals with your groceries from Target. The pool area has 2 large BBQs which is lovely for a BBQ dinner by the pool. You purchase shuttle tickets from a machine outside the door and the stop is on Harbour, but we went through the gate by the pool across to the Hyatt and purchased
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking a moment to share a review of your experiences while with us. I am pleased to know you enjoyed your stay with us and I sincerely hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Nice but needs a deeep clean
Summary: We used to stay here pretty regularly when my son was younger. But left for other options when it was apparent the hotel needed a refresh. It was clear the hotel had seen seem refreshing in those years. The good: the front desk was very nice, even sending a bottle of wine up upon arrival. The location is great as we are near Disney and Target (for those last minute items). And the beds are comfy. The negative: the breakfast in the morning was a bit of a zoo. The bath tub in my son's bathroom had a huge rust stain. But the big thing that bothered me was when I went to grab a glass from the kitchenette and saw lipstick stains on its rim. It really made me question the cleanliness of everything. It was our last day so I didn't alert the desk, but it was really disconcerting.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for providing feedback on your stay with us. I am pleased to know our staff took great care of you and your family during your time with us. I am very concerned about the issues you experienced however. Please know that your comments have been shared with our management team and will be addressed immediately to ensure this experience is an isolated event. Thank you for staying with us and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guest again soon.

Summary Heading: The best hotel for families in the Disney area
Summary: This was my 6th stay at this Residence Inn and I cannot speak highly enough of it. The staff continues to be friendly, helpful and conscientious. The rooms have more than enough room and the beds are comfy (sofa beds could be a bit more padded, though!) This is the perfect place for families and groups to stay and have a break from the nearby attractions with a great Disneyland shuttle coming right to the front of the hotel. The grocery shopping option (hotel will shop for you before you arrive) is super and a real money saver - 8 adults ate for only $125 for 5 days vs all the food we would have bought in Disneyland or in restaurants. Great breakfast and super pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for being your "go to" hotel in the Disneyland area. We sincerely appreciate you staying with us time and again. I am very pleased to hear that our staff was as friendly, helpful and courteous as you have grown to expect. Thank you for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you on stay number seven!

Summary Heading: Excellent  place to bring family to stay.. helpful concierge
Summary: Absolutely  love this Inn.. residence stay.. this must've been the 4th time we've stayed here . Lourdes  and Alex concierge at front desk are extremely  helpful.. and the location is minutes from the  Disneyland area, theme parks  close to LA.. which means it's also close your all the LA beaches and Hollywood/ things to see. There's  a shuttle to the Disneyland resort.. entertainment and all conference  areas...  very nice if you need a break with your family. Lourdes and Alex 5 stars. 👍
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel. I am very pleased to know that you found our location to be perfect for the needs of you and your family and that our staff went above and beyond to make sure you were well taken care of. I want to assure you that your comments have been shared with them as well as each of their departments. I appreciate you taking a moment to share your review with us and sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a week on company business. The suite was very large with several rooms and a complete kitchen....just like being at home with a few exceptions. The kitchen was sparsely stocked...no can opener, frying pan, or spatula. There were a few pots but forget it if you wanted to fry anything on the stove or needed to open a can. The kitchen was also dimly lit with a very old and outdated light fixture.   The toilet in the master bath was hard to flush and would run water constantly if you didn't wiggle the handle which was very loose as well as the toilet seat. Sometimes in the middle of the night or early morning the toilet would make gurgling sounds that woke me up and the water level in the bowl would drop low...seems like they have drain venting issues.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very sorry to hear that we fell short of your expectations in so many areas during your stay. Please know that each and every one of these items is important to us and will be addressed/corrected immediately. Thank you for choosing our hotel and I sincerely hope we may have the opportunity to better serve you on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed here one night and we liked it so good that we chose to stay another night.  We stayed in a 2 bedroom 2 bath suite. This accommodated my family perfectly.  The hotel has a free hot breakfast.  This hotel is convenient to many  restaurants.  It is close to Disneyland, but definitely not close enough to walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to know our two bedroom two bath suite fit the needs of your family perfectly and helped to make your stay so enjoyable. I appreciate you choosing our hotel and sincerely hope we get to see you again on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: Everything about our stay here was wonderful. We stayed here for 9 nights with adult kids and having 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms was the only way we could have gotten ready on time  for our busy days at Disney etc. I liked the fact that the sink in 2 queen bedroom was outside the toilet/bathtub area so I could get my makeup on while someone was showering.There is another bathtub/sink and toilet off 2nd bedroom (with bunk beds) but just a note- there is no blow dryer in that one so you might want to pack your own if you are counting on using it.  There is a living room with a terrible sofa bed in between these two bedrooms. Sofa beds definitely need to be replaced! Everyone also commented on how thick and hard the pillows are. I fortunately had my own along but my daughter in law
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your review with us. I am pleased to know you enjoyed your stay with us and found our two bedroom two bath suite to be well suited for the needs of your party. I hope we have the opportunity to see you and your family again soon.

Summary Heading: Great if you need some extra space
Summary: This is nice if you want some extra space with separate living room and bedroom along with kitchen.  Free breakfast is nice and the staff does a good job of keeping up with large crowds.  They don't really have a shuttle, per se.  They have a bus option that seemed to be a little inconvenient.  You can walk to Disneyland from the hotel. It might be a long walk back after a long day at the park.  Our room had an air conditioning leak and the front desk took care of it right away.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing a review of your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again on a future trip to Disneyland.

Summary: A great hotel for families.  They offer a delicious breakfast buffet with anything you could want to eat.  In the evenings there is always some type of food that is offered at either no cost or minimal.  Conveniently located to several restaurants. Rooms were clean, the only complaint is the bathroom is in the bedroom.  If you have someone visiting or sleeping on the sofa bed, they have to go into the bedroom to use the bathroom.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing a review of your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again on your next trip to the Magic Kingdom.

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: We love staying here when we visit Disneyland.  We really like the locations (we walk to the parks), free breakfast and the layouts of the rooms.   We have a toddler and this hotel is perfect.  The room isn't super fancy, but it is always clean and has exactly what we need.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. We appreciate you sharing your review with us and are very happy to know you enjoyed your time with us again. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Good for Disney but getting run down
Summary: We stayed here about ten years ago and it was great!  I've been wanting to stay here again but the prices are always so high I have not usually chosen this hotel for our Disney trips.  This time the price was good so we got a two bedroom, bunk-bed suite.  I stay at a lot of Marriott's for work and so I have a pretty high expectation for the Marriott brand.  This hotel was just fine, but a little lower than the typical Marriott standard, in my opinion.  I'll give them credit that they must go through a thousand kids a week in this place being so close to Disneyland, but there's a lot of TLC this place could use.  The staff was very helpful and great.  When we arrived our room wasn't ready and so Bill check our bags and gave us lots of local advice on where to eat, when the park
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am pleased to know that the service we provided exceeded your expectations. I am sorry, however, to hear that the condition of your room did not. I appreciate your review and want to assure you that this will be looked into and addressed. I appreciate you choosing our hotel and sincerely hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guest again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Edith was very attentive and thoughtful during our recent stay.  Her help made our stay an enjoyable one.  No matter how busy she was or what she was doing she would stop to do whatever we needed.  Her friendliness makes us want to come again.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing a review of your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again on a future trip to Disneyland.

Summary: After being a long time member with Marriott, this Residence Inn has made it to the top of my list as the best hotel stay.  The staff here was amazing and extremely customer focused.  They went above and beyond to be helpful and friendly.  It wasn't just one or two staff members, but the entire staff there treated us with friendliness and made our stay amazing.  Hard working group of folks here.  Thank you for a beautiful room and an amazing stay.  You made our family's first trip to CA together an amazing one.  Thank you!!  We will definitely come and visit and recommend your hotel to our family land friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to Marriott as well as being our guest. I am very pleased to know that your experience with us was nothing less than exceptional and that our staff went above and beyond to ensure your stay was very memorable. I sincerely hope that we have the opportunity to see you again soon on a future trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Average stay in an average hotel
Summary: We were planning another trip to Disneyland and because it was as last minute decision there were limited options and for our budget this was one of the few hotels available that would accommodate my 2+2. Check in was seamless and the social that happens every Monday to Thursday we are a fanily of 2+2 and booked into this hotel as a last minute . check in was good and effecient evening was a lovely touch. That Thursday night it was hamburgers and hot dogs and the weather was lovely.  Now down to the downside- the room was adequate as described, although it did look a bit tired and the sofa bed had definitely seen a few guests as there were alot of loose springs. The bedding for the sofa bed was in the cupboard and though we had booked for our family of four we were expected to
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am pleased to know the hotel accommodated the needs of you and your family well. I am however, concerned about your room having not received service daily during your stay. I want to assure you that our policy is that all rooms are serviced daily, unless our guests request no service. I appreciate you bringing this to our attention and sincerely hope we may have the opportunity to better serve you and your family on a future trip to sunny Southern California.

Summary: Residence Inns have their pluses with kitchenettes that are good for extended stays and with breakfasts etc.  Obviously with the location and these amenities it is good for families. The hotel staff is good--pleasant and helpful.  But a couple of observations that would suggest it would be worthwhile to stay at a different hotel or Residence Inn.  The parking is $15 a day and combined with the taxes, the stay ends up costing more than expected.    The elevators or lack of them is an incredible nuisance.  It was not uncommon to wait more than 10 minutes to have an open elevator.  The stairways are inconveniently located such that they exit the building and are not close to the parking lot.  I did get to meet quite a few people from the hotel as I seemed to see lots of familiar
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing a review of your stay with us. I am sorry to hear we did not fully meet your expectations during your stay. I want to assure you your feedback has been shared with all of our managers to ensure the best practices are in place and changes are made where possible to ensure the best experience for all of our guests moving forward. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again on a future trip to Orange County.

Summary: The hotel was amazing. Moises and all the staff went above and beyond to help us. The room was big, clean and the way they provided a BBQ dinner on the night we were there was unbelievable. The breakfast was also plentiful. Regretting not staying here longer! Will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel. I am very pleased to know you thoroughly enjoyed your time with us and everything about your stay, from the room size and cleanliness to the BBQ during your stay, exceeded your expectations. Thank you for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for the second time and it was just as great as the the first!! This is a great place for large families, there were eight of us and we got the two bedroom suite.  It was so spacious and had two bathrooms, which was great! The desk clerks, breakfast workers and housekeepers are all so friendly, helpful and accommodating! Not once did anybody make you feel like you were a bother to them. I do feel for the breakfast crew at times, they work very hard to keep food stocked, while I realize it's free, people pile their plates with food that probably gets wasted more often than not. Just because it's free people, doesn't mean you have to act like hungry animals!! I am looking forward to another visit next year!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel again for your vacation needs. I am pleased to know we exceeded your expectations again and sincerely look forward to having you as our guests again on your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We stayed here two times this time is was not as clean as first. The tv did nit work but overall it was good. Love the back yard for families. The breakfast needs to get better for the price. I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your return stay. I am very sorry to hear we did not meet the expectations from your first stay with us, but please know I have shared your comments with our management team to ensure the items you mentioned are addressed. Thank you for being our guest and I sincerely hope we get to see you again soon!

Summary: Very comfortable place with all essentials needed.. Clean and comfortable mattresses, very good housekeeping ,coffee 24 hours at lobby. . Breakfast buffet  has all what you need scrambled eggs, burger,pan cakes waffles, cereals, cheese., etc (same food every day)
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences while with us. I am very pleased to know that we exceeded your expectations for cleanliness and that you had an enjoyable stay with us. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to sunny So Cal!

Summary: We used our timeshare and requested an exchange through Interval International. However I got tired of waiting and booked a getaway instead. We usually stay at Residence Inn when we travel locally but this one took the icing on the cake. We love Residence Inn because they serve breakfast daily. This location didn't have the usual continental breakfast - it was literally a buffet. They offered regular and egg whites, pork, andouille & turkey sausage, waffles, pancakes or French toast plus an assortment of Fruit, bread (bagels, croissants, English muffins, and others) plus the usual cereal. Everyday was a new adventure in the dining room. They even offered a full size stove/oven in the 2bdrm suite we had. So we could have cooked but fortunately we didn't have to. This resort
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel, we sincerely appreciate you sharing a review of your stay with us and are thrilled to know we exceeded your expectations. Thank you for being our guests and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guests again soon!

Summary: This hotel is great! From the moment we arrived till the moment we left we loved it. We stayed in a 2 room with couch in one room, 2 queen beds in another, and full kitchen.
