It was very clean and up to date. We had the 7th floor across from the elevator and had a view of the fireworks at Disney. It was convenient access to elevator and noise was not an issue. Breakfast was served each morning with a large variety of foods like cereal, bagels, muffins, pancakes, waffles, beverages, etc. the pool area was great with large pool, kiddie pool and jacuzzi. Their was a shuttle service to Disney parks right outside hotel. We have 2 adults and 1child and it cost us about $21 for 2 days of unlimited transportation between parks. The hotel does charge $15 a night for parking. There is also
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences while with us. I am pleased to know you enjoyed your stay with us and I sincerely hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: We loved our stay at this property! Check in staff were friendly and helpful and let us check in at 10am (such a relief after 3 days of plane travel!). Our room was perfect for our family of four, pool area was great for the kids! They offer a free "snack" Monday-Wednesday 6pm-8pm - it was more than enough for dinner! Breakfast was great. Would definitely stay there in the future!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent family get away. I am very pleased to know you enjoyed your time with us and that all of your experiences, from check in through check out, were excellent. I appreciate you taking a moment to share your review with us and sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you and your family again soon!

Summary: This hotel is clean every morning I saw the same wonderful cleaning person in the lobby, health club area, rest rooms and breakfast. She worked her butt off and was friendly as well.  The front desk people are very well trained and friendly. Nice location near the convention center, Disney, and tons of restaurants. Nice value for the money
Manager Response: Dear Mike,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your positive experience with our hotel and TripAdvisor community. I will make sure to share your feedback with our lobby attendant. She will be delighted to hear that someone recognized her and her outstanding performance.   Have a great 4th of July weekend,

Summary Heading: Just average, tight parking, ok food
Summary: Were there for 1 night and found it to be average hotel. Parking wasn't extra but hard to find a spot. Rooms were average and on the older side making it look like they might need renovating soon. Didn't really hear noise at night so was able to get some rest. Morning breakfast was packed with Disney going families. Food was just average at the breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. We appreciate you taking a moment to share your review and appreciate your feedback.

Summary: Attended a conference held in Disney Land and decided to stay out of Disney complex. Chose Residence Inn by Marriott because of low budget, location, and amenities. Friends joined us at last minute and it was a real vacation. It was all excellent, beyond expectations. The room and bathroom spacious, accommodated 4 adults with 2 Queen size beds and a sofa bed. The kitchenette complete with oven, micro, sink, pots, electric coffee, dishes, glasses. Daily cleaning. The swimming pool, hot tub, plus a toddler pool was adjacent to area with grills and tables for picnic. Pool towels large and conveniently located. Laundry room spacious and economical. The complimentary breakfast was a buffet of juices, fruits, cereals, hot dishes and drinks, and varied the 3 days of our stay ( one day
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: This hotel was a good place for our family of 6.  It was close to Disneyland, restaurants, about 30 minutes to Huntington Beach, and an hour to Hollywood.  The breakfast was perfect, with something to satisfy everyone.  The sofa bed was not comfortable at all, but our youngest was able to sleep on it with some modifications.  We put the sofa cushions on top of the mattress and then put the sheet on top of that.  Thankfully she was small because an adult could not have slept on it without feeling the bars.  The hotel was clean but needed a little more detailed cleaning in corners, drawers, under the sink, bathroom, etc.  it was very nice to have a refrigerator, microwave, and oven.  It is an additional $15 to park in the parking lot each day, so just be aware of that extra
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary Heading: Edith and other employees of Residence Inn
Summary: This was the first time we went to this Residence Inn near Disneyland. Have not been to Disneyland for about 9 years. My Triple AAA Insurance agent recommended this hotel. We loved  their morning buffet. There was such a variety of food to choose from there.  Scrambled eggs, different kinds of sausages, bacon, pancakes, French toast, tamales, all kinds of breads, fruits, cereal, waffles, and juices and more!! There was a wonderful young lady named Edith who did a fantastic job with the buffet running constantly to help people who had questions and making sure food was available  at all sections all the time.. There was also another free food surprise that they offered on Monday- Wednesday nights from 6:00P.M.-8:00P.M. Edith was instrumental in this endeavor, also. It was listed
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: Can't Believe We Found This One
Summary: Rolling with a large family usually means a cramped room and large expense. But we came to L.A. simply because we were able to find this hotel for what I'd normally pay for a single-queen. I'll be going back for that price, even if it was just because it was Memorial Day weekend.  The staff was very friendly, room was clean, and if you have a large family, this is a great spot that feels more like home with privacy for mom and dad, than a college dorm room.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your Memorial Day getaway. I am pleased to know we exceeded your expectations for room size and value. I hope we get to see you again soon on a future Disneyland getaway.

Summary: It was okay. We got there early, around 10am. We were told there were no rooms ready and it could be as early as 12 or as late as 4pm. That was disappointing. The front desk person took down our number and said she'd call us when a room was ready. 12pm came and we figured we would give a call. There was a room ready and we could head back over. I really wish someone would've called us because we had other things to do that morning. (And were elite members as well) breakfast was sub par at best. Jammed packed and nothing was stocked. By 8:30am anything edible is gone. They need more staff tending to the buffet. It's just too many guests for 1-2 people.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us.  I sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay with us. I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we are providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to regain your trust on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: This place is the best! Best value for a family. Safe and clean. Very friendly staff..
Summary: We have been staying here for years. Lourdes is one of the ladies that helps prepare breakfast. She is always friendly and accommodating. Honestly, its people like her that keep us coming back. She goes out of her way to see that my family is taken care of. Breakfast has everything from scrambled  eggs, toast, biscuits and gravy. The list goes on and on. Fresh fruit, juice 4 different cereal. The breakfast has something for everyone. The lobby can get busy but the tables are cleared fast for the next group. honestly, we have never been disappointed with breakfast,  The rooms are spacious. The layout of the rooms is awesome for families. There is plenty of space.  The beds are comfortable!!!! Hot water is abundant. This last trip we checked in late at night. Jennifer was so kind
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay! I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary Heading: Great hotel at a great price
Summary: Recently stayed here with my wife and son, having looked at a lot of options in and around LA. This hotel offers the complete package for a great price in comparison to central LA hotels. The added benefit of a pool and breakfast sold it to us! Great location if you're looking to do Disney or Knott's Berry, and Hollywood and Universal were only just over half an hour by car too. The staff couldn't be more helpful either.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay! I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: We just finished a 3 night stay and were very pleasantly surprised.  Our room faced Harbor Blvd which is quite busy but the room was well insulated.  Lots of eating choices within walking distance.  Breakfast was a little hectic with lots of families and food was average but about what you would expect in a Residence Inn.  Will definitely stay here again on our next trip to this area.  Staff was extremely friendly and welcoming.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay! I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: With so many hotels to choose from, skip this place and go somewhere else!  The Pros-  - Polite front desk - Across the street from a Target - Full size fridge  The Cons -  - Furniture is cheap and hodge podged together in room - Breakfast is unorganized and food is not replenished fast enough (on weekends start at 7:00... A little late in the morning for the parks!) - No "happy hour" only crappy food and soda! - Parking upon check-in is a mess and dangerous (watch your kids!)  Our story:   Since my daughters 9th birthday fell on the day after Memorial Day we decided to surprise her with a trip to Disneyland. We have been many times and typically stay at the Red Lion, which is a decent place to stay, but decided to try something different. Surprisingly, most hotels were in the
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very sorry to hear we failed to meet your expectations during your stay. Please know that your review, and your concerns, are important to us and will be shared with our management staff to ensure the best practices are in place for our guests. Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary: Service  Everyone at this hotel was helpful and able to answer our questions.  The breakfast staff was very helpful.   Location  For those visiting the Disney resort don't let the city name of Garden Grove fool you.  It is right off Harbor Blvd and a short drive to Disney via car and I think they also have a shuttle stop out front.  It can be difficult to find because the sign near the entrance/exit is not very big so watch carefully!  It's on the corner of Harbor and Chapman across the street from an Outback Steakhouse, next to a Hyatt.   Exterior  Well kept. There is a small parking lot on the property. (Additional fee for parking). Although we were able to find a stall each night, it was near the back of the lot. I'm sure during peak seasons/times parking may be limited or
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay! Summary: This was a great hotel for our family. All in one room but had privacy. Felt like an apartment. Room was clean and kids enjoyed watching tv in their own room or even the living room. Great breakfast too!

The location is convenient to a slew of restaurants, Starbucks and even a Target if you want to stock up on food for the week.

Summary Heading: Perfect for a family with kids!
Summary: Highly recommend staying here!  Just a few minutes away from Disneyland. Kids loved the whole hotel, game room, kids pool, and we loved watching movies in the kid dinning area.  Shuttle made it convenient to get to Disney.

Summary Heading: From check in to check out, we had such a great experience
Summary: Front desk found out that it was our anniversary and sent us a care package to our room. I was very impressed on how clean our room was. Every employee in the breakfast area was exceptionally friendly.  We had a great experience with this property and will definitely return.

Summary: This hotel is super clean with spacious suites and full kitchens.  Free, high quality,  full breakfast buffet every morning - awesome.  Kids dining room with kid size tables and chairs and big screen TV with Disney channel playing- kids loved it!  Tues-Thursday a feature treat from 6-8 p.m.  One night a taco bar another night build our own waffle cone sundae.   And the she service is amazing. Need more towels?  Done.  Need extra blankets or sheets? Delivered immediately.  Need help finding a movie theater for that day you're not in Disneyland.  Just ask.  The ladies at the desk were super friendly and helpful.  My only small complaint would be the comfort of the hide-a-bed mattress, not great. I slept on it as a couch rather than pull it out (better). But 2 bedrooms with King
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay! Summary: My husband and I picked this hotel for our recent trip to Disneyland because the kitchenette in the room, and the free breakfast allowed us to save on some of the expense of vacationing with a family of 5.  It turned out to be much more than just a good bargain!  From the friendliness of the front desk staff, to the cleanliness of the rooms and common areas, to the extra no-charge amenities (basketball court, ping-pong table, snacks/water/coffee in the foyer, even a grocery shopping service!), everything about this hotel was wonderful from start to finish.  The only downside was that there was no complimentary shuttle service to the Park, but at $40 for the 5 of us for 3 days, it wasn't a big deal to pay for one that picked up in front of the hotel and came by every 30 minutes.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay! Summary: The two bedroom suite we had in this hotel was absolutely perfect for our visit to Anaheim.  The staff was super courteous and helpful. We will definitely be looking at this hotel again.  They weren't super fancy but we loved the two bedrooms, one with a bunk bed for two of our three kids. Also, this suite stands apart from others in that there were two bathrooms. You can't beat that when returning from a busy day and everyone just wants to get to bed. The laundry room was really convenient too and you can buy soap from the front desk which was perfect. Complimentary breakfast was great as well with make your own waffles, lots of bacon, eggs, fruit, pastries, etc. Finally, we really enjoyed playing in the pool and hot tub one day of our visit. Not extravagant but just perfect
Manager Response: Dear Explore17814 We want to send a big thank you to you and your family for this wonderful review. We are glad to hear that you had a great stay with us during your most recent trip to Anaheim. It is an absolute pleasure to be able to receive such great compliments. We hope to see you back at our hotel soon. Safe travels from all of our staff here at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area.

Summary: I have stayed at many of the Residence Inns in the Western United States, (business) and travel with a service animal dux to a hearing problem (I don't) so I always look for a stay with either tolerance or is pet friendly (or both) and easy access to my vehicle,  This Property excels in both needs.  First Floor, King Bed, Pup Tolerant ! can't beat that.

Summary Heading: Great for long term business stay in a family filled hotel
Summary: Stayed here for several weeks on business.  The staff works hard to assist guests.  Keep in mind that it can be a bit hectic on peak Disneyland days,especially during breakfast.  Despite the number of children, the noise level is low.  Hotel does need updating but is clean and comfortable.  Within walking distance of a few restaurants and Target.

Summary: We recently stayed at this hotel (again) and had a wonderful stay. We arrived late Thursday night; Jen @ the front desk was very friendly and helpful. When you're on a trip with 8 high school girls, clean towels are vital and a nicely made bed at the end of the day was greatly appreciated! A hot breakfast every morning (with much needed coffee!) made mornings easy, and the overall value of our stay immeasurable. The staff is always friendly, rooms are always clean ... I recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: Have been staying at this hotel for a few years every time my family travels to the Anaheim area. The staff Is always amazing! The breakfast and evening hour is great for families. We always enjoy seeing the food staff especially Lourdes! They go above and beyond to make the Residence inn experience great!

Summary: We have stayed in this hotel 10+ times. It's starting to show its age. The couch is to the point of being too uncomfortable to sit on. The kitchens are beyond the point of being able to be cleaned. Surfaces are fading, dishwashers are not functioning properly and the housekeeping staff needs a nap. When Frank P left as the GM, the establishment suffered tremendously. Time to spend some money on renovations, until then hello Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am sorry to hear that we failed to meet your expectations on your latest stay with us. Please know your comments will be shared and discussed. We appreciate your candor in the matter and sincerely hope that we may have the opportunity to regain your trust in our property on a future stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: This was our second trip to Disney area in last few years and we were looking for something away from the Park and the chaos. This hotel fit the bill and it was a great choice.  Check in-Super friendly, Alex was on it and we got cookies for the kids upon check in. Good cookies too. They were delicious.  Room- We had a one-bedroom Suite which is what we prefer. We like the separate bedroom even though you have to cut through the bedroom to get to the only bathroom. It has a kitchenette, full fridge, microwave, cook top, sofa bed, etc.   The room overall was clean with the exception of one thing: There was hair on the phone and all over the shower curtain and shower area, which admittedly was disgusting. I took a wet wash cloth and wiped it all off. Obviously it was missed by

I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Summary: We had a very comfortable stay at this hotel during our trip to Disneyland. We had the double room with the king bed room and twin bunk beds. The room is well ursnished, kitchen well stocked with utensils, dishes and silverware.  A few areas in the room do show the age of the property; however, this did not affect our stay in any way.  The sleeper sofa was extemely uncomfortable for sleeping, this is something I would keep in mind if my travelling party consisted of more than 4 people.  We did not use the pools. They were of decent size.  daily breakfast was good, and it wasn't very crowded during our stay.  The hotel is a good distance (1.5 miles) from Disneyland. We did not attempt to walk to the Disneyland park. An Uber ride cost between $6-$7 each way.

Summary: We stayed here in April of 2016, and previously in 2013. Nice lobby, beautiful grounds and pool area, and a great free breakfast (with a decent variety that is kept well stocked) to start the day. We were able to check in early which was a huge plus. Our King suite was a corner room on the 4th floor and it was nice and quiet. Our room was very clean, but we did notice that it was starting to lose its polish a bit (stained grout, scuffed/chipped furniture, scraped/peeling wallpaper, etc). Of course these are all little things that had absolutely no effect on our stay, but they did stand out. The PCA shuttle was very convenient, though I can see how crowding may be an issue during the busy seasons. Overall this is a clean hotel with many great amenities. It's also close to many

Summary: This hotel is not as fancy as its next-door neighbor, the Hyatt, but it's cheaper and perfectly fine.  I only stayed one night (because I'd rented a house), but the place was quiet and the breakfast was good.  The pool and hot tub were nice, and there's a Starbuck's in the lobby of the Hyatt next door - less than a 5-minute walk away.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking a moment to share your experiences with us. We hope to see you again on a future trip to Garden Grove.

Summary: This property is your average Residence Inn - not anything special. It was sufficient for our needs at Disneyland because we weren't in the room much - staying all day at the parks! Breakfast was about what you expect for Residence Inn and was the same each day, though I would have liked more healthy options.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking a moment to share your experiences with us. We hope to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel during Spring Break (March 18 - 25, 2016).  This was our second stay and it didn't disappoint.  The room was large, clean and very comfortable.  My only complaint (thus the 4 stars) is that the rooms could use some maintenance.  I'm guessing that it's such a busy property that things run down quickly.  The sink had a foul odor when you turned on the water.  It probably needed to be snaked.  The maintenance did it once an it helped a little but the smell still lingered.  The breakfast did not disappoint.  The staff tried to keep the breads, fruit and buffet well stocked but it was a full house and people were eating everything quicker than they could move.  That's the price you pay for Spring Break.  The location is excellent.  Close to restaurants and a
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your Spring Break get away. While The hotel can be very busy at that time, I am pleased to know that our staff ensured your needs were taken care of. Thank you for sharing this review with us and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guest again on your next trip to Southern California!

Summary: This property rocks.  It is just down the street from Disney.  A plethora of dining and shopping choices are nearby.   Breakfast is very good.  Housekeeping was excellent.  The exercise room was just a little bit better than a prior Residence Inn I stayed at in SD.  You cannot go wrong.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent vacation. I am pleased to know you and your family had a great stay with us and sincerely appreciate your compliments about the hotel. We like to think we rock as well! I am pleased to know our cleanliness exceeded your expectations as well. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you again on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: Stayed in a 2 bedroom suite with kitchenette - 2+2 - roomy, clean family friendly, full  size fridge. Suite had 2 x ensuites, which really worked well.  Great pool for teen kids. Nice and close to restaurants and take out. Could request no housekeeping.  Shuttle to Disneyland $5 per head return - easy to use, on the half hour.  No restaurant on-site, breakfast very busy as included in room rate.  Target close by, Orange Outlets about 5 mins drive.  Good self laundry, very friendly and professional staff. Self parking.  Would certainly stay again with kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our rooms were able to accommodate your family.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: Every person I spoke to at the hotel provided fantastic service. I give 5 stars to their front desk and management.  They even held it together with a smile when I overheard a woman getting upset about their parking situation. One of the security officers even offered her his spot. (See below on parking). For the price, the room was spacious: Two bedrooms, two baths, a kitchen and small living area. Two complaints: the room was very dark - need to up the wattage on the light bulbs!  Second was the mattresses. The pull out couch was unacceptable. The queen in the bedroom was ok but sagging in the middle. The bunk bed mattresses were fine. Free Breakfast was good !  Always water and coffee in the lobby... Parking late was sometimes an issue but the front desk validated a parking
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we are providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: Great place to stay!  Breakfast is excellent.  They had coffee and water available all day! Our room was great and everyone was very friendly. We didn't use the pool but it was well taken care of with plenty of room to sit outside and enjoy the sun.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent vacation. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences at the hotel and  I'm pleased to know you enjoyed your stay with us. I sincerely hope that we have the opportunity to have you as our guest again on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: This hotel is perfect for family travel. We rented a two bedroom suite and were very pleased as we had four adults and three children under six. The full kitchen was very helpful and the breakfast was great.
Manager Response: Dear Patricia U,  Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your experience at our hotel. We are delighted that we were able meet and exceed your expectations. Please keep us in mind when your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area.   Best Regards,

Summary Heading: I did not want to leave!
Summary: I stay at the resort about twice per year.  Once again, my experience was excellent.  I arrived relatively late (about 10:00 pm) on a Saturday night and the front desk attendant recognized me and had all of my materials waiting and I was able to check in within 5 minutes!  My room was spotlessly clean, well appointed, and was a full sized suite with full kitchen and large new king size bed and furniture.  The room was on the eighth floor and faced the pool and recreation/BBQ area.  I was amazed that every staff member that I encountered stopped to welcome me by name! This included Moises, Bill, Lourdes, and Walter - this truly made me feel welcome.  In addition, the staff asked me if they could help me in any way to simply ask.  My room was very quiet and I slept very well.  The
Manager Response: Dear Keith H,  We cannot thank you enough for posting such a wonderful review. Positive feedback like yours only fuels our staff to continue to provide world class service to each and every one of our guests. We all thank you for your continued loyalty and support.   Best Regards,

Summary: My family of 6 went to Disneyland and booked this hotel because of the location and price. One room fit us all with 2 queen beds and a pull out couch.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  We used both the gym and laundry room and both were great.
Manager Response: Dear Emily H,  We are delighted to hear about your positive experience at our hotel and hope to have the opportunity to host you and your family on your next trip out to the Anaheim area.   Best Regards,

Summary Heading: Not enough attention to details with the booking
Summary: I rang from Australia 4 times to correct and confirm configuration of our rooms, months in advance, and almost every detail was ignored in spite of my reminders and requests for details in writing. On arrival I was informed by the Manager, that every detail to which was advertised and which I had confirmed, was subject to an extra charge if applied (bed types and setups). At length he did not apply these charges, but there should never have been a question. Things like this happen almost every time we visit there and leaves me/us apprehensive to book again. It is not how to end 15-20 hrs of travel. then after having booked months in advance we are told to have a seat in the lobby and wait 5 -6 hrs for our rooms to be ready The time before this their private Taxi service
Manager Response: Dear Ajpaul5308,  Thank you for taking the time share your feedback with us. I apologize for inconvenience that you all had to go through with the reservation process. Sometimes our international travel agents don't communicate the details of your requests with the property and we can sometimes run into some minor misunderstandings. I believe that we were able to square you and your family away during the check in process and invite you to email me or call me directly when planning your next trip. We hope that you had a great flight home and look forward to hosting you next year.   Best Regards,

Summary: The hotel is walking distance from stores, restaurants and the convention center. Plenty of free parking space. Spacious rooms and comfortable beds. Great buffet breakfast. Nice swimming pool and jacuzzi.
Manager Response: Dear Mark F,  Thank you for sharing your positive review with our TripAdvisor community. We are only truly content when we have exceeded the expectations of our guests. Thank you again for your valuable feedback.   Best Regards,

Summary: Awesome location near Disneyland, shopping, and dining.  Decent complimentary breakfast.  Clean rooms.  But it needs updating.  Wood furniture is worn.  The dresser drawer was broken and wouldn't open.  There were no pots/pans in our kitchen.  The TV remote was missing.  Phone in living room didn't work.  The windows aren't very soundproof.  We were woken up at 8:00am by the sound of basketball playing and shouting, and we were on the 6th floor.  Air conditioner is really loud.  These are all nitpicky things, but I expect more from a Marriott hotel.  But I would stay again for the functionality of having a kitchen and multiple rooms for my family.
Manager Response: Dear diznychic,  Thank you so much for your positive comments and we truly appreciate the honest feedback about your room. I will ensure that those items have all been addressed and ensure that there is a bigger focus on the details that are some important to our hotel and our brand. We wish you safe travels and hope to see you back soon!  Best Regards,

Summary Heading: Fantastic rooms with full kitchens - perfect for the family trip to Disneyland
Summary: This was an excellent hotel with great service and good amenities in Anaheim.  We made great use of the shuttle service to Disneyland which went from right outside the hotel - very regularly and very reliably.  Having a full kitchen and a suite with a separate kids room (including bathroom!) was fantastic for breaking up the day and allowing for some homemade meals rather than always takeaway or room service.   With Target across the road, you can access groceries and snacks / drinks easily and make your holiday very smooth.  The breakfast that is included was basic but plentiful and fresh.  A great start, early in the  morning when you are off for a day at Disney or other spots around Anaheim. I would definitely recommend this to people who are looking for a self contained
Manager Response: Travel_With_TC, We thank you for sharing such positive comments about your most recent stay with us. Our goal is to always provide a memorable experience. We know that our guests have many choices in the area and we are truly thankful that families like yours take the time to share their experiences with our wonderful TripAdvisor Community. We hope to see you back soon!  Best Regards,

Summary: We are so grateful to and for the staff at this hotel. Gris, Ericka and Maria do a FABULOUS job and prepare the breakfast every morning! Also Manager Raymond, Manager Briana, and the front desk staff, Hayley, Keesha, Krystal, are fantastic and helpful. The kitchenettes are a great asset! Thank You to the entire staff for all you have done for us. The Mosse' Family
Manager Response: Dear Kamela,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post such a wonderful review. I will make sure that the mentioned employees are recognized for the outstanding service. We hope to see you back at our hotel soon!  Best Regards,

Summary: The Residence Inn Hotel is excellent! The staff is very friendly and helpful. The hotel is well located for Disney World. The hotel is well maintained and very clean. The King suite is very nice and spacious. Overall a very enjoyable stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent stay in the Disneyland area. i am very pleased to know you found our staff to be friendly and helpful and the hotel to be clean and well maintained. Thank you for being our guest, I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guest again on your next trip to sunny Southern California.

Summary: This is an amazing hotel.  It is extremely clean. Staff is very helpful.  Room is spacious.  Breakfast has a huge variety warm foods cereal and lovely waffles.  Entertainment for kids -special area with TV for them, even a magician that offers some magic. Laundry service is helpful.  Location is ideal, Target is across the street for the little extras you need.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to know we met your expectations for cleanliness, staff service and variety in the morning breakfast buffet. I appreciate you taking a moment to share your review with us and sincerely hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guest again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: our experience with Residence Inn was excellent... if you have kids like me it's a great hotel close to everything like Target and some places to eat like Outback steak house, Joe's crab shack...it's a walking distance from Residence Inn. the most important thing is they have a free breakfast so you don't need to go out every morning to look for a place to eat. I would definitely choose Residence Inn when I go back to Disneyland again.
Manager Response: Dear debbielei14,  Thank you for taking the time to share such a positive review about your most recent stay with us. It was our pleasure serving you and your family. We hope to see you back at our hotel very soon!   Safe Travels,

Summary: We had a great time at the hotel.  The breakfast was great, the room was nice and clean.  The kitchen had everything that we needed (except a wine opener which would have made it even better for us as parents.  The pool was a lot of fun.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am pleased to know you found our hotel to be perfect for you and your family and sincerely hope to have you as our guest again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel can be described as just right.  It provides a reasonably priced place to stay with just the amenities you need but none of the extras that you would never need but need to pay for.  I have already lost track with how many times we have stayed at this hotel.  It has been our go to hotel since our first family trip to Disneyland in 2009.  To start things off, its location is a little over a mile from the Disneyland Main Gate.  The rooms are large, spacious and have a full kitchen fully stocked with pots, pants and utensils.  The beds are comfortable and ever room I have stayed in so far has a sofa that converts to a full sized bed.    Breakfast is provided every morning.  Our favorite has always been the self service waffle station.  However, there are also hot wells
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! I am very pleased to know that each time you stay with us is the same excellent experience as the last. I sincerely appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us and look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: Overall the property was ok. As I stated earlier the ceilings need to be redone. The sinks and drains need to be cleaned / replaced. Carpets need to be replaced and the furniture also is in need of replacing.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am sorry to hear the your room did not meet your expectations. I do, however, appreciate you taking a moment to share a review of your stay and appreciate your feedback. Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary: This property offers two bedroom suites with the second bedroom having two twin beds.  Each bedroom has it's own bathroom.  Breakfast is included and has a very nice selection.  It is a short drive to parking areas for Disneyland.  There is also a bus route along Harbor Blvd.  That runs from Disneyland to the hotel area.  Daily bus passes are available.  The staff at the front desk were very friendly and helpful.

Summary: Service/staff was great.  I'm part of the rewards program and love the check-in & check-out options.  So easy.  The staff are wonderful folks.  They really seem to value your business and treated us right.  The room was oversized for a 2 bedroom unit.  Full kitchen had everything we needed.  We will definitely be back again.

Summary: We had a great time as a family. The Residence Inn made us feel so comfortable and welcome. We loved the hotel and will be staying there again, as well as referring everyone to go there. The staff and management were excellent and really went out of their way for us.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, but unreasonably high priced
Summary: Great hotel, but unreasonably high priced compared to similar hotels around same area. Specially $15 parking charges, when they do not have their own parking and ask to walk a mile to park at Hyatt, that's crazy. And there is no way u will know that u have to park at Hyatt.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. Outback Steak House, Red Robin, Joe Crab Shack, Target, and Walgreens all with-in walking distance from hotel.  Also, its a Marriott property so you can use your rewards points.

Summary: I travel a lot & its hard to find a perfect hotel that accommodates a family of 6 and still meet my high expectations. This hotel is perfect in every way. New mattresses & bedding, Incredible free breakfast & dinner & very accommodating professional staff.

Summary: The hotel staff was great, the rooms were exactly what we were looking for, we had 5 family members and the space was perfect. The hotel breakfast was very well thought out and tasty.  For the price they charge and the quality, will definitely return to this hotel.

Summary: Great option for families.  We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite.  It was a little small, but worked well for our needs.  Breakfast and night time snacks made mealtimes easy.  Full kitchen gave us other options if the night meal wasn't what we wanted.  Close to Disneyland and other attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay! Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: The front desk staff charged my card upon check in without my knowledge and I was told Differently. When I spoke with the lady at the desk she was RUDE. They also charged $15/for parking and it was impossible to park in their lot. I had to park somewhere else and still had to pay $15/day for our hotel. Why?!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay. It is difficult to comment on your concerns without knowing the full details of your experience. However, with regards to your arrival experience, it is customary in the hotel industry to place an authorization on a guest's credit card upon arrival to ensure payment for the stay. I see this contributed to your overall experience at the hotel not meeting your expectations. Please know that we are intensely focused on our guests satisfaction and strive to ensure each and every guest has an enjoyable stay and prefer when possible to ensure a guests satisfaction prior to their departure should an issue be experienced. We appreciate you being our guest and hope that we may have the opportunity to have you as our guest again on a future stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: Strip is clean. Hotel bldg is clean. Room is nice and big. The only thing that I didn't appreciate was the $15 daily parking. Hotel is 1 mile away to Disneyland. Disneyland parking is between the hotel and actual Disneyland resort. Pay $18 Disneyland parking and still have to take the Disneyland shuttle bus that runs every minute.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay! I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary Heading: It was a very pleasant place to stay!
Summary: This hotel was convenient and easy access to Disneyland. The rooms were average and okay. The only negative was the shuttle to the parks. It didn't have enough room to accommodate at the people at night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Summary: We stayed at this property using points.  The rooms are very spacious, including a kitchen and separate sitting area which can be useful if you have young kids, and a bedroom.  We had two queen beds which were very comfortable.  This property has a basketball court, pool, ping pong, etc.  It is relatively close to Disney but you would need to take a shuttle (i.e.: not walkable).  Breakfast is included and the service was very good.  You can walk easily to the Hilton next door if you want Starbucks. :)  All in all, we have stayed at multiple properties around Disney (we are pass holders) and I would definitely stay here again when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. I agree that our room size is able to accommodate large families!  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: We are platinum rewards members with Marriott and have stayed in many different Marriott hotels. This hotel far exceeded our expectations. We have 4 teenagers and came for a trip to Disneyland. Aside from its being so close to the parks, our experience with the hotel was awesome.   On the night we arrived one of our daughters wasn't feeling very good. The gals at the front desk were so sweet and asked what we needed. They gave us some Gatorade to give her, and seemed genuinely concerned for her. Shout out to Keesha and Jennifer! Their customer service was second to none!   Our room was very clean and accommodated our whole family very comfortably. The beds were comfortable and the sheets and linens were clean and crisp.  The complimentary breakfast was amazing. They had lots of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay! We are fortunate to have employees who go above and beyond for each and every guest. I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: Nice place large rooms  Big breakfast in morning and the team that took care of that were very accomodating.  Front desk was pleasant and welcoming.  Fitness center needs some attention, many out of service machines.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking a moment to share a review of your stay with us. I am sincerely sorry to hear that the fitness center did not fully meet your expectations and I want to assure you that our maintenance department is addressing the machines that are currently experiencing issues. Thank you again for being our guest and I hope we may have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Keesha embodies the definition of customer service
Summary: I have been a Marriott rewards member since 2005, all because of the service they provide. Keesha, who was at the front desk and took care of us when we arrived, truly embodies what service is all about. If you plan on staying here, ask for her... she'll make you realize why the Marriott is the place to go.

Summary Heading: My loyalty to Marriott Hotels has ended.
Summary: I consistently stay for work and pleasure at Marriott Hotels. I have lost faith in  the Marriott's brand. In the past I felt if there name was on the building it was going to be great. Not anymore. I will have to think twice before recommending any Marriott Hotel and I definitely will not be returning to the Residence Inn. If I had not booked and paid through Costco Travel before my arrival my 6 night stay would have been cut to 2.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of your recent stay. I am sorry to hear that your stay was far below your expectations. It is always our desire to ensure each and every one of our guests has an enjoyable stay with us, regardless of whether booking direct or through an agency. Should a guest have a less than satisfactory stay with us, we will do our absolute best to resolve any issue while the guest is with us. While I am unfamiliar with the issues you feel you experienced, I will certainly look into your account to better understand where we could do better. I sincerely hope we may have an opportunity to have you as our guest again on a future stay and to regain your trust in our hotel and brand.

Summary: We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite with a living room in between. very nice quality.                                                  Service was good. Breakfast was good. The rooms are clean and comfy. The hotel is well maintained. Staff are friendly.    J
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very happy to know your stay with us was very enjoyable. I hope we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Best highlights- pool, spa, basketball court, breakfast, and evening socials.   Cleaning staff didn't clean well one time even after I specifically called the front desk and told them about an issue we had had the night before.  Another day they weren't done cleaning and we were back from the park, (around 4pm). The rooms were a little pricey but the breakfast and evening socials help make up for that cost in food!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share a review of your stay with us. I am very sorry to hear that our housekeeping staff did not respond appropriately to one of your requests during your stay. I will certainly bring this up with our staff to ensure that your experience is an isolated incident.

Summary: Front desk people were extremely upbeat, always said hello when you walked by  and had a big welcoming smile.  Rooms could have been a little cleaner.  Bedrooms were very sound proof so we did not have to listen to the running up and down the halls.

Summary: Great room and location. We were on the 8th floor in a 2nd suite. Had a perfect view of the fireworks. Breakfast got a little crazy but that was from people not watching their kids. Elevators are slow, especially in the mornings and around dinner time.

Summary: i celebrated a special birthday weekend with ten family members. The two bedroom suites were perfect and very spacious and comfortable. The breakfast was hot and fresh and delicious and especially nice being a buffet.

Summary: 1st time staying here we had some issues with check-in, none this time, & girls at the front desk were very pleasant and always smiling. Had a great little dessert buffet on Wed night. The breakfast has numerous choices, you wont leave hungry, but just a little warning, 2 of us had some GI problems after eating the eggs & sausage. The 2nd bedroom with the bunk beds is pretty small, not really any room for luggage.There were no recycling bins in the rooms. The pillows are not good(worst thing about the hotel) & the mattresses are on the firm side. There is a shuttle(not the ART) right out front that picks up at :10 & :40 each hour & was on time. This is the 1st of only 3 stops. There is a large laundry room & an arcade room. There was some billing issues at the end, but they were

Summary Heading: Friendly Staff made a good trip better
Summary: The hotel's rooms and overall appearance were fine, and I particularly appreciated the included hot breakfast. What stands out for me is the service. One of the breakfast hostesses, Grizelda, went out of her way to make sure everything was fine with my. breakfast and showed genuine interest in me as a person. You can tell that she enjoys her work! I got the same courtesy from all the staff. This makes a big difference to me.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. Summary: The Residence Inn by Marriott is conveniently located on Harbor Blvd near the Convention Center and Disney attractions. We enjoyed the breakfast which included pastries and hot food such as eggs, waffles, and sausage. Although we didn't need the full kitchen on this trip, it would be handy when travelling with families if you wanted to prepare food in your room. The full-size refrigerator, stove, microwave, and sink were located in the living area, and the unit included a full separate bedroom. Shopping and restaurants are within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. Summary: Stayed here in 2012 and we really liked the hotel so we returned on this trip. Hotel was in great shape as it has had some upgrades in the common areas and the rooms. We had the 2 bedroom suite with bunk beds for the kids. Works great as they have there own bathroom and TV. Breakfast is above average with lots of selections and plenty of seating.  They also offer and evening meal but we never used as timing did not work out.  Public transportation stopped right at the hotel and is a very easy way to get to the parks.  There is plenty of parking but there is a daily fee but that is a common practice with all the hotels on the area. Used the pool daily and was always clean and well stocked with towels. Staff was always very helpful.  Pricing was well within line with most of the

Summary: My family and I always stay at this location because of the room set-up and the full breakfast.  I highly recommend this property to anyone with a family who is visiting the area.  I give this place two thumbs up!

Staff was very pleasant and rooms were nice, with mid level furnishings.  Very close to parks with shuttles stops in front of the hotel.  I had a 2 bedroom unit with a king bed and 2 bunks in  the second room.

Summary: Thank you Residence in for taking good care of us. There was a water leak and they dry cleaned our clothing and upgraded the room. We enjoyed the th fireworks from our hotel window every evening. It was only a 15 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center.

Summary: Rooms are fantastic, they come with a living room, and fully loaded kitchen (stove/sink/fridge, etc).  There is a swimming pool and hot tub. They have a Grilling area outside. There's a half court basketball court, and even a ping pong table.   The breakfast in the morning is awesome. They have eggs, sausage, waffles, bread/toast, cereal and fruit. Along with other items that change from day to day. Its included with your stay, buffet.  They can even sell you the disneyland tickets right in the lobby, which is pretty convenient.

Summary Heading: Great price & hospitality in Anaheim area
Summary: Stayed for two nights.  Room was very clean, although furnishings have show of wear.  Not a deal-breaker, as bed was extremely comfortable and room amenities were generous.  The hospitality of staff made-up for any negative marks.  I even left a gratuity for housekeeping staff, it was that good.  Hotel was not at capacity and my stay was for business.

Summary Heading: In and out, but will come back
Summary: Great price considering Disneyland was less than a mile away. Check was quick and even have us a bag of cookies we didn't need lol. Bed was comfortable. Quiet. Parking was super limited. Will be back.

Summary: I enjoyed this hotel, it was very clean. Everyday we came back to our hotel it was clean.  Very spacious 2 bedroom suite I had for a family of 7. I would of rated it 5 stars however I was disappointed with the quality of the breakfast buffet.

Summary: Fantastic stay! Very clean, awesome amenities, full American breakfast buffet, all day shuttle to Disneyland, free coffee in lobby all day. Would definitely stay here again in the future. Loved the fact that it was a very family and kid friendly hotel. Plenty of activities for children to keep busy.

Summary: We stay here every single time we come to Disney.  The rooms have a full blown kitchen, the array of breakfast foods they serve on a daily basis is awesome, it's a quick shuttle drive to Disney, and it's clean.  Only thing I hate is the parking fee, very annoying thus the 4 stars

Summary: I love this particular Residence Inn for its convenience and close proximity to Disneyland/California Adventure.  We love the Residence Inn properties as we like to prepare a simple meal at the end of the day rather than eating out after a day of eating out at the parks. The kitchenette is perfect for that.  Also, I can't say enough good things about the full breakfast in the mornings.  Our children look forward to going down to the breakfast room and getting chocolate chip waffles every morning we are there.  There is an abundance and fantastic selection of breakfast food, including healthy choices such as an oatmeal "bar",at least two varieties of fruit, yogurt, hard boiled eggs as well as 4 waffle stations and four or five hot food selections.  I think it is reasonably priced

Summary: Great hotel for our large group of 16.  Excellent breakfast before we headed to the parks each day. Great pool and activities for the kids. Great location near Target and main restaurants. Room suites were perfect for putting our young kids to bed and having a lounge area for the adults to stay up and chat.

Summary: The front desk staff was amazing! Thanks Tammy! The location is ideal and rooms are impeccable. Overflow parking send us to the convention center, which was a short walk to the hotel. Kids enjoyed the breakfast and spacious rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us. Summary: Hotel is in need of an up grade furniture had rips and stains. The room was dirty with stains on carpets, walls in need of painting.  Room was dark, with extremely poor lighting.  Bathroom had mold growing on tiles.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very sorry to hear that your room below your expectations. I want to assure you that this is not the experience we want our guests to have while with us and I will ensure the room you had is addressed and the issues you experienced are corrected immediately. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we may have the opportunity to regain your faith in our hotel on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This was a very big room for the 6 of us. We had 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with a large living area with pullout couch and fully equipt kitchen. Everything was clean and in top shape. The price was very reasonable at $200/night. We were close to Disneyland, and I would love to stay here again. I'm a very private person and this place was perfect for privacy.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team as we strive to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Summary: All suites rooms that can sleep 6. Best breakfast buffet near Disneyland. Convenient shuttle to Disneyland. Nice pool and laundry on site. Knowledgeable, friendly staff. They greeted us with cookies and even left a Valentine in our room on Valentine's day.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I agree that our breakfast is a great added amenity for our guests, especially those travelling with families!  I will be sure to share your comments with our team as we strive to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: We stayed here for two nights and overall we enjoyed it. We went to several places including a Ducks hockey game, the beach, and Knott's Berry Farm.  The hotel was a great central location to everything.  The hotel is clean and nice.  Breakfast was fine but it was a bit crowded. There was a pretty good variety of items.  There were 4 in our party.  We booked a one bedroom suite. It included two queen beds in the bedroom and a sofa bed in the living room.  My teenager just ended up sleeping on the couch because she said it was softer and more comfortable.  The little kitchen had everything we needed to "eat at home."  My biggest complaint was that they charged $15 per day for parking and if you get back to your hotel late in the evening you still have to park quite far from the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I agree that our location is great as we are near Disneyland, the beaches, and other activities.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team as we strive to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a great location with great amenities
Summary: We love this hotel.  We stay here every year.  The hotel is clean and the breakfast and afternoon reception is a great bonus at this hotel.  The staff is super friendly, especially Edith.  She was so kind and friendly to everyone.  Angel and Chantel did a great job setting up our group reservations.  We can't wait to come back next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent stay. I am very pleased to know that our staff went above and beyond to ensure your stay was exceptional. I will be certain to share your review with them individually, as well as our staff in general. Thank you for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you again next year!

Summary: This is a basic Residence Inn. Nothing out of the ordinar. Only 2 elevators, which means their is a large back-up when Disneyland goers come back for the evening. Very poor and tight parking. The charge of $15 is ridiculous for a non-secure parking lot with limited parking,
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing a review of your stay with us. I am sorry to hear that we did not fully meet your expectations and I want to assure you that your comments will be shared with our entire management team.

Summary: The Residence Inn Resort Area is always our best value for staying in Anaheim.   Great rooms, great service, great breakfast, great location to Disneyland and other So. Cal attractions.  We always get treated well when we stay here.  This is is our 10th time to stay at this facility.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am so pleased to know that stay after stay, we continue to be your favorite Anaheim hotel. I appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us and look forward to your 11th stay with us!

Summary: The room was really dirty with sticky drink residue on the TV remotes & tables.  We left the discarded coffee cups behind the sofa to see how long it would take the maid to pick them up...she never did.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and sharing a review of your stay with us. I am very concerned to hear that we fell short on your expectations with regard to the cleanliness of your room. I want to assure you that cleanliness is extremely important to our hotel and will be addressed to ensure this is an isolated incident.

Summary: Comfortable rooms/beds. Sound proof rooms made it great for our kids, good, hot breakfast. Friendly staff, very clean throughout hotel. Good amenities, just a wonderful place to stay. We really loved it
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you sharing your experiences while with us. I am very pleased to know you and your family had an exceptional stay with us. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary Heading: Not what I expected from a Residence Inn
Summary: The bathroom wasn't really clean and furniture looks really damaged.  I know many people travel with kids since Disney is really close, but not all your customers are families, you also have the Convention Center which means many business people.  Your front desk person and your manager would not take my Intercam card which is a debit card for multi-currency and what they said to me was that it is a company policy to not accept cards that do not have the name engraved on the front, even when the name and signature are on the back.  Weird company policy since I just used the exact same debit card a week ago also in a Residence Inn at NY.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I sincerely apologize for the condition of your room.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that this was an isolated issue and will be addressed moving forward.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to regain your trust on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Great location clean rooms friendly service
Summary: Great location walking distance to restaurants (Outback, Red Robin, etc) or Disneyland. Target is right there in case you forgot something. Clean suites with friendly service. I didn't have breakfast but smelled good I just grabbed a coffee and apple to go.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am happy to hear that our location and our proximity to restaurants and shopping as well as the Disneyland park were all consistent with your expectations. I truly appreciate you choosing our hotel and hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: The room was large, the bed was comfy, there was a lot of breakfast choices. I would definitely stay here again and bring my family. The only bad thing about my stay is, I didn't like havin to pay $15 to park my car.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and sharing a review of your stay with us. I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guest again should your travels return you to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Had a business meeting in the area, and needed a full kitchen so I chose the Residence Inn. The location and the facility worked out perfectly. There were plenty of restaurants near by and it was easy to get around. There were also ample parking. There were lots of families staying in the hotel but the hotel rooms were quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share a review of your stay with us. I am pleased to know that you found the hotel to be quiet, comfortable and well located for your business needs. I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: Since I have been here since the beginning of January, everyone has been very helpful. I am enjoying my stay. High quality hotel. I really appreciated the breakfast staff: Erika, Edith, LuLu, Maria, Gricelda, and Rocio! They were so nice!! Also Jennifer was very helpful and nice, everyone was treating my grandson so well. Someone was there right away to help me, during breakfast when my grandson dropped something, they were right there to help!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to hear that our associates from the breakfast service and the Front Desk have all been so helpful and attentive. I want to assure you that I will be sharing your review with them and truly appreciate your kind words and recognition of their efforts. Thank you for choosing our hotel.

Summary: This is my second time here and I continue to live this hotel... Very family oriented and so accommodating. It's convenient, near Disney, target, restaurants and shuttle.... The staff is great and so is the service... Highly recommend....
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to know that we have been, and continue to be, your go to hotel for stays in the Anaheim area. I truly appreciate you taking a moment to share your review with us and look forward to having you as our guest again on your next trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: enjoyed staying in this hotel. Have been to this place since 2013 & have enjoyed each visit. Staff is very friendly. Sales Director Angel accomodates room reservation on phone, so i'm boarding place to orange county & i call her from airport, she gets my room reserved
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your comments. I am very pleased to know that our staff provided you with excellent service during your stay and that Angel our Director of Sales can help accommodate with your travel needs. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again on a future trip to Anaheim/Orange County Area.

Summary: Great value for family vacation with 9 people ranging in ages from 4 to 74.  Breakfast was amazing every day and great location for those wanting to cheer on the runners.  Rooms were nice to have full kitchen as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to hear that our hotel was a great fit for you and your party! We are happy you got to enjoy some of the extras our hotel has to offer like the breakfast and full kitchens within suites. We truly appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences with us and sincerely hope we get to see you and your party again soon on a future trip to Orange County or for a future Marathon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay just a walk away from Disneyland
Summary: Hotel is just a walk away from Disneyland and lots of restaurants. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was a bonus and made our mornings easy.  Room was updated and clean. It was nice to have a full size refrigerator in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and had the opportunity to take advantage of all our great amenities and what our area has to offer. We look forward to you staying with us again in the future.Thank you for your comments.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel many many times. We love Marriott and this hotel fits our family the best. We love the 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom suites. Our kids loved the bunk beds when they were little but have out grown them now. It is so nice to have our own room and own privacy. We love having the full size appliance, we always go shopping and love having our own food available. This is a home away from home!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are pleased to hear that you had a memorable experience for the positive reasons and got to enjoy our greatly valued two bedroom suites! I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: We have stayed here many times.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  The hot breakfast in the morning is also very nice and there are many things to choose from.  The staff is extremely welcoming and goes out of their way to make us feel comfortable.  Krystal at the front desk is amazing and we appreciate her great customer service.  It is always nice to be greeted by a friendly face.  We will continue to stay here for future visits!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking a moment to share your experience with your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that your stay was enjoyable. We are very proud to have such service-minded staff members like Krystal, who ensure each and every guest is taking care of. I will be sure to pass along your comments with our team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional customer service. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: The staff is typical professional Marriott, but the hotel itself is not. The rooms and I have stayed in many due to business travel and it not being my choice are in need of serious updating. The mattresses are soft and uncomfortable, the furniture is worn and every room had water damage in the bathrooms. I would choose to spend my money elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete your review of your most recent stay with us.  I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay regarding your mattresses and condition of the furniture.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that this was an isolated issue and is addressed moving forward.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to regain your trust on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Tix all the boxes for a weekend stay
Summary: We had a two room suite with bunkbeds. Our son enjoyed his view of the fireworks from our room. They have movie nights for kids and say they give snacks but we never saw any snacks we brought some down from our room. The movie volume needs to be louder but they would not turn up. Walking distance to many restaurants and that a good thing. Not much for kids, no play areas really at all. Food for breakfast is ok not great. Front desk were all nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review us! We do see we fell short on some of your expectations in regards to the kids activities and breakfast. I will be sure to share your comments with our Kitchen and front desk to ensure that our movie nights are enjoyable for the kids and that our breakfast is something all our guests want to start their day too. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Our overall hotel stay went very well. The 2 bedroom suite was a king bed with its own bathroom and bunk beds with their own bathroom.  That  made it very nice and convenient.  Fully stocked kitchen, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that your stay was a memorable one, for the positive reasons.  I agree that our fully equipped kitchen is a great added amenity, especially for those travelling with families.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: I had to travel for business. The hotel is located in a move area, safe for walking. The rooms looked nice & smelled nice. Convenient location. Beds were Extremely  comfortable. Loved the complimentary breakfast in the morning
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that your stay was a memorable one, for the positive reasons.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: It was okay but not going to stay with my business trip again. If I come with my family, I may consider to stay. It was good walking distance to Disneyland. I would like to have a full kitchen like this facility has.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. I am very sorry to hear that we did not fully meet your business expectations during your recent stay with us. I sincerely hope we may have the opportunity to have you as our guest in the future when visiting the area on leisure.

Summary: This was a family vacation with our adult children, I would say this property was not up to the usual standards of Marriott or other Residence Inns. Furniture was well used, we could not open dresser drawers without two opening at the same time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I sincerely apologize for the condition of your suite.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that this was an isolated issue and is addressed moving forward.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Our two-bedroom two-bathroom suite was very appropriate and well-equipped for our 3 adults and 3 children.  The warm breakfast was well presented and satisfying. The breakfast staff was friendly and quite responsive.  The swimming pool was cool, but warm enough (at least for the children). The hot tub was the rescue.  Late checkout was only available until 1pm.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that your stay was a memorable one, for the positive reasons.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: I had an overall great experience and will definitely stay here when I return to the area.  The breakfast was way better than I imagined, the room was very spacious and I one small problem that I did have with the room was manged so quickly and well that I didn't even mind that I had a problem in the first place. Job well done Marriott.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that your stay was a memorable one, for the positive reasons.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Everything has been amazing!!  Check-in was so courteous.  Keesha was beyond hospitable!  We had Come in from a day in the park, and she was so sweet to my daughters and i!  Room is a great setup with a full kitchen and a pull out sofa.  Very clean and plenty of room for us to spread out!  Grounds are great. Good proximity to the toy story lot if you are heading to Disney.  Everything is perfect!  Did not want to leave out Alex at the front desk!  Very nice gentleman.  Keesha did steal the show though.  I will look at this location to book every time we come down here now just because of the courtesy of her!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that your stay was a memorable one, for the positive reasons.  We are fortunate to have employees such as Keesha and Alex who provide superb service to all our guests.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: There were dirty diapers left out everywhere and in all the garbages so every floor stunk.  The hotel elevators were extremely slow to come and go.  The customer service was friendly and did their best but all in all it was not a very clean hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. I am pleased to hear that our staff was friendly to you and your family, but do apologize on behalf of the challenges you faced with cleanliness and our elevators. I assure you that the challenges that you encountered were exceptions to the rules and are not to be considered common.
