Thank you again for being our guest and we hope when your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area you will give as another chance. Thank you again for being our guest. .

Summary: I loved the bunk beds, kitchen and double bathrooms.  The two room suite was perfect for all 10 of my family members. The staff was so nice and the breakfast was amazing.  I will stay here over and over again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that your stay was a memorable one, for the positive reasons.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: staff was great and willing to help us get the room we wanted (top floor)  they welcomed us with coffee and hot chocolate for the kids. Check in was fast and easy we were in our rooms within 10 minutes of arrival. We loved our stay there .
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that your stay was a memorable one, for the positive reasons.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Customer service, wonderful! Cleanliness, excellent! Complementary breakfast was great, just get there earlier to beat the crowds of families going to Disneyland. Would highly recommend a stay for families or groups of 4+.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that your stay was a memorable one, for the positive reasons.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Great room and an amazing breakfast. The desk clerk even comped the parking fee for one of our cars. It did get a little crowded in the morning, but you can't beat the location if you're going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that your stay was a memorable one, for the positive reasons.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: This hotel is amazing for the price. My family and I have stayed here A LOT. We started staying at this hotel when we would go on Disneyland vacations starting in 2004. We keep returning. The staff is friendly,kind and helpful. The hotel itself is always clean and feels like your home away from home. We have tried the "fancy" Disneyland hotels and we return to the Residence Inn by Marriott every time we go. You get more for your money. I can't say enough good things about this place. You get a free hot breakfast every morning! It's fantastic. I highly recommend this place for your next family vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay!  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: location is great for walking to disney, room was not cleaned good, when we arived the bathroom floors hadnt been cleaned from previous poeple. overall cleaning not very good. beds are old so dont expect a good sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I sincerely apologize for the cleanliness in your room.  We pride ourselves in providing great service and a great room, but we have fell short of yours, and our, expectations. I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that this was an isolated issue and that it has been corrected moving forward.  Thank you for being our guest, and we hope to regain your trust on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Staff was great, from check in to check out. Greatly appreciate Stephanie at the front desk she did and awesome job checking us in and she felt very genuine upon check in!!!!!! Great job Rrsidence inn Garden Grove!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay!  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: My mother, my two daughters, and i took a quick trip during the last days of the Christmas Break, and we had a fantastic stay at the Residence Inn.  We enjoyed the entire five day stay, and will definitely be back when we head down to Disneyland again.  Thank you to all of the staff for an incredible five days!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay!  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Your management of hotel has been very professional.  Except charging the parking fee for the car we have been traveling, all other elements of your services are satisfactory.  I wish your properous year if 2016.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay!  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Stayed a week for business,. Friendly staff, great room , good bed, good internet, clean, good area, full breakfast, what's not to like. About 45 minutes from LAZ, tight by Disney, but I did not go to Disney
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay!  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Perfect for a family of 4. We had the 2 bedroom suite and it was enough space to make everyone comfortable. Shuttle to Disney was just outside the door. Restaurants nearby within walking distance and outlet mall was a short drive.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I agree that we are conveniently located to nearby restaurants and to Disney!  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Great amenities from full breakfast to ping pong and basketball.  Clean considering there are a ton of kids at this property.  Pool, kiddie pool and a hot tub where there is something for everyone.  Highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay!  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Great location and fairly maintained property. Nice and professional reception staff. The only downside is that rooms facing the Harbor Blvd. don't have appropriate double-glazed windows and this street is functioning 24-hours so very noisy or extremely noisy. Unfortunately there were no other rooms available at the time. Small things like these make a huge difference. It's the difference between coming back and not coming back Marriott.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am sorry to hear that you experienced an issue with street noise in your room. I want to assure you that your review and comments are greatly appreciated. We thank you for being our guest and hope we may have the opportunity to have you as our guest again in the future.

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this Residence Inn. There were five adults and one child on this trip, so we really appreciated being able to spread out in our 2 bedroom 2 bath suite. The kitchenette was basic but met our needs. Our suite was clean and comfy. It's only about a mile from the hotel to Disneyland, and we drove every day to the parking structure, and then took the tram to the park entrance. Near the hotel are many restaurants, as well as a Target within walking distance, which is where we purchased groceries. We really appreciated the hotel's free breakfast and the themed "mix" nights. The woman who took care of everything on Hot Cocoa Night was super sweet and friendly. We will definitely stay here again when we return to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts and feedback with us. Our family suites certainly do provide the extra space for bigger families and I am pleased to know your room fit your needs so well. Thank you for being our guest and I hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: I was very impressed with two of the employees of Residence Inn Marriott. The first person Jenn, front desk. Went out of her way to try to  for keep order with some very ungrateful people. The end result was great.  The second person Alex; the parking lot was full and he offered to move his vehicle so we could have a place to park. He didn't have to, but he took the extra step to accommodate those he didn't know.  Rewards are not always give to those who takes the extra step, I for one would give them one.  Thanks, Richard
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to know that our staff in general, and those two employees specifically, helped to make your stay with us exceptional. I want to assure you that your review will be shared with both of them as well as our staff in general. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: My family had a great time at this hotel. The room was nice, the kids loved the bunk beds, and the breakfast each morning was a nice treat to get the day started before hitting Disneyland for 12 hours! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to know that our hotel met your expectations and that our breakfast helped to get everyone started on the right foot for a fun filled day at the Disneyland part. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we get to see you again on your next trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: i was there couple of weeks ago and we just love it excelent staff so helpful the room is huge and nice everything was so nice !!!!we go every year for mu kid birthday and they always had a nice detail for her we just love it
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Residence Inn Anaheim Garden Grove for your little ones birthday. We are so thrilled to hear you and your family had such a great time with us and enjoyed your stay. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and coming back with us year after year, we appreciate your kind comments! We look forward to having you in the new year 2016!

Summary Heading: Humble but Convenient Lodging for Disneyland
Summary: Truly helpful, courteous staff - every last one of them.  Great selections for breakfast.  The shuttle for the Park only comes every 30 minutes where as the ART shuttles are every 20 minutes and deliver/pick-up closer to the entrance to the Park.   The rooms are really run down.  Our room had a moldy crack in the shower enclosure; floor molding breaking off and generally in need of maintenance/up-keep or remodeling.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking a moment to share a review of your stay with us. I am very sorry to hear that we did not fully meet your expectations, but please know that we value your feedback and your comments have been shared with our staff for correction. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again on a future trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: Very nice and clean Residence Inn.  I am a platinum elite member and hotel had already upgraded my room.  Thank you, as this should happen each time, but does not always.  Close and in walking distance to several restaurants.  Would have given a "5", but parking is limited and was charged $15 nightly.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and being a loyal Marriott Rewards Member! I am very pleased to hear that our staff was able to get you an upgrade upon arrival and that our cleanliness exceeded your expectations. As a frequent traveler with Marriott we truly appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences with us and sincerely hope we get to see you soon on a future trip to Orange County!

Summary: Second time we stayed in dual suites. Awesome w kids and super convenient for Disneyland. Great breakfast. Super for families. Our 4 year old loves this property. Disneyland is a short UBER ride away.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with us. We are pleased to hear that you had a memorable experience for the 2nd time with us. I will be sure to share your comments with our hotel team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: Awesome staff....good location....good size room and clean.........love the breakfast and kids movie theatre........my kids got cookie treat......love the atmosphere and it is defiantly family hotel....laundry kitchen and business CENTER...........
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! I am very pleased to hear that our staff and hotel service exceeded your expectations. I truly appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences with us and sincerely hope we get to see you and your family again soon on a future trip to Orange County!

Summary Heading: A convenient place to stay for Disney and surrounds
Summary: We stayed here to access the theme parks for our visit. The hotel seems to have considered this need of most of their customers quite well. The room had plenty of space for our kids to flex out and two bathrooms with a decent kitchen. The breakfast in the lobby wasn't quite what we're used to back home with a lack of healthy options and fruit selection. That being said, the kids loved it and we found enough to eat and keep going.  We rented a small car to get around as the theme parks are a little out of walking distance. There's a few fast food outlets close to the hotel if you're after a convenient meal after stomping the parks all day too. I'd recommend this place to our friends if they were going to visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us. It is always wonderful to hear when our guests enjoy their stay. We hope that if your travels bring you back to the Orange County area you will think of us. Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary: My daughter and I generally stay in the Tustin area on Thursday nights. This week there was a last minute need to stay on Tuesday night and all of our preferred hotels near Tustin were either full or way too expensive. Found this on hotels.com and while it was a little farther than we like to stay, it's better than having to get up extra early to drive from home.  The hotel is very geared toward Disney guests. There were some things that I really liked and a couple of things that really annoyed me.  The good: 1. The taco bar at night was good. The attendant kept things filled. Some real salsa would have been a great addition, instead of bottles of hot sauce. 2. The fact that they have meals Thursday evening, while most Residence Inns I have been to don't. 3. The breakfast had a
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experience with us. We apologize as we clearly fell short of your expectations on your most recent stay with us. We truly pride ourselves on ensuring that each and every one of our guests has a truly enjoyable time while with us and we will be taking these comments to my team to ensure better quality suites and service. Thank you again for being our guest, and we hope that if your travels bring you and your daughter back to the area you will give us another opportunity.

Summary Heading: Excellent Service!  Especially Krystal at Front Desk!
Summary: Our family travels to SoCal several times a year to attend Disneyland and we love staying at Marriott hotels for the consistency, great service and the cleanliness!   we loved staying at this hotel, the kids loved the bunk beds and extra room and even the food was tasty.  Krystal at the front desk made check in perfect, we checked in on a Holiday and even though she could have complained about working on Thanksgiving, she was cheerful and treated us like family.  It got our trip off on a good foot and I was really impressed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotel and service. We are very proud to have such service-minded staff members like Krystal, who ensure each and every guest is taking well care of. I will be sure to pass along your comments with Krystal and our team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional customer service. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Everyone here has been cheerful which is expected of the customers as we are just 1 mile from "the happiest place on earth".  But the same goes for the staff.  Rooms/halls/common areas/gym are clean.  The free breakfast is the best I have ever experienced and I have been to a lot of these.  Choices for everyone, food is fresh, hot stuff is hot, eggs with and without yolks, fruit, granola, tamales, cereal, oatmeal pancakes, turkey and pork sausage, and again staff is friendly and take pride in the product.  Say hello to Lourdes if you go she is the best.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay with us. I am very happy to know that our staff and hotel exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are also happy to have employees like Lourdes who help our guest leave happy. I will be sure to pass along your kind comments and hope we have an opportunity to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: An Excellent Choice for a family stay at Disneyland
Summary: We have stayed in many hotels in the Anaheim area and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend the Residence Inn . It was very comfortable and well appointed. The breakfast was very good. Having a kitchen with all the accessories is very helpful. There is a Target across the street so you can stock up on water and snacks to take into the park.. We had a couple of issues with the room when we checked in and we were extremely pleased with the professionalism and follow-through of the general manager. Couldn't ask for more.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am thrilled to hear that you had an excellent stay.  I agree that our kitchens and hot buffet style breakfast in the mornings provide great value for our guests, especially those travelling with their families.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Hot breakfast buffet was well worth it!
Summary: Kids room near dining area was a great idea so they can play while parents finish eating. Good value for price. Kitchen area & loving room makes it a home away from home. Would definitely  stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable experience.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Amazing place to spend your vacation or business time.
Summary: Everything was wonderful. Nice staff, wonderful rooms, relaxing bed, and great breakfast buffet. The staff is considerate, thoughtful and really engaged with their guests. We had booked at another hotel closer to Disney and were horrified at the accommodations. So we rebooked at Residence Inn at the last minute. I told the front desk lady that we had a run the next day and we hadn't slept all night. She said she would do what she could, then called us an hour later saying our room was ready (SUPER EARLY). Walked in to a beautiful lobby, accommodating staff, and then slept the afternoon away in a wonderful Marriott bed. There was not one thing wrong with the stay. When we left early for our half marathon, the staff had put out bananas, breakfast bars and water for us to grab on
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am thrilled to read that you had an excellent stay with us!  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide memorable customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to welcome you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We stayed in the two bedroom suite (1 King, 2 Twins) Having a kitchen and living room was nice to have but I would not reserve this room again for my family. The description of two bedrooms is deceiving. The 2nd room is more like an oversized closet with no windows and no closet to put clothes and luggage. It was very small, hard to move around. Might be ok for toddlers but not older kids. Got a good deal on price so we made do but would have been very disappointed had I paid anymore than I did.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we are providing excellent service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to have the chance to regain your trust on your next visit to the area!

Summary Heading: Fun ride at Disneyland and the elevator
Summary: Everything you expect at Disneyland, clean, friendly staff, etc. you can experience at this hotel, including riding the elevator and stopping at every floor during peak times.  Very courteous staff who will go out of their way to assist with the minor of needs.  Great location near restaurants, drug store and a Target for getting all the necessities for a long stay at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable experience.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time your travels bring you to the area!

Summary: We had a few issues but they quickly and without question took care of them and even gave us an upgrade. This was a great option for our family. Instead of having to get 2 rooms or all be packed into one room  there  was plenty of room  for everyone. Some could stay up play cards, watch TV in the living area while others went to sleep in the bedroom. The full kitchen was handy but they also offer a breakfast buffet included in the price  that was quite good. My family enjoyed making breakfast burritos and strawberry waffles. The pool is larger than many hotels offer and the hot tub was wonderful after a day at the mouse. The beds were comfortable and the rooms  were quiet. We had a fabulous  stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable stay.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service for all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: I highly recommend this Residence Inn especially if you are looking for a good neighbor hotel closer to Disneyland. the shuttle was available every 20 minutes. The breakfast served each morning was fresh and there were many things to choose from. The suite we enjoyed seemed to have been refurbished as did the entire hotel. Everything was clean and comfortable. The staff very accommodating . If you are not staying at  one of the Disneyland Resorts then I highly recommend this place.There is a pool area, basketball courts and work out area as well. I would stay here again.It was just my husband and I on this trip but wouldn't hesitate to bring our family with all the grandkids. Cute little gift shop had lots of Disney items to choose from with no lines ;)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable stay.  I agree that our amenities such as the sport court, ping pong tables, and pool are a great plus for our guests.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service for all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: My friend and I stayed at this property at the beginning of November for Blizzcon. The room was clean, the front desk staff was friendly, and the complimentary breakfast buffet was better than what is offered at most comparable hotels that offer complimentary breakfast buffets. The hotel is located about one mile south of the Anaheim Convention Center and about one and a half miles south of Disneyland. It is also located near the freeway and many restaurants in the Garden Grove area.  We did not get to experience the resort shuttles, business center, or pools. However, everything around the hotel seemed clean and there were families and couples using the pools every morning and afternoon during our stay.  One recommendation I would make is to replace the carpet and some of the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable stay.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service for all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary Heading: Very comfortable for a family although a little dated decor
Summary: This is a very nice, comfortable venue to stay to be near Disneyland.  Park your car and use the very affordable transportation to Disneyland.  This hotel provides a wonderful, plentiful breakfast plus an evening snack or light meal; as well as, a full kitchen.  On previous trips to Disneyland we had difficulty find meals for kids who were somewhat grumpy after a full day at the park.  Also there are numerous restaurants within walking distance.  We spend 4 days without once using our vehicle.  Our great-grandson loved the pool area also.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable stay.  I agree that our breakfast provides great value to our guests, especially those travelling as families.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service for all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: This is my second time staying at Marriotts Residence Inn Garden Grove. Great location for Disney trips and family stays. Extremely friendly and helpful staff. I don't usually give anything or place a rating of 5, however Krystal at the front desk was so helpful and enjoyable that she makes a great place Fantastic. Thank you Krystal for everything.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable stay.  We are lucky to have employees such as Krystal who go above and beyond for our guests.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service for all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: Comfortable for two Girl Scout leaders and 6 girls.  The two bathrooms came in handy.  The breakfast staff was nice enough to pack  us food to take up to our room for when our six sleeping girls missed the last call for breakfast.  The front desk was very accomodating to let us check out one hour later than regular checkout time.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing you and the girl scouts to our hotel! I am very pleased to hear that our rooms and amenities were a great fit for you and the troop. I truly appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences with us and sincerely hope we get to see you and your group again soon on a future trip to Orange County!

Summary: This was the perfect place to stay for our trip to Disneyland! The rooms were clean and comfortable.  Our room had two bedrooms and two bathrooms, and was cheaper than renting two rooms at another hotel.  Breakfast was great!
Manager Response: It is always great to hear from a guest when they have a pleasant stay, thank you for your comments. We hope if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim/Orange County area you will visit us again. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Me and my friends usually go to Disneyland two or three times a year. And we finally found our hotel to stay at every time. Krystal was the absolute best, she helped us check in and I never experience customer service like that! She was very informative and very friendly. The room was very nice and for the price we paid it was a steal not to mention we had free breakfast. We were on the very top floor and the view of the fireworks were amazing. Me and my friends just renewed our annual pass for Disneyland so it's Safe to say we will be returning!!! Thank you to all the staff that made my birthday trip the best and especially Krystal!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking a moment to share your experience with us. I am pleased to hear that your birthday and recent stay was memorable. We are very proud to have such service-minded staff members like Krystal, who ensure each and every guest is taking care of. I will be sure to pass along your comments with our team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional customer service. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: We choose to stay here over all other surrounding hotels when we visit Disneyland. The rooms are very accommodating and clean, and the price is great for that all you get. We sometimes stay a weekend or two weeks. The staff is always smiling and welcoming. Lourdes always makes us feel like important guests, or more importantly like family. This place is great!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to provide us with some feedback on your stay. I am very pleased to know that Lourdes and our staff provided you excellent service during your stay and that you were able to enjoy another stay with usl. Thank you again for being our loyal guest and we hope to see you again on a future trip to Southern California.

Summary: it's a decent place to stay. There were 6 of us - 4 adults and 2 kids. One of the kids slept on the sofa bed which was really bad. The spring hurt her back and so we had to use the sofa seats joined two pcs together to act as a cushion bed for her. We reflected this issue to the front desk which said would get housekeeping to look into the matter but didn't. My kid was ok with the arrangement we made for her so we didn't pursue further.  But the sofa bed is definitely not suitable for adults.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your feedback about your experience with the sofa beds. I want to assure you that this will be looked into and appropriate actions taken where needed. Thank you again for being our guest and we sincerely hope to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The suite was a good fit for our stay.   Would like to see the breakfast buffet use actual plates and silverware instead of disposable plates and utensils and cups.   Also, the convenience of offering a shuttle to Disneyland will have me returning and recommending to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary Heading: Bountiful breakfast is the best part of staying here
Summary: The hotel has some nice amenities (pool, outdoor ping pong, fitness room) but being awoken out of a sound sleep at 5:30AM because of protesters with megaphones at a neighboring hotel is enough to prevent me from coming back. I called the front desk at the time and was told there was nothing they could do about it. I wouldn't want to take a chance and have that happen again. One very nice perk is the bountiful breakfast. There wasn't a menu item missing! The staff was quick to replenish and overall very informed.  Other dislikes: the carpeting in the hallways smacked of the 1980s and I found lipstick on a "clean" glass inside our kitchenette cupboard.
Manager Response: thank you for being our guest and for taking the opportunity to provide a review of your recent stay with us. I am pleased to know that you enjoyed the hotel and it's amenities. I am very sorry to hear that you were disturbed during your stay by the protesters at a neighboring hotel. While not directed at our hotel, all the hotels in the immediate area can be affected. I would like to apologize for the perception our staff gave you in regards to your concern about this and will speak with them to ensure better handling of the concerns in the future. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope that we may have the opportunity to see you again as our guest on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We have met here with family  once or twice a year for 10 years with 10-20 family members. Great for Disney trips. Very family friendly. Staff is great. Way good breakfast.  Grandkids love the waffles and the kids area is nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable stay! I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Looking back on our 3 day trip to Anaheim, I wouldn't have changed a thing.  After searching hotels in the area, we found this hotel was the only one that had  2 bedroom / 2 bath rooms available.  This was the ideal set up instead of getting two regular rooms.  One room had a twin bunk bed and the other had a king.  Then the living room had a pull out sleeper.  The space was tight but didn't bother us as we were really on in the room to end the day and sleep.  They put us on the top level in a room at the very end of the hall - loved it.  Surprisingly quiet for a hotel that caters to kids.  Floors seemed like there were made of concrete.   Few other things.  The parking lot spaces are small and it can be a long walk to the car when the hotel is busy.  I really have to say that
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to write such an extensive review of your stay with us. I am very pleased to know that your stay with us was so accommodating to you and your family. From our large two bedroom/2 bath suites to the full hot breakfast, we truly offer our guests a great value for the area. I appreciate you having been our guest and sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you and your family again in the future.

Summary: Use the shuttle service and don't rent a car.  It comes every 30 mins right in front of the hotel. Pool is clean and little kiddy pool nice for small children.  the Movie room for kids was a great place to eat and enjoy your children.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable experience.  I agree that the shuttle service is a convenient way to get to and from the Disney parks, especially for families.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: Our family stayed for 4 nights prior to my husband departing for the Air Force. We were asked what brought us to town by Keesha when we checked in and we told her we were doing a family vacation prior to my husbands departure. When we returned from Disneyland she had delivered a basket of treats and the sweetest "Thank you for your service" note! She and the rest of the staff went above and beyond! Our kids loved the property, the room, the amenities and the breakfast and so did we! This will now be our new go to hotel when we go to Disneyland! Only downside, distance to the park, shuttle was full and parking was a pain!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am excited to hear that you had a great stay with us.  We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  We are lucky to have employees such as Keesha who always go above and beyond for our guests.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to welcome you on your next visit to the area!

Summary Heading: Good value but needs a little TLC
Summary: Great property about 2 miles from Disneyland. Used the bus daily to get to and from and cost was about 5 bucks per day for unlimited rides to all offered destinations. Breakfast was good with scrambled eggs, hot meat choice, oatmeal, fruit, waffles, yogurt, and GF options. Breakfast staff was awesome at re-filling food. Room needed some help. Dishwasher didn't work, caulking and tile grout chipping away etc. Appreciated Target being within walking distance, bought bottled water and snacks to have in the room. They also has a great little souvenir section of Disney items at a fraction of Disney prices. Overall this hotel was a good value and I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am excited to hear that you had a great stay with us.  I agree that our hot buffet style breakfast is a great added amenity for our guests, especially those travelling with families.  We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to welcome you on your next visit to the area!

Summary Heading: Great location for Anaheim or Disneyland
Summary: Good location to area or Disneyland. Has shuttle to Disneyland (small fee). Several restaurants short walks.  Love the large rooms for our family. Only 2 elevators. Big problem when one of them was down.  Otherwise great hotel.  Stayed here several times.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am excited to hear that you had a great stay with us.  We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to welcome you on your next visit to the area!

Summary: In town for soccer event at Stub Hub Center. This is a great location for walking to Disneyland or to nearby restaurants. Shuttle to Disneyland also picks up right in front of hotel. Staff was very accommodating towards our large soccer group.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am excited to hear that you had a great stay with us.  We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to welcome you on your next visit to the area!

Summary: We picked this location because it had a shuttle out front to Disneyland and the hotel had 2 room suites. The room was big and clean.  Breakfast was good too, hot and cold items, but the decaf wasn't good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am excited to hear that you had a great stay with us.  We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  I agree that our hot buffet style breakfast is a great added amenity for our guests! Thank you for being our guests and we hope to welcome you on your next visit to the area!

Summary: We had a great stay here!  Used the shuttle service to get to and from Disneyland very easy and resonably priced.  Breakfast in the morning always had a good variety.  Stephanie at the front desk was very helpful and even sent a congratulations basket to the room when she found out we just got engaged!!  Only recommendation would be to update the "gym."  Other than that great location!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am excited to hear that you had a great stay with us.  We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to welcome you on your next visit to the area!

Summary: Decided to take a small vacation for Halloween this year...Disneyland is the place to be and everyone knows that..The Marriott was the perfect hotel for our stay. Rooms were spacious and clean. The staff was pleasant and very knowledgeable. To many things to say so I recommend you stay and experience for yourself
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am excited to hear that you had a great stay with us.  We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to welcome you on your next visit to the area!

Summary: We had a great time at this hoteland it was perfect for our kids. Free breakfast and parking saved us plenty of money to concerntrate on Disney. Can't recommend this hotel enough. We stayed in the two bedroom suite and kids loved having their own space(so did parents) . Will stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am excited to hear that you had a great stay with us.  We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  I agree that our two bedroom suites provide ample room for families, and the extra TVs are a plus.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to welcome you on your next visit to the area!

Summary: My family stayed at the Residence Inn Garden Grove during our trip to Disneyland. It was great! Rooms are very large, clean and comfortable. Included breakfast was very nice. Lots of options and the service was wonderful. One person in particular - Griselda, she went out of her way to answer a specific request and took time to ask about our day. In general made our stay even better! 😀
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am excited to hear that you had a great stay with us.  We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service to all of our guests, and we are lucky to have employees such as Griselda.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to welcome you on your next visit to the area!

Summary Heading: Great overnight stay before a Disney 1/2 marathon
Summary: Stayed in a studio room last night, very nice. Fireplace inroom (although we did not buy a $5 log from the lobby); great kitchen area to use - we were able to make our dinner/breakfast and lunch while staying there. Wi-fi was fast. Followed the advice of other reviewers and stayed in a room away from the main road for less noise, and on 2nd floor so no noise of overhead walkins/moving around.   About a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland. Good stay - only 3 small things - the peeler in the kitchen was too dull to work and no sharp knife in the kitchen and the pillows, while soft/comfortable were VERY small (maybe bring your own?).  They offer a breakfast buffet apparently, but we ran a Disney 1/2 marathon, so we missed the breakfast hours. Also, I would say the pool and spa are
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am excited to hear that you had a great stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: What a wonderful place to stay for families!   Such kind staff, clean rooms and close to everything!  We even had groceries delivered from Von's on line and the team at RI had put them in our room for us.   Cannot recommend this hotel enough!  We were there for our daughters birthday and they even recognized that!  We will be back!! And are already telling all our friends about this gem of a hotel!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am excited to hear that you had a great stay with us.  We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to welcome you on your next visit to the area!

Summary: No hurry to stay here again, beds where extremely uncomfortable,  and breakfast was not a huge selection at all, very gross, then have to pay to park along with pay for bus shuttle to get to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I sincerely apologize that your stay was not up to your, or our, expectations.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we are providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to regain your trust on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We stayed for two weeks this summer and had a horrible time with this hotel. It was filthy when we arrived and didn't get much better during our stay. We had to request to have the trash cans emptied and 1/2 of the times that we requested, they still didn't do it. Our counters were gross when we arrived. The toilet wasn't clean in the adult bedroom. The bathtub in the kids room had gross rust all down it, ending in the drain. After many days of staying in filth, I complained to the assistant manager at the front desk. This was after specifically requesting that things were cleaned in our room. I pulled her aside so that all of their guests wouldn't hear our laundry list of complaints. A bit later, the reservations manager called to discuss our issues. He sent a cleaning person
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  To say we have fallen short of yours and our expectations would be an understatement.  I sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we are giving excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to welcome you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay!  The rooms appeared clean and the staff was great.  Breakfast was an excellent bonus too.  We did notice under the beds were quite dirty.  We dropped something and when we had to move the bed we saw that there was a lot of little rubbish under there.  We loved the master bedroom, the second bedroom seemed outdated and VERY small for two beds.  The sheets were not the softest and some of the furniture in the second bedroom was old and missing parts.  But besides that we enjoyed ourselves!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment about your most recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that our customer service and breakfast was able to provide you a memorable experience. Your comments will be shared with the appropriate department to make the necessary changes to ensure that we strive to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you and your family the next time you visit the area!

Summary: The first contact is already the good one. At reception very kind professional and helpful people, and with a smile !  Nice confortable room, large bkfast, convenient snack in the evening and coffee 24h/7days.  What else ?
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and had the opportunity to interact with our front desk staff and take advantage of all our great amenities we have to offer. We look forward to you staying with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Friendly Staff, Clean Rooms, Family Friendly
Summary: I stay at the Residence Inn Garden Grove about five times a year for work.  The staff is always extremely friendly, rooms are nice and clean (slightly dated), full kitchens in each room are nice, breakfast buffet offers a full spread of hot and cold options.    Overall I would highly recommend this hotel, but here are my only negatives:  * To avoid street noise and pool noise, request a room on floor two or higher * AC units in rooms can be a bit noisy when they kick on in the middle of the night * Fitness room is small and lacking, but suffices in a pinch
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay with us. I am very happy to know that our staff and breakfast selection exceeds your expectations and that you enjoy your stay with us. We have taken your comments under advisement and will be making the necessary changes. We have added some new items to the fitness center with more to come. Thank you for being a loyal Residence Inn guest.

Summary Heading: Disneyland trip and other places around the area.
Summary: Debbie at the front desk is the coolest gal ever, the most beautiful smile and so kind and helpful.  We had to change rooms and I felt bad but it was no big deal to her even though it was a pain in the rear end.  I love this place, BUT, the king mattresses need to be checked by staff and the bouncy and speaky ones need to be replaced NOW.   But yes, we will stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  We are lucky to have employees such as Debbie who are willing to go above and beyond for our guests.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests!

Summary: Great place for family disney vacation. mattresses are too hard in my opinion. the breakfast is good. all my kids enjoy the pool area. rooms are very good for families. The full kitchen is a life saver as there are six of us. we love to use the outdoor BBQ.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our kitchens were able to accommodate you during your trip.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you again the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: Like renting a nice one bedroom apartment
Summary: This place is like renting a nice, clean & comfortable one bedroom apartment with maid service & complimentary breakfast. Hotel is well maintain, food is good & the staff are friendly.We enjoyed our stay and  will be back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I agree with you that our breakfast and light snacks are a great added amenity for our guests, especially for families.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to each and every guest.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: if you want to be close to Disneyland but not to close the location was fantastic but make your reservations at the Hyatt behind this terrible place, we found ourselves every chance we had walking over there to eat drink and relax also clean and quiet. For the same price!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay.  I have shared your comments with our management team to ensure that we are providing excellent service to all of our guests. Thank you for being our guests and we hope to have the chance to regain your trust on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Not like what I expected they should give a discount for 3 weeks stay the hotel is expensive and average services had been offered. next time I guess we have to read people comments   before we pick a hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am sorry to hear that your stay with us fell short of your expectations. I want to assure you that our rate structure does reflect special rates, based on the length of a guests stay, that are provided at the time of booking. I would not be able to speak  in detail about your reservation without knowing the specifics, but would be happy to look into the matter for you. We appreciate you being our guest and appreciate you sharing a review of your stay with us.

Summary Heading: Another Great Stay in Garden Grove
Summary: Our family (and myself as a solo traveler) have stayed at the Residence Inn Anaheim - Garden Grove - Marriott resort an average of twice per year for nearly 10 years.  On all occasions, the resort, the rooms, and the staff have been excellent.  The staff go out of their way to make the guest feel welcome and often greet me by name even after a 10 month gap in between stays!
Manager Response: Mr. Hanna,  Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest, and we hope to see you the next time your travels bring you to the area!

Summary: We stayed here for 10 nights the room was as described  The staff are very friendly and would stay again  It's a very kids friendly hotel but we were 5 adults and loved it  There is a shuttle that can take you to Disney and plenty of other shops and restraints walking distance away  Only thing missing is a bar for adults
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us.  I am thrilled to hear that your family had a memorable experience with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Thank you to Crystal who got us checked in quickly and made an impression on our 3 year old son. She went above and beyond what was expected. I wanted to thank her personally but she had left for the evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay with us. I am very happy to know that our staff and hotel exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are happy to have Krystal a part of our team and we are delighted to hear about your experiences with her. I hope we have an opportunity to see you again soon and appreciate you for being our guest.

Summary: Nice clean hotel. Friendly staff, with family things to do swim, basketball, pingpong or just hangout  under the patio and put something on the grill. Location nice stores resturaunts in walking distance. If you want a nice clean hotel with things for children this is s place I would recommend right down from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! We are very pleased to hear that our hotel and amenities exceeded your expectations. We truly appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences with us and sincerely hope we get to see you and your family again soon on a future trip to Orange County!

Summary: Our visit to Disney land on a last minute weekend getaway vacation. We Yelp hotels near Disney and found this hotel.  We were pleasantly surprised by how nice our room and facilities were.   Great place to stay right down the street from Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you and your family had a great time with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Enjoyed the suite with a seperate living room, wish the beds where just a little more comfortable. The bathroom was clean and roomy.  The breakfast was nice and the second day had different choices and the pool area enjoyable. Easy shuttle service to the Park. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your most recent stay with us. Summary: Friendly and helpful staff, great breakfast, close to Disneyland, parking was a problem the first night. Have stayed here for every Disneyland trip. Hotel could use some updates in rooms. But do recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort. Your compliments on our helpful staff, amenities and our clean facilities are much appreciated. We’re glad you enjoyed your time with us and hope you will be returning in the future

Summary: We will definitely be back and have recommended you already 😊 We needed enough room for our 3 grand baby's and the bunk beds were perfect. Pool was awesome and we were extremely happy with out stay!!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! I am very pleased to hear that our hotel was a great fit for you and your family. I truly appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences with us and sincerely hope we get to see you and your family again soon on a future trip to Orange County!

Summary: The hotel itself is very nice, but the bed and bathrooms are showing their age. The front desk staff was very attentive to our needs, but housekeeping didn't make up the room until almost 6:00 p.m. on one day. Had to ask the front desk to have them make up the room late in the day on 2 occasions.  Breakfast in the morning had a great selection to pick from.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am disappointed to hear that we fell short of your expectations.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we are providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to regain your trust on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We stay at this hotel every year when we go to Disneyland.  It's an ideal place for families with 4-6 children.  The staff is very efficient and friendly!  It's like home to us. Schedule early for best rates.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay.  I will be sure to share your review with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time your travels bring you to the area!

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay if visiting Disney!
Summary: Would highly recommend this hotel. Very spacious room with great kitchen facilities and shops and restaurants nearby. Quick shuttle to Disney right outside. Nice pool and hot tub area that's open til 10pm so great way to relax after a busy day at the parks. Complimentary breakfast is great, all self service and plenty to choose from, my kids loved making there own waffles. Fitness room and laundry facilities too. Helpful staff also. Free wifi worked well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable stay.  I agree that our amenities are a great bonus, especially for those travelling with families.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service for all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: We recently held our quarterly meeting at this hotel.  The meting room was excellent and the staff went above and beyond.  Special call out to Griselda.  She not only made sure our room was set up each morning, but did a great job at the breakfast area.  If we needed anything, she was able to help us out each time.  Thank you Griselda!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable stay. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: The staff at this hotel is unbelievable! We have been going to this hotel for years and would not go anywhere else! They are truly like family and have treated us as such for years. Lourdes and Edith and everyone on the staff are truly wonderful people and treat everyone like kings and queens! If you have kids, they show them kindness and help with anything anytime. Edith even got my son a birthday cake and Brionna got balloons and sang to him! Lourdes and brought me a cake for my birthday too! We received a hospitality basket welcoming us back and Valencia, our house keeper, did an incredible job. Always clean and neat and even folds up our kids' blankets perfectly! Lourdes and Erica and all of the servers in the morning and night are so kind always helpful--constantly cleaning
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable stay. Summary: We booked for 4 days stayed for 7 days. We booked a room up high, got room 722. Free wifi which is great. Our Ron is good for sleeping not much more, but we not here to sit in a room. Free breakfast, great free Bbq & pool area. Handy to a liquor store, supermarket etc (target) store. Daily bus transport every 1/2hr to Disneyland too, but ticket at reception area. Cost us $24us for 3days for two people. Rooms aren't flash but your not there for that. The staff are absolutely amazing & so friendly. Would stay again 👍
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share a review of your experiences while with us and I am pleased to know you had an enjoyable stay with us. I sincerely hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: I was impressed from the get-go.  Customer service is unheard of, it seems...not at this place.  Super nice, clean, refurbished and yummy.  Soothing décor; everything we needed after hardly ever getting away and a long drive. The breakfast area was clean, yummy and their was a great assortment of food.  Staff was friendly and efficient.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay.  We are fortunate to have team members who understand the importance of customer service.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: The room was great for the 5 of us, the breakfast was super, and the staff was always friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable. Even had a nice pool, ping pong table and basketball court. Super family-friendly hotel! Would stay there again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay. Summary: My wife and girls stayed at this property, they could not stop talking about the room, size, cleanliness and the great staff.  They raved about the breakfast and the many different options of food. I would recommend this family friendly property to all my friends and those reading this review. I know have added this location to my return stays on my Marriott profile.  Not one to write reviews, but our experience here was fantastic.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel with Shuttle to Disneyland
Summary: We enjoyed staying at the Residence Inn during our last trip to Disneyland.  The free breakfast was always great, and the nighttime treats they had out occasionally were also yummy.  The shuttle picks up right out front and comes every half hour.  The rooms were clean and had a full kitchen.

Summary: This was an excellent place to stay for our trip to Disneyland.  Only negative was that it was a bit far from the park to walk.  We just drove and there are shuttles, so no real big deal. We will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! I am very pleased to hear that our hotel was a great fit for you and your family. I truly appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences with us and sincerely hope we get to see you and your family again soon on a future trip to Orange County!

Summary: Great facility, great location, plenty of public transport at the door step, car hire across the road, Disneyland 5 minutes away, motorways only minutes away, 90 minutes from San Diego, 110 minutes from Mexico Border - great & safe experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with us. I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable experience for the positive reasons. Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area..

Summary Heading: Great service, convenient, clean and comfortable.
Summary: We had a great stay in our clean, comfortable suite! The staff was excellent and the location and shuttle were so convenient. Wish we could have stayed longer! We would definitely stay there again the next time we are in Anaheim. Thanks Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area (Garden Grove)!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us. It is always wonderful to hear when our guests enjoy their stay. We hope that if your travels bring you back to the Orange County area you will think of us. Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary: This will be our new hotel choice for going to Disney.  Right on Harbor Blvd., but not so close that you are fighting crowds of people and traffic from the parks.    Shuttle stop right outside the hotel.  They sell the passes for unlimited rides to/from the parks in the gift shop or kiosk by the front door.  $7 adult and $2 kids...well worth it to not have to deal with the hassle of parking.  Get there in plenty of time...they filled up fast!  It only took 10-15 minutes to get dropped off right in front of the parks.  Perfect!  Hotel was clean.  We had a 2 Bedroom/2 Bath suite.  One room had a king, the other had two queens.  Perfect for a larger family.  Breakfast was very good and for once, a nice large eating area!  Usually you have to be very stealth in looking for a place
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to share your experiences while with us. I'm pleased to know you had an enjoyable stay with us and that you found our location, room size and staff service to all exceed your expectations. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: I was really impressed with the size of these rooms, I went there for a conference at the Convention Center and the location was perfect, only a mile away, it is also a mile away from Disneyland, very convenient, breakfast was edible but tasted stale and pedestrian, at least it's free! Because of Disneyland there are a lot of kids so be patient...:-)
Manager Response: Wally,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your most recent stay with us. We thank you for the positive comments and wanted to share that we are currently testing a new breakfast selection. We are confident that our changes will be a big hit among our guests. We hope that you come back and give us a second chance and let us know how you liked it. Thank you again.

Summary: The items they claim to have were non-existent. The Dishwasher & Toaster were rubbish. No windows or wardrobe in Bedroom 2. Housekeeping was inconsistent. Removed items we were keeping; yet didn't empty bins other times. We would NOT recommend this Hotel. A lot better out there for NZ$400+ a night.
Manager Response: Dear monoraillover,   I was alarmed to read your feedback and would like to touch base with you to discuss some of the details. Please feel free to give me a call at your earliest convenience. Our housekeeping department has very strict policies as it pertains to our guests belongings. I will follow up with the respective department head and make sure that this was an isolated issue. Please accept my apology that we fell short on providing you a less than perfect stay. I look forward to speaking with you and correcting the situation.

Summary: Staff was not helpful.  Manager was not available until afternoons on weekend when we were gone to activities.   The manager was also unavailable after 9 pm so staff could not do anything to resolve any issues.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience. We apologize that you had such an experience in getting in touch with management during the weekend and assure you that this is not typical for us here at this hotel. We were all surprised and disappointed to hear the challenges you faced. We understand your frustration and would love to get more information. Please contact us directly if you have any questions or concerns in regards to your recent stay, anaheimriopsmgr@ih-corp.com.

Summary: Good hotel with great service and an average breakfast. Location is an easy walk from conference center. There are a number of nearby restaurants within walking distance. Room was very large and kitchen area was great.
Manager Response: The Residence Inn Anaheim Resort thanks you for being our guest. We truly pride ourselves on ensuring that each and every one of our guests has a truly enjoyable time while with us and I am very pleased to know that your experience was no different.  I hope we have an opportunity to see you again soon and appreciate you for being our guest.

Summary: Great place to stay with kids in Disney area.  2 bedroom Apartment style rooms are a real bonus for the area on a longer stay  Everything as advertised, helpful staff.  Breakfast a bit tedious after a few days but hey it's included in the price. Could do with a few more healthier options.  Pool and spa excellent after day exploring
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay with us. I am very happy to know that our rooms and pool facilities exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed your stay with us. I hope we have an opportunity to see you again soon and appreciate you for being our guest.

Summary: >>> Best Hotel Ever!!!! <<< Okay so we stayed in Room 721, which has two bedrooms.. *bedroom #1 with a king size bed, dresser flat screen TV and full bathroom and a closet with a safe with your own personal pin# perfect for your laptop, tablets, or what ever you may want.. *bedroom #2 has two single beds, dresser flat screen TV and a full size bathroom both have tub/showers. The room also has a full kitchen that has all you need coffee maker, toaster, can opener, everything that you need to cook and eat and drink with. *The living room also has a flat screen TV and has a couch/pull out bed that is a 'full size' , with all the bedding that's on top off the closet shelve.  *The customer service was always wonderful... just as well as the Housekeeping. *The breakfast was more then
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review! I am happy you and your family enjoyed their stay with us and got to take full advantage of all our great amenities from breakfast to our suites to our service! We are so pleased to hear about your most recent stay with us. We appreciate your time in sharing with us your experience and if you are ever in the Anaheim/Orange County area you will think of us!

Summary Heading: Everything you need if you don't mind Disney being ever so slightly distant.
Summary: Here were my "must haves" in choosing a hotel for Disney. -Free breakfast every morning. -Kitchen to make dinner. -Pool -Shuttle to and from Disneyland. -2 rooms connected by common area and kitchen / 2 bathrooms.  It had all the criteria that I wanted- AND there were some pleasant extras. - Close to Target. -Complementary grocery service where you make a list of what you want in the morning prior to 9am, and your fridge is stocked before you get back. (If I knew this, I wouldn't have brought large cooler with dinner fixins - Monday-Thursday? Night they have activities and even free food (bbq I believe on Monday and when we arrived on a Thursday they had beef stew). Pleasant surprise after a long day of driving. - Breakfast area for the kids to watch a Disney movie while they
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am pleased to hear that our customer service was able to provide you a memorable experience and had the opportunity to take advantage of all our great amenities and what we have to offer like our grocery service, light evening snacks and suites.  We do apologize in regards to the shuttle and our breakfast selection. I will be sure to share your comments with our team and PCA our shuttle service to ensure that we strive to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you and your family the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Everything was great! Except the sofabed was super thin and uncomfortable. Great service and free breakfast. Really close to Disneyland and California Adventure. Really convenient. Restaurants and store across the street and all around. Great place to stay.
Manager Response: I am pleased to hear that our service and location were a big hit for you and your family. We do apologize in regards to the sofa sleeper being uncomfortable. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope when your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area you will visit us again.

Summary: We (Family of 5) stayed here for out LA / Disney visit and loved it. It has great family rooms, staff is super friendly and breakfast is great. Its a big hotel but managed very well. Everything was clean and service is good all around. Would definitely stay here again. I've stayed in a number of Residence Inn's and never been disappointed. For this area and family room is a good deal as well. We had the suite with second bedroom with bunkbeds which is great.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay with us. I am very happy to know that our staff, rooms and breakfast selection exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our Two Bedrooms are very spacious and as you mentioned great for families.I hope we have an opportunity to see you again soon and appreciate you for being our guest.

Summary: I love this property and frequent it several times a year. Great location, friendly staff and grest breakfast. Love the spacious rooms! They have comfortable beds and nice amenities. Can't go wrong! Can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your rave review! I am pleased to hear that your a returning guest with us and enjoy all our amenities. I will be sure to pass along your comments with our team to help motivate and continue to provide great service. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Great room for families!  The older kids appreciate separate beds and the bunkbeds were just right. We didn't feel cramped like we do in some hotel rooms.  The option to cook is helpful, too. The elevator was broken for part of a day, which made it tricky.  All in all very good place to stay and close enough to Disneyland with shuttle service.
Manager Response: I am happy you enjoyed your stay with us and that the facilities and service experience was what you expected and deserve. We appreciate your time in sharing with us your experience. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: We stayed 2 nights, the beds were comfortable and the room was clean! The included breakfast was a perfect way to start the day before heading out to Disneyland. The shuttle picks up right outside on Harbor.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us. It is always wonderful to hear when our guests enjoy their stay. We hope that if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim/Orange County area you will think of us. Thank you again for being our guest.
