Summary: Wouldn't stay again- rooms small and run down. Had to ask for toiletries even after room was cleaned. Advertised as room sleeps 6 but really only sleeps a family of four. Had TV issues/cable issues. Asked about an upgrade and was told it would be "significantly more expensive".
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your most recent stay with us. I sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure that we are providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to have the opportunity to regain your trust on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Staff was great, hotel was well appointed. A little worn as evidenced by grim in crevices, slow draining shower, worn Speakman showerhead. However, staff did clean surfaces well and hotel is great, just not 5 star. Breakfast was good, quality just below what you expect if you were paying for it. Overall a great experience at the hotel. The suite rooms allowed for perfect space when travelling with larger family.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with us. I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable experience for you and your family. I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. I will also be looking into our breakfast to make sure it is up to our guest expectations. Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: We are regulars at this location because it's a great location with very good amenities, and most importantly, PET FRIENDLY! We enjoyed our stay and so did our two little chihuahuas. My rating is actually a 4.5 star due to the shuttles and fees. Seems like the buses are not large enough to accommodate the two Marriott hotels anymore. They also didn't come at the times posted. There are also additional charges/taxes that we didn't have on our bill before. It added about $50+/day, so that came as a surprise.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and for being a returning guest! It is great to hear when we have returning customers come visit. We are a great central location to many attractions and we always except your furry travelers. We will be taking a look into the shuttle to make sure it is running correctly on their scheduled times. Please contact us if you have any questions in regards to your receipt. Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Ok, but there are better ones
Summary: This is close to Disney and lots of food places, but it is a little run down and under some repairs.  I stayed here for a convention, which it is close to the convention center, and on my fourth night, had to be moved room to room, as the original was 79 degrees with a thermostat setting of 62.  The second room as very nice and the rest of the trip was fine.  If all the other "name brands nearby are full", stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I sincerely apologize for the issue you experienced with your air conditioning unit.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that this was an isolated issue and we can correct it moving forward.  I hope to regain your trust on your next visit to the area.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: We have stayed here a couple times visiting Disneyland. The rooms were clean. The two bedroom suite gave the kids that extra space when settling in for the night. The breakfast has always been great. The staff seems to take pride. Thank you Lourdes for a great start to our day.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share a review of your stay with us. I am pleased to know that the extra space in the two bedroom suite gave you and your family the extra room to really enjoy your time with us. I appreciate you taking a moment to recognize the efforts of our stay and want to assure you that we will be sharing your comments with her and the entire team. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: If your smart enough to stay here on your visit, rather than the Resorts themselves, you will be doing yourself and family a favor. We reserved, booked, and stayed at this Hotel in a 2 room suite. There were 2 separate rooms as well as the living room, which was between the rooms. The Master room had a king size bed and private bathroom with TV and all extras. The second room had (2) Twin size beds with a private bathroom as well, and of course a TV and dresser. The living room had a Clean Couch that was also a pull-out, a table and (4) chairs, TV, refrigerator with ice maker, all dishes (Pots-Pans, Plates, Glasses, Bowls, & Flatware), stove & oven, and of course a sink with soap and cleaning rags and towels. The room was extra clean with no odors, and it slept (5) of us -
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay with us and we were able to accommodate you during your visit to the area.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: I stayed here with my family for my wife's graduation. The great thing is that we were able to get a room with enough beds for all of us AND be within reasonable distance to Disneyland! The hotel made a great impression though in addition to those amenities...the breakfasts were terrific, the hotel was clean and well run, the front desk staff always friendly, the pool was very nice, and overall, we were very happy with our stay. We were there for three days, so we saw a lot of the area and the hotel and every day, it was just as good as the beginning. I really highly recommend the hotel and would stay here again without hesitation!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay with us and we were able to accommodate you during your visit to the area.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: This is a super hotel that is well suited to families. Located very close to Disneyland and within a short walk from stores and amenities, I would highly recommend. Aside from a great location, the Residence Inn has lots to offer. There is a beautiful safe pool, short court, table tennis and kids club. The rooms are clean, bright and cool. I was allocated a suite which had a lounge, kitchen, master bed and kids room. (Too bad I didn't have the family) The hotel has a small gift store and the breakfast is great. Great spot, hope to come back with the kids sometime
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay with us and we were able to accommodate you during your visit to the area.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: we spent 10 nights here, staying on level 6, overlooking the pool in a two bedroom suite. We found the room to be good sized and well appointed, it seemed a little dark at night though and needs extra lighting if reading or writing. The resort has good pools, one is a kiddies pool & there is a spa pool, there was plenty of towels. There is a reasonable gym with free weights to 50 lb, two tread mills, bike & cross trainer, with towels & water in there as well. The free breakfast had plenty of variety and there was no shortage, waffles, cereals, scrambled eggs, sometimes bacon, sausage patties, potatoes, fruit & fruit juices, bagels, muffins, toast etc. Donnuts, muffin cakes etc. so plenty to start your day off. There was no shortage of seating both inside & outside. A room is
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay with us and we were able to accommodate you during your visit to the area.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: Beautiful location, very friendly staff, our room has a window overlooking very airy, clean rooms, comfortable beds and especially the bathroom very satisfied. Reasonable prices more people here are very hospitable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay with us and we were able to accommodate you during your visit to the area.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: All the staff members we encountered were friendly. The room was great, clean and comfortable. We were able to watch the Disney land fireworks from our bedroom window! I would choose to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! I am very pleased to hear that our staff  and rooms exceeded your expectations. We are happy your family got to enjoy a room with a firework view, great way to end your day! I truly appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences with us and sincerely hope we get to see you and your family again soon on a future trip to Orange County!

Summary: The Residence was conveniently close to the convention center. Lots of kids/families there for Disney, but the rooms were quiet and conducive to business travelers as well. Pool was nice and breakfast was convenient - though maybe not stellar in quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experiences with us. I am pleased to know that our location and our rooms were pleasant. I will pass along the information in regards to our breakfast standards, thank you for your feedback. We hope if your travels bring you back to the Orange County area you will stay with the Residence Inn Anaheim.

Summary: We spent the week at Disneyland and this hotel supported our mornings with an early, quality breakfast (that was complimentary), a shuttle running every 30 minutes to-and-from, and evening movies for kids or evening snacks/dinner. Several nights a jacuzzi was needed to recover from the day, and theirs stayed open late so we could take advantage of this perk. Every need was addressed!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with us. I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable experience and enjoyed all we have to offer. I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: We are Disney Annual Pass Holders & we always stay here.  It's perfect for our large family - 2 adults & 4 older kids.  Breakfast is great, shuttle is right outside.  Kids of the basketball court, ping pong table, and pool.  I would pay a little extra to stay on a higher floor.  They seem to be in better shape.  We stayed on the 3rd floor & it was a little more run down than the other rooms we've stayed in (on upper floors).
Manager Response: We at the Residence Inn Anaheim are pleased to hear that you and your family had an enjoyable and comfortable stay. I will be sure to pass along your comments with our staff to ensure all our suites are exceptional. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great Stay for a Family Disneyland Vacation
Summary: The staff at this hotel are some of the friendliest staff of any hotel I've stay. I stay at a lot of hotels for work travel. Specifically, each evening, Krystal and Debbie were always extremely friendly and helpful when returning from a long day at Disney, answering questions and giving us tips for our next day. The breakfast and rooms were adequate for my family of four.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking a moment to share your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that your stay was enjoyable. We are very proud to have such service-minded staff members like Debbie and Krystal, who ensure each and every guest is taking care of. I will be sure to pass along your comments with our team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional customer service. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Our family thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Residence Inn in Anaheim.  The staff was very helpful, and the location - less than a 5-minute shuttle ride from Disneyland - was ideal.  The room was clean and the beds very comfortable. We will certainly consider staying here again on our next visit to Mickey's home!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay with us. I am very happy to know that our staff and location exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed your stay with us. I hope we have an opportunity to see you again soon and appreciate you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: One of the best hotles in the area
Summary: Very friendly and professional staff. Clean and friendly environment.  Convenient location, close to Disney and shops. Fitness room, swimming pool, basketball court and ping pong table.I stay in this hotel several times in the past.  I recommended it to all my friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent stay. We are happy to hear you are a loyal Residence Inn Anaheim guest and continue to stay with us when your travels bring you to the Orange County Area. We appreciate the recommendations and we look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: The hotel has good proximity to Disney. It boasts spacious suites and cute bunk beds. The beds themselves aren't the best part of the room but the value cannot be beat.   The food was also good. And the overall cleanliness of the hotel was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking a moment to provide us with some feedback on your recent stay. I am very pleased to know that you and your family enjoyed all our great amenities we provide here at the hotel. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again on a future trip to Southern California.

Summary: Friendly staff, very nice and clean rooms, extremely comfortable beds, nice modern decor and the breakfast is very good - great variety and quality.  This is one of the better values for staying near Disneyland.  Highly recommend it
Manager Response: We at the Residence Inn are happy to hear your recent experience with us and that you enjoyed our suites and amenities. Feedback, such as yours, helps us improve for our future guests. Thank You for your review on your recent stay. We appreciate your comments.

Summary: Good location and accomodations!  Nice Staff! Great Breakfast with lots of options. Clean room, maid service was great. Lots of space for 5 people to share a room and Privacy. Would consider staying here again for future vacations. Beautiful grounds and well kept.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. I am pleased to hear that our staff was able to provide you a memorable experience and had the opportunity to take advantage of all our great amenities and what we have to offer.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we strive to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you and your family the next time you visit the area!

Summary: had 3 night stay during labor day weekend - 2 bedroom suit  mix feeling about location - loved that we can watch whole fire work in our bed, there is no block anything  from our room but it is pretty far from main gate (for sure it is not walk-able, we used taxi, with disney traffic it was around $15 everytime) also this place charge for parking so that will add up  very genetic residence inn breakfast which we knew before we go but there was mold on bagel...staff took care of it well (staff was amazing) but it shouldn't happen at all first place  i will not stay here again if we visit disney
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I apologize for your findings in our breakfast area.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that this was an isolated issue.  We strive to provide the excellent customer service and reviews like yours help us achieve that goal.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to regain your trust on your next visit to the area.

Summary: The hotel was great in terms of location & quality of the property. You can enjoy Disney fireworks from your room every night.  Easy access to the highways. You can enjoy walking around at night on Harbor Blv.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience on your recent stay with us. I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the firework view from your suite. We hope to see you again whenever your travel plans bring you back to the area. Thank you for being our guest!

Summary Heading: Good hotel for Anaheim Convention center
Summary: stayed in a 2 bedroom suite with my boss for a convention at the Anaheim Conv Center. Free parking, free upgrade.  Breakfast was great.  Walking distance to Joe's Crab Shack which was a bonus with a Target across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to fill out a review for your recent stay. I definitely agree that our hotel is located in a central convenient location, close to shopping and restaurants. Thank you for being our guest! Come visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Very good value for money - esp for families
Summary: Typical American Family Hotel.Not the nicest building, however, clean and good service. Very Spacious Room with good value for money.Breakfeast very American and small choice. Visit only with children->50% are children. Nice, very clean Swimmingpool.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to complete a review of your recent stay. I definitely agree that our spacious suites offer much value since each has a full kitchen. I am delighted to hear that your family enjoyed their stay and I hope we see you again soon! Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Wonderful hotel for the kids.  Things to do, bunk beds, great service!  The wife and I enjoyed the hotel as well as our son.  On site washer and dryer along with an arcade!  I recommend it for anyone.....
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share a review on your recent stay. We are so thrilled to hear that your whole family enjoyed your stay. I definitely agree that our bunk-bed suites add some fun for families. Thank you for being our guest! We hope to see you again when your travel needs bring you back to the Garden Grove/Anaheim area.

Summary: We love a Residence Inn for it's conveniences including free full breakfast and a full kitchen in the room.  This hotel is not walking distance to Disneyland park but still very close to drive or take a shuttle. It's located right across from a Target which is handy if you need anything during your stay. The amenities for families are great including the Disney movie/tv room in the lobby, game room and pool.  My daughter also loved the bunk bed in the two bedroom suite with her own Mickey light switch near the bed.  Our room had some wear and scratches on the walls in the kids' room but it was otherwise clean and comfortable.  Only downside might be parking which can get very full and we've had to park in their 'overflow' lot more than once--but we are still charged $15 per
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide such a detail review! I truly apologize for the parking inconvenience you've experienced during your stay. We are happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed all our complimentary amenities and services. Thank you for being our guest. Please come visit us soon!

Summary: This hotel is great. Clean, spacious, the hotel staff is really friendly. Plus, it's close to Disneyland, which I'm sure is the main reason for its attraction. I stayed here on business, and even with all of the families it didn't bother me a bit. Everyone staying at the hotel seemed to have a nice disposition. Each day/night they put out coffee and fruit-infused water in the lobby, and each morning they have complimentary breakfast with a ton of choices! It was really great. The rooms are very spacious and clean. The bed is comfy!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your comments on your recent stay. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your business visit with us and we hope you'll come stay with us soon! Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Hotel location was close to attraction. Clean and rooms condition was great. Great customer service. Good quality breakfast and snacks.  The pool was clean and fitness room was good and clean. the laundry room was good too with more than enough W and D. fast elevators.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide feedback on your recent stay. We are so thrilled to hear that you had a great time and enjoyed our breakfast buffet and evening snacks.  definitely agree that  our central location is convenient for those going to Disneyland and looking to be close to several restaurants. Thank you for being our guest! We hope to see you again when your travel needs bring you back to the area.

Summary: We stayed in a one bedroom suite with 2 Queens and the living room area also had a double sized sofa bed.  Everything was very clean and the beds were comfortable including the sofa bed!  We were lucky to get a view of Disneyland's fireworks as well...what a beautiful view!  Their breakfast here is great too! Self-made hot waffles is our favorite! They have an area there for kids and even a game room. Highly recommend this for a family!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. Your compliments on our clean and comfortable rooms are greatly appreciated. We’re glad you enjoyed all our great amenities and your time with us and hope to see you and your family in the future. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Less than 10 minutes from Disneyland.  Many nice restaurants and bars within walking distance.  Very nice pool and deluxe breakfast.  Rooms were modern, clean, large, with comfortable bed.  Great value.  Only issue was parking was extra.
Manager Response: We at the Residence Inn Anaheim strive to hear great comments from our guest stays. We are pleased to hear that your stay was comfortable and convenient. We are a great central location to many great amenities and we are glad you got to see what we have to offer. We hope you return with us for your next trip to Anaheim/ Orange County. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: I like the Cleanliness , the comfortness, the ability to go down and grab a cup of coffee or refreshment at anytime. Friendly, great service, breakfast was good everyday, Good area not too busy. Would highly recommend to my friends and family
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking a moment to share your experience with your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that your stay was enjoyable. I will be sure to pass along your comments with our staff to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional customer service. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for Family Visit to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed four nights last week in a two bedroom suite with bunk beds.  Everything was clean and comfortable.  The kitchen was convenient with a full size refrigerator.  We checked in on a Tuesday and were pleasantly surprised to see they were serving hamburgers for dinner.  The burgers and salads were tasty and it was great to save money on dinner!  The hotel is a short drive to Disneyland, and some members of our family didn't want to get ready early and they took the shuttle (for a small fee) and met up with us at Disney.  The daily breakfast was great for everyone in our group and although it was crowded, there was plenty of fresh food for everyone.  The breakfast hostess, Griselda, was pleasant and she made sure that everyone had whatever they needed.  Thanks, Griselda!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide feedback on your recent stay. I am so thrilled to hear that your family enjoyed their stay with us. I do want to apologize for any frustrations you might have encountered with the rearrangement with your items. We thank you for being our guest and look forward to seeing you again when your travel needs bring you back to the area.

Summary: Nice hotel on Harbor Blvd, about 4 blocks from Disneyland. All the hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. Rooms were clean, spacious and comfortable. We were given a room with a view of the Disney fireworks, which was great and much appreciated! The hotel is opposite a big Target store, which sells food as well as clothes/toys, so it was easy to self-cater if we wanted. There are also plenty of restaurants within a block of the hotel, and the Outlets at Orange shopping village is a 5 minute taxi ride away. Getting to Disney was easy with a shuttle bus stopping right outside the hotel twice every hour. Also the Anaheim depot for Starline Tours (for transport into LA city/tours of LA etc) is just across the road. We used them to get to Universal Studios as it was cheaper than
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment so share your experience on your recent stay. I definitely agree that our hotel is in a prime, convenient location for those who are looking to travel without a vehicle. Thank you for recognizing our fantastic staff! I take pride in having such a service minded team that ensures every guest is taken care of. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Good Hotel, Right Location, Family Friendly
Summary: I stayed here for 4 nights during my Disney visit with my wife and daughter. The rooms are good, clean & neat, with a sufficient kitchenette, typical of any RI property. The location is very close to a grocery store (Target) and few restaurants (at walking distance). The hotel has a good breakfast, eggs, breads, juice, waffles etc.  There is a shuttle to Disney (at a fee) just outside the hotel which provides good access to the park.  Also the typical rates you get at this hotel are lesser than RI near Disney main gate.  In Summary, it is definitely a better deal staying here.  Only problem I had was during check-out when the staff refused to accept a Forex card that I presented for payment. It was USD Visa card issued in my country. They refused as it did not have name
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay.  I apologize for any inconvenience you may have encountered through our credit card policies.  We have these policies in place to protect our guests from fraud.  If you have any further questions feel free to contact me.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Good accommodations, close to everything -- Outlets at Orange, many restaurants, Disneyland. Caters to families visiting Disneyland, so can be a bit frenetic at times, especially at breakfast. Staff was pleasant and helpful, rooms were nice and roomy. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am happy to hear that our location, and the proximity to shopping and restaurants, helped to make your stay more comfortable and enjoyable. I sincerely appreciate you taking a moment to share your thoughts on your recent stay and hope that we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: Great hotel for the family visiting Disneyland and the surrounding area.   Rooms were spacious, comfortable.   Front desk personnel were helpful.  Nice swimming area for kids, breakfast plentiful (Griselda, our hostess, was great)  !!   Movie nights right at the hotel for the young ones.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay with us. We are pleased to hear your stay was enjoyable and got to take in all the amenities our hotel has to offer. We are very proud to have such service-minded staff members like the Front Desk and Griselda, who ensure each and every guest is taking care of. I will be sure to pass along your comments with our team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional customer service. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: All staff was extremely friendly and willing to assist. Breakfast was tasty and a great variety. Loved the spacious rooms and multiple televisions. Will definitely be staying here again and will recommend to everyone!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide feedback on your recent stay with us. We thank you for acknowledging our staff. We take great pride in having such a service-minded team that ensures each guest is taken care of. Thank you for being our guest and come visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: There were FLEAS in our room!!!
Summary: I will start off by saying that Residence Inn hotels are typically my favorite due to all the amenities that it offers. The first night in this hotel my daughter woke up to flea bites and also saw a flea on her as she was getting into the shower. DISGUSTING. I immediately ran down to complain about it. They offered us a different room and also offered to comp our parking. First of all they should not be charging anyone for parking due to the lack of parking spaces. Parking here was a complete pain in the butt especially if you stayed out pass 10pm. If you are going to charge for parking,  then please have spaces for all your guest, parking next door at the Hyatt is not okay. We stayed here to go to Disneyland of course, if you stay at the hotel during the day it's pretty calm
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am disappointed to read your comments.  I sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you and your family encountered during your stay.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure that this was an isolated issue.  Reviews like yours allow us to make changes necessary to provide excellent service to each and every one of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope you give us another chance on your next visit to the area.

Summary: My 11 year old daughter and I went to Disney in July, we initially wanted to stay close to the gate, but stumbled upon this hotel. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The staff was incredibly helpful and friendly, the General Manager helped us make our reservation, and we are very thankful for all the help we received. This hotel is located about 1.5 miles from the gate, you could walk if you really wanted to however we chose to ride the bus, we enjoyed the breakfast and our room was really clean. We also liked that Target was nearby so we could pick up some items we were missing for our trip. We will definitely be back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you and your family had a great stay!  We are fortunate to have a service-minded General Manager to oversee our hotel.  I agree that our location is great because the Target has groceries that allow our guests to make a home-cooked meal in their kitchens.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: room is very clean and service is very good, but parking could be a little bit tricky if you coming late at night.   We had hard time finding parking need to wait a long time for someone to leave to get parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide feedback on your recent stay. I deeply apologize for any inconveniences you experienced with parking. I hope that our clean rooms and friendly staff will bring you back to our location whenever your travel needs bring you to the Garden Grove area. Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: We stayed here in a 2 Bedroom Suite for 3 nights.  The room was nice, and large enough, nothing fancy but it was clean.  The mattresses were newer, but they seemed to be the lowest quality mattress- like the one we have on our daybed at home for occasional use.   They charged us $12/ night for parking, but their parking lot is half the size it needs to be.  We were not able to park in the hotel lot any of the nights we were there.  It was a real hassle parking at the Hyatt, especially since half the time the gate between the properties was locked.   We did not find anything to eat at breakfast.  Usually I can eat the Oatmeal but I checked the first morning and it was more like Oat Soup, I did not check again.   There were a lot of people enjoying the breakfast and my son was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure that this was an isolated issue and we can correct these issues moving forward.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to regain your trust on your next visit to the area.

Summary: My wife and I did a Disneyland package and this hotel was offered as part of the "Disneyland Neighboring hotels" program; we selected this property as it had the amenities, location and services which we wanted, at a reasonable price.  The breakfast was very good, including hot items and the dining area is large enough so there was a place to sit and have breakfast without requiring a super early start to the day.  Nearby there are restaurants and shops.  And there is a shuttle service to the Disney parks that is reasonably priced.   The hotel has a complimentary cocktail hour or BBQ burgers/hot dogs dinner for guests, which is a nice touch.  The staff that we dealt with were friendly and effective.  We enjoyed our stay and would consider going back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide feedback on your recent stay with us. I definitely agree that our complimentary breakfast buffet and evening snacks are an added value for those looking to save on dining costs. I am so thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay and I look forward to seeing your family again when your travel needs bring you back to the area. Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: Very clean and neat hotel, steps away from Disneyland. They have complimentary breakfast there every morning, which was great. I got to breakfast a little late (they start cleaning up at 9:30 on weekdays) and there was no more waffle mix left. I asked an employee, Edith, for more of the waffle mix, and she informed me that they were closed for the morning, but she very kindly brought out more especially for me. She went out of her way to do so, even though they were very busy. I thought this was quite generous of her, and it made my day. It was a great stay, and I'll be back soon! Awesome family hotel :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to provide a review of your stay and the exceptional efforts of one of our employees. I want to assure you that I will be sharing your review with her, as well as our entire team. I am very pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and sincerely hope that we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary Heading: Way too expensive for the room we stayed in
Summary: we paid $319 per night for a 2BR, 2BA room.  It smelled like smoke inside, even though its suppose to be a smoke free hotel.  Then it was not cleaned adequately and the pool was filthy.  Breakfast was ok
Manager Response: We deeply apologize for not meeting your expectations during your stay. I thank you for taking a moment to provide feedback, as both positive and negative comments help us to improve our operations. We hope you will give us a second chance in regaining your trust the next time you find yourself in the Garden Grove area.

Summary Heading: They only missed a 5 because of parking!!!
Summary: Spent three days in the hotel with the family attending Disneyland. The place was great except the parking situation! They share a lot with the Hyatt next door and the walk is about a quarter mile at times!  Krystal of the front desk staff was GREAT! She was friendly, knowledgeable and really helped when we needed it! The rest of the staff wad also friendly and responsive!  The hotel was clean, well kept and modern. Great pool area, arcade and gift shop. The free breakfast was great! Not the normal cereal and milk (although they had that), but eggs, sausage, potatoes, waffles, bagels, toast...well you get the idea! Great value for the five of us! Oh! Can't forget the wandering magician during breakfast Sunday morning, he was a blast!  In closing, I don't think you could go wrong!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide feedback on your recent visit. I truly apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with parking and can only imagine how frustrating that must have been. We take great pride in the service our staff members provide and I am pleased to hear that Krystal went above and beyond to make sure your family was taken care of. We thank you for being our guest and hope to see you again when your travel needs bring you back to the area!

Summary: The customer services was great. The African American Girl who check us in was awesome. She was able to find a room that acomedates 5 people. Also the free breakfast in the morning was very good. The hotel is walking distance by stores and restaurant
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable stay.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we are providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: Eat like a king, but don't get stuck with the sofa bed!
Summary: Everything was terrific except for this:  the sofa bed was un-sleepable!  The mattress (if you can even call it that) definitely needs replacing.  Also, when we first checked in they gave us a King room instead of the 2 queens we reserved.  Lastly the spa was full of sand.  Boo.  On the other hand, you can't beat the free food with a stick!  Awesome!  And the staff was fantastic!  The hotel itself is a little old (popcorn ceilings) but clean and the queen beds were very comfy.  I enjoyed my stay very much!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we are providing our guests with excellent service and amenities.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: Only thing i was not happy was that parking was kinda limited.. and often people parked horrible making it hard to park next to them. This mighy only happen at night after 11pm which is when i experienced this
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we are providing the best possible service for all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: I stayed like 2 month and I feeled that I was at my home ,it was really nice and my kids was very happy .i liked the front disk employees they was very nice and helpful spacially Krystal and Dabei and Monica
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our staff were able to go above and beyond for you and your family.  I will be sure to share your comments with our staff to ensure that they continue to provide memorable customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: If you need a place to stay for 1 night or a week and want professional and a friendly staff this is the place. From the grill on site to the pool and the jacuzzi, it's a vacation everyday. Great stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay.  I agree with you that our grills and our pool area are great amenities for our families to relax after a long day.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary Heading: Excellent family hotel for the price
Summary: The value of having the hot breakfast in the morning, not just continental was worth the price.  The staff was friendly, knowledgeable and always willing to help.  The hotel had all the amenities.  Best value for families.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay with us! I am very happy to know that our staff and breakfast selection exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed your stay with us. I hope we have an opportunity to see you again soon and appreciate you for being our guest!

Summary: The morning breakfast was great. the personal at the breakfast was excellent. There was a lady by the name Lourdes, she was remarkable and very attentive. thank you. We like staying at this hotel, but I'm going to write about the bad experience, first our bathroom smell like cigarette  some guest did smoke by the door, it was very inappropriate. We told the staff. I'm thinking about going to another hotel if they don't make any changes. If you would like to contact me you can reach me at 408-439-2434 Leo Ortiz
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking a moment to share your experience with your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast. We are very proud to have such service-minded staff members like Lourdes, who ensure each and every guest is taking care of. I do apologize in regards to the smell of smoke, but i do want to ensure you that all Marriott's are non-smoking properties, and i do apologize if that was your experience this past stay. I will be sure to pass along your comments with our team to continue to ensure great customer service. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Great for families on budget but they need to understand that this is a limited option hotel with no movies or restaurant on the premises.  The property also is older or at least seem to be.  It felt more like an short-term apartment.  However, as I was traveling with 3 kids, I found the comfort of having a kitchen fantastic.  The hotel also did a nice breakfast and the evening snacks were a big hit for the kids and for the wallet.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a memorable experience.  I do agree with you that our hot buffet style breakfast and light snacks in the evenings provide great value for our guests, especially those traveling with families.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time your travels bring you to the area!

Summary: We stayed 3 nights here..every morning we really loved her nice and sweet smiles...thank you Lourdes for keeping that dining room clean for every guests there and I wish I can see that nice smile every day and every where ..:)..
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  We are lucky to have excellent employees such as Lourdes making such a great impact on our guests' stay.  I will be sure to share your comments with her as well as our management team to ensure that we continue to provide this kind of service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Great hotel, awesome staff and room quality is fantastic. Very clean, breakfast was great and all very well organized. Will definitely be visiting again in the future. Marriot really knows what they are doing!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am thrilled to hear that you had a great experience.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: I was very impressed with cleanses of the room staff very friendly and helpful overall a great stay       The suite was great comfortable great for traveling with the kids.  I found the security very good I liked that the lobby closed the doors at a certain time and only guest would get in with their key.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to read that you and your family had a great stay with us.  We value the safety of our guests so we do close our main entrance doors at 10PM with guest room key card access only.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide our guests with exceptional customer service.  Thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: Good Location and Service... Linen & Towels Hygine are a Question Mark?
Summary: This site is over crowded and seems to have a difficult time catching up with hygenic cleaning of towels and beds linen. Myself and my wife for first ti e ever in life caught eyes-virus lasted with us for a week after staying here for 9 days. Another problem is the parking where you have to park in the overflow area at a further site and next day they close the gate and have to walk a bot longer... Not my choice if I have to to return again...Many family witn kids at the breakfast time you cant think to even try a bite ....Wi Fi was a problematic slow and hard to sign in because of the high traffic of people staying in this place...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide feedback on your recent visit. I am truly sorry that your family experienced such a stay with us. Please know that cleanliness is an important matter to us and that we will make sure this is an isolated incident. I truly appreciate your review as it helps us improve our operations. We thank you for being our guest and hope to regain your trust and earn your business the next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Trip to Anaheim Residence Inn Resort
Summary: This hotel needs to upkeep and upgrade some of the carpets, lobby, laundry room and beds . Extremely hard to find parking and i had to use Hyatt parking lot and walk back to hotel which is quite far. The only thing is good is front desk staffs, they are friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share feedback on your recent visit. I want to extend my sincerest apologizes for not meeting your expectations during your stay. We welcome all feedback, both positive and negative, as it helps us learn how to improve our operations. Thank you for being our guest. We hope our friendly staff will get a chance to see you again!

Summary: I love this hotel so much! They treat you like family! The service is far beyond what you can imagine because the treat you like royalty. The breakfast is a hit! I love the quality of the rooms; both king suites & the suites with bunk beds! This is by far the best place to stay! It's affordable, clean, customer service is awesome with all staff & there are many amenities. A well rounded hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to write a review on your recent stay. Your comments truly brought a smile to my face! I am so thrilled to hear that your family enjoyed the service and amenities that we provide. Your feedback will be shared with the rest of our staff to inspire them to continually exceed expectations and provide superior service. Thank you for being our guest and come visit us again soon!

Summary: My family and I have stayed at a lot of hotels but this hotel stay was by far the best we have ever in countered. While planing our vacation we did a lot of research on hotels in the area and had read so many reviews. So we finally decided on the Residence Inn Garden Grove. What a great decision. What a great welcoming it was! The front desk staff were so friendly at the time of check in and through out our stay. When we arrived to our room it was perfect. Very clean and spacious. The next morning we went for breakfast and it was great they had such a huge variety for everyone. My family's favourite was the waffles mmmm good! We stayed for 8 days and had developed great relationships with the front desk staff. Raeann and Krystal definitely went above and beyond with their great
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay with us. For our staff to have such a positive impact on your family's vacation fills my heart with joy! I am so delighted to hear that your family enjoyed all aspects of your stay, from the yummy waffles at breakfast to our clean and spacious suites. Thank you for being our guest! Please come visit us again soon.

Summary: If you are staying in this hotel because you are visiting Disney, the last thing you want to have after a long day of walking and walking at the parks, is some good rest in preparation for next day, but this is almost impossible to get when you have awful beds, so before unpacking your stuff when you get into the room, make sure your beds don't squeal at all, otherwise, you won't be able to rest as you would expect so.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We apologize that you had such an experience with our beds and assure you that this is not the typical stay at this hotel. We have made the necessary steps to fix the items within the suite. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed at the Residence Inn for 4 nights while we were visiting Disneyland and Universal Studios.  The suites were very spacious and were perfect for a family of 5.  The shuttle bus to Disneyland was located right outside the hotel and was a short trip.  There is a very good pool and a really good outdoor area for eating / relaxing outside.  Breakfast was a buffet and was complimentary, which was a huge bonus and was a great way to start a full day at Disneyland. A number of other items are complimentary, including food on certain weekday evenings. It makes a big change from many hotels which charge for every extra item or who have hidden costs.  I would highly recommend the Residence Inn as a place to stay while visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. I am pleased to hear that you and your family had a memorable experience and got to experience all the great amenities our hotel has to offer! I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: Nice rooms .Everything was great except the breakfasts were not. Everything else was perfect nice rooms and nice staff. Beds were comfortable we had 6 members and we were all very hal oh with the room
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. I am pleased to hear that our staff and rooms were up to your liking for you and your family. I do apologize on behalf of our breakfast which clearly did not meet expectations. I will be sure to share with our kitchen staff to assure that the challenges that you encountered were exceptions to the rules and are not to be considered common. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope when your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area you will visit us again.

Summary Heading: Good location, good value for money
Summary: pros; close to disney and california adventure park especially useful if you dont drive near to all local amenities, target closeby small kitchenette in the room pizza hut, subway, icecream parlour closeby breakfast included pool and hot tub  cons: breakfast could be better cleaner carpets and decor
Manager Response: Thank You for reviewing our hotel. We appreciate your comments. Feedback, such as yours, helps us improve for our future guests. Although we are happy the location and the amenities were good for your party. We will definitely look into the mentioned items in regards to our breakfast. Thank You for taking the time to share your recent stay with us!

Summary: I am a Marriott fan, and this location is consistent with the Residence Inn experience. Good breakfast both days. Location convenient to Disneyland. We were 3 people staying in a 2-queen suite. Perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort. Your compliments on our breakfast and rooms are greatly appreciated. We are a great central location when visiting southern California, as well as to shops and restaurants. We’re glad you enjoyed your time with us and hope you will return with us in the future.

Summary: First and foremost. The hotel staff are amazing. From the the front desk to the housekeepers. They are extremely friendly and helpful. The hotel grounds and well manicured and very clean. Rooms with kitchenette area were extremely convienient. The hotels location was very central to our needs. We attended an event at the convention ctr and Disney. The Disney shuttle picks you up right out front. I could certainly go on and on about our stay with the residence inn. But let me tell you this hotel is the best bang for you buck. The front desk personnel are amazing. Special thank you to Rheanne and Krystal!! We will be back !
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience on your recent stay. I am so thankful to work with such service-minded individuals and I truly appreciate you for recognizing our hardworking staff. I definitely agree that our central location is convenient for those here to attend a convention or to visit Disneyland. Thank you so much for being our guest. We cannot wait for you to come visit us again!!

Summary: We have spent two weeks in this hotel I have sunrise the pros and cons as follows:    Pros: 1- Friendly staff. 2- coffee and water available in the lobby 3- Great Location, Disney land a few min away and lots of restaurants nearby. 4- Two bed room flats are large an spacious,  can accommodate six people comfortably. 5- In room kitchenette with amenities. 6- Daily activity between 6-8 pm. 7- We received two gifts from the hotel oranges, sweets and chocolate. 8- In room dinning is third party, they deal with a local restaurant to delivers to the room. 9- We where compensated for the delay of fixing some problems in the room facilities.  Cons: 1- The on-site laundry for guests is being abused by some customers, by leaving their clothes in the machine for long periods of time. I
Manager Response: I truly appreciate you taking the opportunity to complete such a detailed review of your recent stay. Your comments will be shared with our team to continue to improve our hotel operations. Thank you for being our guest. We hope to regain your trust and see you on your next visit to the Garden Grove/Anaheim area.

Summary: The overall cleanliness of the hotel was a high priority for me and my family.  The friendliness of the staff was very appreciated.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area or Disneyland.  The experience was fantastic for me and my grandchildren.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience on your recent stay. I am pleased to hear that the cleanliness of the hotel and friendliness of our staff exceeded your expectations and provided a fantastic experience for your family. We thank you for being our guest and look forward to seeing you again when your travel needs bring you back to the Garden Grove area!

Summary: I had never stayed at a Residence Inn until this trip. This place was awesome! Very modern, great breakfast selection, and friendly staff. They have free evening "snacks" Monday through Thursday; one evening they grilled hamburgers and hot dogs outside by the pool for the guests. The only complaint I have is the limited parking. You can park for no charge at the Hyatt next door, it is just extra walking and we were traveling with our parents.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! I appreciate you taking the opportunity to share your experience on your recent stay. I definitely agree that our hotel is awesome! The evening snacks and full breakfast buffet is an added value to staying with us. Please come visit us again when you find yourself in the Garden Grove/Anaheim area.

Summary: A little expensive, but pretty nice over-all. Charges for Shuttle Service to Disney. Breakfast area very busy and the person taking care of it seemed to be over-whelmed. Ran out of fruit often. Over-flow parking area was way in the back of the Hyatt. Nice large parking area if you don't mind the walk. A little greedy of the wash cloths. Had to ask twice for them. All in All it was not that bad. Being tired from Disney probably added to some of the frustrations. Still not sure it is worth over $200 a night. More like a $140 to $150 in my opinion.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide feedback on your stay. We attract a lot of vacationing families due to our close proximity to Disneyland and we truly apologize for the inconveniences that might have caused. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay overall. Your comments will be shared with the rest of the team to continue to improve our hotel operations. Thank you for being our guest. I do hope we have the honor of hosting you again whenever your travel needs bring you back to the Garden Grove area.

Summary Heading: Great value, great property, lots of extras!
Summary: Clean, spacious hotel.  Hotel staff was friendly and attentive; requests for things like additional towels were handled promptly.  Rooms were spacious, clean and well appointed. As a Marriott Rewards member, I even received a small cookie basket welcome in my room upon arrival.  Continental breakfast buffet was amazing!  Bacon, eggs, make your own waffles, fresh fruit--it would satisfy even the pickiest eater!!  Hotel offered some great social events during the weekday evenings.  We were able to enjoy a chocolate fountain and a hamburger/hot dog barbeque during our stay.  All complimentary and excellent!  Hotel is in walking distance of a Target and lots of great chain restaurants.  Enjoyed our 3 night stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience on your recent stay. As a Marriott Rewards member, we value your loyalty and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed all of our complimentary amenities like the full breakfast buffet and evening snacks. We thank you for being our guest and look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Great place to stay with family. Guest services were friendly and accommodating. Breakfast and lite snack were good and helped with dining costs. Elevator is busy so be prepared to wait since their aren't stairs.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments. We are happy to hear that our breakfast/ evening snacks and customer service were able to provide a wonderful experience for you and your family. We apologize for any inconveniences with the elevators, please be assured that we do have stairs within the property. We hope you stay again with us if your travel brings you back to the Anaheim/Orange County area. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Would stay here again if I was in the area, it worked really well for our 3 generation trip to Disney.  On the shuttle run so the younger ones could return easily or stay later to see the fireworks.  Very good breakfast.  Comfortable beds.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review about your most recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that our breakfast and rooms were able to provide you a memorable experience and had the opportunity to take advantage of all our great amenities and what we have to offer as like the shuttle. I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we strive to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. It’s nice to know you would stay with us again, we look forward to it!

Summary: Wonderful breakfast, room, grounds, pool and overall facility.  Staff was very helpful and our kids loved the bunkbeds.  Such a great hotel and we will definatley stay here again if we return to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience on your recent stay with us. I am so pleased to hear that your family enjoyed their stay with us. Thank you for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Loved everysecond of my stay. Great location,  great staff, clean, comfoertabl rooms ... great food, beautiful pool,  Loved having a laundry room and movie night was good, too.  What more can I say ... you guys really know what you're doing ... I will come back again and again ... thank you for a wonderful stay !
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the opportunity to share a review of your stay with us. I am very happy to know that our staff service and our guest rooms all met your expectations. I am also pleased to know that you had an opportunity to take advantage of some of our other amenities, such as the pool and guest laundry, while you were with us. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely appreciate you choosing our hotel. We hope to see you again the next time your travels bring you to the Disneyland area.

Summary: This property is in a great spot. A Super Target and a few good chain restaurants within close proximity. There is a bus that leaves to Disneyland every 1/2 hour right in front of the property.  The Staff are all very good at their jobs and are friendly and courteous.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experiences with us. I am pleased to hear that your stay was enjoyable. We are very proud to have such service-minded staff members, who ensure each and every guest is taking care of. I will be sure to pass along your comments with our team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional customer service. We hope to see you again next time your travels bring you back to the Anaheim/ Orange County Area.

Summary: Excellent for all services . This Hotel very clean , inside the Hotel have kitchen everything in there look like you live in your house you can cook , can wash your dishes , and I like they have a big  refrigerator if you have kid is good for you to carry food or milk .
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience at our hotel. I am so glad to hear that our services exceeded your expectations. I agree that our spacious suites, offer the comforts of home with all the amenities in the kitchen. Thank you for being our guest! We look forward to seeing you again when your travel needs bring you to the area.

Summary: 2-bedroom with bunkbeds in kids room was great for Disney trip!  Breakfast was great with eggs, potatoes, meats, all kinds of options plus 4 waffle makers were very popular with all the fixings (whip cream, different syrups, sprinkles!)  Note, breakfast gets a little crowded, so just allow plenty of time, especially if you want waffles.  The shuttle was very convenient because it's right out front, and it's the first pick-up of a few stops, so you always have a good seat - it comes at 10 and 40 after the hour, so just plan accordingly.  And it's the first place to drop off after the parks.  We didn't get a chance to use the pool, but it looked nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience on your recent stay with us. I definitely agree that our breakfast offers a wide variety of items for the whole family! We are so pleased to hear that you had a pleasant stay and we look forward to seeing you again. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: My room had shelving units broken as well as a broken bathroom sink. Dishwasher was missing the utensil compartment.  Breakfast was good. Christina is an awesome staff member, very helpful, and an asset to your company. Room just needs some proper maintenance and then the value would be right.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide feedback on your recent stay. As we try to provide a pleasant experience for all our guests, I see we fell short in delivering a positive impression. I would like to extend my sincerest apologizes for not exceeding your expectations. Your feedback will be shared with our team to improve our operations. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to regain your trust and see you again when your travel needs bring you back to the area.

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, superb restaurant staff
Summary: The room we stayed in was great it fit a family of 5 and everyone had a space to sleep. Every evening we could watch the Disneyland fireworks from our room and bedroom.  The internet is a bit slow and not fully available in every area. The provide daily breakfast and dinner 4 evenings a week and children's movies from Friday to Sunday. The restaurant has some great staff, very calm, competent and patient with the very demanding travelers. My family and I watch the staff daily and the two I would like to mention by name (saw it from the name tags) are Lourdes and Griselda. The were extremely accommodating to the guests, kept cleaning up after they made one mess after the other and were usually a step ahead in bringing out whatever food item was needed next, Griselda and Lourdes;
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide feedback on your recent stay. I am delighted to hear that Lourdes and Griselda were able to ensure your family had a wonderful time. I will share your feedback with them to ensure we continue to deliver excellent customer service. Thank you for being our guest and we sincerely hope to see you again when your travel needs bring you back to the area!

Summary: We had a 2 bedroom suite on the 7th floor with a view to the north. The nightly fireworks at Disney was an extra perk. Shuttle to/from Disney is great. Nice breakfast offering. Wifi worked well. Rooms a bit worn out by heavy traffic, but clean and in good working order. Full kitchen a plus if you want to cook.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide feedback on your recent stay. I am glad to hear you found our breakfast and view from your suite enjoyable. Thank you for being our guest! We sincerely hope to have the opportunity to host you again.

Summary: Most suited for a family with kids and seniors. Rooms was quite comfortable and kitchen was quite convenient. Availability of washing facilities  was helpful to get rid of dirty clothes in the middle of my 2 week US trip. Friendly staff and reasonable cabs charges for airport drop. subway is walkable distance and target is nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience on your recent stay. I definitely agree that our suites are comfortable for families and that having access to a full kitchen is convenient for those looking to cut on restaurant costs. I am so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and I thank you for being our guest! We truly hope to see you again when your travel needs bring you back to the Garden Grove/Anaheim area.

Summary: Our trip started off by Crystal going out of her way to ensure all 3 rooms we rented were on the same floor and as close as possible. She then send delicious cookies to our room as a thank you for our past stays.  Griselda and the other kitchen staff do a great job each morning at keeping breakfast organized and everyone fed! Evening receptions were very good also except for the evening they had one chocolate fountain that kept breaking down. Great place to stay when your visiting  Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate your feedback from your recent stay with us. I am pleased to know that our staff consistently went out of their way to ensure you and your entire party had an excellent time with us. I look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: Every time we are in the area for work or play this is where we stay.  It feels like home. The staff are always friendly and welcoming and the loyalty treat is a huge bonus and we appreciate the recognition that we are loyal to them.  Ample laundry services and at less than $4 a load (total), you can catch up on everything from the road, or head home with a clean suitcase.   Breakfast is generous, but very busy, be prepared to wait for waffles. The staff work hard to keep everything going and the place is always clean.  Rooms are clean, pools are able to accommodate everyone from toddlers to teens and the aching bodies after Disney.   Alex and Sergio the night crew, helped get us everything we needed after a call at 4 am from a sick kid. Fresh bedding, room deodorizer and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your recent stay with us at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area. I am pleased to hear that our breakfast and staff were able to accommodate your family's needs. I will be sure to share all your comments with the rest of our management team to ensure that we are providing excellent customer service to all of our guests. Thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you and your family the next time you visit the area.

Summary: The rooms were really spacious. I think they could've done better on the cleanliness! Don't get me wrong it was acceptable. The staff was great especially ABBY and EDITH that work in the kitchen. They were amazing!! Very accommodating! 😊😊
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share feedback on your recent stay with us. We are so grateful to have such service-minded staff members like Abby and Edith. Thank you for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We had a great stay. It was so close to Disney and at a reasonable price. The rooms were nice and the staff was great. Breakfast was delicious. I will recommend this property to friends and family in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience on your recent stay with us. We are thrilled to hear that you had a great stay. We thank you for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Awesome 5 day stay the Residence Anaheim!
Summary: This was an awesome hotel for an extended stay away from home!! The customer service from everyone encountered was fantastic!! The free breakfast was great. Rooms were clean and comfortable, but nothing fancy. Having 2 tv's, a full size refrigerator, sink, dishes and dishwasher was VERY handy. The pool area was great and not too busy. We were here for a convention next door at the Hyatt. Some people that were staying there came to our room and stated that they wished they had booked at the Residence Inn because our rooms were "so much roomier" and they loved the idea of the free hot breakfast. They have a shuttle service to Disney, (not ART), that comes every 30 minutes. Walking distance to several nice mid-priced restaurants and a Target
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people working at this hotel. I’m glad to hear you had a chance to take advantage of our fully equipped kitchen.  It’s nice to be able to cook up a light snack or even a full diner. We certainly hope to see you and your family on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Hotel ok.  Watch the gift shop!
Summary: As far as the hotel is concerned, it was an ok place to stay.   The good: The hotel lobby was welcoming and the staff friendly.  The pool area was great, and the burger/hot dog dinner we had complimentary was really nice.  The room was spacious and plenty of TVs so everyone could relax with their own show.  We were able to use our Amazon Fire Stick in the TV, so streamed Netflix.  The bad:  The kids rooms were still dirty with some tissues, fingernail, etc., on the floor next to the beds.  An area hard to reach, but....gross.  The ugly:  The only place we used our credit card, other than our military base, was the gift shop located in the hotel when I bought our bus tickets.  2 days later our credit card was compromised; being used in South America.  We had to cancel our credit
Manager Response: I apologize that you had such an experience and assure you that this is not the typical stay at this hotel. I want you know that we do have a very competent, efficient, and service-minded team here at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort despite your recent experiences. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel has it all.  The suite was more than what we expected; five of us shared this space very comfortably, but certainly a larger family could.  The staff was extremely helpful, both answering our questions about a shuttle to Disney and being patient when we weren't quite ready for housekeeping to come in.  We had a fantastic breakfast every day, and many weeknights there was a light supper or dessert for guests.  Our kids loved the pool, ping pong table, and basketball court.  Our stay was so great that we will always stay here when visiting southern California!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. I definitely agree that our spacious one bedroom and two bedroom suites offer a lot more comfort in comparison to traditional hotel rooms. I am pleased we exceeded your expectations and I thank you for being our guest! We look forward to seeing you again when your travel needs bring you back to the area.

Summary: Stayed here June 27-July 4 2015 for a dance convention at the Hyatt next door and had a great experience! Called the hotel direct to make reservations and spoke with the general manager Frank, he was very friendly and accommodating to our needs. Arrived on Saturday before the normal check in time and our room was ready for us! The room was clean and was great for a family with kids! The hotel has an awesome courtyard with built in barbeque grills, a pool, a basketball court and a ping pong table, the kids loved it! The breakfast was great and the ladies that worked the breakfast area in the morning were so friendly. They always greeted us with a good morning and a smile. The hotel also offers light meals Monday- Thursday between 6 and 8. We really enjoyed the Thursday night
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience on your recent stay with us. I am truly thankful to have such service minded employees like Krystal, Monique and Frank who ensure each and every guest is taken care of. Your comments will be shared with our team to inspire them to continue to deliver exceptional service. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: This is a perfect hotel for a family.  Breakfast and dinner is included.  Breakfast daily and dinner Monday through Thursday.  Breakfast consisted of eggs, a meat, potatoes, toast, bagels, English muffins, make your own waffles, fruit, yogurt, juices, coffee, and teas.  The dinner consists of an entree, salad, and some type of small dessert.  Sodas were included.  The laundry room was huge with plenty of washers and dryers.  The pool was a nice size with a lot of room to sit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review our hotel. I definitely agree with you that our hotel is perfect for families. I am thrilled to hear your family was able to utilize all the amenities, from enjoying our full breakfast buffet and taking a swim in our pool. Thank you again for being our guest! We look forward to seeing you again when your travel needs bring you back to the Garden Grove/Anaheim area!

Summary: My family of 4 stayed here for 2 nights while visiting Disneyland in the last week on June. Everything was great at check in and the room was spacious and clean. We brought some food with us with the intention on cooking but we were quickly disappointed when we noticed that the cooking utensil/pans were sparse. That wasn't too big of a deal since there were so many restaurants nearby and the hotel has complimentary breakfast and evening snack 6-8pm. The only dilemma with that is that it is a absolute crazy seen at the breakfast buffet. It was so loud and crowded even at 6am. People were rude and the food was awful to boot. My husband and I settled for cereal and brought it back to the room since there wasn't even one spot to sit. The one table that was available was filthy and
Manager Response: I am very sorry that you and your family experienced a negative experience while with us. I want to assure you that what you experienced with the tickets is an exceptional occurrence and I will look into this matter personally.
