I appreciate you being our guest and sharing your feedback with us. I sincerely hope that in the future, we can regain your trust in our hotel during a future stay in the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: The rooms were clean, roomy and decorated nicely. Ours was two bedrooms and two bathrooms. We had plenty of room for the 6 of us and we are all adults. Staff was very helpful and courteous. Breakfast was fabulous! The hotel is very close to restaurants and Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay with us. I am very happy to know that our staff and breakfast selection exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed your stay with us. I hope we have an opportunity to see you again soon if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim Area. Thank you and we appreciate you for being our guest.

Summary: Absolutelyperfect hotel if taking the kids to Disneyland, or any of the other attractions near- the two bedroom "kids" suite with the bunkbeds was amazing and met our needs in every way possible!  Great staff, and great hotel- very impressed.
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. I will be sure to share your feedback with our staff. I hope to have you back soon!

Summary: great Stay. Great hotel. The staff was helpful and friendly. Pool and jacuzzi was nice. The basketball and ping pong area was a smart way for the kids to have fun and stay busy. Parking was abundant and easy access. The hotel is located in a greAt location
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people working at this hotel.  We hope to see you as a guest again very soon.

Summary: So happy to be back at the residence inn . We have stayed on a previous trip and will be back again . The front desk staff was great and very helpful . Breakfast was great ! Love this place !! Can't wait to come back !!
Manager Response: Happy birthday and thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we strive to provide memorable customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Very good, nice & Good hotel good nice stay.Very good, nice & Good hotel good nice stay.Very good, nice & Good hotel good nice stay.Very good, nice & Good hotel good nice stay.Very good, nice & Good hotel good nice stay.Very good, nice & Good hotel good nice stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: A great experience with my family at the Garden Grove Residence Inn!! I would like to also recognize Griselda that works the morning shift. She is very hard working and always greets the customers with a smile. Great job Griselda....
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay with us.  We are lucky to have such friendly employees such as Griselda.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: A few negatives but nothing real bad. Went to use kitchen dishes and they where dirty. Also room was a little smaller then I thought it would be. Overall though the hotel was great. Wonderful breakfast and evening reception. Staff where so kind and helpful. We loved the location as it was so close to many resturants and Target. Team to Disneyland was great and this hotel was first pick up so always plenty of seats.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: We stayed here so we could go to Disneyland.  The room was a great fit for our large family.  The facilities were clean and the staff was nice.  Most notably, the breakfast area was very busy each morning, but there was a patient and smiling woman named Lourdes who was like a ray of sunshine in the dining room.  She made us feel comfortable and relaxed during our breakfast--a really big deal when you are headed out to Disney with a bunch of kids.  If we go to Disneyland again, we will look at Residence Inn Garden Grove.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had such a memorable experience with us.  We are lucky to have such friendly employees such as Lourdes who make our guests feel like they are at a their home away from home.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: ran out of parking and I had to park at another hotel's lot.  Sure there was no extra charge but made it difficult to load to leave.  While loading my car to leave it was tight parking and I did have someone back into my car.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review about your most recent stay with us.  I sincerely apologize for the parking trouble that you and your family experienced with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we do everything we can to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to earn back your trust on your next visit to the area.

Summary: My family bought the annual passport to Disneyland last August so we have stayed at this property 7 times since.  It is the perfect hotel for families (5 stays) as well as business (2 stays).  The rooms are clean, spacious and well arranged.  They are also well equipped with everything you need for both a short or extended stay.  A hot breakfast is provided every morning and hot snacks are provided weekday afternoons. If you ever need anything, a Target and Walgreens is kiddie corner from the hotel, a Von's Supermaket is about a quarter mile away and restaurants in the area are diverse and limitless.  If you need laundry- a very reasonably price coin operated laundry machines are on the premise.  The hotel also has a nice gym, a hot tub and a pool.  The most important fact is
Manager Response: I truly appreciate you for taking a moment to fill out such a detailed review for our property. I definitely agree that our property is conveniently located near a lot of restaurants and markets. I am pleased to hear that you have enjoyed every visit, from business to leisure, with us and are able to enjoy all of the amenities we provide. Thank you again for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Million dollar room at an affordable price!
Summary: Marriott has never failed to deliver. You are always top notch in your service, cleanliness and staff! Will never stay with anyone else again! Marriott Rewards is Sooo worth it... It's free to join!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience on your recent stay. I am thrilled to hear that we exceeded your expectations. We thank you for your loyalty to the Marriott Brand and hope to see you soon!

Summary: The hotel is an excellent value.  It's hard to find a hotel room large enough for 2 adults and 4 children.  Having the kitchenette also helps to keep costs down, not having to eat out for every meal.  Wish it was just a little closer to Disneyland so we wouldn't have to use the shuttle service.  However, it is nice that the shuttle service is offered, for a fee.  The hotel was clean but obvious that there is high turnover because of some of the "wear and tear" in the room (i.e.  cracked sink and shelf falling off the wall in one bathroom).  Overall, very good hotel and we would definitely go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to know that our rooms comfortably accommodated you and your family. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences while with us and I am pleased to know you had an enjoyable stay with us. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary Heading: Good for families; Horrible pet odor
Summary: We stayed in a two bedroom suite which was great for two families, however, they put us in a room that obviously had been used by pet owners. The smell each time we walked through the door was horrendous. I tried requesting a room in a different location because I had noticed all the people with pets going that direction but since we were checking in late there were none of our room types available elsewhere or so they said. Breakfast and other amenities were good. Parking was horrible, their overflow parking is at another hotel next to theirs but it's quite a walk and at $12 a day, you should be able to park on site. If we stayed here again, I would make sure we were checking in earlier. And the elevators being out was kind of inconvenient with 4 children, 2 of them under 3.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very sorry to hear that you experienced an issue with pet odors in your room. Please know that cleanliness is incredibly important to us and that we will look into the issue to ensure this is an isolated incident. Please know that we appreciate you being our guest and for the feedback you have provided us. I sincerely hope we may have the opportunity to regain your faith and trust in our hotel on a future stay in the Garden Grove area.

Summary: We had a great family vacation  with the residence inn. Lots of space for kids to rest during heat of day while adults could visit. We try to stay at residence inns when traveling as it's nice to have a kitchen and lots of space while still having the Marriott cleanliness.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We believe we are the ideal choice for anyone visiting Disneyland and are happy that you agree.  . Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We hope to see you as a guest again very soon.

Summary Heading: Great place for a family of six!
Summary: We brought our four kids to Disneyland in June 2015.  It is difficult to find a room near Disney that sleeps six.  We have one son and three daughters so we love that we can get a room at Residence Inn with a king, two queens and a sofa sleeper so we can comfortably sleep everyone.  It is much nicer than getting two hotel rooms.  This Residence Inn is very clean.  The beds were comfortable, the staff was friendly and helpful.  Three of us have celiac and there weren't many gluten free options for breakfast but we are used to that.  The pool was nice.  It's a lovely place to stay.  I highly recommend it.
Manager Response: I definitely agree with you we are great for families. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is the best value in Anaheim. Our staff works hard every day to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary: Had a great relaxing stay here while visiting Disneyland.  Several great restaurants within easy walking distance.  Only drawback is parking spaces are extremely narrow, so if you have a large SUV, expect to receive a door ding or two.
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay.  Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Krystal at the front desk was extremely knowledgable and flexible.  She arranged for the best room and service without any hesitation -- even though we checked in past mid night.  Our stay was so much more enjoyable because of her service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback in regards to our staff. I am so pleased to hear that Krystal provided such a great experience after a long day. We are lucky to have her as a front desk agent! Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you again when your travel needs bring you back to the area.

Summary: Awesome customer service, very clean. Lorena M. and Lourdes are the best!! We've been more than taken care of!! Our stay exceeded our expectations!!  We look forward to another trip and I hope Lorena and Lourdes are still there as they treated me and my family like royalty!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience on your recent stay with us. I am truly grateful to have staff like, Lorena and Lourdes, who take the time to ensure each guest is taken care of. Your comments will be shared with our staff to motivate them to continue to exceed expectations and provide superior customer service. I thank you for being our guest and I look forward to hosting your family again!

Summary: This is the first time that we have to write a negative report regarding a marriott property. we have always chosen marriott hotels in the past because of their reputation about cleanliness and friendliness. Our stay this past week at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area/Garden Grove from June 7-11 was rather disappointing. Since we have a highly allergic daughter we requested in writing and over the phone twice beforehand that a special extra care would be taken to ensure the room was thoroughly cleaned and allergy free ready. I called the day of arrival as well to make sure that the notes where passed on to the cleaning crew and we were assured that all was set for our arrival. We arrived at around 7pm on the 7th and when checking into the hotel room it was pretty clear that
Manager Response: We appreciate your very direct feedback and will follow-up on your impressions to ensure we offer the best stay possible for all of our guests. We expect to provide a clean and comfortable suite with everything in working order and apologize that this was not your experience. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Parking is always full and you need to go to the Hyatt to park there, and there is a long walk.  Breakfast was not good  Rooms are ok but the toilet was covered with hair, and the water got stuck all the time
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort. I do apologize that we clearly fell short on some of your expectations during your stay with us. I want to assure you that the feedback you have shared with us from your recent stay has been reviewed and shared with the appropriate staff to ensure those issues are corrected. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope that we may have the opportunity to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary Heading: Perfect for families spending several days at Disneyland!
Summary: The place was clean and spacious.  The staff was helpful and the breakfast was wonderful. It was handy having a full kitchen and washing machines and dryers available. We will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your stay with us. I am very happy to know that our staff and breakfast selection exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope we have an opportunity to see you and your family again when your travels bring you back to Orange County.

Summary: All I can say is wow! The staff is very friendly and helpful. The breakfast is free every morning and what a selection!!! A special thanks to Lorena M. For going the extra mile for us several times. I will recommend this place and book it every time
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking a moment to share your experience with your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that your stay was enjoyable. We are very proud to have such service-minded staff members like Lorena M., who ensure each and every guest is taking care of. I will be sure to pass along your comments with our team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional customer service. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: So much fun, excellent outdoor space, great breakfast and evening social.  The staff was very friendly.  Located near grocery shopping, restaurants, public transit, everything you would need.  My 2 bedroom suite was perfect for our family of 5 and the kitchen is a full kitchen, not a pretend kitchen
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Residence Inn Anaheim Garden Grove for your recent vacation. We are so excited to hear you and your family had such a great time with us. We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and had the opportunity to take advantage of all our great amenities and what we have to offer. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review, we appreciate your kind comments!

Summary: I'm a life-long traveler and have a career in hotels but this is my first review. I was so impressed by the Residence Inn Garden Grove that I had to submit a review. The staff was very friendly and helpful. They stopped what they were doing to help and inform their guests. We were also going to Disneyland and making our accommodations through them was so easy and stress free. This allowed us to focus on our family and have a great trip! The room was perfect- bright, clean, and well stocked. Breakfast was amazing and the evening snacks were delicious. I highly recommend this hotel for the area and can't think of one bad thing to say about my experience there.
Manager Response: Your review title put a big smile on my face. Thank you for noticing the effort of our staff members. My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Simple, but very pleasant. The two rooms was fantastic over normal one room hotels. We will certainly stay here again, as we intend to do do soon. It's close to Disneyland and the tram is better than parking at Disneyland itself.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We believe we are the ideal choice for anyone visiting Disneyland and are happy that you agree. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is the best value in Anaheim.  We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great stay.  Seems perfect for families
Summary: Though we didn't have kids in our party on this trip, this hotel seems perfect for families.  We had a  2 queen suite, with kitchen, small dining area, and a living room, 2 TV's and a somewhat smallish bathroom.  The hotel is located about 1 mile from the Disneyland entrance.  There's no free shuttle, but there's a shuttle that stops right outside the hotel (on Harbor) and costs about $5 per person.  We chose to drive and park for convenience (and the fact that if you have at least 3 people to transport, then driving and parking costs only $2 more than the shuttle).  Free breakfast offered everyday...waffles, eggs, potatoes, sausage, cereals, etc, etc.  It's quite a substantial breakfast! Large dining room, plus a pretty large kids dining room too.  We didn't use the pool or
Manager Response: I definitely agree with you we are great for families.  Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We hope to see you as a guest again very soon.

Summary: The Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area is one of the best Residence Inn properties we have ever visited.  The hotel is about a mile from Disneyland.  They have a shuttle run by PCA that stops in front of the hotel twice an hour.  And you buy tickets just outside of the hotel front door.  When we were researching on the internet we had trouble locating shuttle info.  The Residence Inn is the first pickup going to the park as well as the first drop off returning.    We had a room that had a main bedroom with a king bed and a 2nd room with bunk beds.  The both bedrooms had their own bathrooms which is perfect for a family.  The full kitchen gave us a place to store our food and drinks in the fridge.  As well as dishes when one night we were so tired we just ate in the room.  To top
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing a review of your experiences with us. I am very happy to know that our General Manager helped to make your stay with us so magical. I want to assure you that I will be sharing your review with him personally. I am pleased to know that throughout your entire stay that you had nothing less than a five star experience. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Disneyland area!

Summary: Excellent hotel_____. Value for money____. Room size could have been bigger. Close to Disney____. Parking space is small as I had a problem finding space one night when I reached the hotel late______.
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay.  Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Hotel was clean and the housekeeping staff was wonderful.  Front desk was nice, but didn't check to see if my room request could be made when I checked it (  fireworks view) was ready. Just told me it would be an hour and 1/2. I told her no I didn't want to wait... gave me another room. Then I told my family that it would have been 1 1/2 wait for view room. He said yes he wanted it so I went back and told her. After making a few calls she found that it had been ready the entire time- that didn't make me happy.Second we couldn't' hook up out portable dvd player to either tv and that was disappointing. But the room it's self was clean and beds were comfy. And there was enough room for everyone to stretch out and relax after a long day at disneyland.  The shuttle was always on time
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. I am pleased to hear that our staff was able to get you and your family checked in early and into the suite as requested but do apologize on behalf of our staff and the challenges we faced with the water. I assure you that the challenges that you encountered were exceptions to the rules and are not to be considered common. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope when your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area you will visit us again.

Summary: If you are going to Disneyland with kids, then this is the perfect place to stay.  The rooms are clean, spacious and comfortable. The wash basins are located outside the bathroom, which is a great convenience for large families. Among amenities is a Swimming Pool and Fitness Center.  There's a daily evening complimentary snack session. The breakfast spread doesn't change much everyday and includes Oats, Eggs, Meats, Yogurt, Breads, Waffles, Fruits and Juices.  The only downside was the uncomfortable Sofa Bed and Paying for Parking despite being a resident at the Resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to provide us with some feedback. We are delighted to hear that you had a great stay and that you were able to take advantage of the some of the extra's we provide at the hotel. I will be sure to share your comments with our team. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again on a future.

Summary: The two room, two bathroom family suite with kitchen and sitting area were perfect for our family of 7 visiting Disneyland for a week. It was clean with enough clean towels (thank you housekeeping!), plenty of room. Complimentary breakfast served downstairs to sit and enjoy, take back up to the room, or grab a piece of fruit and bagel on your way out the door. $12 a day parking fee. Adult kids liked the jacuzzi to relax after a full day on the feet. Basketball court was a plus with my son too!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review! I am pleased to hear that our housekeeping service was able to provide you a memorable experience and that you and your family had the opportunity to take advantage of all our great amenities and what we have to offer. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you and your family the next time you visit the SoCal area.

Summary Heading: Perfect Place to stay for Disney
Summary: The hotel was very close to Disney.  Easy walking distance to eateries and grocery store.  Only downside was the daily parking fee.  Recognize it is due to the area, but still do not like paying an additional fee for the right to park in a parking lot of the hotel for which I am already paying a resort-area nightly rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing a review of your stay. I also thank you for sharing your comments regarding the parking fees. I want to assure you I will share your comments with our management team. Thank you again for being our guest and I hope we have the opportunity to see you again on a future trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: We had a nice stay. The Disneyland parks are walking distance if you like to walk. The place was extremely busy when we were there, it was Star Wars weekend. Needless to say every morning the breakfast area was packed. This wasn't our 1st stay at this hotel, we've been here before. My only disappointment is paying for parking. Which is understandable, you might have people parking here and walking to Disneyland to avoid parking fees. Good size room, we checked in and all that was left was the 2 bedroom. Same thing happened last visit!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Residence Inn Anaheim Garden Grove for your recent vacation. We are so thrilled to hear you and your family had such a great time with us and was able to experience our two Bedroom suites as well. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review, we appreciate your kind comments!

Summary: Had a great stay here. Will stay again. My only issue is one day for blast there was no meat. Maybe I got there late. Overall though I loved it. I didn't need meat anyway.had a great room with a great view at Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us. It is always wonderful to hear when guests enjoyed their stay. We hope to see you in the future and I will be sure to pass your comments along with our staff.

Summary: My family of five stayed there Memorial Weekend 2015.  Staff was friendly and help.  Loved the location; minutes away from Disney and Cali Adventure. Loved the two bedroom suite and the daily breakfast.  Nothing bad to say about this place.  Would have given a 5 rating, but I down graded a bit because this hotel has 8 to 10 floors, but only two elevators and on a busy weekend it took forever to get a lift.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete our survey about your most recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that our customer service was able to provide you a memorable experience and had the opportunity to take advantage of all our great amenities and what we have to offer.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we strive to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you and your family the next time you visit the area!

Summary: We stay here every year when visiting Disneyland and the hotel is fantastic.  Rates are very reasonable, awesome breakfast in the morning, and convenient to the parks.  Our family of 6 stayed in a room with a fireworks view and truly enjoyed all the hotel had to offer.    I would have given the hotel 5 stars, except for a follow up call for a lost item left in the room safe.  I was assured that the safe was checked and nothing was found.  The person I spoke with even put me on hold for several minutes and confirmed that the room was checked and nothing was turned in.  That call was made while I was still in Orange County and able to return to the hotel.  The next day, I called again and sure enough the items were in the safe exactly as I knew they were but now the hotel will
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experiences with us. I am very happy to know that our staff and breakfast selection exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed your stay with us. I do apologize to hear about the charges inquired, but am very pleased to know that our staff was able to locate the missing item. Thank you again for being our guest, and we hope to see you in future.

Summary: Our homeowner's insurance company put us at the Residence Inn while our home was being repaired. We were there for 3 weeks. All the while, there were no problems whatsoever. Krystal and the other staff were helpful, accommodating, and thoughtful. We enjoyed the special evening treats, too! Clean rooms and friendly staff made it a nice home away from home.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay with us. I am very happy to know that our staff and Krystal exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, best breakfast, helpful Staff!
Summary: Clean rooms. Thick walls. Comfortable beds. Helpful staff. Best breakfast we have ever had at a similar hotel. ONLY PROBLEM:  Checked in around 4pm, really tired and wanting to rest the whole family. Carpet cleaners knocked about two minutes after we first sat down, saying they needed to clean the carpets right now. I had to pretty sternly say no, we just checked in and we do not feel like having you clean the carpets for 20+ minutes right now, THEN have wet carpets for 4 hours. Once I pushed even harder, they said they would come back tomorrow. Then they asked what time we we're checking out. Although contracted cleaners, the staff should not allow cleaning carpets right when people first check in and into the evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to share your experience with us on your recent stay. I would like to extend my sincerest apologizes for the inconvenience you experienced shortly after check in. I will bring your feedback to our staff to ensure we are checking guests into suites where the carpets have already been serviced. I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed the rest of your stay and that we exceeded your expectations with our breakfast buffet. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again when your travel needs bring you to the Garden Grove/Anaheim area!

Summary: The check in staff was very friendly and efficient.  The breakfast was very good and quite abundant.  Giselda was very helpful and cleaned and dried an outside table for us.  She even helped carry my tray since I had a toddler in tow. We would definitely return on our next Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking a moment to share your experience with your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that your stay was enjoyable. We are very proud to have such service-minded staff members like Griselda, who ensure each and every guest is taking care of. I will be sure to pass along your comments with our team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional customer service. Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: As always, Residence Inn provides a consistent experience that meets our needs when travelling as a family - clean, comfortable room, fully equipped kitchen, and extremely helpful and friendly staff. We needed an early check-in on this trip, and had no issues with having the room ready and waiting for us before noon.  Normally I would provide a 5 rating, however the sofa bed was long past its comfort life, and unfortunately, after setting up the bed and lying on it, we decided that it would be less uncomfortable (you could feel each and every spring) to close it back up and just sleep on the couch.
Manager Response: Thank  you for being our guest. I am very sorry to hear that you found the sofa bed to be below your expectations. We certainly strive to ensure the best stay for each and every one of our guests and will certainly look into the issue you experienced. I am pleased to know that the rest of your stay was enjoyable and hope to see you again on your next trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: Most rooms face a busy 9 lane road and if you're lucky enough to be a member of their rewards program they will put you by the intersection too. The staff is pretty nice but they should at least install thicker windows to minimize the noise
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area/Garden Grove with us.  Every process put in place is aimed at providing you with an unforgettable hotel experience. From your recent feedback, I am disappointed to learn that we fell short of your expectations. I would like to take this time to apologize for the noise disturbance caused by the main road.  Rest assured, we are taking steps to help ensure problems of this nature do not occur in the future. As a valued guest, thank you again for your feedback and we hope to serve you again whenever your travels bring you back to Garden Grove.

Summary: My family and I had a great time! The free breakfast and dinner (during the week) make a Disney vacation much easier on a budget, and all the extras kept the whole family entertained. Our only minor issue was a loss of water pressure during prime shower time!  Griselda (working in the dining area) was especially helpful during our stay. She was extremely patient with my Disney hyped children and always greeted us with a smile.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and you found the included breakfast to be such a great added value for you and your family. I appreciate the recognition of our breakfast staff as well and will be sure to pass along your kind comments to her. I would also like to apologize for the issue with the loss in water pressure due to a pump failure. I want to assure you that the issue is an isolated occurrence and has been resolved. I appreciate you choosing our hotel and thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: My family and I enjoyed staying here!  The room was clean, hot breakfast every morning, kids enjoyed playing basketball ping pong etc etc...also it was very convenient to buy disney tickets at front desk! Close to everything and walking distance to several restaurants like Roscoes Chicken, target, liquor store etc. my kids even enjoyed going to Angels game at Anaheim Stadium.   I would definitely stay here again next time we go back to LA.  Staff are friendly and helpful.  The only down is paying overnight parking  :(.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am pleased to know that you and your family had a great time while with us! I am also very pleased to know that you were able to take advantage of some of the other great things Orange County has to offer. Spring baseball games are a great family event to take advantage of. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we get to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: We where married on Monday and then came to the Residence Inn by Marriott Garden Grove on Tuesday. Best stay ever!! Kesha and Kristal at the front desk where soo helpful. And we came back to find a bottle wine and chocolates. Clean, friendly, wonderful!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and we wish you a heartfelt congratulations on your new marriage! I am very pleased to know that your stay with us was nothing less than perfect! I truly appreciate you taking a moment to share the experiences of you and your family and for noting the exceptional service provided by our Front Desk. I want to assure you that I will be sharing your comments with them and our whole team. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope we see you again to celebrate your future anniversaries!

Summary: Wonderful place to stay.Breakfast buffet is amazing.  Tons of choices! Rooms were clean and staff friendly and helpful... Were able to get early checkin.  Shuttle bus to Disney picks up in front of hotel and only picks up one other hotel so always a quick ride.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! I am very pleased to hear that our staff was able to get you and your family checked in early and that our breakfast buffet, room cleanliness and staff service all exceeded your expectations. I truly appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences with us and sincerely hope we get to see you and your family again soon on a future trip to Orange County!

Summary: Our stay was wonderful!  We had a pet room, and even though we were on the first floor the hotel was pretty quiet (and I have really good ears and sleep lightly!). What makes it great for a family is that they serve a continental hot breakfast (eggs, sausage, fruit, etc.) AND they serve a free "dinner" ea. night that can be anything from a potato bar to pasta and sauce. After a day at Disney where you pay so much for everything a free meal is a welcome treat.  The hot tub (and Lourdes) is one of the main reasons we would return.  If you have seriously sore muscles then this is the hot tub for you. Best hotel hot tub I have ever been in.   Lourdes works in the eating area and she really knows how to provide good customer service. It's plain to see that she loves her job and
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experiences with us from your recent stay. I would like to offer my sincerest apologies for the odor issue you experienced while with us. I would like to assure you that I will be addressing this with my staff to ensure this issue is an isolated incident. I am pleased to know that your stay with us was a pleasant one and we truly hope we see you and your family again on your next trip to Orange County!

Summary: We had a decent stay at this property. The rooms were a good size and on par with what I expect from a Residence Inn. The location is very convenient.   We were there on a very busy weekend but the check-in process was a nightmare. No one seemed to know what to do and the lobby area was just chaos. It took hours after our check-in to get a crib - not great after a very long day. Our room location was on the main street and louder than I would have expected.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for bringing your check in experience to our attention. I would like to offer my sincerest apology for the perception that you were left with and assure you that I will be discussing this with our front desk team. I truly appreciate you choosing our hotel and sincerely hope we may have the opportunity to regain your trust on a future stay in the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: This was a business trip for me - the conference I attended was at larger hotel next door.   Forgetting that it was Orange County and near Disneyland, didn't realize nearly everyone there would be families going to the magic kingdom.  The breakfast was super crowded with the families.  Drawbacks - elevator waits are eternal - use the stairs to go down or up (ask staff how to use them - they're not obvious.)  The upside - the hotel is empty most of the day while the families are at Disneyland.   Staff upgraded me to a two-bedroom suite - for just little me - wish that had the young nieces along for this trip!   Hotel is perfect for families going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Pros: Room size of the King bed and 2 bunk beds was great. Very spacious and clean. Breakfast was great. Food quality was better than expected. The grounds and common areas were in great repair. The kids pool was nice.  The Disney shuttle was convenient and priced well. I was also surprised about the snack/dinner that the hotel provided for free Mon-Thurs. That was a nice benefit. Parking was fine. The spots are slightly narrow but there were enough spots. Safes were available in the room for free.  Cons: The Elevators. There are only two elevators and they can't keep up with the traffic. The stairs are located on the far end of the property outside. Very bad design. We requested a high room on our reservation and were given the second floor. This made the elevator issue a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with the rest of our team to ensure that we are providing excellent service to all of our guests. Again, thank you for being our guests and the valuable feedback required to provide great service to our guests.

Summary: Except for an occasional outburst from an excited young child, the room was quiet, restful and a source of solitude from an exciting day and evening at Disneyland.  A great family oriented hotel!  Especially liked the surprising meal snacks in the evening along with the excellent breakfast selections.  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our staff was friendly and courteous to your family.  I agree with you in the fact that our breakfast and light snacks in the evening provide great value for our guests, especially those travelling with their families.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.

Summary: My family and I had great experience here. The only thing that was disappointing was the breakfast. They had good ideas, but the food was taste terrible. The potatoes were uncooked in the middle and burned on the outside. The eggs, if that's what you called them, were terrible. The muffins were very dry. I kept going back and forth trying to see if something would taste good, but it didn't happen. Mykids complained for about a week after staying there. It's time for another stay in a hotel, and the said please not the Residence, the rooms are nice, but the food isn't good Mommy. Let's stay somewhere else. If the food is better, we will come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we are providing the greatest product that we can deliver.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to regain your trust on your next visit to the area!

Summary Heading: Another win for the Marriott Brand
Summary: Marriott hotels always offer excellent accommodation and  very friendly staff. I stayed in this hotel for 3 nights. Room was very clean. This hotel is in a great location if visiting Disneyland and it is great value for the money.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that your stay was enjoyable.  I agree with you that our breakfast and light snacks in the evening become a great value for our guests, especially those travelling with their families.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you on your next stay!

Summary: We have stayed at this place for years. It never disappoint. Their staff is amazing. Shout out to Lorades Lorraine  is an Ester you made her stay a special one as always. These ladies are always hustling in the kitchen area.... They're always husteling making sure there is plenty of everything. If they are out just let one of them know.... And the problem is solved . Close to target and lots of places to eat. We have a parking pass to the park but have figures out we would rather take the bus right in front of the hotel. It rained one night when we were there and they had hot chocolate waiting in the dining area! It's these kind of things that make a trip magical. This place is a 10 out of 10!  Even with a sold out hotel the noise level in the rooms was quiet. Insulation is
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that Lourdes and Lorena were able to make your stay even more enjoyable.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next  time you visit!

Summary: Staff was very friendly and extremely helpful with all our needs and requests. Our family enjoyed the breakfast buffet as well.  Good location. Close to parks.  The workers at the buffet were also very helpful and worked hard keeping up with the large amount of people in the breakfast area. The food in the evening was also a nice touch.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am lucky to have such great staff members who are service minded and ensure that all of our guests are taken care of.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: Previously we stayed in Disney hotels when going to the parks. This year I wanted a more spacious room for my family. I am so happy we chose to stay here, this will be our go to place from now on!  I highly recommend to all!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I agree with you that our spacious suites are a great perk to all of our travelers.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guests and we look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: Was staying in Residence inn with the family. Nice property. Great breakfast. Perfect location. Shuttle to the Disneyland. Great room. Nice kitchen. But unfortunately sheets were not changed, I dicovered some sand and lots of hair in my bed. I called front desk to get fresh sheets, did not get any. Had to use spare sheets that were for sofa bed.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very sorry to hear that there was an issue with the cleanliness of your bedding. I am sincerely sorry for the inconvenience you experienced and want to assure you that this is being addressed with our staff to ensure that this is an isolated, stand alone, incident. Thank you again for being our guest. I appreciate you bringing this to our attention and sincerely hope that we may have an opportunity in the future to regain your trust during a future stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: Spent 2 nights and hotel very convenient. One king and two queens with kitchenette worked very well for our group. The only thing preventing an excellent rating is we don't think its right to charge for parking when staying on property. Our nation is going crazy with  these added fees for what used to be included. I wont say we would not come back here but I will say before doing so I'll shop for a property that does not get on the Fee band wagon.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I agree with you that our spacious suites are a great perk for our guests, especially those travelling with their families.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we are providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you again when your travels bring you to the area.

Summary Heading: Great location, awesome staff, a few miles to Disney!!
Summary: We stayed with our kids for 2 nights at this wonderful property in a 2-bedroom suite. Everything was comfortable - the hotel staff were terrific, the property looked new and well-maintained, breakfast was decent, and ample parking for guests. To add to it, Disneyland was only a few miles away. We have been recommending this hotel to friends and family since our return. We will most definitely return to this hotel on our next trip. Way to go Residence Inn!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that we had such a positive impact on your vacation.  We appreciate the fact that you recommend us to your friends and family, that is the greatest complement we can receive.  Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: From the beginning we were greeted with absolute enthusiasm. Krystal ensured we were always pleased with whatever were doing during our 5 day stay. Thank you Marriott and Krystal ! I will definitely be rebooking if I decide to go to Disney again!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! I truly appreciate you taking a moment to provide a review of your stay with us and for your acknowledgment of one of our associates. I am very pleased to know that she went above and beyond and made your stay so enjoyable and memorable. I want to assure you that I will be sharing your review with her and our entire front desk team. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The staff was very friendly. Everyone from the front desk to housekeeping. Kitchen was well equipped and.the room was very clean. I have st as stayed at a few of the Marriott in Anaheim and by far this is the best.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and thank you for such a kind review of our staff! We truly appreciate you choosing our hotel for your recent stay and sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again soon on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: The suites at Residence Inn Anaheim were fabulous. They were clean and large with a nice kitchen. Lots of room for 6 people and the living room was a great addition. Some people could go to bed while the others stayed up and watched tv without bothering anyone.  The free breakfasts were great - especially the waffles! The pool and hot tub were great, but we really enjoyed the ping pong table and basketball court. Great stay. The cost was exactly as they had said it would be during booking. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing a review of your recent stay with us. I am very happy to hear that our two bedroom suite was exactly what you and your family was looking for! I am also happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations in regards to breakfast, especially the waffles and that the rest of the hotel amenities helped you all relax after a long day at the park. Thank you so much for being our guest and we truly hope we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary Heading: Perfect Family hotel for a comfortable and economical trip to Disney Land
Summary: great location. 10 mins from disney land ony disney bus, (cheap) you can get the passes in the hotel.  free breakfast was awesome with the kids. wake up go down eat a good hot breakfast and away you. lots of sores nearby if you want to buy groceries like we did and do pizzas and whatever in the evening. it helps keep the costs down if your on a budget. Pool is nothing to writr home to mom about but if your kids are like mine as soon as they hit the water they are good and i enjoyed haviung a hot tub in the evening with a beer after doing theme parks all day. Be sure to pre purchase a Southern  Cali "City Pass" for park admissions to 3 parks in Cali. great family spot.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. We appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences while with us and I am pleased to know you had an enjoyable stay with us. Thank you again for being our guest and it is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to sunny Southern California!

Summary: Had a great experience and Krystal at the front desk was absolutely amazing and always curious and helpful to our group.  Out room was always clean and the location was right by everything you could ask for
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences while with us and I am very pleased to know that we exceeded your expectations. I also really appreciate your recognition of our staff member and her efforts to ensure your stay was memorable and comfortable. I want to assure you that I will share your comments with her and her department manager. Thank you again for being our guest.  It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This was perfect for our family.  Two separate bedrooms with bathrooms, a living room/full kitchen in between, in case someone woke up or didn't want to go to bed yet, there was a place to go without disturbing anyone.  The most comfortable mattress I've ever slept on in a hotel.  Loved the free breakfast every morning.  Loved the full kitchen!  Kids loved the pool! I would choose this hotel again for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that we were able to make your stay a memorable one.  I will be sure to share your comments with our staff to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: We were a family of 5.  Had a 2-bedroom family suite with 2 separate baths, plus the sofa sleeper.  The room was clean, a very good size, and comfortable.  It included a very hearty all-you-can-eat breakfast buffet.  Location is superb.  The staff was very nice and very helpful with directions and park advice.  Excellent value for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that we were able to make your stay a memorable one.  I will be sure to share your comments with our staff to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: this was a nice get away to Disney. I called 2 days ahead of time to confirm our room. I explained we would be coming in late, cranky and tired. I did not want any problems w/our room. I confirmed a room w/3beds,2 bedrooms, 1 king and 2 queens and a hide away bed/couch. all people in the room are adults. we were tired when we checked in. the person at the desk got our room and keys. up to the room we went. the room had bunk beds. not happy! I called the desk, they said give us a few minutes to correct the problem. they called us back in the 1st room and asked us to come to the desk to get new keys. we got the new keys and off to the next room. this time it was correct but, not enough towels, shampoo and soaps for 6 people. back to the desk to retrieve these items. the person at
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we are providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest, and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: This was the perfect place to stay. I loved our room and the breakfast room was awesome. There were many food choices which was helpful because my kids are picky eaters. The only thing I wish were different were the chairs out by the pool. Every lounger was ripped. Hopefully they'll replace soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to our guests.  Our pool lounge chairs are currently in the process of being replaced, and should be done soon! Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary Heading: A Stay the family will love
Summary: We always have a good time at this hotel. The staff is the best!! Their goal is for you to have the best stay. The rooms are very spacious. Their suites have a full stove which came in very handy. Great Stay!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I agree that our fully equipped kitchens are a great amenity, especially for our travelling families.  I will be sure to share your comments with the rest of our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time your travels bring you to the area!

Summary: The location and the price we paid were great. there was great restaurants close by and the hotel staff made our stay even better by going the extra mile.The rooms were clean and perfect for our family vacation
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am lucky to have great a great staff who goes the extra mile to ensure that our guests are taken care of.  I agree that the number of restaurants in the vicinity is extremely convenient to our guests.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.

Summary: Oh my the complimentary breakfast makes this hotel great value to stay at, although you need to get there early before it gets trashed.  Hotel is about 25 minutes walk to Disney which we actually liked after eating a huge breakfast it was good exercise.  Rooms are cool and have great kitchen facilities.  My only complaint was the sofa bed linen could have been cleaner. It didn't look like it had been washed since last used. Staff friendly. The pool looks grea although we didn't use it.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am sorry to hear that you felt the sofa bed linens were not clean. I want to assure you that cleanliness is of the utmost importance. I will be sharing your comments with our staff and ensure that the proper processes are in place to ensure the freshest possible linens for the sofa sleepers. Thank you for being our guest and we certainly hope to have you as our guest again on a future trip to the Garden Grove area.

Summary: This was our third time to Anaheim and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. There was enough room for everyone. The breakfast had great variety. Rooms cleaned every day and the kitchen in the room and two bathrooms was ideal for our party of 5. Across the road from shops. Walking distance to Disneyland, but recommend the bus that picks you up right outside the door every half hour. Someone took some of our items from the laundry and did not return them which disappointed us but not the hotels fault. Just make sure you hang around the laundry if doing any washing. Great save for kids with pool, spa and basketball court. Definitely will stay here again. As I work in the travel industry I will be recommending this to colleagues and guests.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences while with us. I am very pleased to know that we exceeded your expectations for cleanliness, room amenities, break fast and hotel amenities in general.I am very happy to hear that your stay was so enjoyable and it is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary Heading: Awesome place to stay with family
Summary: This was my 3rd time staying at this hotel. Great customer service from front desk. Family friendly and great complimentary breakfast. They have small tables for the little ones and Disney show on projector. Shuttle for Disneyland is located in front of hotel. I will definetely come back again.  Staff is great overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very happy to know that you and your family had such a great time with us and that our facilities, including the kids theater, helped make your time with us special. I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: stayed here over the weekend for my daughters 3rd bday. Decided to choose this base on other reviews. I Booked my reservations way in advance and asked if they could do something special in the room for my daughters bday. They said sure no problem got my daughters name and everything and will set something up. Called to confirm my booking and everything seemed fine. When we finally checked in, I didn't see anything set up but thought maybe since we are here 3 nights they'll do it eventually. Well the next morning, I asked the front desk (Chantel) regarding a set up and see said yes, your daughters name is so and so? Well 2nd day  passed by still nothing.. So I asked AGAIN the front desk( no name given when they answered) and she said she will call back to consult with her
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I sincerely apologize for the situation you and your family experienced with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that this was an isolated situation.  Feedback, both positive and negative, are integral in helping us provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary Heading: Terrible experience that ruined our Disneyland vacation
Summary: Our family's hotel room was flooded when the room above ours had a fire and water came into our room from the ceiling. When the hotel called us at 11 AM to tell us our room was flooded, we had to leave Disneyland and lost most of that day for which we paid. Our luggage, clothing and much of our children's toys and books we had purchased from Disneyland the day before were drenched and ruined from the awful-smelling water. The hotel manager, Frank Palacious, met with us and promised we'd be compensated for our losses. Several months later their lawyer Sam Logan told us the hotel wasn't responsible, and we have yet to be compensated.
Manager Response: I am very sorry that you and your family experienced this event. However, as this was a very exceptional circumstance, I do not feel this is the forum to discuss this matter. Unfortunately, as this is not something that is directly handled at the hotel level, I am unable to comment on the status of this claim. I want to assure you, however, that I will ensure the General Manager is made aware of your comments.

Summary: We stayed here for Star Wars Celebration 7 and loved this hotel. It is very spacious and was clean! It was about a mile to the convention which made it hard to walk back and forth. You also have to pay close to $15 for parking which was a down fall. But the hotel itself is very nice. I would recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that your stay was a memorable one, for the positive reasons.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we strive to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: The breakfast buffet was very good and had a large variety each day. It was especially nice to have a lot of fresh fruit. Menu changed each day as well. It is about a 20-25 minute walk to nearby convention center. Close to Disneyland and had a shuttle to park. Hotel had pool, basketball court, ping pong table as well as 2 outdoor gas grills. Rooms were furnished with full kitchen and frig including pots and pans. There is a target store within 15 minutes walking from hotel to stock up on food. The only complaint I had was the air conditioner unit within room was loud and closet safe didn't work. Staff at hotel extremely friendly and helpful. Even gave cookies baked fresh as we checked in. Also has a nightly get together With finger foods as well. Kids enjoyed video room and we
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our amenities were able to meet the needs of your family.  I agree with you that our breakfast and our light snacks are a great amenity, especially for families.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service for all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, two bedroom suite with kitchen is brilliant for families visiting the sites of Annahiem.
Summary: We stayed at the Residence Inn between the 5th and 13th of April 2015 and found the hotel really good. We were travelling with two teenagers so the two bedroom units with a kitchen were brilliant for us. The hotel has a decent pool, Spa pool, basketball half court and table tennis, so the little down between theme parks was easily filled at the hotel.   The front desk staff were excellent, very helpful with local knowledge and recommendations.  The complimentary breakfast was fairly average, waffles, cooked breakfast - just seemed really processed. They have a social session most nights with burgers, or soup and salad (complimentary) - seemed a good idea but we didn't have time to try it. There was plenty of parking at about 12 bucks a day.  Overall we were really happy with the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experiences with us. I am very pleased to know that you had an enjoyable stay with us and were able to take advantage of several of the hotels amenities during your down time from the parks. We truly appreciate you being our guest and hope to see you again on a future trip to the area!

Summary: We stayed here for a few nights and was very pleased with the free upgrade we received to a 2 room suite with bunkbeds for the kids, with their own TV and bathroom! The grounds were great! Arcade, heated pool, kiddie pool, spa, small shop with gifts & snacks, and movie room for kids. Breakfast was crowded, but didn't have to wait that long for any of the items, which were a great variety! Parking lot was always crowded, but not too far of a walk to main entrance. It's definitely not close enough to Disneyland or Cal Adventure to walk and there isn't a shuttle that I know of. The beautiful Huntington Beach wasn't that far either.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We believe we are the ideal choice for anyone visiting Disneyland and are happy that you agree. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Went to Disneyland. The evening meals are a nice plus. Pool area was very nice with a small basketball court. Breakfast was delicious and fresh. I highly recommend this hotel to disney travelers. Staff was also very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We believe we are the ideal choice for anyone visiting Disneyland and are happy that you agree. Thank you so much for being our guest and we certainly hope to see you and your family on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Stayed few nights for business at the convention center but appeared to be primarily Disney crowd.  Attentive staff... accommodated my request for a late check out.  There can be some road noise if on the lower level and facing Harbor.  Comfortable room with decent wifi speed.  Great value and service for rate.
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people working at this hotel.  We hope to see you as a guest again very soon.

Summary: We stayed in this hotel for 7 nights. The room had a King size master suite then two twins in another separate room.Then we had a pull out bed in the common area next to the kitchen.Completely suiting our family size perfectly.  Our room was always clean and the full kitchen was a PLUS! The staff is always friendly. The breakfast every morning was wonderful and had a huge selection every single day. Monday - Wednesday evenings they offer a wonderful "happy hour". The food was awesome. We made a meal out of it. We were walking distance to Anaheim convention Center and Disneyland (though it was a long walk) the shuttle is convenient and easy to catch. We will be back again next year.
Manager Response: I definitely agree with you we are great for families. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is the best value in Anaheim. Our staff works hard every day to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary: also   edith lorena erika lulu   were gr8 with kids and all attentions @breakfast  ---stayed @room118 ~> needs new carpet  ~> the cleaning brush supplied to wash dishes had black hairs in it... very odd ... I took it to the front desk but the person at the moment said he had no idea and just gave me a new sponge....... cleaning crew better watch out for these details  but again, the level of service / attention in general was very good
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  We are lucky to have great staff members who are able to provide excellent customer service to our guests.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for being our guests we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: Very nice room with 2 queen beds (yeah!).  Good size kitchen, small family room and 2 TVs.  Nice pool and jacuzzi, sport court and ping pong table. Breakfast was good but gets crowded after 7:45. We drove car and parked in Toy Story Disneyand lot which is 3 blocks away.  That was $17 which was less than the $20 we would have spent on the shuttle from the hotel. Best of all, we didn't have to wait for the shuttle.  Several good places to eat dinner...Oggi's was our favorite.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our amenities were able to meet your family's needs.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team as we continue to strive to provide memorable experiences to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights prior to a cruise.  We booked 2 rooms (each had 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms). Perfect for 2 families traveling with teenagers.  The atmosphere is relaxing - nice pool, hot tub and small kiddie pool, pool deck has lounge chairs and tables and chairs as well.  Basketball court, table tennis, BBQ's and lounging area outside was wonderful.  The rooms came with small living room space and full kitchen.  Plenty of restaurants within 5 minute walk as well.  One of the families walked to Target (5 min) and bought chicken breast to BBQ and a fresh salad.  The staff was outstanding!  Always friendly and smiling.  The hot breakfast every morning provided enough choices to fill up and start the day.  There were many people at the hotel due to Easter weekend, but
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am delighted to hear that our amenities were able to accommodate your family's needs.  I agree with you that our spacious suites and our proximity to a large store are extremely convenient to visiting families.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team as we strive to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.

Summary Heading: Excellent Customer Service, Convenience, and Value
Summary: We (family of 4 with kids ages 12 and 7) stayed here during Spring Break (the week before Easter).  I give the Residence Inn at Garden Grove high marks for customer service, convenience, and value.  I definitely recommend staying here for a family trip to Disneyland.   Suite:  One of the main reasons we stayed at Residence Inn was so we could sleep in a bedroom separate from our kids.  The 1-BR suite size is not huge (around 500 sq ft), but it is definitely bigger than a standard hotel room.  When the couch is made into a bed, however, there is no walking space around the bed to get to the window.  The main bed seemed to be about medium-soft.  My kids were fine on the sofa bed (I wouldn't recommend it for adults, though).  There is an in-room safe.  Wifi was fast and reliable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am lucky to have great front desk agents such as Sergio and Monique who are able to leave a lasting impression on many of our guests.  I will be sure to share your comments with the rest of our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: Fantastic place to stay!!! Great price with extra amenities.
Summary: This is a great place for any types of groups to stay, business or pleasure! Quiet rooms, GREAT STAFF, nice breakfast with variety. Rooms are clean and spacious. Very accommodating staff. Hotel was at full capacity but you couldn't tell. Parking became a challenge. Handicap spaces limited and NOT monitored for law breakers. Other then that, would stay again and again! We had 2 suites and stayed 5 nites. Lourdes in dining area was very kind and helpful when one of the kids lost a toy.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our amenities were able to meet your family's needs.  I agree that our breakfast is a great amenity in that it provides a variety of foods for everyone's needs or wants.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we are providing the best service we can to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you next time!

Summary Heading: Great choice for families looking for a more space
Summary: We stayed in this hotel in 2008 and chose it again for our trip in 2015 because we knew we needed more space than the traditional hotel rooms on Disney property.  We enjoyed the two seperate bedrooms and living area this hotel provides at a much better rate.  Breakfast area was well stocked every day and as clean as you would expect.    The drawback is you have to wait for the bus to get to and from the parks.  I would suggest NOT buying ART passes, unless you plan to use it to get places other than the Disney parks.  ART no longer stops outside the hotel.  You have to walk to the stop across the street.    There is a seperate transportation service to the parks for this hotel and a couple others that are close by.  Buy passes for that service once you get to the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that we were able to be a part of a memorable experience for you.  I do agree that our larger suites provide ample room for everyone to lay our after a long day at the parks.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guests and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: Looking for a family friendly hotel with lots of room near Disneyland?
Summary: Let me start off with, I'm usually a fan of Residence Inns. I've stayed a few throughout California. For the money, it's usually a very good value. I typically travel, with my husband, two kids (2&5), and my parents. We like to stay in suites with 2 bedrooms and a kitchenette of some sort. This particular Residence Inn wasn't what my family was used too.   Pros:  1)The value of the money. We had a 2 bedroom/2 bath suite during 2015 Spring Break, and it was VERY reasonable.  2) Location. The hotel is near the Disneyland Resort, and you can take a shuttle to and from - again very reasonable 3) Free breakfast, more than just your typical breads/juices. There are variations day to day. Like make your own waffle, sausage, bacon, pancakes, etc.  4) Extremely kid-friendly, from the
Manager Response: Thank you for begin our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us. I am very sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations on cleanliness during your stay. I want to assure you that I have shared your feedback with our staff and will ensure those areas noted are corrected. I am pleased to know that we met or exceeded your expectations in service, value and location. We appreciate you being our guest and hope to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: Me and my husband stayed at this place with our two little girls on our trip to Disneyland. After a long day at the park we were happy to return to a really nice room to rest for the night.
