Raeann was very helpful in our check in process and in finding us the most suitable room top for our needs. We are definitely planning on staying here on our next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for begin our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences while with us. I am very pleased to know that our hotel exceeded your expectations that you and your family had such an enjoyable stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Southern California!

Summary: This hotel has great value with only a few items for caution.  Sergio at the front desk was extremely friendly and helpful as was the rest of the staff.  The front desk booked an LA tour for us and made it so that we didn't have to worry about the details.   The rooms are somewhat modest but spacious for our group of 6. The kids really enjoyed the bunk beds. Housekeeping staff did a great job daily. Overall just a friendly environment     The Shuttle to Disney was super easy and convenient.    Breakfast was again, simple but well done. Many guests feel the need to stuff their purses with enough food to last for days and if you do not time it right it can be chaos.   Prepare for that unless you come early.    Two elevators serving the entire hotel can be troublesome during the
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to share your experiences while with us. I am pleased to know you had an enjoyable stay at the hotel. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to sunny Southern California!

Summary: Hotel is in good location, is clean, and front desk staff are really good.  The problem is that they don't open for breakfast until 7 a.m. on weekends and the first bus out to Disneyland leaves at 7:10!  So there's no way you can take your family down for breakfast and get on the first bus which puts you ahead of the massive lines.  This is a poor arrangement and one we were quite disappointed about.  Other than that we liked the hotel.  Bedrooms a little small but nice living and kitchen area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us. I appreciate you taking a moment to share your point of view on the weekend hours with our breakfast service and the park shuttle. Our goal is to always provide the best possible service for each and every one of our guests and I am very sorry to hear that you experienced an issue with the timing of our breakfast service. Please know that we appreciate you choosing our hotel and hope to have you as our guest again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Fantastic Service, Free Hot Breakfast and Spotless Rooms!
Summary: My family and I really enjoyed our stay at this property. This place is friendly, family oriented and the ideal spot to stay to enjoy the SoCal Anaheim resort corridor. With a 2 room suite and full kitchen, I was expecting to cook to save money, which I did but this wonderful hotel had other options as well.  From 6p - 8p during the week they host events with food, we had soft tacos one night, bratwurst another.  Movies for the kids and early morning cartoons.  The front desk staff was always helpful and friendly. I NEVER heard other families through the walls.  I am always concerned about booking with family friendly hotels due to the inevitability of screaming and crying children.  I was pleasantly surprised at the serenity of the nights. No stomping feet on the floor above.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experiences with us. I am very pleased to know that our location, staff service, cleanliness and food options all met or exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves on ensuring that each and every one of our guests has a truly exceptional time while with us and I am very happy to know that your experience with us was no different. Thank you again for being our guest and we look forward to having you as our guest again on a future trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: recently stayed at this hotel for a Disneyland vacation. The hotel service was very god but Lourdes, who worked the breakfast buffet, was above and beyond. People were piling in to the restaurant trying to get an early start at Disney and the food was going quickly. Lourdes kept the place hoping and was as pleasant to every guest as if they were the only customer in the house. I know she does this day after day but you would never know it from the smiles and enthusiasm she demonstrated at al times!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences with us and for taking the time to mention the excellent service provided by one of our employees. I will most certainly be sharing your review with her and the entire staff in the kitchen. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: Just returned from a five day stay here with our children and grandchildren and found this property was overall a fine place to stay while visiting Disneyland.  We had two rooms nicely located across the hall from one another which were well-equipped with good beds, adequate kitchen, and spacious sitting and dining areas.  The staff was  friendly and efficient in correcting the AC problem we had for a short period.  There was also a good pool area, great free breakfast buffet, and a short shuttle ride to the park.  Yes, the décor is a bit tired and the shuttle packed for the ride home at night.  But, at these prices and with a locale within walking distance of Mickeyland and good restaurants, we will stay here again on our next trip with the family!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel. We want to thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experiences with us. I am very pleased to hear that you found our location, value and overall comfort of the hotel to be what you were looking for. We truly appreciate you being our customer and look forward to having you as our guest again on a future trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: Good location near restaurants.  A little noisy and crowded at breakfast probably because we were there during spring break.  The food was the usual fare for the Residence Inn.  They also featured snacks/ dinner at night which was great for large families. I peeked in and the buffet featured grilled chicken sandwiches, salad, and fruit.  There was a kitchen which we did I not use since we were only staying for one night and moving our convention hotel. Thee room was very clean but had a dated feel likely from the high traffic this hotel gets from being close to the happiest place on earth- Disneyland! The toilet did not flush and they sent someone up immediately. The shower curtain had a little sour smell from not being fully dried out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being our guest. I am happy to know you had a pleasant stay with us. I am very sorry to hear that you had an issue with your room but I am pleased to know that our staff responded quickly to correct that for you the first time. We appreciate your staying with us and sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Recently stayed here for second time and have to say this is a great place to stay if you are travelling with kids.  Shuttle bus right outside the door to Disneyland  ( don't walk )  next to the Starbucks.  The absolute best hotel breakfast you will ever find, serving abundant options and many healthy choices such as fresh fruit, hard boiled eggs, yogurt,  as well as waffles, scrambled eggs,turkey sausage, bagels, muffins, juice, cereals, etc.   Pools, basketball courts etc and laundry facilities. On Week days a light supper is served free of charge betwee 6-8:00. (Soup, salad, spaghetti etc.) Rooms are large and well equipped with fridge, stoves, microwave, dishes.   Across the street to sporting goods store, Target. We traveled with some seniors who would take the shuttle back
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am delighted to know that your stay with us was nothing less than a five star experience! I am pleased to know that you and your group were able to take advantages of the hotel amenities and the park shuttle to make your trip so memorable and fun. I truly appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences with us and we hope to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, convenient location, but needs some TLC
Summary: This hotel had a convenient location to Disney and the shuttle service was cheap and convenient.  I could even purchase my Disney tickets at the front desk.  The staff were friendly and the hot breakfast was good, but definitely had long lines during peak hours, which is typical for a family friendly resort location.   I have stayed at many Residence Inns, but I have never had so many maintenance problems with one room before.  We had the two bedroom suite with the two twin beds in a small room separated from the living area by a sliding glass paned door.  The door was not properly affixed to the track so in addition to sliding left to right to open and close (like it was supposed to), it also could swing forward and background like a playground swing.  My 3 year old discovered
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very sorry to hear that you experienced so many issues during your stay. Please know that I am discussing the issues you have experienced with our maintenance staff and will ensure that each and every one of them is corrected. I am very pleased however,  to know that our staff and the service provided to you during your stay met your expectations. Thank you again for being our guest. I appreciate your feedback and hope that we may be able to regain your confidence during a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: What makes this review stand out?  That would be the customer service.  The hotel is nice, rooms are great, and breakfast is above average.  But I"m telling you after visiting and reviewing even the nicest hotels and resorts, how you are treated makes all the difference. The front desk is awesome, ( special thank you Krystal) they are  friendly, and ready to help in any way.  From the breakfast staff to the cleaning staff to maintenance I have no complaints, I was so grateful for the hospitality.   It's a little more than a mile to Disney.  I chose it because it had the space my family needed, plus a kitchen and a Target in walking distance.  There is a bus stop right outside the hotel to drop you off at Disneyland.  I paid $8 for a 2 day bus pass.  This stop is the first of
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We're glad you and your family had a good stay. I absolutely agree with you; we do have a great staff and we are fortunate to have each and every one of them. I will be sure to share your feedback with our staff. I hope to have you back soon!

Summary Heading: Best family stay in Disneyland-trip to remember and already shared with many friends
Summary: Within walking distance of DIsneyland or 5 minute tram/bus shuttle. Walking distance to wide range of family friendly dining options. Free breakfast buffet and sunset snack for early to bed kids. Extremely friendly and helpful staff too!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences while with us and I am pleased to know you had an enjoyable stay with us. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to orange County.

Summary: We recently used this hotel as a base for a visit to the LA area with children.  The hotel is ideal for a trip to the Disney parks but a bit of a drive in traffic to visit Universal.  We had a two bedroom suite, the second bedroom had two twins bed but no window or closet which was a surprise as we have stayed in many two bedroom suites and have never encountered this. The second bedroom was small, but sufficient for two kids.  I don't think that the beds are quite as comfortable as other Marriotts we have stayed at but still adequate and everyone got a good night sleep. The hotel room is looking a bit worn and will need an update soon.  That being said, the kitchen was very functional and we able to prepare some basic meals in room.  The breakfast provided varied a bit daily
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to know that the full kitchens in our room helped make the stay of you and your family so comfortable. Having the extra space and the full kitchen in the two bedroom suites definitely make longer family stays more enjoyable. I am pleased to know that the service by our staff was in keeping with your expectations as well. We certainly do our best to ensure each and every guest has the most pleasant stay possible. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary Heading: Great place for family's to stay
Summary: My family and I spent four nights here and out of the many trips and hotels we have stayed at, this is by far our favorite. The hotel lobby is kept clean and the staff is friendly and always welcoming when we would come and go. Most hotels now offer free breakfast but here they put everyone else to shame with the buffet they offer every morning. There are also family events most nights. For example, they will have movie nights, bbq's and ice cream socials to name a few. They also have a basketball court and ping pong table at the pool area. And let's not forget the rooms. We had two queen beds in a separate room with a pull out sofa sleeper and kitchenette in the front room. It was great to have the space for a family of five. I would highly recommend this place to my friends
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We believe we are the ideal choice for anyone visiting Disneyland and are happy that you agree.  . Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We hope to see you as a guest again very soon.

Summary: The staff was courteous and accommodating.  One staff in particular was wonderful.  My grandaughter got sick and basically exploded in the bathroom and we had to call housekeeping to clean up the bath thoroughly at 11 pm. Jasmine responded quickly to the task and handled it without  any complaints  or gagging. Overall the Hotel staff was always responsive to our needs and very courteous.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and thank you for the kind recognition of our Housekeeping staff. In every department, we strive to provide the best, most professional service possible. I am sorry to hear that your daughter was under the weather, but I am pleased to know that we were able to make the situation better. The associate that assisted you is a great asset to our hotel and our guests and I will be certain to share your review with her. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you and your family again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: we had and awesome experience at this hotel. The rooms were great, the Disney tv at breakfast, the pool- but more importantly the customer service was top notch. Everyone in the hotel I felt went above and beyond to our stay worry and stress free- from the breakfast & snack staff to the linens employee who took our luggage cart down for us. The front desk employee Sergio was especially helpful and really enhanced our trip. Thank you residence in / garden grove. You are the best and we will definitely be returning soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experiences with us. I am so pleased to know that your time at the hotel was so enjoyable, but even happier to know that you found our staff to be so service oriented and helpful. Please know that I will be sharing your comments with all of our staff, especially those that you mentioned. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: I only stayed overnight at this lovely hotel for a quick business trip. The gentleman at the front desk was very nice, the room was clean and the beds were very comfortable. My room was along the street which was a bit noisy, but didn't ruin my sleep. I would definitely stay here again. It was great to have breakfast included as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. While your stay may have been short, I am pleased to know that we were long on service and hospitality! We truly pride ourselves on having a very service oriented staff and I am pleased to know that your experiences with us proved to be no different. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next business, or preferably pleasure, trip to Orange County.

Summary: We just returned from a 5 night stay. My husband and I have a 12 y/o boy and a 3 y/o girl. I wanted a place that allowed us to our our daughter to sleep at an appropriate bed time with a door to shut so that everyone else could stay up later. I also wanted 2 bathrooms. And as much as I didn't want to do dishes or cook, the kitchenette was very handy. Our son crashed on the chaise in the living room each night. My husband and I enjoyed our private master suite. There was plenty of storage for our clothes and supplies. The first day we arrived we were exhausted from travel so the boys loaded up on frozen pizzas and snacks from Target and we ate dinner in our suite. Having a full size fridge was great because the kids guzzle milk often. We often made breakfast in the room before
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am happy to hear that both the size of the suites and the in room amenities were so ideal for you and your family and helped to build value into your stay. I am also happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of several of the other great attractions that Southern California has to offer! We appreciate you being our guest and taking the time to share a review of your stay with us. We hope we have the opportunity to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: A great medium-sized hotel.  This hotel is too far to walk to Disneyland, but has a shuttle stop out front and is both the first pickup and first drop off on the shuttle circuit. The shuttle took 10-15 minutes either direction, but was 10-15 minutes late at times.   We were surprised to find a full kitchen to include a D/W. The hotel also offered a "fill my fridge" option that we presumed was complimentary, but never used since there was a Target, Red Robin, and Outback Steakhouse within one block of the hotel for out-of-park snacks, meals, and other supplies.  The pool/jacuzzi area is shaded and has a BBQ available for use.   The continental breakfast was pretty good and promptly replenished. They also offered a taco bar one night and had an extensive room service menu.   They
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a few minutes to share your experiences while with us. I am pleased to know that you found the hotel, it's location, our staff service and hotel amenities to be just what you and your family were looking for. We pride ourselves on our service and our ability to see to the needs of our guests and their families and I am pleased to know we delivered so well against your expectations. Thank you again for being our guest and we certainly hope to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: Very friendly staff, clean hotel and easy to get to lots of attractions. If you're heading to Disneyland, they offer shuttle service too! Lots of restaurants and a Target within asking distance. Pool area was nice with a hot tub and children's pool for the little ones. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to hear that you had such an enjoyable time with us and found our hotel to be so conveniently located and found our hotel and amenities to be so family friendly. We sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Perfect for a week in Anaheim
Summary: We stayed for a week in The Residence Inn at Garden Grove. I can honestly say that the staff were the friendliest and most helpful that we have encountered on our three week American Holiday. Nothing was a problem for them and they were eager to help I'm any way.  The room was great, two bedroom two baths for up to eight people (we only had six). There was plenty of room and all the amenities you could want; free WiFi, good selection of TV channels, complementary coffee and drinks in the foyer and the rooms were serviced everyday (and cleaned up really well). The beds were very comfortable and the showers were excellent.  It was close to Disneyland and the area shuttle was just outside the front door. Also the   local depot for starline tours is directly across the street.  I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that we were able to make your stay a memorable one.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we strive to make every guest's experience unforgettable.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at Residence Inn. The staff was friendly & helpful. The room had 2 bathrooms, cleaned nicely and comfortable bed. If I had any concerns it would be that the maids ran the dishwasher with 3 dishes in it & CA is in a drought.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our rooms were able to accommodate your needs!  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure that we are providing memorable customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: Great place for the whole family
Summary: This is a great place for any family visiting Disneyland! We stayed in the two bedroom suite and loved every minute! The staff is friendly, rooms are clean, beds are comfy and we will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I agree that our spacious two bedroom suites give everyone ample room to lay out after a long day, and has an extra bathroom to get ready quicker.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure that we continue to provide great customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest, and we hope to see you and your family the next time you visit!

Summary: The Residence Inn, Garden Grove is a great place to stay. Well worth the $. Very clean.  Excellent service from friendly staff all around...the front desk went out of their way to accommodate us.  Great outdoor patio for families to sit and visit, basketball court and ping ping table. Nice pool and great hottie! We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our staff were able to go above and beyond for you.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort Area.

Summary: This was our second stay and we will stay here again. Our room was the perfect size for the four of us with a full size kitchen. Ate a wonderful breakfast down stairs each morning (No disappointment there!) and had the kitchen to fix lunch or dinner. Plenty of food choices around the hotel, pick up or delivery. Staff was awesome, need anything just ask. We even brought family, they stayed in another room, and really enjoyed it. I know they say you get what you pay for, but I feel like we got a whole lot more.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us!  I am pleased to hear that your room and our staff were able to accommodate your family's needs.  I agree with you that our fully equipped kitchen and our hot buffet style breakfast are a great amenity for all of our guests, especially large families.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Front desk was helpful and professional. Pool area with outdoor grill was a bonus. We had a spacious King room, very clean. Could use an update soon, but was quite comfy. Will return again if the price stays affordable.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your experiences with us! I am pleased to know that the size, and cleanliness, of our rooms exceeded your expectations and that our Front Desk was so helpful and friendly and that you were able to take advantage of the other amenities the hotel has to offer. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: My visit was Very Good and the Food and Drink. The Restaurant staff in the morning are so kindly. The Staff of front desk are solving my doubts very well. The Laundry area and prices are very good. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experiences with us. I am pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and found our front desk and breakfast staff to be so helpful. I am also pleased to know that you found our on-site laundry to be convenient for your needs. We hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: Hotel staff are friendly and hotel is clean and neat. The staff Lourdes is always friendly and welcoming.  We are regular long term stay customers and the hotel staff are great at acknowledgeing thei appreciation for our stay. The staff at the Neighbor Hyatt star bucks are a very friendly staff too.
Manager Response: Your review title put a big smile on my face. Thank you for noticing the effort of our staff members. My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Second visit....can't wait to come back !!!
Summary: Our second stay at The Residence Inn, Garden Grove. Very convenient location to Disney Parks. A real treat for a family from Australia. Great family rooms with plenty of space. Clean and comfortable - and friendly, helpful staff. Breakfast in the dining area each day was a treat, with plenty of variety. We celebrated 2 family member's birthdays whilst here and the staff had generously organised balloons and gifts for us...very kind gesture !! 5 minute bus ride to Downtown Disney, and located close to shops including Target, liquor store and many restaurants within easy walking distance. Looking forward to our next stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We're glad you and your family had a good stay. I absolutely agree with you; we do have a great staff and we are fortunate to have each and every one of them. I will be sure to share your feedback with our staff. I hope to have you back soon!

Summary: Stayed in a suite with our son's family. We were amazed at how clean and comfortable it was and the staff so helpful and friendly.  The huge breakfast menu filled us up with energy to enjoy Disney. The hotel was packed with families like ours and they did an incredible job of making sure everyone was treated like their most important guests.
Manager Response: Thank you for begin our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences while with us. I am very pleased to know that our cleanliness and staff service exceeded your expectations and that our breakfast buffet gave you and your family the energy to get the most out of the parks each and every day. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: While making my reservation several months in advance, I mentioned it was going to be my daughter's 18th Birthday.  When we got into our room the night of arrival, there was a gift basket and a card and balloons, saying Happy Birthday!  What a great surprise for her!  It's not olive garden where I am treated like family, but Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very happy to hear that our staff made your daughters birthday a day to remember! We are always happy to help families celebrate special moments and ensure their trip is as memorable as possible. We appreciate you choosing our hotel and sincerely hope we get to see you and your family again soon.

Summary Heading: Great spacious room,love the complete kitchen.
Summary: Great spacious room,love the complete kitchen. I would suggest better lighting in bathroom and added toiletries!  I would also would have liked a small guide for the TV. Other than that this room suited my stay very nice! It was clean, spacious and was nice to have a full kitchen and extra living space. I will be coming here again but this time I'd love to bring my kids along, I think this would accommodate a family well!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very happy to hear that your stay with us was enjoyable and that you are already planning your next trip with your children. Our large suites are definitely family oriented and I am sure they would have a great time. I appreciate your feedback on the in room lighting as well. We are actually in the process of replacing our in room lighting hotel wide and converting to brighter, and more efficient, LED lighting in our guest suites. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Awesome breakfast with a great comfortable room.
Summary: My whole family came down to enjoy disneyland from Tucson, AZ....We loved the suite , very comfortable...we we're able to keep our food and snacks in the kitchen. The only down fall was that the hotel did not include a free shuttle and parking was very congested.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and sharing your experiences with us. I am very pleased to know that you and your family had such a great stay with us and found the amenities in the room to be so helpful. There is nothing quite like having a full kitchen available to you while on vacation! I am sorry to hear that parking at the park was so congested. While the hotel does not run its own shuttle, we do receive sevice from a shuttle company that does pick up outside our hotel on the main street that I believe you will find to be quite useful. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you and your family again on your next trip to Southern California.

Summary: A home away from home. Excellent facilities both inside and out. Would definitely recommend to anyone visiting disneyland to stay at this hotel as the prices compared to others is quite reasonable. Can't wait to visit again :)
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your experiences with us. I am pleased to know that our hotel, staff service and value exceeded your expectations. We sincerely thank you for choosing our hotel and look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to sunny Southern California.

Summary: The perfect home away from home. Free buffet Breaky every morning from around 6.30am-9.30am weekdays and  On weekends- 7.30am-10.30am. Sometimes in the evening they will have like pre-meal night , for example make your own tacos or hot chocolate night to ice cream night. They are just enough to fill the belly before or after dinner - just perfect👍.   Walking distance to restaurants and other hotels, even walk to a BIG Target, unlike Australian Target store.   This American Target Store is like Coles and KMart joined together, yes they sell food, lots of fresh vegetables and fruit, even delicatessen foods, meats too. so, if you are gluten and dairy free like us, you can buy your own food there, and it's fresh.   The staff at this resort are friendly , except two female staff at
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our amenities were able to accommodate your family's needs.  I do agree with you that the Target is extremely convenient for our guests' needs, especially those travelling with larger families.  I will be sure to share your comments with the rest of our team to ensure that we continue to provide exellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: I came here with my husband and 2 daughters for 3 nights while we visited Disneyland and I loved my stay. We are a Marriott member and all of our preferences were made to our room before our arrival as well as a room upgrade. The service was great and the room was clean. Thank you Marriott and Residence Inn for never letting us down!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and a loyal rewards member! I am pleased to know that we were able to fulfill all your room requests while with us and ensure that you had an excellent stay. I truly appreciate your feedback and hope we have the opportunity to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: We stayed 3 nights here while visiting Disneyland with family and thoroughly enjoyed every minute.  Each staff member we met went out of their way to greet us warmly, answer our questions, and make us feel at home.  This hotel is definitely geared toward the guests and making their stay enjoyable.  We rented two rooms and both were immaculate and comfortable. The air conditioner could be set to a temperature you liked and it did not cycle on and off at night, but stayed constant, which meant great sleeping.  After spending several nights at a "resort" hotel where the air could not be set below 75 degrees, this was heaven!!  Our grandsons loved making their waffles at breakfast, as well as selecting from the eggs, potatoes, sausage, yogurt, fruit, etc. that were prepared for
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very happy to know that our hotel and staff went above and beyond your expectations that every experience, from our staff service to room cleanliness, helped you enjoy your time with us to the fullest extent. I am also happy to hear that your grandson enjoyed spending time in the pool and making his own waffles at breakfast. Everything we do is aimed at creating wonderful memories for our guests while they are with us. I am pleased to know that your experience is no different. Thank you again for being our guest and we truly hope to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: I am so looking forward to this trip !!!
Summary: I am not writing my review just yet as I am going here on March 15th thru the 21st but I had to comment. I made a reservation at another Disney Good Neighbor hotel and then found these reviews. The reviews on the first hotel were not very good so I cancelled that and changed to another Good Neighbor hotel, their reviews were better but not great. Then I stopped changing my hotel rooms and went through the reviews for all the appropriate hotels for myself, my daughter, my niece and my two grandchildren ages 6 and 3. I have waited two years to afford this trip and did not want to be disappointed. After reading the reviews for the Residence Inn resort area I finally feel confident that I will not be sorry I stayed here. I am not the type of person that usually writes reviews but
Manager Response: Thank you for your preview of our hotel. We are truly proud of our staff and the service they provide to our guests. It is that sense of customer service and dedication that has made us number 1 in Garden Grove and has helped to create so many outstanding moments for our guests and their families. We look forward to having you with us soon!

Summary: Several business colleagues and I stayed at the Residence Inn while in town for a conference.  The rooms were very nice, staff was courteous and helpful.  Food both in the evening and breakfast was first rate.  Nice pool and outdoor activities to include ping pong and basketball.  I would highly encourage families planning on visiting Disney Land to consider the Residence Inn.    The only negative was the taxi service they recommended.  Very expensive and charged more for credit card purchases.  I would have refused to ride, but I didn't have a choice as I was trying to catch an early morning flight.  I would encourage the hotel to change vendors on the taxi service immediately.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for bringing the issue with the taxi to our attention. While we do not directly contract with any of the taxi services, when one of our guests experiences an issue, we aggressively follow up on the matter. We take great pride in the service and accomodations we provide to our guests and care deeply about your experiences. I am pleased to know that our staff treated you so well and that you found the rest of the hotel services to be perfect for your needs. Thank you again for being our guest and I truly hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed three nights and absolutely loved the Residence Inn which is a Marriott property. It was so nice having two rooms, great wi fi, and a kitchenette! We were able to relax and enjoy ourselves since we had enough room to accommodate four adults comfortably. The staff was great and the hotel was clean. While we didn't take advantage of the breakfast, we did see a lot of families enjoying themselves and it appeared there was a lot of breakfast options. The proximity to Disneyland was the best. We chose to drive and it was only a few minutes away. We brought in several drinks and snacks so it was wonderful to have the kitchenette available! Loved this!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our rooms were able to accommodate your party's needs.  I agree that our spacious suites provide ample room for every guest.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: What stands out for me about the Residence Inn Anaheim is the staff.  Seriously, everyone was so helpful and accomodating - almost anticipating our needs.  And, always with a genuine desire to help and a smile.  Lourdes who seems to "run" the buffet is amazingly efficient, a very hard worker, notices what would be helpful and reacts, and is so friendly.  Prudencia cleaned our room and even organized our kids' shoes and stuffed animals. I don't see this type of service in many 5 star hotels.  Beyond this, I would note: The hotel has a great location for Disney. Rooms are large - 2 bedrooms and 2 baths with a full kitchen in our unit.  Perfect for kids. Hotel and rooms are clean and efficient. Breakfast is robust - lots and lots of buffet food. Free wifi. Pool and hot tub are
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to heat that our staff, especially Lourdes and Prudencia were able to accommodate your family's needs.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary Heading: Another great stay at Residence Inn
Summary: This is our 4 stay in as many years and we will not stay at another hotel when in Anaheim!  We tried once - bad idea!  We travel with 2 kids and we always choose the 2 bedroom suite - the kids get their own room and bathroom too.  After a long day at Disneyland etc it is really wonderful to come back and be able to make our own meals - we utilize the pool side bbqs many times - they do all the clean up and in our room we have a full kitchen including the dishwasher!  We prefer that to eating out as we always stay for 9-10 days here!!  As well as the full breakfast buffet there is also included the "happy hour" light dinner/dessert bar Monday to Wednesday 6pm to 8pm.  The team of employees are extremely friendly, the entire facility is clean and accommodating.  The pool area is
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you have found a home away from home in the Anaheim area.  I agree with you that our amenities do have a great impact on familys as we try to accommodate everyone's needs.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.

Summary: This was my second trip to Disney land in the last couple of years, and the first time I mad the mistake of picking a hotel close enough to walk but far enough to make you regret it. This time my wife and I decided to get a hotel that could not only fit our family comfortably but provided a shuttle service, and breakfast. This hotel met that requirement. We brought 6 adults and three children and were able to fit everyone comfortably in the two bed room suite with a king sized bed, two queen sized beds, and a pull out sofa sleeper. The kitchen helped to avoid the overpriced food at the park. The shuttle came every 30 minutes, and was $5 dollars for adults and $2 dollars for children.   There were two restrooms, and dishes on site. The breakfast was pretty good and they switched
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your time in Anaheim. We are very proud of the value and comfort that we provide our guests. As you mentioned, the large suites with the dual bathrooms and full kitchens make a family stay much more comfortable, enjoyable and offer a substantial cost savings for our guests. I appreciate you taking a moment to share your experiences with us and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next trip to Southern California.

Summary: This the 3rd time I stayed at the Marriott. The front staff & employees are always professional with guest. The pros are that breakfast is included as well as WiFi , where other hotels charge you. The rooms are large & very comfortable. Great pool area, Close to shopping & restaurants
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences while with us and I am pleased to know you had an enjoyable stay with us. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: We had a family of 7 - and we chose the Residence Inn after a great first time stay at the Ontario CA location in January 2014.  The stay in Garden Grove did not disappoint - I'm hooked on Residence Inn due to the home like feel.  When traveling on vacation restaurant meals can become tiring - with the full kitchen facilities in the room, we actually can have home cooked meals.  This is something that my family and I value as it makes it feel like home even if we're on vacation.  Our room had lots of space - enough room to move about without stepping on each other.  This is saying a lot since we had a 3 year old boy who likes to run around constantly.  The staff were all very friendly and helpful.  The free daily breakfast was also very good as there was a variety of things to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our amenities were able to accommodate your family's needs.  I agree with you that our kitchens provide a great service to family's, as they provide a means to get a home-cooked meal away from home.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service.

Summary: We were very happy with this hotel! These are a few reasons why: The rooms were comfy and the kids loved the bunk beds! The complimentary breakfast was wonderful - so many options and a great way to start the day before heading to Disneyland. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable of the area- especially Sergio and Bill! This hotel did so many "extras" .. hot chocolate night, movie nights, on my daughters birthday they put balloons and treats in our room. She was so happy!  Great location, shuttle takes you right to the parks, Target across the street - Will definitely stay here again! Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am delighted to hear that our hotel amenities were able to accommodate your family's needs.  I agree with you, the second bedroom gives everyone extra space and an extra bathroom to get ready in the morning.  I will be sure to share your comments with Bill, Sergio, and the rest of the team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.

Summary: rooms were apartment style.  Very nice and spacious.  perfect for families or just anyone who enjoys more space.  They cleaned the room daily, even my dishes.  Cooked dinner every night, as well as lunch for the next day. Saved me a lot of money!  Will definitely stay here again.  Walking distance to many places, convention center and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for begin our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences while with us. I am very pleased to know that we exceeded your expectations for cleanliness and that the extra space in our suites made your stay with us much more enjoyable. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The staff are the most genuine, pleasant, courteous people we have ever had the pleasure of meeting in any hotel ever!!! We have been treated so well! Special thanks to Lourdes, what a wonderful person. I will recommend this hotel to every one I know!! Thanks to my travel agent Mona at Maritime Travel in Kelowna BC Cannada for finding this little gem.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being our guest for for taking the time to recognize one of our employees! I want to assure you that I will be sharing your comment with her, as well as the entire kitchen staff, personally. I am very pleased to know that your stay was so enjoyable and hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to sunny Southern California!

Summary: Well we drove all day with our grandkids. Checked in with no problems. Room was nice one bedroom, full kitchen and living room, two queens in bedroom. It was hot in the room I set control to 65 degree and left to go food shopping. When we returned room was still hot. Shoot bought all this food for a week and no ac. Called the front desk they sent a man to fix. He was unable to fix. Surgio the man at the front desk called and said how sorry they were. He said he couldnt discount because we booked through expedia. He said he has a room that is two full size bedrooms, two full size baths, kitchen and living room and it was two doors down. He came to our room a gave us the keys. Wow what service. Thank you Surgio for making our trip the best. This hotel is very clean, very secure,
Manager Response: Vicki,  Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your experiences with us. I am very sorry you experienced an issue with the air conditioner in your initial room. Please know that we certainly strive to ensure each and every one of our guests has an enjoyable stay with us. However, when the unexpected happens, such as in this case, it our goal to ensure the issue is resolved quickly and professionally. I am pleased to hear that is the case in this situation and that our associate took such great personal care of you and your family. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: We were so happy with our stay- the staff was incredibly attentive and quick to help- from having scissors we could use, arranging for a taxi to take us to a character breakfast, and giving a free late check out, and even offering for us to use our room the rest of the day when our flight time changed. The breakfast was great, especially since it was complimentary. My kids loved the fact that they had disney jr playing. We were very happy with our rooms as well. We will definitely stay here again for future disney trips.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experiences with us. I am very pleased to know that your stay with us was so enjoyable! We pride ourselves on havinf a very service oriented staff and I am happy to know that they were able to accomodate your needs on your departure day so well. We will definitely look forward to having you as our guest again on a future trip to the area!

Summary: Came in with a discount on our room and without asking we received an upgrade to a larger suite.  With 5 people it was a real treat to have the bunk beds and extra bathroom.  Rooms were clean and both bathrooms had extra towels. The pool was heated and my grandkids were thrilled to be able to swim in the winter! Plenty of pool towels to be had. Hot tub was awesome after a long day on our feet in Disneyland.  Breakfast was hot or cold with lots of choices. All attendants were courteous and helpful. The breakfast area was hectic but there was always a clean table and plenty of food and drinks. Fresh coffee or ice water in the lobby at all times.  Shuttle to Disneyland was always on time and a great deal.  The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful.  The hotel itself was quiet
Manager Response: Susie,  Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your experiences with us. I am very pleased to know that our hot tub and pool area were the ideal cure for tired feet after a day at the park. I would also like to say thank you for recognizing the efforts of the breakfast staff. I will be certain to share your comments with them and the rest of our staff. Thank you again for being our guest and we truly hope to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: I've stayed here several times over the years for family vacation. It's a great value and and the rooms are setup well for families. The kids love the breakfast. The pool is nice when it is warmer out.  We will definitely come back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that your room, pool, and our staff were all able to accommodate your family's needs.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you and your family the next time you visit the area!

Summary: I was looking for a suite hotel for a one night stay near Disneyland Resort. Hotel was easy to find, clean rooms, full kitchen, good price, and a great breakfast.  Got checked in quickly by pleasant staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences while with us and am pleased to know you had an enjoyable stay at our hotel. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: The staff is great and rooms are clean. Would definitely stay here again. Easy to get to Disneyland thru the shuttle pick up and drop off location. Kid friendly. Front desk very helpful. Breakfast  is good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure we continue to provide great customer service.  Thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Stayed here for four nights while doing Disneyland, works very well.  The two room suite is a bit smaller than usual for RI but still a good amount of space, and two baths which is critical to get everyone up and going.  Kitchen has basics and full size refrig, stove, micro & dishwasher.  Nice big breakfast area downstairs with movies being shown in a separate area for the kids.  Nice pool area and deck to sit out and enjoy the sunshine.  Staff is very pleasant, balloons for the kids at breakfast!  Plenty of retail and restaurants close by to make things easier.  We did not use their shuttle and found parking at Disney relatively easily.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our breakfast, room, and staff were all able to accommodate your needs.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure that we are providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: This hotel is great. It may be a little older, but they treat you super well. The breakfast is well worth it and the snacks are also good. Front desk service is top notch! Housekeeping is hit or miss, unfortunately.  But,maintenance is great and very prompt if you need something,  even late at night! Beds are also pretty comfortable.  We had a bunk bed and I slept super well.
Manager Response: Thank you for beign our guest. I am pleased to know that your stay with us was enjoyable and that you found our staff to be so friendly and service oriented. I would also like to apologize for the inconsistencies you experienced with the servicing of your room. I will certainly address this with our housekeeping staff and ensure those differences are corrected. Thank you again for choosing our hotel and we certainly hope to see you again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with small children!
Summary: We brought our three small children here recently for a three night stay. The layout of the room was perfect for us! The boys had their own bedroom and bathroom, and we had our own on the other side if the living room/kitchen. Speaking of which, the kitchen was great! Fully stocked, and they'll even go grocery shopping for you! Housekeeping did an excellent job, and the room was very quiet. If there were any issues, like the fact our toaster wasn't working, they are corrected immediately. The kids had a great time, and we'll definitely be back when we make our next trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the opportunity to write a review of your stay with us. I am very pleased to know that you and your family had such a great stay with us and that you were able to take advantage of some of our additional sevices such as the grocery shopping. Thank you again for being our guest and we certainly hope to see you and your family again soon.

Summary: Have stayed at most of the Marriott properties in the Anaheim/Disneyland area and are always very pleased.  Decided to try the Residence Inn even though it was just my wife and I this visit.  First favorable opinion was that the property was well maintained which is important in this particular area because of the high volume of visitors all year round.  Second favorable opinion was about the friendly and up-beat attitude of the front desk staff (Raymond Min).  Finally, we were surprised by the size and decor of the room.  A small but full kitchen, dining room table with four chairs, computer table, living room with large LED TV.  The primary bath room was en-suite with the first bedroom (with its own large screen LED TV).  Off the dining room was a second bedroom with bunk
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! I am very pleased to know that you enjoyed your time with us and that our staff took such great care of you. I will be certain to share your comments with our entire staff. We certainly strive to provide the best service and experience to each and every one of our guests during their time with us. Hopefully, the next time you and your wife come to Garden Grove, you can bring the entire family to enjoy our large suites! Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary: All the staff are great! Rooms clean and tidy, ours had a full kitchen with full size fridge, dishwasher, oven, toaster and all the dishes you need.  Good breakfast, lots to choose from. The pool is clean and heated, the hot tub is nice, and there is a small basketball court which my big kids enjoyed. Outdoor seating and lounging areas and two really nice BBQ's make this a super family friendly place to hang out.  There is a shuttle to Disneyland if you need it ($5.00 a day) and I would recommend it for people with smaller children as it is good half hour walk (less if you like to move a bit quicker).  Lots to see on the walk though.  Gift shops everywhere, you can even check out the ones in the other hotels  If you like pizza, there is a Pizza Hut take out location just a 2
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. I am very pleased to know that your time with us was so enjoyable and that your family enjoyed the facilities, especially your older kids enjoying the sports court. I am also pleased to know that you found our location so convenient. Thank you again for being our guest and we truly look forward to having you with us on your next trip back to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: I really was so pleased! We are a family of 7. All kids are 8 down to 2. Finding a hotel to accommodate our size family and with great service has been hard to find. The room were so a great comfortable size. Plenty of room for everyone to sleep. I loved the full kitchen so I could cook and we could save money on food. My kids loved the heated pool. The grounds were well maintained and clean. The breakfast was such a plus! Waffle Makers and waffle bar, hot eggs, sausage, breakfast sandwiches and pastries, pancakes, cereal, fruit, yogurt, breads, and variety of juices. They also had a family dining room with colorful seating an a big screen with disney junior on. Such a treat for my kids! Target is directly across the street so you can walk to it for anything you need even
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am pleased to know that your stay with us was so enjoyable and that the room comfortably accomodated you and your whole family so well. Our hotel definitely fits the needs of families from big rooms to the build your own waffle bar that you experienced. I truly appreciate you taking a moment to provide a review of your stay with us and the TripAdvisor community and hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: Good location close enough to Disneyland without the big price tag. Plenty of shops and restaurants close by. Staff were always friendly and very helpful. The included breakfast was ample. We would recommend it for families going to Disneyland , Knotts Berry farm etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your stay with us at the REsidence Inn Anaheim Resort Area.  I am pleased to hear that our staff and your room were able to accommodate your family's needs.  I will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: Great place for a RunDisney Event
Summary: The hotel stay was good and staff was helpful all the time.. the only thing that I did not like is that they rushed to shut down the Breakfast 10 minutes before the end... so I had only half ... if you are running a Disney Race, the course goes infront, so my family was able to cheer for some time and then get inside without a problem..   Overall ... it was a good stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you had a great time at your home away from home during the Disney Marathon Weekend.  I wanted to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with our breakfast times.  I will be sure to share your comments with our staff to ensure that we are providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you the next time you visit the area.

Summary: Staff was helpful when we requested a room change due to cigarette smell in the room.   Walking distance to many restaurants.  Shuttle to Disneyland for small fee.  Walked to Disneyland one day due to a Marathon on Harbor Blvd.  Awoke to a band playing directly outside hotel at 5:30 a.m. on Sunday MLK weekend.   Nice large pool area.  Very large kid friendly dining room with child size table area.  Plenty of food and large selection up until 9:30 a.m. (10:00 a.m. on weekends but not holidays.).  We were very satisfied with this hotel overall for the 4 night Disneyland visit over MLK weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I truly appreciate you sharing your thoughts with us. I am very pleased to know that overall you had an enjoyable stay with us. I would like to apologize however for the band playing so early in the morning. The marathons are a new addition to the area and Disneyland, the city and all the hotels are still working through the growing pains of sponsored events such as these. The feedback of you, and all of our guests, is an important part of that process and I thank you for sharing your experiences with us. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: I spend over 100 nights a year in Marriotts and usually am treated better.  The rooms smelled bad and the breakfast service was horrible.  I was dishing up breakfast for my kids before serving myself and when I took the breakfast to my kids table and came back to get my own breakfast, they had rushed to take away all the food.  I asked if I could have some and was quickly dismissed.  I guess you don't have to treat guests as well here because of the hotels proximity to Disney Land.  It will be busy no matter what the reviews say.    Dissappointed Platimun Member
Manager Response: To say that your experience is concerning would be an understatement. I apologize that you had such an experience and assure you that this is not the typical stay at this hotel. I want you know that we do have a very competent, efficient, and service-minded team here at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort despite your recent experiences. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: The Residence Inn is located about a mile from the Disney Parks, but only 1/2 mile from the Disney Parking lot, so I would recommend walking to the parking lot and catching the shuttle in and save the $17 Disney parking fee, which would mean you only got to drive that 1/2 mile anyway.  There are lots of restaurants surrounding the hotel, from high-end (Morton's, Ruth's Chris) to moderate (Buca de Beppo, Joe's Crab Shack, Outback) to affordable (Red Robin and all of the fast food chains)  There is a big Target right down the street.  The breakfasts are pretty good, with several different entrees every morning and lots of seating,
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experiences with us. I am very pleased to know that you enjoyed the hotel amenities, especially the daily hot breakfast, as well as the wide variety of restaurants in the surrounding area. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Warning would have helped a bit
Summary: We stayed Jan 14th through the 18th. Overall our stay was good HOWEVER we were surprised by the 12.00 per day parking fee and most of all irratated we were never informed by the staff the road in front of the hotel would be closed due to a running marathon. This came as a surprise to us at 5:30 AM when we were leaving to catch a 7:15 flight as well as return a rental car! We had to go 20 minutes out of our way due to no route being set up and the directions we received from the staff were incorrect. Next time, please let your guests leaving now of the road closure. It's the least you can do since we spent 1500.00 on our stay at your hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am sincerely sorry for the inconvenience you experienced with the road closures for the half marathon this weekend. I agree with you that communication needs improvement on all sides. The sponsored marathons are new to the area, but I want to assure you that feedback, such as yours, is very important to us as we work to smooth out the process and limit the impact on our guests. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to have you as our guests again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: the BEST hotel we have stayed at in the Disneyland area. We've stayed at quite a few places and this hotel far exceeds all of those places. Clean, friendly staff, close to disneyland, shuttles are nearby, parking is ample, free breakfast is great, Target is across the street, great restaurants within walking distance, clean pool, free dinner in select nights...I cannot express how great this hotel is.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experiences with us. I am very pleased to know that our location, staff service, cleanliness and breakfast options all met or exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves on ensuring that each and every one of our guests has a truly enjoyable time while with us and I am very happy to know that your experience with us was no different. Thank you again for being our guest and we look forward to having you as our guest again on a future trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: A nice location for family and friends to stay.  Very close to the park.  We had the largest room and all of us could stay comfortably.  The room was two levels and was clean and large enough not to feel like a hotel room.  Pool was heated, breakfast was fresh and you felt very save walking around in the evening.  There are many choices in the area, we are loyal Marriott customers and this hotel did not disappoint.
Manager Response: Thank you for begin our guest! I appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences while with us and am pleased to know you had an enjoyable stay with us. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We had an opportunity to spend a few nights at the Anaheim Resort Area Residence Inn this past month.  We spent one evening there prior to departing on a cruise, and then decided to return for a couple nights during our stay at Disneyland.  Rooms were large.  We had a two bedroom suite -- one king in master bedroom, and a set of bunk beds in a second room.  Both bedrooms had a bathroom attached.  The sofa in the living area also pulled out into a bed.  Both bedrooms and living room were outfitted with a TV.  Kitchen was what you would expect from a Residence Inn.  Rooms were also very clean.  The housekeeping crew does a good job at this hotel.  Very family friendly.  Served a large breakfast with several different options.  This is a big deal for our family of seven.  Made for
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to share your experiences with us. I am very pleased to know that your stay was so enjoyable and comfortable for you and your whole family. As you mentioned, our two bedroom suites really give families, especially a family of seven, that extra space and bathrooms, to make the stay enjoyable. We look forward to having you with us on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: The hotel was very accommodating when I asked to stay a few more days and then let me do a late check out. It is in a great location if you want to visit Disneyland and California Adventure. I would definitely use this again.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experiences with us on TripAdvisor. I am very pleased to know that our location, hotel and staff all met, or exceeded, your expectations. We truly appreciate you being our guest and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great location, facilities all excellent, breakfast was very good, social hours Mon, Tues & Weds great ideas, shuttle to Disneyland, pool, good value, just get there you won't be disappointed, staff very helpful & friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! I am very happy to hear that your time with us was so enjoyable and that our evening Social Mix was an added value to your stay. I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again the next time your travels bring you to California.

Summary: We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite which was very comfortable for the 8 of us. Each room had its own tv which was great. The bathrooms were spacious and clean. The room was serviced daily by housekeeping. The pull out couch was broken but when I reported it to the front desk, maintenance had someone there in 15 mins to take out the broken couch and replace it.  We were able to check in to our room earlier then expected which was great after catching the Red eye from Maui.  The complimentary breakfast buffet had many choices and was perfect for our family before heading out for the day. The kids loved the waffle makers and fresh fruit.  We were able to eat at the taco night which was simple but filling for the kids. I was very impressed with the service, all of the workers were
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experiences with us. I am very pleased to know that our staff took such great care of you and your family. Those early morning red eye flights can certainly be challenging for families and I am happy to hear our staff was able to get you checked in so readily. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope that when your travels bring you to the Southern California area, that we will have the opportunity to have you stay with us again.

Summary Heading: the best experience in my life!
Summary: I spend a great time with family after a long trip for work and I decided to go to this hotel! they are great everything neat and clean! breakfast really amazing for the family kids enjoyed making waffles by themselves pools really clean! we meet Lourdes she is great at her job she answered  all my concerns about the food she is kind and professional and friendly as well! looking forward to have vacations to come back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to know that you enjoyed your time with us and very pleased to know that our associates took such great care in assisting and answering your questions. I am very proud of each and every member of our staff and how they go above and beyond to ensure the best possible service. I assure you I will be sharing your comments with her and each of the members of our kitchen staff. Thank you again for being our guest and we truly hope to see you on a future trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: If I could give a little less than a 5 I would because it's not as if this hotel is the Ritz, but it really was great especially for such a reasonable price. To choose a place so far away from home is always daunting, you just don't know what you're going to end up with, but really we were very happy. The front desk, SO FRIENDLY The beddings smelled like bleach which makes me happy; I like clean The towels smelled like bleach The kids were happy they could swim even though the outside temperature wasn't hot, the pool was nice and warm; and we saw it cleaned a couple of times in our stay. The hallway smelled like cleaner For a free a breakfast for four people, you really couldn't complain, I only would've appreciated more fresh fruit choices, and food a little hotter, but a
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to share your experiences with us. I am pleased to know that the professionalism and friendliness of our staff and the cleanliness of our rooms exceeded your expectations. I also appreciate your feedback on the other amenities of the hotel. We will certainly look into your reccomendations. Thank you again for being our guest and we truly hope to see you again the next time your travels bring you to sunny Southern California.

Summary: I wanted to love this hotel especially since all the reviews were so positive, but the truth is this hotel is tired.  The staff were very helpful and friendly which we greatly appreciated.  The convenience of the laundry facilities, the cost savings of the wonderful breakfast and the convenient location of the hotel were all very much appreciated.  The big downside of this hotel is the rooms are in desperate need of an update and the beds must be replaced.  Even though I know housekeeping was in our room each day, the suite never felt clean mostly due to the paint splashes, the fraying carpet, and the cracking grout.  The beds are very "springy" - each time my husband rolled over I felt as if I was on a roller coaster at Disneyland!  I did not say anything to personnel during
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us during your recent trip Anaheim. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim

Summary Heading: Best place to stay! Great Location for Disneyland
Summary: this is the best place for families to stay going to Disneyland. The bus stop is right out front of the hotel. It leaves every 30 minutes... Property has the best breakfast hands down. if you have stayed at a Residence Inn you know they always have the best food selection as well as taste. The only difference is the other Residence Inns don't have the fantastic Breakfast crew!  We have stayed at this Residence Inn three times this year .... we always notice how hard the Breakfast ladies work. The food is always fresh and hot. If you need anything I will bet Lourdes ( I believe this is what her tag said) will get it for you.  This place feeds alot of people every day and it is always neat and presentable. The staff goes out of their way to make your stay one to remember. We
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our hotel staff and amenities were able to meet the needs of you and your family.  We are lucky to have hardworking employees such as Lourdes who want to make every guest feel like they are the only guest we have.  I will be sure to share all your comments with our team to ensure that we are providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you and your family the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: A Great Family Christmas Disney Vacation
Summary: When we arrived at the Residence Inn in Anaheim California, they had a  card and a gift of  goodies in our room to welcome us.  Only a few minutes later another welcome gift of cookies came to our door.    The Kitchen staff was especially kind and helpful.  Everyone on staff was great.  We enjoyed a clean suite and loved having the dishes done each day by the cleaning staff.    Overall very nice experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that our team members were able to make your vacation a memorable one, for the positive reasons.  I will be sure to share your comments with all of our staff to ensure that we are providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you and your family the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: This was a perfect place for our family of 6 to stay for our Disney vacation
Summary: The front office was very friendly. The breakfast was excellent & the evening dinners were a nice surprise. The rooms & service were excellent. We had the suite with 2 bathrooms & bunkbeds. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experiences of your stay with us.. I am pleased to know that you and your family had such a great time with us. Having the extra space of our tow bedroom, two bath suites, makes it very comfortable for a large family, such as your group of six, during longer stays. Thank you again for being our guest and we certainly hope to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: We rented 2 rooms for our family for a Christmas week Disneyland trip.  The staff could not have been nicer or more helpful.  Initially, we were dispointed that the Residence Inn closer to Disneyland's entrance was fully booked.  However, we actually preferred being a little further away from all the action and noise near the park.  The hotel was really convenient to Disneyland via the shuttle (which always artrived precisely on time).  Most importantly, everyone was attentive to the needs of our 2 year old granddaughter.  The breakfast quality was excellent.  And the "happy hour" snacks were a great surprise and added feature.  The next time we visit Disneyland, this hotel will be our first choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking a moment to share your experiences with us. I am sorry to hear that your first choice hotel was unavailable, but am very pleased to know that our location, and the service of our staff, was such a pleasant surprise. We truly pride ourselves on ensuring that each and every one of our guests has a truly enjoyable time while with us and I am very pleased to know that your experience was no different.
