Thank you again for being our guest, I certainly hope we will be able to help celebrate your granddaughters 3rd birthday with you next year!

Summary: There are a lot of good things about this resort but I'm giving this a low rating due to the small rooms and the uncomfortable sofa bed which gave me a severe backache.    Firstly, the resort itself is good though a little dated.  The staff are all friendly and helpful.  The breakfast buffet is good and there is a lot of space in the hall despite being crowded.  They also had a couple of big screen TVs in the breakfast room running some Disney shows which kept the kids busy.  They had a Happy Hour in the afternoons with free snacks and soft drinks.  The rooms were clean though a little dated too.  The main issues with the rooms were that they were very small with hardly any space to walk around in the living room and the bedroom.  We felt very claustrophobic in there.  Secondly,
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to share a review of your stay with us. I am very sorry to hear that you had difficulties with the sofa bed in your room. We certainly strive to provide each and every guest with the best possible experience and service and I will definitely look into the issues you have described. It is my sincerest hope that we may regain your trust in our hotel on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area. Thank you again for being our guest and I hope we see you again soon.

Summary: A little far to walk and no free shuttle to Disneyland but there was a shuttle you could pay to ride a bit spendy was cheaper  and more convenient for the 7 of us to drive and pay to park. Otherwise a nice place with a good breakfast.  Nice pool & hot tub with an outdoor kitchen a big plus. Red Robin next door and a Walmart across the street. Full kitchen.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We believe we are the ideal choice for anyone visiting Disneyland and are happy that you agree.  . Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We hope to see you as a guest again very soon.

Summary: I was there on business at the Convention Center. Don't try to walk to the Conv Center without good sneakers (about 1 mile). Uber cab service is available but very slow and expensive. Room typical of Res Inn properties, but the hotel is a little dated in decorum, hallways, amenities. My toilet ran for three days. The wall Hair dryer literally blew up (smoke, sparks, and everything); pillows were hard as concrete. The desk staff resolved everything with a single quick call, except for the toilet,  which required a few. Staff was overall excellent, the food  typical of Res Inn, but given their location I would have expected more fruit and healthy options. You can walk to a depressing Target nearby for food for your refrigerator. The area is tired and gloomy, despite nearby  Disney
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your comments in regards to your recent stay at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort.  We see that there is room for improvement based on your feedback and   noticed that there were several missed opportunities. Please accept our apology for not meeting your expectations during your stay. I will be sure to share your feedback with our staff. I hope to have you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great Place for a Great Price!
Summary: Great accommodations, wonderful and responsive staff, very nice breakfast buffet and an excellent location close to Disneyland.  The only downside is paying $12 a night to park at the resort. I guess most hotels do this, but it just doesn't seem right.  I definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts with us from your recent stay. I am very pleased to know that our staff service exceeded your expectations and our location and buffet breakfast fulfilled your needs. I truly hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: This was our second stay at the Residence Inn Garden Grove.  This time we had three rooms for to accommodate family.  The two bedroom two bath with King and two Queens was very nice and an affordable approach.   We were upgraded on one of our other rooms to a two bed two bath with King in one room and bunk beds in the other, this was a treat for my brother in law and their two small kids.  Great breakfast each day included.  We met Lourdes who did a great job of keeping the breakfast area neat and clean, and was a great hostess!  The front desk staff were all great.  Super location with Outback, Red Robin, and Joe's Crab Shack close by (walking distance)for dinner.  And a Target you can also  walk to for water and snacks.  1.5 miles from Disney, with a shuttle bus stop out front
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I truly appreciate you taking the time to share a review of your stay with us. I am very pleased to know that your stay, and your rooms, were so comfortable and that you found our location to be so ideal. It is a great benefit to our guests to have restaurants and grcoery stores so close to the hotel and I am pleased to know that you and your family were able to take advantage of those amenities. Thank you again for being our guest and we certainly hope to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary Heading: Belated review - but this is a gem
Summary: So this has been quite a while (yes 2 years) but I thought I would let people know that as just others have rated this hotel so highly it is in fact very true! And it looks like it is still an excellent place to stay. We stayed her NOV 2012 with my family of 4 in a 2 bed suite. No its not new but it is very clean, very spacious and perfect for a stay when visitng Disneyland. The bus transport (ART?) stops out front and it literally is only 10-15 minuts to Disney gates. There are so many hotels to choose from but this place is set apart due to its wonderful staff. They are genuine and do care about the customer. We were so impressed with this place that we have booked again for Feb 2015 when my daughter and I travel to California. Not going to Disneyland this time but we will
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that your experience with us was so memorable that you wrote a review on your stay.  Although it was two years ago, we pride ourselves in consistently providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you and your daughter on your next visit.

Summary: We shared a suite with another couple for a week. The price was great!  The rooms were clean and comfortable. Bathrooms immaculate!  Breakfasts were a delight and being from the northeast USA, we loved the eating outside option!   But what really stood out above all was the staff.  They could not have been more helpful or more kind!  Lourdes went out of her way every time we were in the breakfast room to make sure we found what we needed! If anyone in the area looked around as if searching for something, a staff member asked if she could be of assistance!  WOW!  Another staff member made sure we were able to enjoy the Nacho Bar when we arrived back about 5 one night.  She was almost ready to clean up but made sure we had a nice plate! Sadly, we neglected to write down her name
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us.  I am very pleased to hear that our staff were able to go our of their way to make sure you and your family had a memorable experience here.  I will be sure to share all your comments with our management team to ensure that we are providing excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Bit of a delayed review of this property. I don't often share reviews as I travel a lot almost 150 nights a year on average. These are business trips and usually by myself or a work colleague. the reason for this review is I took my family with me last week to another property in Seattle and felt compelled to share what a bad experience we had. This reminded me of a better experience and I wanted to share. I booked a suite for my family as a treat near Disney at the end of a business trip to join me. I used my Marriott points as I am a platinum member although I have stayed outside the Marriott family lately due to a company policy although just had that reversed and back home to Marriott we will go. I have 4 small children and our experience started at check in. The staff were
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with us. I am very proud of our staff and am thrilled to know that each and every one of them made such a lasting and positive impression on you and your family. Thank you again for being our guest and we will certainly be looking forward to seeing you again, both on leisure and business.

Summary: I took my daughter and three of her friends to Disneyland to celebrate her 18th Birthday.  From the moment we walked through the door, the staff treated us like gold.   Sergio and Joshua were just amazing at check in!!!   They were kind and funny with the girls, they were sincere in wishing my daughter a Happy Birthday and brought us some cookies as a gift.   Sergio and Joshua made sure that the room we were getting suited our needs.   We upgraded to a bigger suite with 2 bathrooms which definately made our stay more comfortable  ( 5 ladies in a room - you need two bathrooms!! ).   We were happy to see our wonderful hosts everyday and let them know about our day.   The friendliness of these two gentlemen made us feel like we were at home.  Thank you Sergio and Joshua for making
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased to know that our Front Desk staff went above and beyond to ensure your daughter had such a memorable 18th birthday. I will be sharing your comments directly with the two associates that assisted you during your check in. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you and your daughter again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: My husband and I stayed in this Residence Inn for several days last week. From the moment we arrived, we felt welcomed - the staff was so friendly! They also greeted us with cookies and upgraded us to a suite. Even though there were only two of us, the suite worked out GREAT - we loved each having our own bathroom. =) There was a nice kitchen - though we didn't cook anything, it was very handy to have a fridge and microwave to save/heat up leftovers.   This hotel also serves the nicest buffet breakfast I have ever seen! The hot menu changes from day to day - so many choices. It was great and would be even more perfect for a big family! I enjoyed visiting with Lourdes every morning when I came down to breakfast, as my husband was at his conference. She and the whole staff were
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete such a stellar review of your most recent stay with us at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area.  I am extremely pleased to hear that your stay was memorable for the positive reasons.  I agree with you that our kitchen, breakfast, and social hour are great amenities for all our guests.  I will be sure to share all your comments with our staff to ensure that we continue to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you and your husband the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: Residence Inn by Marriott Garden Grove
Summary: Good clean hotel with helpful people.  Close to Disneyland -- a short shuttle ride.  We enjoyed the morning breakfasts prepared by Griselda, Edith, and Rosio -- very nice and a pleasant greeting by staff as you enter the dining area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us at the Residene Inn Anaheim Resort Area.  I am fortunate to have employees such as Griselda, Edith, and Rocio who all provide excellent customer service to all our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: Great room and breakfast. Gym needs TLC.
Summary: This was a great room for a colleague and myself to stay for a conference. The extra space and two bathrooms were needed and the room was very clean. The breakfast was great and they mixed up the hot choices everyday.   I would've given the hotel a 5, but the gym was not functional. One treadmill was broken and the elliptical's level 1 resistance is more like level 25. None of the tvs on any of the equipment worked. I ended up going to a 24 hour fitness a mile away.   I would stay here again and use the local gym instead of the hotel gym.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for giving us such great feedback on your stay. Please accept my sincerest apologies for the challenges you experienced with our fitness center. Please know that I have addressed these issues and we are in the process of correcting them. I am pleased that you found the other services, such as our hot buffet breakfast, to be beneficial to yourself and your colleague during your conference. Thank you again for being our guest and we sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next trip to Southern California.

Summary: On a recent trip to Disneyland, my family had a last minute change in plans and we arrived one day ahead of our reserved hotel on the Disney property and needed one night at a hotel near the parks.  We choose the Residence Inn and was very happy with our stay.  We had a two room suite which accommodated our family of 5 perfectly.  The buffet breakfast was good and offered a lot of choices for everyone. The elevators got a bit backed up in the evening as people returned from the parks.  The staff was very courteous and helpful and the rooms were clean, spacious, and comfortable. It was disappointing when we moved on to our other hotel that was much smaller and much more expensive. We would love to stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for being out guest. I am pleased to know that you had such an enjoyable time with us and that you found our hotel to be such a perfect fit for you and your family. The service to our guests and our hotel cleanliness are very important to us and I am pleased to know that we exceeded your expectations! Thank you again for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you and your family on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary Heading: Great options for large family vacations near Disneyland and California Adventure
Summary: Great place for a group of friends, two couples or a large or extended family to stay. Not very many places offer Suites that accommodate so many. The free full buffet style breakfast and make your own waffle bar is extraordinary! Hotel staff were all very accommodating and helpful. Pool/hot tub and outside grounds well maintained. The suite was pretty darn nice and clean and everyone has own space to decompress separate but still be together. Free wi-fi is a major plus. Major downfall to this great place to stay with big groups or families is having to pay parking $12.00 per day and there is no free shuttle service to major attractions/destinations. It was a pretty good hike to the amusement parks, at the amusement parks, and then back again especially with tired children. The
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreicate your feedback and am pleased to know that you enjoyed your time with us. I will certainly share your comments with our entire staff and management team. I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next trip to sunny Southern California!

Summary: Perfect place for two couples or a family to stay. The breakfast is extraordinary, great selection and Lourdes & all the staff were friendly & helpful. Front desk were kind and very ready with recommendations & helped with transportation options.  Pool/hot tub well maintained.   Overall a relaxing place, highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to share your experiences with us. I am very pleased to know your stay was so enjoyable and that our staff, both at the Front Desk and in the breakfast area, went above and beyond to ensure you had a great stay. I will certainly share your comments with each and every one of them. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We were traveling for our family vacation and the hotel was perfect in every way we could have imagined.  It was extremely clean, convenient to our destinations and offered amenities that we were easily able to take advantage of.  Feeding a family of six on a 5 day vacation has the potential to become extremely expensive.  The complimentary breakfast and social hours dinners were not only delicious but perfect for our budget on the trip.  But what has always distinguished one business from the other, in my opinion, is the personal touch in it's customer service representatives.  The staff member Lourdes quickly comes to mind as we look back at our time there. We were traveling for one of my son's birthday and also my wife's.  He was quite excited and loved telling everyone, well
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 5 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We hope to see you as a guest again very soon.

Summary: This is always our choice for our family of 5 to be comfortable in a 2 bedroom suite. Not to many hotels have 2 bathrooms, which makes it very convenient.  We 've always enjoyed our stays in the past. This year the staff made it feel very special by leaving our welcome cookies in our room. We love the convenience of onsite laundry, with providing detergent & dryer sheets (for a fee, but convenient). We love that breakfast is included and the variety of different choices  available. The service is excellent anytime of day. Thank you Lourdes for making our stay a memorable one. It's also great to have a kitchen & access to the BBQ area out by the pool. The location is great too. We always look forward to our next stay. Love how they decorate the lobby for the holidays.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. I am pleased to know that you and your family had such a great time while with us... and that your family enjoyed our spacious 2bedroom suite. Thank you so much for being our guest and we certainly hope to see you and your family on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I like this Residence Inn and the staff is incredible. First off, their free breakfast is the bomb! By far, the biggest variety of breakfast items I have ever experienced from a residence inn. Residence Inn breakfasts can be hit and miss, but this place hits the mark. Kudos! General Manager Frank Palacious has this place running on all cylinders. Yes, the elevators can be slow, but ok, it doesn't ruin the trip. Accommodations are very clean and gives you room to stretch and relax. I am a Marriott Platinum member and they recognize that at check in with an extra surprise that I won't mention.  They offer a meal Monday-Thursday nights, which again is great. I have been to some RI's that only does this two times a week and one doesn't do it all, so four nights is a real treat. It
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area.  I am extremely pleased to hear that our staff and your room were able to exceed your expectations.  I am very fortunate to have a staff and a General Manager who go out of their way to ensure that our guests have a memorable experience.  And I do agree with you that our breakfast buffet is a great added amenity especially for families.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure that we are able to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you and your family the next time you visit the area!

Summary: We love this hotel and stay there every time we travel to So Cal.  The staff is great -- the General Manager, office and front desk staff are friendly and helpful; the housekeeping staff is always polite, friendly and eager to help make our stay pleasant.  The rooms are comfortable, clean and nicely furnished.  Love having a working kitchen; it's very nice to have the option to cook ... or at the very least, bring back left-overs!  Great place for families to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area.  I am extremely pleased to hear that our staff and your room were able to exceed your expectations.  I am very fortunate to have our staff who go out of their way to ensure that our guests have a memorable experience.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure that we are able to provide excellent customer service to all of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you and your family the next time you visit the area!

Summary: Stayed for 14 night at beginning of November. Have stayed elsewhere in the area but this was best by far. For a longer stay having the extra facilities in room like Microwave and massive fridge freezer was great.  Room was comfortable and quiet. Did think a bit more lighting might help but probably not needed as much in height of summer. Staff were always very friendly and helpful. Would definitely go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area.  I am glad to hear that our room amenities were able to meet your family's needs.  I will be sure to share your comments with our management team to ensure that we are providing great service to each and every one of our guests.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I look forward to seeing you the next time you visit!

Summary: This is our second vacation in Anaheim and we found the residence Inn Anaheim by the fantastic reviews on Tripadvisor.  We had such a great stay!!  Close to Disneyland and quite a few restaurants and Target only a stone throw away.  We had a hire car for our stay and paid the nightly parking fee but the resort bus comes and goes from here.  We stayed In a Double/queen suite. Three adults and 1 child stayed here comfortably.  The kitchen was an added convenience.  We didn't use any cooking facilities while we were here but it was very handy having the full size refrigerator.  House keeping was great and the morning buffet breakfast was fabulous.  We needed to use a vacuum on our last day to use space bags in our luggage, housekeeping were more than obliging. Unfortunately we
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your most recent stay with us at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area.  I am truly pleased to hear that our rooms, ammenities, and staff were more than accomodating to your familiy's needs. I will be sure to share your comments with our management team.  Thank you again for being our guest and I hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort Area.

Summary: We reserved a 2 bedroom 2 bath unit that was very clean and modern.  The 2nd bedroom was tiny but because the 2 beds were bunk beds it worked.  The pull out in the living room was not comfy at all but then again what hotel pull out is.  The breakfast was decent with a nice variety but it would have been nice to have more fresh fruit.  There are restaurants across the street, including Outback and Red Robin.  Parking was safe and plentiful.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your stay with us here at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area.  I am glad to hear that our 2 bedroom suite was accomodating to your family.  I will be sure to share your comments about the pull out sofa and more fresh fruit at breakfast to our management team to ensure that we are providing the best customer service possible.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you the next time you visit the area!

Summary Heading: Great for Families But Rooms Need Updating
Summary: Stayed here with my husband.  My 3rd stay at this hotel.  Great place for families with kids.  Enjoyed the free breakfast buffets each morning.  Very good selection and variety.  Best part is making your own Belgian waffles.  Food during "social hour" (dinner) not the greatest but quite nice to have as a convenience.  Suites are good size.    Rooms need to be updated and modernized.  Furnishings and finishes look tired and old.   Dated linoleum on kitchen floor, plastic bathtub walls, refrigerator had lots of dents, sofas and chair were worn and saggy.    Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful.  I also stayed at this hotel a year ago but in a 2-bedroom suite.  Be aware that the 2nd bedroom is not a proper bedroom.  It is TINY.  About 2/3 the size of a regular bedroom, NO
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback on your stay. I am sorry to hear that your room felt dated. We did complete room renovations on all rooms in 2012 with new kitchens, carpets, sofa's, chairs etc. I will certainly look into the room you had with us and ensure everything is up to standard. I am also sorry that the two bedroom suite you had a year ago felt too small. We do have a total of four different types of two bedroom suites at our hotel ranging in size to accomodate six to eight people in a variety of configurations to meet every families needs.  Thank you again for being our guest. We certainly hope to see you and your family again on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We had a group of seven women here to celebrate my sisters upcoming wedding. We had a fantastic stay. Brianna helped us at check in and was able and willing to upgrade us to a bigger room. We appreciated that so much. Then she sent up a bottle of champagne for us. When we ordered more towels, they came right away. No waiting. We asked for late checkout on our final day and when it started to look like that wasn't late enough, Katrina gave us an extra hour to get our act together. The entire staff was so friendly and accomadating, I think all if will be returning to this hotel in the future. The roo.s were fantastic and the free breakfast was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very happy to hear that you were so well taken care of during your arrival and throughout your entire stay. I will certainly share your comments with the associates that you mentioned! We certainly pride ourselves on giving the best service to each and every one of our guests and I am very pleased to know that your experience with us was no exception. Congratulations on your upcoming wedding and we hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: Obviously a favorite with families coming to see Disneyland, this hotel has spacious suites and friendly staff. The breakfast is plentiful and varied - with items to meet every person's taste. The outstanding piece, however, is Lourdes, who was hostess this morning. She kept a close eye on the food and the guests to make sure the food was presented, everything stayed clean, and the guests got what they wanted. Great job, Lourdes!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am pleased to know that your stay with us was so enjoyable and that our employees in general, and one in particualr, took the time to make your stay with us so enjoyable and memorable. I will certainly share your comments with her! Thank you for being our guest and we certainly hope your travels bring you back to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area again soon.

Summary: Stayed here in early November 2014 with family of five. Great amenities, and comfortable stay in two-bedroom suite.  Kids enjoyed the pool and basketball hoop. Wife enjoyed the workout facility. We all enjoyed the daily breakfast and dinner (Monday through Thursday). Perfect place to stay for a family Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed our hotel and facilities so much.  Our two bedroom suites are so great for families and certainly make longer stays much more comfortable. I am happy to know that your children enjoyed the pool and sports court as much as your wife enjoyed the fitness center! Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you and your family again soon!

Summary: The place is fine for the economical disney visitors. We had two rooms. My husband and I were in a one bedroom suite. My daughter and her family were in a two bedroom suite. They loved theirs. Our room was "tired" and the microwave was dirty. Ick! The linens were cheap. The breakfast was what you would expect. And there was some evening snack, light dinner. We only made it to that once and it was ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate your taking the time to share your experiences with us. I am very sorry for errors in your guest room cleaning. I will certainly be speaking with my housekeeping staff to ensure proper cleaning procedures are in place. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Lorena Sanchez was terrific with our event.  This is a great facility overall. Well kept, great service! Room is well maintained. Clean and plenty of towels.  Breakfast was enjoyable and saved a lot on meals.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to recognize an employee that made your trip to the Anaheim area so memorable. I am very pleased to know that our staff, service and facilities made your trip so enjoyable and that our included breakfast and evening meals proved to be a great added value for you. We certainly hope to see you again on your next trip to Southern California.

Summary: Stayed here with 16 Family members! Sharing two suites. Everything was always clean. Shuttle service was Very handy. Kitchen perfect size. Nice outside area to relax and kids to take a break from Disneyland.  Breakfast was yummy and Lourdes!! and the other girls were very friendly and helpful. :)
Manager Response: Thank you to you and your family for being our guests. I am very proud of our staff and the service they consistently provide to our guests. I am very pleased to know that your stay with us was so enjoyable. I will certainly be sharing your comments about our staff members with them and their entire department. Thank you again for being out guest and we look forward to seeing you again on a future trip to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Nice family hotel, would definitely stay here again
Summary: My family of five stayed here for four days and were very pleased with the accommodations.  The staff were all so friendly and helpful.  The breakfasts and managers toasts were delicious, Lourdes was outstanding and the choices were amazing, my family was happy and full the entire vacation.  The hotel was clean and everything we could hope for, we would definitely pick this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and sharing your experiences during your stay. I am very pleased to know that your stay with us was so enjoyable. I appreciate you taking the time to recognize our employees and their attention to our guests needs. I will certainly share your compliments with our entire team. Thank you again for being our guest. We look forward to seeing you and your family again on your next trip to Southern California.

Summary Heading: Comfortable stay after a day at Disneyland
Summary: All of the Residence Inns I've stayed at are all pretty much consistent so I knew what to expect; great customer service and comfortable beds. I checked in using the app, and within 4 minutes of arriving we were in our room. We stayed in a two bedroom suite and everyone slept comfortably. It's possible to walk from the hotel to Disneyland (2.8 miles according to Google Maps) but we chose to use Uber and Lyft as it's a pretty far distance to walk after 16 hours at Disneyland and California Adventure. My only complaint would be the price to use the computers and printer in the  business center. We bought a $5 card and that gets you a really small amount of computer time, which wasn't enough to buy and print three Disneyland tickets.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of you rmost recent stay here at the Residence Inn Anahiem Resort Area.  I am pleased to hear that our service and the quality of your room met your expectations.  I do agree that the mobile check-in app is a great way to save time.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you and your family the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort Area.

Summary Heading: Friendly staff but check out other places before booking for business travel
Summary: Stayed here for 5 days and paid about $206 per day including fees and taxes for a one bedroom suite.  The staff was the best thing about this property.  They were very helpful with day to day issues.  Lourdes and the other ladies seemed to always be working the food service area and other common areas clean and well stocked.  The hallways were clean as were the suites, beds and bathrooms.  This place gets a lot of family traffic and there is certain wear and tear to be expected.  There was notable grime on all the light switches and wall plug outlets in our room which was strange considering the cleanliness elsewhere.   When traveling inside the U.S. I typically stay at Marriott properties when available.    I would consider other places before booking this particular hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and providing feedback on your recent stay with us. I am very sorry we did not fully meet your expectations. While we are close to Disneyland and see many leisure guests, it is our sincere desire to accomodate our business clientele and their needs with the same level of service and attention to detail. I want to assure you that I will be sharing your experience of being charged to print boarding passes with our service provider. I appreciate your feedback on our staff and your experience in general. Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary: My husband and I booked a room for two nights at the last minute because we decided to stay at Disneyland longer than originally planned and the Disneyland hotel was booked for the weekend. The room was pleasant and had a full kitchen, which would be awesome if we had kids or planned on staying a but longer, it's a great feature to cut down on park food costs. The breakfast was quite good. My husband is a chef and he was impressed with the food despite the large amount they produce to accommodate the number of guests staying. The breakfast had a wide variety of things to choose from and we feel this saved us at least $20 each day. They have a room for kids near the lobby that plays Disney movies which is awesome and keeps that Disney vibe going even after you've left the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am pleased to know that you found the hotel to be comfortable and am happy to know that you and your husband not only enjoyed the included complimentary breakfast but felt that it added so much value to your stay. We certainly look forward to having you as our guest again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great Leisure Stay, Short walk to Disney
Summary: I stayed over the course of 5 days here last week (10/22-10/26) with some family and friends sharing two rooms. As has always been the case, I simply rate these hotels as a LEISURE traveler.  Some hotels that i've rated as a Leisure guest fall woefully short in that category but may be better suited for the business traveler (and vice versa).  Let me start with the positives:  The staff.  Great staff and a notch above the superb service I am used to getting from Marriott.  There were a couple of minor complaints that I had throughout my stay and they were very swift to address them.  I won't be addressing these complaints per se as a negative only because they were fixable OR rather the staff turned them into an easy fix.    Another thing to like personally is the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for the candor and detail of your review. I am pleased to know that overall, your stay was so enjoyable. I am very sorry for the issues you experienced at breakfast with the waffle makers and the lack of courtesy experienced from other guests. I am pleased to know that you found our included breakfast to be such a beneift and great value to you during your time with us. We certainly strive to provide service and value that sets us apart from the competition and I am certain that we will earn that fifth star during your next stay with us. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We, a family of 5, were recently displaced from our home due to water damage. We stayed at the Residence Inn for 20 nights. The 2-bedroom suite was clean and maid service was spectacular. My only knock on the place was that our AC worked the first night and never again after that. We called several times to have it fixed and each time a maintenance person told us it was fixed, but it never was. We asked for fans and that helped at night but were a nuisance during the day with an 8, 5 and 1 year old running around. Our experience outside of the AC was very good.   The front desk staff was attentive and friendly throughout our stay. The complimentary breakfast was an awesome luxury. The food was well prepared, incredible variety and basically whatever you wanted to drink. ALL
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and providing such a comprehensive review of your stay. I am very sorry to hear that your issues with the air conditioner in your room went unresolved during your stay. I will definitely be looking into why that issue persisted. I am pleased to know that the staff service was everything you anticipated. I am very proud of the service provided to our guests at this hotel and am pleased to know your experiences were no different. Thank you again for being our guest and choosing our hotel. We will certainly look forward to your coming back for a "stay-cation" at anytime!

Summary Heading: Winnipeggers loved it - Great hotel - great staff - great location
Summary: We just got back from our 5 night stay. Everything was amazing we loved our room with two bathrooms and bunkbeds. The pool was great. The view out our room to the pool and Hyatt pool was beautiful. Super close to walk to the Hyatt to Starbucks. The staff was always super helpful. They printed maps for us to long beach aquarium, John Wayne Airport, Disney parking. They were always friendly and helpful. Fresh cookies when we got there. Amazing breakfast and waffles. A great shuttle just outside. The gift shop was super. Stocked with frozen merchandise. The gift shop staff were super nice. Lots of restaurants close and super close to drive to outlets at orange. Lots of food places Carls Junior, Red Robin etc. This place is amazing.  Super close to Target.  Our stay was supere
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the opportunity to post a review of your stay! I am very happy to know that our location, availability of near by restaurants, and most importantly, the helpfulness of our staff made your stay so enjoyable. We certainly hope that we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Southern California area.

Summary: I have stayed here twice now & never received anything but 5 star service. The rooms are always clean & well kept!! I highly recommend staying here & I will be back. One of the many employees, Lourdes, treats me like her own son & always makes sure I am well taken care. She loves her job & will make sure you are well taken care of too. My last stay is right now: 10/18-26/14.  :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to wrtie a review about your most recent stay with us.  I am very pleased to hear that Lourdes made your stay a memorable one.  I will be sure to share your comments to Lourdes and the entire staff as well.  Again, thank you for being our guest and I hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort Area.

Summary: I have stayed at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area - Garden Grove - about 15 times over the last 9 years now.  My last review was from February, 2014.  My latest visit was exceptional.  I had contacted the resorts' General Manager and Chief Engineer (Frank and Walter respectively) prior to my visit. I also spoke to Bill - the Assistant General Manager - when I arrived and he was very kind to me by taking a lot of time out of a very busy day and described the variety of suite styles available at the resort and he also suggested activities for me while in the area.  In regard to the suite itself, I wanted Frank and Walter to suggest any suite location in the resort and the only thing I specfically asked for was a King Size Bed and if possible, to be on one of the upper floors.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family really enjoyed our stay at this hotel.  The rooms were nice and clean, the staff was friendly and helpful, and the meals were wonderful.  The meals they serve in the evening are such a great benefit.  After a long day at Disneyland with several kids, it was nice to have a buffet style dinner that was ready for you.  It made things easy and perfect with kids!  We liked the amenities--pool, game room, laundry room, etc.  Our family would stay at this hotel again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay here.  I am very happy to hear that your room, and amenities exceeded your expectations. I am also pleased to hear that the staff was friendly and accommodating to your family.  Our evening social hours are very popular, especially the BBQ we have every Thursday.  I will be sure to pass on your review to our staff who were involved in making your stay memorable, and I am sure they will be thrilled to hear about your review.  Thank you for being our guest and I certainly hope to see you and your family the next time you're in the area.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay while visiting Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at the Residence Inn for 6 nights while we visited Disneyland.  I am usually very impressed with Marriott hotels and this was no exception.  Every staff member we met from the front desk to the cleaning staff was friendly.  They offer a free breakfast with a lot of choices.  It can get pretty busy in the meal area with all the families getting ready to go to Disneyland, but the staff stays on top of it keeping everything stocked and clean.  Rooms were nice and clean.  Pool area is nice, the water was a little cold for adults but the kids didn't seem to mind.  There is a nice little kids room area off of the main dining room and they have movie nights (which we didn't take advantage of.)  We spent most of our time away from the hotel so spending more money at the
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very proud of our staff and the service they provide to our guests and am happy to hear they exceeded your expectations while with us. I am also pleased to hear that you were able to enjoy so many of the amenities that the hotel has to offer from the pool and the coffee available in the lobby to the buffet breakfast and evening social hour that helps so many families stay on budget during their vacation. Thank you again for being out guest and I truly appreciate you taking the time to provide such a great review of your stay and certainly hope to see you and your family again in the near future.

Summary: We loved staying at the Residence Inn!   They really work hard to make sure you are comfortable and taken care of, no matter what.  The rooms are nice and inviting, the breakfasts are wonderful, and the evening meals were a  nice ending to some long days.  The gals who run the cafeteria area were always so nice to help us with whatever we needed and did it with a smile!  We loved the shuttle service and being able to come and go as we please.  We have recommended it to others who will be traveling to Disneyland, and we will make sure we book a return visit in the future!!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for providing such a rockin' review! I am very pleased to know my staff went above and beyond to make your entire stay so enjoyable. I will definitely be sharing your comments with our hardworking kitchen team and thank you for taking a moment to recognize their efforts. I hope we get to see you and your family again soon and thank you again for being our guest!

Summary Heading: A very nice place to stay
Summary: My family really enjoyed staying here on our Disneyland trip.  The rooms were clean and spacious, and it was very nice to have the two separate bedrooms so that our younger children could go to bed a little earlier than our oldest child.  We loved having the kitchen so we could eat in sometimes.  My children are very picky about food, but the breakfasts had a large enough selection that all of my children were satisfied.  My daughter especially loved the waffles.  Everything I ate at breakfast tasted great.  We were also pleasantly surprised by the "social hour" food service Monday through Thursday.  We were expecting a light snack, but it was more like a simple meal.  My children loved the pool, but it isn't heated enough so it got a little chilly in the evenings, but that
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am very happy to know that the hotel met the varied needs of you and your family... from differing bedtimes to meeting the needs of the more selective eaters in your family. The waffles we offer are very popular and I am glad to know your daughter enjoyed them so much. I truly appreciate your taking the time to provide your review of the hotel. It is the feedback of guests, like yourself, that allow us to constantly improve our hotel and our guest service. We certainly hope we will see you and your family again soon.

Summary Heading: It really is like a home away from home
Summary: We have stayed here 3 ot 4 times now.  Our most recent stay was in late September early October.  From the moment we arrived we only had great service.  Our room was upgraded, the nightly meals and the breakfast made the stay very enjoyable.  The BBQ on the Thursday night was wonderful.  A very clean and well run hotel. Whilst at the BBQ I thanked the assistant manager and he asked me what they could do better, honestly I couldn't think of anything.  We were having problems witht the television reception and the manager sent someone up straight away to look at it.  We will stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to post your review of your experiences with us. I appreciate your being our guest not just this time, but for your stays in the past as well. Often when I ask our guests the question of what we can do better, I get strange looks, but it is that on going drive to be the best we can for our guests that builds the confidence and loyalty in our guests and keeps them, like yourselves, coming back year after year. Thank you again for being our guest and we certainly look forward to the next time you and your family take a holiday in the States.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with the family
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a basketball tournament, but it is close to Disneyland and would be a good choice.  The room was spacious and clean- we had the King suite, so our son had his own room/TV.  There was also a nice, small kitchen with microwave, stove and fridge.  The hotel provides breakfast- not just cereal and milk, but a full spread of eggs, potatoes, sausage, waffles and a variety of other choices.  My family was very pleased with the spread.  The hotel has a nice pool area.  They also have a ping pong table outside and a basketball court- which was a big hit.  All in all, a great family place to stay in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay with us. I am pleased to know that you and your family found the room to be so comfortable. I am also happy to know that our breakfast, and all the variety you mentioned, helped fuel your family, especially your son, up for the basketball tournement. Thank you for being our guest and I sincerely hope we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Me and some friends traveled to Disneyland/SoCal area this past March. We stayed at this Residence Inn. I thoroughly enjoyed this hotel. We stayed here from March 22nd-March 26th. The hotel was SUPER busy, as there were Spring Breaks and a cheer convention going on. I will never go in March again!!! The room was nice and large for the 4 of us. We had two friends who were not a couple so having the extra sofa sleeper meant they didn't have to share a bed. This hotel is not that close to Disney. They have a shuttle that picks up outside of the hotel for a fee. I recommend taking the shuttle sometime after the morning hours if the parks allow you to be there late. The shuttles are so crowded we felt as if we were being jammed into a prison bus. Not a good experience. Free breakfast
Manager Response: I appreciate your taking the time to provide a review of your stay. I am very pleased to know that your stay with us was enjoyable and that you were able to take advantage of the amenities and that the included buffet breakfast helped you and your family stay on budget. Spring Break is definitely a busy time for the hotel, the park and Southern California in general. Thank you for being our guest. Hopefully, the next time you and your family can get away to Anaheim will be in the off peak times when the park is not as busy.

Summary: Friendly and service oriented staff complement this clean and well maintained hotel.  A prior review dings this hotel at one star for the shuttle service not being luxurious and free...shuttle is operated by PCA Management and was good (only late twice in 14 trips and never by more than 10 minutes) but back to hotel... 1. When we had a flat tire on wheelchair front desk provided a pump in a fast and cheery fashion. 2. In a small accident my wife needed a bandaid which was provided. 3. The breakfast host and staff kept the food fresh and premises clean and greeted folks with a smile. 4. Fresh coffee and infused ice water always available at front desk. 5.  Staff explained shuttle and parking options with a smile and were informative. 6. We booked thru get away today and also got
Manager Response: Troy,  Thank you for being our guest and taking the opportunity to write a review of your experiences with us. I am very pleased to know that my front desk, housekeeping and breakfast attendants all exceeded your expectations for service. I am very proud of our team and we do work hard to ensure each and every one of our guests receives the same excellent service you experienced. While occassionally there are things, like the shuttle, that are outside our control, we do work to not only ensure the impact on our guests is mitigated, but that we also work with our partners to ensure service issues are corrected. I truly appreciate you choosing our hotel as well as taking the time to write your review. I will certainly be sharing your review with our staff and recognizing all involved with helping to make your stay so memorable and enjoyable.

Summary: I researched hotels to find the best deal at this hotel. I thought they had free transportation to disney but it turned out that we had to pay per person. It was awful!! No air conditioning, it stunk, and the driver was rude. The hotel and the free breakfast was okay, but I wouldn't recommend it. The beds are comfortable, but the air kept going on and off all night and was so loud it woke me three times. We left our headphones in the room by accident when we checked out and no one ever turned them in.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I appreciate your sharing your experiences of your stay with us. I am sincerly sorry for your experiences with the shuttle. I will be sharing your points with the management team that provides the shuttle service to ensure these items are addressed. Please know that service and our guests comfort are corner stones in our daily operations and that we value your feedback on your stay with us. Thank you again for being our guest and I sincerely hope that we may have the opportunity to regain your trust in our hotel on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This is a very nice hotel with great customer service. We were here for only one night. We wished that we had selected this hotel for our disney vacation package. Through costco. The best western we had as part of that package was poor in  comparison.  We will stay here again
Manager Response: I’m glad to hear we were able to exceed your expectations. We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We have stayed here previously and did a review a few years ago. It is a great place to stay if you are travelling as a family. The 2 bedroom suites are excellent. You have a master bedroom with a king bed and ensuite, and a second bedroom with 2 beds and its own bathroom. The small lounge area is comfortable enough, and the kitchen area has a full size refrigerator and table for 4.  Staff were friendly and helpful, and we purchased our Disney tickets here. The Disney shuttle was good and punctual. The breakfast area is a bit of a bunfight at peak time....but there are plenty of seats. NOTE FOR PARENTS...... it was disgusting to see children piling up their plates with food, and then just leaving it on the tables. I commented this to the cleaning staff and they fully agree to
Manager Response: We were happy to have you and your family with us again! It is a testament to our staff and our hotel's amenities when we see our guests year after year. I certainly appreciate you taking the time to post a review of your experiences with us. While I know Australia is a long way from sunny Southern California, I truly hope we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next American holiday. Thank you again for being our guest!

Summary: We had a full family suite for 4 adults and 2 children one an infant and it was great. A master suite with ensuit and a bunk bed room with ensiutes. My wife and I took the bunk beds while my daughter & husband took the master with a baby crib. Our granddaughter used the sofa bed in the lounge. The bunk bed was more comfortable than the sofa bed which was a bit thin on the mattress but fine for our granddaughter. The room had full size fridge freezer, dishwasher and stove. The pool was great after a hot day in the park. Breakfast was very good lots of choices, hot and cold and there was even a meal at night which was handy. We had booked out to eat but did enjoy the Pasta night on our "in" night. Shuttle service was good to the park and the hotel isn't far from the Amtrak
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to provide a review of your stay. I am pleased to know that you and your family found your accomodations comfortable, but as your family grows, please know that we have even larger suites than the one you enjoyed during this stay. I am also happy to hear that the included daily breakfast buffet and evening social hour were amenities you were able enjoy as well. We certainly hope we have the opportunity to see you and your whole family again on your next trip to Southern California.

Summary Heading: Awesome amenities! More like a luxury apartment than a hotel.
Summary: All the rooms here are suites, and they have a kitchen with stove, coffee maker, dishwasher, pots, pans, dishes, forks knives, measuring cups. This place is so well equipped. Even the kids arcade room and pool are very nice. The only bad thing is that the parking lot is too small. It can be hard to find a spot sometimes.
Manager Response: I am very happy to know you and your family enjoyed your stay with us! It is certainly a compliment to be compared with a luxury apartment. Our hotel, and the entire brand, are focused on ensuring our guests have a "home away from home" experience while on vacation. I am very happy to know that your family was so comfortable while with us. Thank you for being our guest and we truly hope to see you again on your next trip to Orange County!

Summary: This was a special stay for us.  We had a mini family reunion to celebrate our grandson's 5th birthday.  Our grandson has undergone 2 open heart surgeries and we encouraged him through the last with a trip to Disney.  There were 7 adults and 3 small children, he being the oldest.  We were surprised to find the room decorated (they allowed our other daughter in early to decorate his room) and that night when we returned from a very long afternoon at Disney, we found the staff placed more birthday surprises in the room.  There were snacks, toys and a backpack.   The next morning at breakfast, a breakfast attendant overheard my conversation about it being a birthday trip.  The staff got together and surprised our little guy with a chorus of happy birthday.  The next morning, the
Manager Response: Thank you for fantastic review! We're thrilled that you and your family had such a great time on your vacation with us. Thank you for noticing the effort of our staff members. My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and making us part of your birthday celebration.

Summary Heading: Perfect location but needs updated rooms but fits a family of 6.
Summary: The location is perfect if traveling with familys. The room is not updated. Carpet looked like a huge stain. The bathroom looked very dirtybecause it was so old. But the staff were very friendly and the complimentry breakfest was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and we appreciate your feedback with your review. I am very sorry to hear that you felt the cleanliness and style of your room did not meet your expectations I will definitely address these concerns with our housekeeping staff. We sincerely hope that we may have the opportunity to regain your trust and satisfaction on  next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary Heading: A Disney Experience at a Great Value
Summary: We are not tourists. We were displaced by a house fire and moved in here for a week while we got everything repaired. Wow! What a great choice! We were so impressed by the training the staff has obviously had. They are providing a Disney quality experience from check-in to check-out. The staff never fails to greet guests warmly. The are articulate and informed. I witnessed them answering questions in clear, accurate detail. We had a few special requests and requirements while we were there and those were always met with a smile and all the support we needed. They keep the premises clean and orderly, There is coffee and ice water available in the lobby at all times. For the tourists, there is a shuttle right outside to take them to Disneyland without troubling with the traffic
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having your family as our guest. It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from some one who spent over one week with us. The people that work at this hotel are an exceptional group and greatly appreciate you noticing their efforts. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your suite. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary: just got back from another amazing stay, room was clean, beds were comfy, and breakfast was yummy.  Parking is a little hard at night BUT I will definitely bring my family back again and again.  Thanks for being a part of our vacay!!!
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We have a rotating menu that changes daily. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future.

Summary: would definately stay here again.  We spent 9 nights here while our family of 5 enjoyed a disneyland holiday.  The breakfast was an absolute life saver!  Very good variety and plenty for everyone.  The rooms were very clean, roomy, and comfortable.  The pool was plenty to keep the kids happy. Staff was more than friendly and accomadating for our entire trip.  This hotel is worth every $$ and more.  Thanks again Residence Inn for making our trip that much more comfortable.
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 5 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.  Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back as our guest.

Summary: The Residence Inn was a great place to stay for my family, which consists of my wife and two boys.  The breakfast in the morning had a decent amount of variety, which we can speak to because we were there for 6 nights and 7 mornings.  The hotel is kept very clean, as there are a great deal of little fingers touching everything.  We saw the staff cleaning walls and shampooing carpets on a regular basis.  Our room was wonderful, as we had a two-room suite facing North, so we could see the fireworks from Disneyland.  Each boy had his own bed, which helped keep the peace better than a bunk bed would.  The fridge helped keep leftovers or we would have been throwing a lot of food away.  And it was nice for my wife and I to have a room of our own instead of having to contend with our
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the opportunity to post a review of your recent stay with us. I am happy to know that our hotel, our staff and our level of service made for the perfect stay for you and your family. Your point of having enough bedding to "keep the peace" is where our hotel truly shines with our large two bedroom suites. I am happy to know that the room, breakfast, shuttle and pool all met the needs of your family so perfectly. Thank you for being our guest and I truly hope that we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Garden Grove/Anaheim area.

Summary: We have been to Disneyland several times and stayed in the Park and out.  I like this hotel because the rooms are big.  There are 5 of us and we stayed in a King suite and it was very spacious.  We had a separate bedroom with a huge bed, the girls had bunk beds and the one boy slept on the sofa sleeper.  The breakfasts are also a huge bonus and they are great and there is a large selection.  The hotel is clean and the kids love it.  It isn't a luxury hotel, but it is 5 stars for a family (especially one who wants to get some sleep) and we had a great view of the fireworks.  Nice shuttle to get in and out of the park and close to shopping.  I must admit I liked staying here more than at the Disneyland Hotel or the Grand Californian.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to provide a review of your recent stay. I am pleased to hear that you and your family had such a great time with us. As you mentioned, the large rooms and the included daily breakfast do provide a great value, especially for large families such as yours. We greatly appreciate your being our guest and hope to see you and your family on your next trip to Southern California.

Summary Heading: Not the best Residence Inn, but good for Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here in March this year. I had qualms after reading the mix of reviews (I advise you to read the bad ones - they are accuarate) but figured there were enough good ones to even things out. After staying at this property I can see both the good and bad.   We were upgraded because my husband travels a lot and stays at Marriott properties, so we got a 2-bedroom suite which was huge; one bedroom with a King, a living room plus kitchen area, plus a children's room with bunk beds; and two separate bathrooms. For a family with small children it wasn't the greatest layout because the bunks were quite far away across the living area from the master - but it was a huge amount of space and would be perfect for older kids or other configurations within a family. There was a clean
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay with us. I am truly sorry that you feel we fell short of your expectations. I want to assure you that cleanliness and maintenance of our hotel is paramount to our success and an incredibly high priority for the comfort of our guests. I truly appreciate your bringing these items to our attention and hope that we may have the opportunity to regain your trust on a future trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: Our family of 5 stayed here and loved it.  Rooms had plenty of space.  we enjoyed our stay, and would head back there again.  Very close to Disney, so we were able to return at about lunch time.  friendly staff and very clean
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 5 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.

Summary: Friendly staff.  Great breakfast.  Nice afternoon meal.  Room ready early!  Clean rooms.  Target across the street.  Many restaurants close by. We stayed here for the Disney half marathon.  They have laundry facilities!  The lounge chairs by the pool could be updated!  Shuttle service for the runner to the park was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel and being our guest! I am pleased to know that our hotel proved to be everything you were anticipating. We are fortunate to have so many convenient restaurant and grocery options so close to the hotel. It really helps our guests settle in and enjoy their stay, especially during a marathon weekend! Thank you again for being our guest and we look forward to having you with us for the 2015 marathon as well.

Summary: Every morning I am greeted at the free breakfast by the most wonderful women named Lourdes her smile makes my day. More than that it is her attitude and ability to making your requests effortlessly achieved. I jokingly refer to her as no nonsense Lourdes. In all my years of traveling I have never met a hotel employee get the job done effortlessly, expeditiously, all with the biggest smile and happiest attitude. I would return to the Residence Inn simply because of her excellence.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being our guest! I truly appreciate your taking the time to provide a review of your stay and am thrilled to see that our staff treated you and your family so well and attentively, especially Lourdes. I have shared your comments with her and the entire kitchen staff. I feel very fortunate to have such a great and attentive employee, and staff in general, at this hotel. Each and every one of them ensures that all of our guests are well taken care of during their time with us. We look forward to seeing you and your family again on a future trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: Recently dropped our son at university in SoCal.  Brought the entire family, so we needed a hotel with multiple bedrooms.  Booked a 2 bedroom 2 bath suite at the Residence Inn Garden Grove.  Tons of space, clean and comfortable.  Staff are excellent.  They helped with package deliveries, theme park tickets and directions.  The Magic Kingdom theme is prevalent here, so don't stay if you aren't a fan of Mickey.  Lots of families, kids and all the drama that goes with it.  Pool and patio area are very nice.  Breakfast buffet is great.  Get there early so that you have a seat.  Overall, a worthwhile location for all OC related activities.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! I am very happy to know that our staff tended to your needs so well with tickets, directions and overall great service. We hope that on your next visit to see your son that we have the opportunity to have you as our guest again. We certainly appreciate your review and thank you again for staying with us.

Summary: When we do Disney, we are hardly ever in the room, as we're iron-manning it in the parks for 10+ hours a day.  This last trip was no different, but even with that I can honestly say that part of what made the experience great was this hotel.  The location is perfect.  They no longer use ART, instead using another bus company, but the shuttle stop is right outside the hotel on South Harbor Blvd.  Going to the parks there are two additional stops, but going back to the hotel you are the first stop when leaving the parks.  If all you're doing is going to DL, don't bother renting a car -- you're less than 10 minutes away by shuttle.    The free breakfast was excellent.  There wasn't a huge variety of things, as this isn't a high end buffet, but what was prepared every day was quite
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review on our hotel. I am very sorry you had an issue with your fridge, but I am pleased to know that my staff was able to correct the issue so quickly. I am also pleased to know that you took advantage of the amenities the hotel has to offer. Nothing helps wind down a long day at the park like a dip in the pool! It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: My mother who is frail and very ill came to stay @ this hotel so she could go to Disneyland with her great grand daughter for her birthday. Not only did the ac not work but the carpet was soaked in 3 places due to the ac, when we let management know we were given fans which did not help at all considering it was over 85 degrees. When we stressed how important it was to keep my mother cool due to her illness and just coming from the hospital to give my granddaughter her birthday wish. We were told we would be given another room the next day, that didnt happen the assistant general manager said we would stay in the room we have and they would replace the ac, not only were we not able to go to Disneyland with my granddaughter because we waited till approx  4 pm that afternoon to
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We apologize that you had such an experience and assure you that this is not the typical stay at this hotel. We were all surprised and disappointed that we let the issue with your air conditioning unit get to that point. I wish you mother a quick and full recovery. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We chose this hotel based on various reviews.  We were given a room fulled of smoke and flooded with dirt water but fine we can deal with it.  Then next day we checked in our luggage while we waited for a new room.  When we returned from the theme park, we found out the hotel has lost one of the most important luggage which has a laptop in it.  The hotel claims no responsibility and offer no help at all even though the security camera proved the luggage has been dropped off.   They offer no help not even a single quarter to cover the laundry or toothpaste or any key essentials.  How can vacationers have a worry free stay? While we expressed the complain,  the assistant general manager Bill and the front clerk had small talk then gave us some dirty look. I rarely write reviews,
Manager Response: I apologize that you had such an experience and assure you that this is not the typical stay at this hotel. We expect to provide a clean and comfortable suite with everything in working order and apologize that this was not your experience. An internal investigation was in process to locate the missing bag after a thorough inspection of our storage facility the bag was found and returned to you. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: When visiting the theme park area of the OC, this is our favorite place to stay. I'm writing this while the kids play in the pool after check out. Very accommodating.   Thanks Lourdes for greeting us this morning at breakfast, and making sure everything was clean, orderly and pleasant. A great way to start the day!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. I am pleased to know that you and your family had such a great time while with us... and that your family enjoyed the pool up to the last minute. Thank you so much for being our guest and we certainly hope to see you and your family on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: After having at least 5 great stays here in the past, this visit was extremely disappointing. Upon check in, found food all over kitchen floor, a fly in the room and a bad odor near the bathroom sink. Spent most of our first night awake due to an issue with the a/c. The next day management fixed a/c but that's it. Other problems remained and nothing done to compensate for anything. Last night housekeeping didn't even replace towels. Clearly they are not interested in taking care of frequent guests. Excited to see new hotels opening in the area, will definitely be staying elsewhere next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to provide a review of your stay. I am very sorry that you experienced issues with your room upon arrival. When our guests experience an issue during their stay, it is our goal to ensure issues are resolved promptly and to our guests satisfaction. I am very sorry that we did not meet your expectations during your stay. It is my sincerest hope that we may regain your trust on a future stay to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This was truly a place to have a family holiday.  Close to Anaheim's Disney Resort and close to many eating places it made for a great holiday.  The hotel had mostly suites and so had a bedroom and a good kitchen and groceries could be bought close by, if a parent misses cooking or someone needed home cooked food. The hotel provided a great breakfast too. Great hotel for a family holiday.
Manager Response: On behalf of myself and my staff, I want to say thank you for being our guest! I am very pleased to know that you enjoyed our hotel, its services, amenities and proximity to restaurants and supermarkets. Having the ability to cook a meal, or simply have snacks in the rooms, does make our hotel uniquely family friendly. It is my sincerest hope that we have the opportunity to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: We have stayed here on three separate occasions. We love the breakfast and the evening meals or socials. The staff are friendly and attentive to our needs. The suites are spacious and provide much-needed rest in a cool and comfortable environment. The pool and hot tub are great relaxation features. I was talking to a manager during our stay, and praising the hotel. He asked me to complete a trip advisor, this is the first one I have ever done! And this hotel truly deserves it. In checking with my wife about what could be improved, she thought that having laundry baskets in the rooms would be helpful. We could think of nothing else :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. I am pleased to know that overall your stay was so pleasant and relaxing. We truly appreciate getting feedback from our guests on their stay and how we can improve. I will definitely look into your suggestion about having laundry baskets available. We certainly hope to see you and your family again on your next trip to Orange County!

Summary Heading: I go to Disneyland so often, my friends say buy a condo.  Why? when I can stay at Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area!!
Summary: I travel a fair bit, and have lost count of the number of different hotels at DisneyLand I tried before I discovered this amazing property.  Frank and his staff go out of their way to welcome us back.  I believe they remember us, not just the canned welcome.  As a family with five children, I am very frugal with our money, and a key reason I can continue to take the children to Disneyland is FREE BREAKFAST!  I like coffee, and will stop by the occasional Starbucks, but paying $3 for coffee in a diner for breakfast ruins my whole day.  At the Residence Inn the free coffee is on all day.  You say your children are fussy eaters?  Just wait to you see the spread they put out for breakfast; make your own waffles, egg dishes, hot cereal, dry cereal, baked goods, it just goes on and
Manager Response: On behalf of Frank, myself, and our whole staff, I want to thank you for being our guest. Frank goes out of his way to ensure all of our guests have a wonderful stay with us, especially those, like yourself, that return year after year. I am also very pleased to know that our hotel provides you and your family with such a great value while still providing so many options for breakfast and social hour. Thank you again for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you and your family on your next trip to Orange County!

Summary Heading: Good value?  Depends on your priorities.
Summary: Stayed here on a family trip to Disneyland.  I think this hotel is average and typical for the area and price point.  Furnishings need updating, but it provides "basic" and clean accommodations.  The free wifi is good and we had a strong signal.  The free breakfast buffet is acceptable - you can make your own waffles, they have some dry cereal and oatmeal, toast / bagels, fresh fruit, decent coffee (available all day) and a hot egg entree with sausage links.  It gets tiring after 2 days but its included.  You can always grab something at Disneyland, but it'll cost you.  At Starbuck's, a lemon loaf slice which normally costs $3, costs $5.
