In the evenings starting at 5:30, they have a manager's reception which you could probably turn into a meal.  One night was baked potato
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to write such a comprehensive review of your visit to the area. I am very sorry you experienced an issue with your air conditioner in the room, but I am pleased to know that our staff was able to resolve that issue for you. I am very sorry that you had issues with the ART shuttle services. While we do not use their transportation services at our hotel, it is clear that your experiences with them clearly did not meet your expectations. Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Residence inn I general is losing quality
Summary: I have been a loyal visitor with Marriot world wide, residence inn USA in particular. This has been going on for at least 6 years. I'm disappointed with the quality of service they have been providing recently. This is my second stay at Residence inn this summer. At my current location, the room was not fully cleaned when we checked in, half empty bottles of drinks in fridge, hair in drawers,etc. the elite member internet kept cutting on and off since we checked in 4 nights ago. The gym had a broken elliptical machine out of order since we checked inn, I'm sure much longer than that. The wet sanitizer wipes in the gym ran out 3 days ago, still not filled up. Finally the bathroom was not cleaned yesterday, it was dirty as we left it. I really feel bad for such a great franchise
Manager Response: Dear Khaled,  Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to share your thoughts with us. I am very sorry for the inconvenience you experienced while with us. I want to assure you that those experiences were the exception and not the standard at this hotel. I will personally address the items you discussed and ensure they are corrected. Thank you again for being our guest and it is my sincerest hope that we may see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We prefer staying at the Hampton inn wherever we go in the USA but couldnt find a booking this time. We were looking for extended stay in a suite for our family of 5, near disneyland with good facilities including free wifi, parking and kitchenette. We were not disappointed, however we did hope for more from housekeeping. On some days we returned to our suite to find it immaculate but on others we just weren't impressed.   Wifi could have been better too.   And the parking lot was always packed.  Staff are great though. Very helpful and always full of smiles.  Breakfast is a lovely plus.  The kids did expect more disney and cartoon channels on TV.
Manager Response: We are glad you choose to stay with us!  I’m sorry your experience with our parking was less than positive, we do have over flow parking available next door at the Hyatt. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We hope to see you as a guest again very soon.

Summary Heading: BAD EXPERIENCE WITH RECEPTIONIST MICHAEL M
Summary: I am giving a low rating because of an isolated incident with the receptionist named Michael M.  This person should not deal with customers at all!!!  What started as a 5 star rating went down hill after dealing with this receptionist.  We like the place.  Outdated but very clean.  There are a few imperfections of course as you will see some chipped paint or rusty towel bars for instance but here are the positives: The free breakfast has a good selection Free afternoon snacks on selected days Free Wifi Oversize safety box that fit a large laptop and 3 tablets. It still had plenty room left. 2 Flat TVs we got a bedroom suite with a full kitchen  Other cons will be a the $100 pet fee.  Sheraton only chargerd $25.  But sheraton charged $10 a day on wifi. $10 parking fee and no free
Manager Response: To say that your experience is concerning would be an understatement. I apologize that you had such an experience and assure you that this is not the typical stay at this hotel. I want you know that we do have a very competent, efficient, and service-minded team here at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort despite your recent experiences. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We arrived in California after a long day of travel and found out that where we had originally planned to stay was not at all promised.    We searched and found the Residence Inn - Anaheim Resort.  What a wonderful experience!    The Hotel staff treated us with the utmost kindness.  Ever single person we dealt with - the front desk staff, the people that set up and maintained the breakfast area, the cleaning staff - were professional, courteous, helpful and friendly!    The breakfast in the morning was fantastic and the evening get-togethers were great.  The Front Desk staff was terrific and extremely professional, plus had great advice on where to eat and shop. Everyone definitely went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable - and they were all genuinely nice.    We
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people working at this hotel. Our staff genuinely cares about our guest's experience and we will always go out of our way to ensure that every guest has a great memorable stay. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: I have taken my family to this hotel for the last 6 years or so and to tell sum it up: It is simply the BEST!  The whole staff (I hate to call them staff because they really are like family!) makes you feel like you are at home. They always go above and beyond and we especially take notice of how they treated our children--they could not have been nicer or better in any way to our kids! If you want a place that you can feel comfortable with your kids--this is the place!  From the cookie package welcoming us back to the property(we kept have kept that note each year) to the care package after a mix-up with our keys, they never hesitate to make you realize that they are thinking about you and your family constantly. When we arrived at the hotel, I accidentally dropped my key into
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We're glad you and your family had a good stay. I absolutely agree with you; we do have a great staff and we are fortunate to have each and every one of them. I will be sure to share your feedback with our staff. I hope to have you back soon!

Summary: We spent Memorial Day weekend at Disneyland.  The Residence Inn was a TERRIFIC place to stay.  They upgraded us upon checkout and our room was situated so we could see the fireworks at night. AWESOME SURPRISE!!!  The hotel was clean, management super friendly and the breakfast, although crowded (as expected) was great.  Not sure what the issue other people had with the elevator was all about.  There were no long wait times at all.  All in all a great stay.  Next time I'm in the area I'll be staying here!
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. The rooms that face Disney get a great view of the fireworks I’m glad you enjoyed the scenery. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: Stayed here after  3 nights at Hyatt next door (they could not accommodate our whole stay) and was very pleased.  Staff was super helpful and friendly when asked questions about airport and Disney shuttles.  Breakfast was very good (eggs, sausage, several waffle makers).  Hotel was clean and we got upgraded to a HUGE suite -- much more space than we needed!  Nice sized pool area as well.  Used the $5 Disney shuttle at the Hyatt next door which was a straight shot to Disney rather than the ART = highly recommend.
Manager Response: Your review title put a big smile on my face.  Thank you for noticing the effort of our staff members. My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Great time at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area !!
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times in the past 3 years - usually with family and or friends.  This is one of our favorite Disneyland area hotels!  Lorena S. - who works in the restaurant - is really super great.  She found out that my birthday was during our stay and she took the time to have a birthday gift delivered to our room!  All the people we met who work at this hotel are very friendly and accommodating.  And we especially enjoy all of the free food that is provided.  Highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and making us part of your birthday celebration. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed our suites. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary: This was my four year old granddaughter's first trip to Disneyland and the ocean.  Because we live in the Central United States (in Arkansas), it's rare for us to have the time to travel to Southern California.  When I first arrived at this hotel, the room type that I had selected was unavailable which was a big glitch for me.  The room was unavailable because the guests who stayed in it the night before had chosen to stay another night.  When this happened, the General Manager immediately stepped in and fixed the problem well beyond my expectations.  What was most telling about this hotel is how friendly and service oriented that the staff members are.  It is obvious that a requirement to work at this hotel is that you have to be extremely friendly.  The accommodations are nice
Manager Response: Thank you for giving the high grade of A+! I’m glad to hear that you had an awesome stay. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website! Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.

Summary: Great family hotel with all the facilities we needed. Really catered for kids and customer service was second to none. The housekeeping manager, Judy, went above and beyond to look after us and was generous with her time. I can highly recommend this hotel, our stay was fantastic.
Manager Response: I definitely agree with you we are great for families. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is the best value in Anaheim. Our staff works hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary Heading: This Used to be Our Favorite Place to Stay!
Summary: I've reviewed this hotel in the past very favorably.  It is still a great location with the exception of two months out of the summer.   My son's basketball team stays here each year while they play in a tournament at the ASC.  It is in a great location in regard to ease of accessing the transit system and I like being able to walk across the street to Target and get drinks, food, etc. and it has some nice restaurants within walking distance.    My complaint stems from a LARGE group of people who invade the hotel for two months during the summer.  They honestly take over the entire hotel; there is no parking (we had to park behind the next hotel over and walk quite a distance), they take up all the seating both in the lobby and pool area.  You can't sit outside and enjoy that
Manager Response: Dear Ktrusty,  Thank you for being our guest and thank you for providing a review of your recent stay with us. I can certainly understand your frustrations with the group we had at the hotel during your time with us. I want to assure you that their behavior was not ignored by our management team and in fact was addressed with their group leaders several times. I want to assure you that based on their behavior during their time with us, this group will not be returning to our hotel in the future. We value each and every one of our guests and I am truly sorry for the inconvenience they caused you, your team members and our guests in general.   Thank you again for being our guest and we sincerely hope to see you again soon.

Summary: It was great  time that I spent in residence inn Anaheim garden grove with my family. I felt like I was staying in my home the staff were friendly and helpful. Room furniture and space met our expectation. When we entered our room after along day of activities we always get surprise of the very kind treats offered by the hotel. my children were very exited and happy they enjoyed different events overfed by the hotel specially the barbecue time. Their quick response to our needs was awesome.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. We are centrally located with many dinning options with in walking distance. We are thrilled that you found our staff helpful and friendly.  Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: I recently stayed here 7/11-7/13. I was put on the 6th floor and requested to be near the elevator. I was no where near the elevator. I suppose they don't look at requests, because this has happened to me before. My floor had no air conditioning running, so it was very warm walking down the hall, there was a floor fan blowing towards the hall(?) It smelled bad. The room was very small for the amount of $ they wanted. Room 625 had a crack in the bedroom closet door at the bottom. The elevator took forever, so many people and the breakfast buffet only had sausage patties, no bacon. I expected more than what they had. Overall I wouldn't recommend this place. Sorry Residence Inn, I've had better experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us during your recent trip Anaheim. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim

Summary: The hotel room was quite spacious. We were able to check in early which was wonderful since had a 6 hr flight. Breakfast was good but was not restocked on weekend like it was through the week. Bed were a little hard but nice staff. The night time reception had good food and is free
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We have a rotating menu that changes daily. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future.

Summary: We stayed here July 5th for 3 nights, while taking our kids to visit Disneyland. First off, check in was easy and smooth and we were thrilled to find out that as Gold members we received a upgrade to a 2bedroom suite.  The room was perfect for a family of four. We had two bathrooms which max's getting ready in the am easy. The 2nd bedroom, while small was perfect with two twin beds. The master had a nice large king bed.  While we didn't use the kitchen to prepare in a meal in, it was fully stocked with pots, pans and dishes. It was nice to have a fridge and microwave.   The hotel provided breakfast was plentiful with lots of choices including hot breakfast items. It was one of the better breakfasts we have seen at a Marriott property!   As for the location, it was a block away
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and thank you for being a Marriott Rewards member! While we don't always have the ability to upgrade our guests, I am very pleased to know that we were able to provide you and your family with one. I am glad to know that you enjoyed the included daily breakfast buffet and found our location to be so convenient.   Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay with us and thank you for being our guest. We look forward to seeing you and your family again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The Residence Inn as well as Marriott Towne Inn and others I have stay at are Great! The stay was excellent with swimming pool, table tennis, theater room and exercise room. Also, laundry room. A healthy selection breakfast for all ages.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal Marriott guest. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your suite. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary: This is the best Residence Inn my family and I have stayed at.  The general manager was very helpful and let us check in early.  The full breakfast was great and there were many food options.  We stayed in a 1 bedroom suite (king bed with sofa bed) and really liked that the master BR was private.  It is only 1.5 mi. from Disneyland and 2 mi. from Angels Stadium.  There are restaurants within a short walking distance too.  The pool area was nice (large pool, kiddie pool & hot tub).  There is a basketball court outside and 2 grills to BBQ on.  The only negative for us was the tight parking spots.  $10 per day for on site parking.  We will stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We believe we are the ideal choice for anyone visiting Disneyland and are happy that you agree. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Stay Here and you'll be very happy you did!
Summary: My family of 6 stayed here in October of 2013.  My kids were 10 months, 2.5, 3 and 7 at the time. I was very happy at the level of cleanliness.  Space was amazing for the price that we paid.  Free breakfast was good and a must with all the kids.  There was even a dining area just for kids.  The shuttle picks up right outside the hotel and went straight to Disneyland.  Our room had a separate bedroom with two twin beds and bathroom just for the kids, a large living/kitchen area and a bedroom and bathroom for the master.   We had stayed closer on another visit to Disneyland and we decided that closer isn't better.  We will be returning.
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 6 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.  Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We hope to see you as a guest again very soon.

Summary: I love this hotel.  I have stayed here several times.  I keep coming back because they have it right.  The rooms are clean, spacious and modern.  There is no comparison.  The breakfast is GREAT!  There are lots of options, the pool area is nice and clean, and there are many things to do!  It's decor is family friendly and matches the surrounding area.  The only drawback is the parking and the distance from Disneyland, but it makes up for it in everything else!
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to come back. I’m glad to hear we were able to exceed your expectations. We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay.

Summary: We had a great experience at this hotel!  The entire staff was amazingly helpful, courteous, and professional.  The location is right in the middle of all the action.  The breakfast choices met every one of my family of 6's needs.  The hotel and our rooms were clean.  The 2 bedroom suite was plenty spacious, and even the pull out couch was comfortable.  I highly recommend this place!
Manager Response: I definitely agree with you we are great for families. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is the best value in Anaheim. Our staff works hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary: I just completed a two night stay at this hotel. Overall it was fine. The kitchen staff did a great job keep the breakfast well stocked and very clean. I would mention that Ms. Lourdes was very gracious and helpful.  On the second day the 3rd floor hallway area developed a bad stinky smell that lasted a whole day. Luckily the our room was spared the bad smell. I walked over to Starbucks for coffee and returned thought the trash area, which I don't have high expectation for, but this area was nasty- I think this was the origin of the smell? But overall, a fine stay and I would go back.
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. I apologize for the bad smell you had to deal with on your floor I hope we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Just got back from our Disneyland vacation and have to say the hotel really helped make the trip a huge success!!!  Our family of 6 got a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom suite and it was absolutely perfect.  Plenty if room to spread out & rest when we were all exhausted!  Breakfast was great, service was great, location was great!  Excellent experience!  We will be back!!! :)
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Having three televisions in the suite allows everyone in the family to watch their favorite show. Thank you for recommending us hopes to see you back soon!

Summary: This was our family's first trip to Disneyland & this hotel was the perfect place for our stay. It's close enough to walk to the park. It takes about 20-30 minutes to get there, and when you're walking all day long that time seemed reasonable. You can also pay to take a shuttle to the park. The kid's area is great and disney themed. Our daughter loved it! The room layouts were great. We were in a 2 bedroom/2 bathroom suite. The hotel staff was very friendly and courteous. There were a couple things in the room that could have been cleaned more thoroughly, but nothing that would keep me from not staying again. You could also tell this was a family hotel because of the wear and tear in the furniture in the room. Overall this was a great hotel and great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and making us part of the special event. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed our suites. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary: We are a family of five and stayed in a one bedroom suite that was more than adequate for us. We enjoyed the well maintained pool and hot tub (especially after walking in the Parks).  We were very appreciative of the breakfast bar in the morning and the comfort foods served in the evenings including an ice cream social on Wednesdays. The staff was incredibly helpful and courteous, one of the front desk clerks also works at Disney and gave us great "insider" info that saved us much time. Another associate gave a nice package of cookies to my son and the Manager was able to extend our stay and share some valuable information about our next destination in Sequoia National Park.  On one evening I was able to cook some nice steaks on the available outdoor grill and while preparing a
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. We are delighted that you found our staff helpful and friendly. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent Location, Excellent Room, Excellent Breakfast.
Summary: One of the best Marriott-chain hotels we have ever stayed in, and we will definitely be staying here every time we return to the Anaheim area.  The daily breakfast was wonderful, the room was very spacious and well-situated, the pool area is large and clean.  There is a fun 'kid room' that shows Disney movies seemingly constantly, is separate enough as to not disturb the non-kid travelers, but convenient enough that kids can easily use it. There are activities posted in the lobby each day, this place goes above and beyond to ensure a fun, enjoyable stay.    The location is ideal for visiting Disney, and would be an easy walk to the parks (though we drove because we already had a parking pass).  Lots of food options nearby in easy walking distance.  A grocery store and a Target
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Being one mile away from Disneyland we are a popular hotel among families. Our staff works hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary: This hotel is great for families with young children.  Our two bedroom suite with a full kitchen and spacious living area made it perfect for us.  We had two adult couples and a total of small kids.  The convenience of a full kitchen saved on money.  There is a nice little restaurant in the lobby with full meals and alcohol.  We were impressed that the manager of the hotel was in the restaurant every morning talking to the guests of the hotel.
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The full equipped kitchen allows you to cook light snack or a full meal. Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Gricelda was excellent.   Breakfast was much better then expected.   Staff was great with the 2 young kids.  Including my 4 year old singing his diarrhea songs.   Would highly recommended the hotel especially with kids
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. You are absolutely right about the value and money that can be saved by enjoying our complementary hot breakfast buffet and evening meals. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: My family and I (8people) stayed in a 2 room suite here at the end of May 2014. We absolutely loved the hotel.   Pros - our room was beautiful, updated and definitely clean (they even did carpet cleaning during our one week stay there) breakfast buffet was AMAZING - fresh waffles, eggs, fruit, drinks included it was delicious!  Such a great disney area themed hotel, posters of disney, movies playing at breakfast for the kids, even a little gift shop selling disney items if you forgot to buy something!  free parking!  -3 minute drive to disney parking lot (it was $17 to park) we had two SUVs packed with people so much cheaper than the shuttle which i think was $6-7 per person - right across the street from target (TARGET has amazing disney souvenirs for cheap cheap!)  Im glad we
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. We are centrally located with many dinning options with in walking distance.  Your recommendations are great and I’m sure it will help many families plan accordingly and get the most out of their So-Cal vacation. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: We spent a week here with our adult family in a two bedroom suite and it was just perfect.  We had two bathrooms and a full kitchen which not many of the hotels we looked at had.  Staff were friendly and helpful.  Great location and facilities.  Target grocery/department store across the road and plenty of places to eat.  The pool and spa area was open until 10.00pm which was another bonus.  Excellent buffet breakfast every morning and free managers special snack/light meal most weekday evenings.  About a 20 minute walk to Disneyland but because the weather is so great that was not a problem.  The shuttle bus was right outside the hotel if you didn't feel like walking.  We will be back - highly recommend this place.  Perfect!
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to post this review. Sounds like you had a great time in our spacious two bedroom suite. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. See you soon!

Summary Heading: We will never stay anywhere else after staying here!!
Summary: My family and I just returned home after staying at this hotel for 5 nights.  Normally, we stay at a different hotel but this time we wanted to use our Marriott rewards points so we decided to give this hotel a try.    We will never stay anywhere else after staying at this hotel!  It was clean and comfortable.  We didn't expect maid service every day (as most hotels just do this every other day) but each night when we returned to our room, our beds were made neatly and our room was spic and span.  One of the housekeepers even arranged all my kids stuffed animals on the coffee table in a very cute display, which they really enjoyed.  One of my sons clogged the toilet one night at 10:00 pm and a maintenance man came to fix it almost immediately.  The breakfast buffet is out of
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a great family vacation. We are delighted that you found our staff helpful and friendly. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Clean, accommodating, excellent service.  Highly recommend it!  Perfect for families.  Breakfast meals were excellent and the Monday-Thursday suppers were very much appreciated after a day at the park. ONLY thing I could see on improving, is an available area/lounge for parents to unwind - no restaurant or bar area directly on site but many options nearby
Manager Response: I’m glad to hear we were able to exceed your expectations. We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Our family of four (2 teenagers)spent 4 nights over the Memorial Day weekend.  Comfortable, clean, ftiendly, and well located. Desk staff was exceedingly helpful. We are frequent Southern California visitors and will stay here in the future. BTW: the full kitchen is a great convenience when traveling with the family.
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. I’m glad that you were able to use the fully equipped kitchen to prepare yummy snacks for your family. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Fabulous staff, clean hotel, updated rooms include full kitchens with dishwashers. The hotel has great amenities including a gift shop, laundry, weight room and free internet. Full breakfast buffet. Lots of extras. We have stayed here 4 times in 5 years. It us our go to Disney hotel.
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.  Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family.  Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: My husband and I stayed for a romantic weekend alone and a alone trip to Disney.  It was great from the room to the water pressure to the breakfast. my only complaint is where you have to wait for the Disney bus there is no shade at all and it was hot.
Manager Response: Thanks for recommending us it is an honor to received such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like your self. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: I stayed here for just one night last week.  Marriott Gold Member:  *didn't get an upgrade *Needed a late check out but was only allowed to stay until 12:30.  I asked for 1pm, they said no.  So both of these, I understand it's by availability and apparently they were sold out.  I guess it's a good thing for hotels to be full....bummer for me.  *rooms are ok.  For the price, I think it can be updated a little more. *Campus was clean. *Parking is rather right *Breakfast was decent. Area was kind of small for all the families.  *Pool looked nice, didn't go in. *Has a basketball hoop *Lots of restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us during your recent trip Anaheim. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We spent 10 days in Anaheim at this hotel and with two teenage children this place was perfect! We had a two bedroom, two bathroom and kitchenette room and it exceeded expectations. Great service, good breakfasts and even free light dinners! Good location with everything nearby. The only disappointment was that my wife had some new make-up go missing during our stay which unfortunately could only be attributed to the cleaners. We would still stay again as everything else was excellent.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Having three televisions in the suite allows everyone in the family to watch their favorite show. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary: We stayed here April 29th, 2014 with our son and his wife and two kids.  We each booked a one bedroom King room model. The king bed was very comfortable and the fold out sofa bed was just fine for the 5 year old and 3 year old...  The buffet breakfast was adequate and seemed to offer something for everyone....pastries, hot and cold cereals, eggs, bacon, fruit juices, coffee, tea, and the typical "make your own waffle" area that most Marriotts offer.  We did not sample the evening Happy Hour menu, but judging from the menu plan posted in the room, it appeared that a family with young children could virtually eat "dinner" at the Happy Hour on weeknights...  The staff was friendly, the rooms were clean and freshly painted and decorated.  It is 1.5 miles to Disneyland.  There is a
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a great family vacation. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and making us part of the special event. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your suite. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary: Our family of four stayed here from April 1 to 8 while visiting Disneyland, and from now on this will be the only hotel that we will stay at when we return.  Everything about it was perfect, from the cleanliness of the rooms, the great breakfasts, but especially the customer service which was the best my wife and I have ever encountered, truly second to none.  Any request to the front desk was completed immediately, the staff was incredibly friendly and helpful and the cleaning staff did a great job every day.  What topped the customer service off for me is one day my 3 year old came down with a bit of a stomach flu and ended up getting sick on one of the beds.  Not only was it cleaned up very quickly at our convenience, when we returned to our room later, there was a
Manager Response: I definitely agree with you we are great for families. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future.

Summary: This place I'm at is very nice the customer service is very grateful you're always helpful they're always saying hello to us. my kids feel like this is home when we leave our house. I just want to say thank you for  everything you have done for my stay. I will recommend it's hotel to everyone I know.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am very happy to hear that you and your family had such a great time and your children felt as if they were at their home away from home. Thank you for being our guest. We hope that we get to see you and your family again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, nice Staff, great breakfast
Summary: I stayed here as part of conference for a work trip.  The stay was nice.  The beds were very comfortable.  The staff was friendly.  The room was clean.  They have a very nice hot breakfast in the morning.  The offerings were MUCH better than at the Anaheim Convention Center.  There was an evening *meal* with snack type foods and salad.  There were a lot of families there for Disney trips.  Its within walking distance from the Parks and if you want to there are also shuttles for the parks.    There was a very friendly staff person name Giselola(not sure if I have the spelling right?) that helped with the food in the morning and was very friendly.    I would recommend this hotel and stay there again.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights end of April.  Was a great place to stay with 2 kids (9yr & 12yr), kids had a separate bedroom with bunks, set of drawers to put their belongings & their own bathroom, so it was nice for us parents to be on the other side of the lounge/kitchen area in our own space with comfy bed & our own bath/shower.  This place is definitely not flash & is a bit dated, but was clean & tidy & was fine for our family who spent most of our time in the theme parks.  Was also great to have a kitchen with fridge.  The complimentary breakfast was great, each night they also had some sort of free dinner option, one night we were there it was loaded fries, another it was hotdogs etc.  we only used this our 1st night as we checked in late, but great if you want to save on
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. I’m glad that you were able to use the fully equipped kitchen to prepare snacks for your family. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Our family of four had a great time staying at this property located just a short shuttle trip from Disney resort.  It is clean, we'll maintained, and staffed by courteous and helpful folks, including some shining stars of service like Edith who each day helped us avoid unwanted food allergens by happily finding and sharing the product ingredients for each breakfast item our child with severe food allergies intended to eat.  While the property does not yet maintain a binder of all the ingredient lists of foods served, Edith often saved the day by finding the packaging so that we could review the ingredients and make our decisions about what to eat.  I am hopeful that such good service and customer orientation are well rewarded as it has certainly been a key to our returning each
Manager Response: I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people like Edith working at this hotel. Our staff genuinely cares about our guest's experience and we will always go out of our way to ensure that every guest has a great memorable stay. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable rooms and exceptional staff!
Summary: My family of five was on a Disney trip with a large group. The staff were wonderful before and during our stay. The breakfasts were impressive! Even with a large group there was plenty of food. We took advantage of the manager's reception a couple of times and it was enough for us for dinner. There were plenty of activities for all the kids with the pool, patio area, and basketball/ping pong area. Our room and the beds were comfortable. Having a full kitchen was an added bonus. We used the shuttle to Disneyland. It was on time, easy to use, and inexpensive. We all enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: I could not agree more. We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 5 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. The people that work at this hotel are an exceptional group and greatly appreciate you noticing their efforts. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great stay at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort!
Summary: We found this to be a cut above your typical Residence Inn.   This is a very attractive hotel in a great location (although a bit far to walk to Disneyland--you will probably want to take either a cab or the shuttle).  We got upgraded to a larger suite with a nice kitchen, and from our floor we could see some of the fireworks.  What distinguishes this hotel above all is the extraordinary service-- the front desk workers were uniformly top notch, polite, knowledgeable and accommodating (one surprised me by even calling me by name the next day after checkin).  We would certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. We are delighted that you found our staff helpful and friendly. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Kids enjoy the breakfast buffet which great money saver. Room for family of 5 in two room suite.  Shuttle bus outside hotel and cheaper then parking at resorts.  Hotel staff very helpful.   Would recommend for any one with family and kids. Pool and basketball court was hit one night
Manager Response: Thank you for fantastic review! We're thrilled that you and your family had such a great time on your vacation with us. Our newly renovated pool is heated year round it’s great to see so many families enjoying it. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland.

Summary: We have made several trips to Disneyland and stayed in a variety of hotels in Anaheim. Our most recent experience (April 2014) was at the Marriott Residence Inn. This is by far our favorite. We had 7 in our party. Our room accommodated 8 and had two bathrooms. Facility was very clean. Breakfasts were great. Staff was super friendly and helpful. Shuttle in front of hotel to the Park. Nice pool. Across the street from a Super Target. Room had a small kitchenette, so you can cook your own meals if you feel inclined. You can't go wrong with this choice!
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 5 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.  Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We hope to see you as a guest again very soon.

Summary Heading: Great Stay at the Residence Inn
Summary: Had a great stay at the Residence Inn, convenient shuttle service to and from the Disneyland Parks.  Hot buffet breakfast in the morning saved us a lot of time and money. Target was located across the street so we were able to get groceries and cook in the kitchen in our room. Nothing to complain about.
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a great family vacation. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and making us part of the special event. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your suite. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary Heading: Great value for a family trip to Disneyland!
Summary: We chose  booked a 1 bedroom suite and to our delight we were given a free upgrade to a 2 bedroom suite upon check in. Our daughter slept on one of the twin beds in the 2nd room and our son slept in a pack n play in the living room. The master bedroom was quite roomy and comfortable. We loved that we had a full kitchen and plenty of space to put our things and still have room for the stroller and to walk around.  The free breakfast was a good value and sufficient for us to fill up on before going to Disneyland. We chose to walk to Disneyland,  but next time we would opt for a taxi which is about $9.  There is also a shuttle stop right by the hotel which was about $5/adult and $3/child I believe. It runs twice an hour and makes stops along the way.  The pool area was very nice
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We have a rotating menu that changes daily. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future.

Summary Heading: fun trip accentuated by great accomodations
Summary: The hotel is great.  So helpful for a family on a budget to have a kitchen, as well as an awesome breakfast, AND a manager's social with food in the evening.  The staff was helpful with requests about just about everything, and one night, we even came 'home' to a package of really yummy cookies!  There is laundry on site, the pool area and lobby were spacious for our large group to spend time together when we weren't doing the parks.  We were extra blessed to have a room with a view of the fireworks over Disney, even on the nights we didn't go!  My only issue was that the stairs exited outside of the building and so were harder to find going up, which made the elevators busier than they needed to be...and that was a challenge when the elevators were shut off because of the
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We believe we are the ideal choice for anyone visiting Disneyland and are happy that you agree. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: I frequent Residence Inns because I have a large family.  The rooms are of a good size and the fact that they offer free breakfast (and during M-F an evening social hour) saves me money on meals.  They are located very close to Disneyland so it is very convenient.  That's probably all the good things I can say about this place.  Service was ok.  I requested extra towels and a flat sheet and I had to place a follow up call after 2 hours.  I did receive my items and they did send us up cookies and a nice note of apology for the wait.    Our second night we arrived back to the hotel to the smell of sewage and fried fish?  Not sure what was going on but it wasn't very pleasant.    To top it off my daughter and I woke up to bites on our bodies.  We don't own any pets.  I did report
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am aware of the concerns with your room and assure you that the experiences you had at our hotel are the exception and not the norm at our hotel. Our housekeeping staff was advised of your room concerns and have been addressed.  I would like to offer my sincerest apologies for the inconveniences you experienced. I appreciate your being our guest and providing the feedback on your stay. We hope to regain your trust and serve you and your daughter again in the future.

Summary: We were on a school band trip from Washington state and stayed here for one week.  The staff couldn't do enough for us.  Everything we asked for they did with a smile!  So accommodating.  The breakfasts were great and plentiful with lots of choices.  I would definitely stay here anytime when in Anaheim.  Great job!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and more importantly, thank you for being our guest. We certainly enjoyed having the band with us and we are thrilled that your experience was such a positive one. I know a lot of time, effort and research went into choosing the right hotel for your trip and I am very pleased we met your expectations. We will be looking forward to your next trip to the Anaheim area!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at this hotel as a family of eight. There was plenty of room in our two bedroom suit. Staff was very friendly and accommodating. I'd definitely look into staying here or another Marriott hotel in other areas.  We enjoyed the daily breakfast, and for our family, we thought there was enough choices and variety. Always fresh fruit, eggs, sausage, potatoes, waffles (with yummy toppings), yogurt, granola, oatmeal, muffins, bagels, toast, English muffins, ect... I'm sure I'm missing something as there was so much to choose from! We always left full and it kept us satisfied until a late lunch in the park.  They do not have lotion in the rooms, but if you ask for it, they will deliver.  Yes, they only have two elevators, but I didn't find the wait too terribly
Manager Response: I am so pleased to hear that we were able to accomodate you and your family so well. Our hotel is known for its large rooms and with the daily breakfast, makes for a very good value, especially with a large family such as yours. I am very pleased that the accomodations, location and staff service met your family's expectations. We hope to see you and your family again on your next trip to the park!

Summary: Outstanding service and assistance from front desk staff, breakfast and evening snack staff, housekeeping, and sales manager.   Our band reserved a block of rooms after reviewing, contacting, and interviewing over 30 area hotels.  This hotel was the most receptive to our needs.  Sales Manager Angel went above and beyond! Not enough elevators, however, and stairs located inconveniently.  Also, for a family, it would be nice for the parents to have a room to themselves and kids' sleeping areas separate.
Manager Response: We were very happy to have you and your group as our guests. I am pleased that your stay with us was so enjoyable and I will certainly pass on your comments to Angel in our Sales Department. We look forward to seeing you and your group again in the future!

Summary: We have stayed here several times...but the last 3 or 4 times lest a bad taste in my mouth....a lot of times there is not enough parking...if you come back too late there is no parking available, and since my husband is handicapped...never enough handicapped and also never enough regular parking. Second of all. never try to stay another day!! Twice I wanted to stay another day, checked the website found there was rooms available for I think it was 169 a night, went down and they refused to honor the 169 till I pulled up the website and showed them the price. Finally after about 15 minutes and a lot of discussion they honored the price. That as in November. In January again, wanted to stay another 2 days. I was told it would be 299 per day...I explained to them that I only paid
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review of our hotel. By the experiences you shared, I can certainly understand the frustration you experienced. Myself and my staff certainly strive to make every guest experience a pleasant one. From your review, we evidently did not meet your expectations during your last stay. I would like to offer my sincerest apologies for the inconveniences you experienced. Customer service is our number one priority and welcome speaking with our guests to ensure the best possible stay and hope to regain your trust. Thank you again for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you on a future trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Most everything about our stay was great - loved the room, breakfast, convenience of the Disney shuttle, etc.  Only two things to be aware of - they only have two elevators.  Super-busy hotel, so you spend a lot of time with a lot of other people waiting for the elevators.  Nothing I can see that can be done about that, just be aware.  Disney shuttle is convenient, but when we were there, it was always PACKED - standing room only and had to leave people behind in certain cases.  Staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to share your review. I am pleased to hear that your stay with us was so enjoyable and that the room, breakfast and shuttle met your family's needs. I can certainly understand the concerns about the occupancy on the shuttle. I will certainly convey these concerns to the shuttle operator. Thank you again for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you and your family again on your next trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: We where here for a quick weekend trip to Disneyland.  The staff where great and the room was clean. Breakfast was very nice and had a large selection of warm foods and fruit.  My kids enjoyed the make you own waffles ( sorry about the mess).  Overall a great stay and I plan on returning to this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experiences with other TripAdvisor members!  I am very pleased to hear that you and your family had such a great stay and that the waffles, hot breakfast and fresh fruit were such a hit with you and your family. Thank you for being our guest and I sincerely hope that we get to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Stayed here for two nights. It was a last minute trip for business so paying rack rate hurt! Plus a $100 pet fee. No complaints on cleanliness, staff or location though. After we left I thought I had left behind some receipts. The front desk had someone go right up to the room to check. Saved me a lot of time. The other guest were all so nice. No smoke smell and comfy pillows.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. Our staff works hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary: Residence Inn is my hotel of choice, but have to say I was slightly disappointed with this one.    We stayed here for 5 nights in Feb and here are the good and the bad:  GOOD: excellent service & staff, everyone is really friendly and helpful.  Great location, within walking distance from convention.  Free Food, breakfast and Mgr's reception.  Free WIFI  BAD:  Room was a little smaller than we're used to compared to other residence inns.   Bathroom & Vanity area next to it was really tight.   Free wifi in the room was weak, constantly getting dropped.  We were on the 7th floor so not sure if this makes a difference.   Free breakfast was almost the same everyday.... Potatoes, sausages & waffles.  not much varieties.   would be nice if they can do french toast or pancakes at least
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. I am pleased to know that our staff was helpful, friendly and attentive. I feel fortunate to have a great team at this hotel.   I am sorry to hear that the internet performance was not consistant for you. Our service provider has been contacted to check our system and ensure proper connectivity for our guests. I appreciate your feedback on our breakfast as well. We will certainly look at options to increase the options available to our guests.  Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to see you again.

Summary: 2 nights, fantastic $99/nt. to visit UC Irvine nearby, thanks to Angel & the UC Irvine rate!  2 queen beds, one bedroom suite w/the kitchen. Myself & my 3 teens (17,15,12). We had plenty of room w/a great pool view.   Great customer service from the front desk staff. Always a hello, have a great day, or how are you when we walked by the counter.   Evening snacks 5:30-7:30 M-Th. Wed night -loaded fries, w/chili, tomatoes, delicious guacamole, shredded cheese, hot cheese sauce, salad & drinks. All complimentary! .  Lobby is comfortable w/sofa seating lounge & large table/chairs area where guests eat breakfast, & there's a kid section too. Outdoor covered patio w/fire pit, 2 bbqs, one hoop bball court, ping pong table, pool, kiddie pool & spa.(balls/paddles at front desk/free)
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We're thrilled that you and your familyhad such a great time with us. Thank you for noticing the customer service of our staff members. My staff and I are committed to making every guest's stay a memorable and rewarding one. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: We stayed in this hotel during our Disneyland vacation. The bedroom had 2 queen beds (comfortable) and a pull out sofa bed in the separate Living Room. The kitchen had stainless steel appliances and was very clean. The maid service was awesome. There is a free breakfast buffet and we all enjoyed it. The Managers reception was also very good (Sloppy Joes, salad and rice krispie squares.  We rode the shuttle to Disneyland each day (the stop was next door over at the Hyatt). We had a late flight out of SNA so they held our bags for us.  I should say our family consists of 2 adult daughters (21 and 23) and me the Mom  :) We had a very memorable trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. I am very pleased to hear that you and your daughters had such a great time with us. The included brakfast and social hour are very popular with our guests as well as the shuttle service to Disneyland.   I hope we get to see you and your family again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This is for all the people who work at the Residence Inn Garden Grove.  We have just arrived home after an 8 day stay at this Hotel and we had a wonderful stay.  Firstly Mr. Frank Palacios the Manager has a lot to be proud of with the way this Hotel is run.  We emailed ahead asking if we could have a quiet suite as my husband does not sleep well and away from the basketball courts.  He emailed back and said he had requested this on our booking.  We got the suite that was on the 8th floor away from any noise, so thank you Frank.  The front desk staff both day and night, the kitchen staff for breakfast each morning, cleaning staff who cleaned our suite  were all great.  Easy to get to anywhere from this Hotel whether by bus or cab was great also and front desk staff were willing
Manager Response: Thank you for fantastic review! We're thrilled that you and your husband had such a great time on your vacation with us. Thank you for noticing the effort of our staff members. My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. I’m glad to hear you enjoyed your wedding anniversary.

Summary Heading: Always a Great time at the Residence Inn!
Summary: 3/6-3/9 Just spent three nights at the hotel and thoroughly enjoyed it. The price is very reasonable, especially when you throw in free breakfast buffet. The staff is very friendly, and go out of there ways to make you feel comfortable,  We have been traveling to the Disneyland area for many years and we have finally found a hotel that we can truly call home away from home.   The rooms are very clean and the beds were comfortable.  The daily free breakfast is the best I've had at a hotel. There is a huge assortment: eggs, (bacon or sausage on alternate days), pancakes, hash browns, plus the standard bagels, toast, cereal, fruit, etc. We had a nice filling breakfast every morning before heading over to Disneyland.   Overall, great value and comfortable stay. This place lives up
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We believe we are the ideal choice for anyone visiting Disneyland and are happy that you agree. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Avoid at all costs!!! Sewer smell and theft.
Summary: Our family of 6 stayed at this hotel in late February 2014 during a family trip to Disneyland. We are seasoned travellers and have travelled the world and never have we been treated the way we were treated at this resort. Firstly we had paid for a two bedroom room for the first night of our stay because the one bedroom for the others nights wasn't available. When we got there they said they could put us in the one bedroom for the whole stay which sounded great because we didn't want to move our stuff from room to room. However even though we moved to the smaller room they told us they still had to charge us for the two bedroom which made no sense. I didn't make a big deal but when we got to our room I could not have been more disappointed. The smell from the room was disgusting.
Manager Response: We apologize that you had such an experience and assure you that this is not the typical stay at this hotel. We were all surprised and disappointed that we let the issue with your garbage disposal get to that point. . We expect to provide a clean and comfortable suite with everything in working order and apologize that this was not your experience. I’m sorry that your daughter doll went missing while you were a guest at my hotel. An internal investigation has been done and a thorough inspection of the room has been completed. However, the Ariel doll was not found. I would like to request that you please double check your belongings to ensure it did not return home with you. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Stayed here on relatively short notice after cancelling a reservation at another hotel after reading some unflattering reviews. So happy they had space for us here. The staff is amazing. And not in that fake nice way. They are truly nice people and take a huge amount of pride in their work. From the maintenance people to the front desk to housekeeping and the women who put out the amazing breakfast buffet. They have left us extra towels in our room and an extra duvet appeared for our kids to snuggle up on the couch. The toiletries are aplenty and when we requested a kettle, a brand new one still in the box appeared. It is good old-fashioned customer service and this hotel is worth every penny. Our room is comfortable and clean and the beds have crisp white linens. We read about
Manager Response: I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people working at this hotel. Our staff genuinely cares about our guest's experience and we will always go out of our way to ensure that every guest has a great memorable stay. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: #1 hotel to stay at when visiting Anaheim area!
Summary: This hotel was beyond impressive. It definitely looks well kept. The lobby was very spacious and accommodating, the rooms are big and helped sleep up to 6 people comfortably. We were a group of 9 girls spread between two rooms and we all had enough space to relax out, get cleaned up and hang out without stepping all over each other. The team at this Residence Inn is always smiling and willing to give you their full attention with any request or question. Amanda, the young lady at check in, was amazingly polite, always smiling and helped each of my friends find their rooms as they all arrived on their own time. The breakfast staff did a great job of keeping warm food coming out throughout the breakfast service and were quick to help with special requests of other guests.  Our
Manager Response: We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website! The comments regarding the great customer service is very kind and we're thankful you had a great stay.

Summary Heading: Great hotel very close to Disneyland
Summary: Great property..............great service................great breakfast buffet.  Had our family of 12 at this location for the past 5 days.  The staff went out of their way to make us feel comfortable and appreciated.  Both family suites were very comfortable, and the pool area was a plus.  We will be back!
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a great family vacation. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and making us part of the special event. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your suite. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary Heading: The only place to go for a Disney trip, hands down best property with value and customer service
Summary: If you're going to make a trip to Disney, this is the best hotel by far with its value and all the amenities provided.  The rooms are very large, well kept, clean and I like that they include a calendar which has all the events such as social hour BBQ's and much more on the refrigerator.  The communication is very prompt when asking for requests, and their staff is by far one of the best I've come across while traveling to different hotels.  Frank, the general manager, is the most down to earth, genuine and hospitable person as he always goes out of his way to make sure everyone in the hotel is taken care of.  He constantly is active doing multiple jobs to make sure this property truly delivers in guest satisfaction.  I can't say enough good things about this property, and we
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. I absolutely agree with you we do have a great staff and we are fortunate to have each and every one of them.

Summary: We had a great week here with the family. Hotel is well run and set up for families. The breakfast each morning was a nice start to the day. Lourdes B. and the other folks running the buffet have amazing patience and somehow keep the food stocked and the tables clean with all the families rolling through eager to get to the parks. Thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being our guest as well as for taking the time to write a review of our hotel and our associates. I feel very fortunate to have such a great staff and will share your kind comments with them. Lourdes, and our entire breakfast staff, work very hard to ensure a great start to the day for each and every one of our guests.  Thank you again for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you and your family on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We decided to stay in this hotel for a family trip to Disneyland and it was the right choice.  I was there with my wife, mother-in-law and 3 kids and we had a wonderful stay.  The room was a two bedroom suite and was perfect.  The bunkbeds were super fun for the kids to sleep in and the two bathrooms made getting ready a breeze.  It is so close to the park and the Convention Center you could probably walk to both.  Only 3 blocks from the Woody parking lot was also great.  If you park there, the bus drops you off right at the entrance to the park and you don't have to walk through downtown disney if you don't want to.  It was perfect for the end of the day with sleeping children.  The breakfast was amazing and my favotite part was that they would come around and give the kids
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. The people that work at this hotel are an exceptional group and greatly appreciate you noticing their efforts. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your suite. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary: I travelled with 2 children and 2 other adults, we had a 1 bedroom suit (2 double beds in a room and a pull out couch in lounge) for our first visit and then after a trip to Vegas stayed in a two bedroom suit. Both rooms were excellent, fully functional kitchen, lots of space, clean, comfy and nice warm feel. The two bedroom has two bathrooms and great to have the kids in their own room so would def book this one again. No noise in the room (except for our kids!), great view poolside. Breakfasts were fab and exceeded our expectations especially after reading some of the reviews. Make your own waffles, with real choc and cream, hot drinks and cold drinks to boot, hot breakie and cereals - for the price you pay excellent variety and quality. There was always a table free and the
Manager Response: I’m so excited to hear you wouldn’t stay anywhere else. We want to earn your business and have you stay every time you visit the area. You are absolutely right about the value and money that can be saved by enjoying our complementary hot breakfast buffet and evening meals. I absolutely agree with you; we do have a great staff and we are fortunate to have each and every one of them. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary: Fabulous stay for a quick Disney holiday. We were surprise upgraded to the 2 bedroom kids suite. It was fantastic. Bunks and beds comfortable, kitchen well equipped. And so easy with the target across the road. I would definitely book this in future. Everyone was friendly and more than helpful.
Manager Response: We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future. Thank you for noticing the effort of our staff members. My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon

Summary: Simply awesome. We had phenomenal experience at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort, the 2-bedroom suite was the perfect size, not huge, not tiny, the right size and design, perfect for my family. But nothing I can say about the building and the accommodations can compare to how the staff treated during our stay, they were AWESOME! Just awesome, Highly highly highly recommended! We have season passes to the park, and will only use this hotel from now on.
Manager Response: I definitely agree with you we are great for families. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is the best value in Anaheim. Our staff works hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary: I last reviewed the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area/Garden Grove in October, 2013.  I booked another stay commencing on January 19, 2014 for one week.  It was excellent.  I arrived about 1.5 hours early on the Sunday of the long weekend and was very pleased to be able to check into my room immediately.  The staff recognized me at the front desk and welcomed me back by first name.  The room was clean and the view excellent.  I had a particularly busy schedule prior to visiting Garden Grove so my master plan was to just relax in my room for the first full day and I used the "door hangar" to tell the staff that "no service was required" for my first day.  Well, after about 4 hours of relaxing and looking out of my living room window at the view of the mountains, sunshine, and The
Manager Response: Keith thank you for taking the time to write this review. I absolutely agree with you we do have a great staff and we are fortunate to have each and every one of them. I’m glad that we were able to check you into your room early get you a head start on your vacation. Can’t wait to have you back!

Summary: We recently spent a weekend in the 2 bedroom suite with our 2 year old daughter and her grandparents.  The rooms are large and clean, you don't feel as though you are squeezed into a hotel room.  The kitchen area is functional and stocked with dishes.  The one thing that was missing was a kettle, but there was a coffee maker for coffee drinkers.  We stayed on the top floor (8th) and the road noise at night was incredible.  I found it difficult to get a good nights sleep with the constant roar of traffic.  I would have expected a hotel to have soundproof windows or at least sound reducing.  There was no noticeable noise from other rooms/ hallways within the hotel.  The breakfast selection is limited, and when we were there it was chaos.  I think the staff have difficulties
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being our guest and taking the time to write a review about your experiences. I am very sorry to hear that your stay with us did not meet your expectations. While I can fully understand your disappointment, I would like to assure you that your experiences were not typical. I am truly sorry for the impression you had of our hotel.   Everything we do is aimed at providing our guestswith an excellent hotel experience and your feedback is extremely valuable.  We truly appreciate you sharing your thoughts with us so that we may continue to deliver exceptional service in the future.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel with our four children (15, 13, 9, 7) during the week between Christmas and New Year's and were so pleased with our choice.  It is a perfect choice for a family stay. The hotel staff are pleasant and accommodating, the rooms were spotless, and the breakfast buffet tasty and plentiful! Our youngest child has food allergies, so we appreciated the full kitchen and made good use of it while we were there. The pool, basketball court, and games room were a hit with the children and there were always plenty of towels on hand. Located about three km from Disneyland, it was a straight, easy walk to the parks. The shuttle for us would have cost $32/day, so we walked. We had a fast pass for the 10:00 World of Color show one night, so we took the public
Manager Response: Thank you so much for having been our guest. I am very happy to hear that you and your family had such a great time with us and that our staff gave you such great suggestions. There are not very many places where you can usher in the New Year with your toes in the sand, but sunny Southern California is definitely one of them!   Thank you again for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you and your family again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed one night at the hotel while in Anaheim for a hockey game, not Disney. After flying cross country and driving down from LAX it was a nice touch to have full coffee service available all day. The check in was easy any and fast and the front desk staff was great. The two br suite was very clean and spacious and gave us room to spread out and relax. There were only 3 of us but definitely would work for more people for a longer stay. The manager's reception dinner  and full breakfast are great touches adding value to the stay. The only downside of both, and this is NOT the hotel's fault, is too many unsupervised small children at the food and drink stations and carrying and spilling all over the place and being underfoot.  Overall it was a great experience and great value
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to review our hotel. I am pleased to hear that you and your party had such a great time with us. As you pointed out, Anaheim has more to offer than simply the park with NHL and MLB games so close to the hotel. Hopefullly, on your next trip to the area you will be able to take in a baseball game as well! Thank you again for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: After an amazing stay a couple years ago, it was a no-brainer on which hotel we'd choose for our Disney vacation this year. Once again, we were pleased beyond measure! The friendly staff, clean large rooms, evening reception and amazing breakfasts, great pool, close proximity to Disney... there's nothing this hotel doesn't do right! Thanks again and we can't wait to be back!  On a side note, we did have a bit of trouble with the ART shuttle... the drivers kept missing our stop, even after we spoke directly to them and pulled the cord. Finally got the hang of it the last couple days and just stood up and hollered until they stopped! Lol!
Manager Response: I am thrilled that we were able to have you and your family at our hotel again! Thank you so much for being our guest. I am glad you found our staff, rooms, evening social hour, breakfast and pool as exceptional now as it was during your first stay.   We thank you for being our guests and look forward to seeing you and your family at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort again in the future!

Summary: My family and I have visited Disneyland about once a year for the last 7 years.  I had always stayed at another Marriott but was using points so I tried this one.  Best decision ever!  Close to the park, clean rooms, great complimentary breakfast and dinner and the best staff anywhere.  Very clean food area with multiple attendants always on hand for any special needs.  One night we walked in from the pool and my 5 year old was shivering and they went and brought him some hot chocolate.  The variety and quality of the food was very good.  My kids loved the huge breakfast choices, something for everyone.  The pool area was nice, plenty of chairs and tables.  It has a shallow wading pool for my 3 year old and a full size pool for the older kids.  There is a sauna as well but I
Manager Response: I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people like Bill working at this hotel. Our staff genuinely cares about our guest's experience and we will always go out of our way to ensure that every guest has a great memorable stay. Both our daily breakfast buffet and the evening manager’s reception are an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: This hotel was fantastic, all the staff are helpful, friendly, nothing was too much trouble ! I reviewed this hotel and choose it from tripadvisor, and all the good reports aren't wrong. I stayed with my husband and children for a week in December we did Disneyland and some shopping trips based out of here, the hotel was clean & comfortable. We had a 2 bedroom suit with 2 bathrooms and it worked perfectly ! The room had a kitchen, if you require one, everything was there! The breakfast the hotel supply was terrific ( coming from Australia the kids thought waffles for breakfast was a real treat ! ) But also plenty of cereal, fruit, eggs - perfect !  The bus/ shuttle to disney isn't long at all and a great way to have a chat & meet people from all around the world in the 10min or
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experiences with other TripAdvisor members! Our entire staff works diligently to ensure that all of our guests needs and expectations are tended to. I am very pleased to hear that you and your family had such a great stay and that the waffles were such a hit with you and your family. Thank you for being our guest and I sincerely hope that we get to see you and your family again on your next trip to California!

Summary Heading: I give it a 4.5 stars for a family hotel
Summary: We were at a different hotel and were cramped and someone mentioned the Residence Inn so we looked at a room and decided to move here as it was great.  It is designed for families and is a great choice.  You get 2 bedrooms, each with its own bathroom.  The kids room either has bunk beds or 2 single beds.  There is a living room/dining room/kitchen in-between the 2 bedrooms.  For a family going to Disney or the surrounding area this is the hotel for you.
