There were 7 of us so we had 2 different bookings, one had 2 adults and 2 kids in a 2 room apartment and the other had 2 adults and one kid, also in a 2 room apartment.  Each bedroom had its own TV and the living had a TV as well so everyone was happy being able to watch their own shows when we relaxed.  The kitchen made it easy
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like you. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website!

Summary: Stayed here at the end of our world trip to spend the last 4 days at Disneyland.  It was a 1 bedroom, self catering apartment with a clean bathroom, comfortable big bed and ok sofa bed. We didn't have a chance but the pool area looks like a good place to spend a few hours on a warm day also. The kitchen is fully equipped and Target is across the road which also has a supermarket in it :) The hotel offers a complimentary shopping service where you list the items you need and they go buy it whilst you are out.  The cost is simply added to your total at the end. The shuttle for Disneyland stops right out the front, regular schedule through to the last pick-up from Disneyland at 11pm each night.   Breakfast is included each morning and a couple of nights a week the manager offers a
Manager Response: I definitely agree with you we are great for families. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is the best value in Anaheim. Our staff works hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary: This was one of the our stops on our great southern California adventure. I was travelling with my hubby, and three children (12, 10 and a toddler almost two),. We stayed at the RI in San Diego as well. We had booked a two bedroom suite. The amount of space we got was ample, just felt like a whole apartment, my little one had enough space to run around and play, we had three sets of TV ( which was a bonus because if you can imagine the kids). The breakfast was good, with different select items everyday. My kids are picky eaters but they always found something to eat. The Hotel and rooms were clean and friendly staff We stayed for three nights.  The only complaint i had was for the amount of people, which was on our reservation, we only had one small bottle of shampoo and
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Having three televisions in the suite allows everyone in the family to watch their favorite show. Thank you for recommending us hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Stayed here as part of a 1 week Southern California fall vacation with my family (wife and 2 kids, aged 10 and 6) and it was the perfect hotel for us.   We had the 2 bedroom king suite which included a full kitchen, 2 bathrooms with bath/shower combos, bunk beds for the kids, and a nice little living room area. For the very reasonable price it was fantastic value for money. The room was clean and the maid service was spot-on, my only complaint was the heat/AC system was quite loud. There was a huge vent/air intake in the bedroom that was super loud when the heat or AC was on. We had to turn off the environmental controls to sleep. Could be an issue if it's super hot and you want AC.   Location is also great, a short distance from Disneyland and close to both the I5 and 22
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Our beautiful California weather makes our pool area a popular family amenity. Our staff makes a strong effort to keep the pool area clean and well maintained always plenty of pool towels out there. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future.

Summary Heading: One of best Residence Inn's around. Best breakfast experience.
Summary: Christmas week saw a lot of traffic at the hotel but it didn't stop them rom delivering everything that we could ask for. The staff were fantastic, pleasant, attentive to all requests and needs (extra pillows, blankets, etc.). The facilities and room were extremely clean and quiet, despite all the traffic.   Breakfasts are always nice at RI hotels, but this hotel exceeded expectations. Seems like there was more food to choose from, and more beverages (both in the morning and in the evening when returning from Disney), and there were 6 or 8 waffle machines which allowed us to make waffles without waiting for machines to become available (even with a large breakfast crowd). The dining area was very large with lots of tables/chairs as well as stools and counters to choose from.
Manager Response: I’m glad to hear we exceed your expectations and made the list of top Residence Inn’s. Our hot daily breakfast buffet offers a variety of food like scramble eggs, sausage, fresh fruit and hot oatmeal. The most popular item on the breakfast buffet is our waffle station were you can create your own waffle and top it off with some whip cream or strawberries. Thank you for noticing the efforts of our wonderful cleaning staff we are all committed to making the experience of every guest a memorable one. Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We just got back from our Disneyland holiday and stayed at this hotel. We arrived early on December 24 and got into our rooms right away. Santa came to visit on December 25 and Mrs Claus visited on December 26. Staff was friendly and Helpful. Balloons were handed out  to the kids. The kids enjoyed cartoons at breakfast while eating waffles they made on there own.  Breakfast was really good and there was something new everyday. It was a great start to our days. Room was comfterable with a full kitchen. Needs a little updating as there is some wear and tear. The shuttle service was inexpencive and always great service with friendly helpful drivers. Enjoyed our holiday and look forward to visiting again and will stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: I’m glad to hear that you family got to meet Santa and Mrs. Claus. My staff and I had a great time handing out candy canes and watching all those kids eyes light up with excitement. We want to earn your business and have you stay every time you visit the area. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Great for families going to Disneyland and want a kitchen
Summary: If we were to go to DL again, I would use this hotel again. Its about 1 mi from DL and too far to walk, but read review for why in our situation it made sense.  Pros- Very nice, clean room with full kitchen which was a big deal for us because my daughter has food allergies. We were able to make dinners and lunches in, which also helps on cost.  For those of us who could have breakfasts-they were very good and a lot of variety and choices-much better than the standard continental or yuck egg BFs most inns serve. Price was competitive and is really cheap if you make dinners in. Pool was warmest pool I've ever been in at a hotel minus Hawaii. Spa was nice, too. Staff was friendly and helpful. ART takes you to Disneyland from front of hotel. Only a couple of quick stops- 1st on
Manager Response: I definitely agree with you we are great for families. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. There is a small fee to use our business center however printing boarding passes is complementary. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future.

Summary: We stayed at this property August 25 and went to California Adventure the next day.  Check in was quick and easy.  We had a higher up room any from the elevators.  It was nice and quiet.  Our favorite part was that the kids had their own room with bunk beds, their own TV and their own bathroom!  It wasn't a big kids rooms, but it worked just fine for them.  And the kids room was on the opposite side of the hotel room - so far enough a way to not disturb them.  Our room had a good sized bed, comfortable, and our own TV as well.  We loved the full kitchen and good sized fridge.  In the morning the free breakfast was great!  Homemade waffles, eggs, sausage, cereal, fruit - everything you could want.  Staff person was great in recommending places to eat for dinner.  We didn't use
Manager Response: I definitely agree with you we are great for families. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is the best value in Anaheim. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: 5 Star Service and an Outstanding Stay!
Summary: My family and I had a wonderful stay at this property as we went to Disneyworld and California Adventure for a couple of days prior to the Christmas Holiday.  Check-in was quick and easy and the front desk team member was very pleasant.  The hotel was well maintained and our room was clean and comfortable.  What stood out to us was that every staff member we encountered (housekeeper, maintenance, breakfast hostess, front desk, management) went out of their way to greet us, hold elevator doors open for us, and make our stay pleasant.  One morning I made a compliment to one of the breakfast hostesses who was diligently working to keep breakfast items stocked and fresh telling her that she was doing a good job.  She said with a smile, "Thank you.  I love my job".  During breakfast
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. We are centrally located with many dinning options with in walking distance. We are thrilled that you found our staff helpful and friendly.  Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: We stayed here in November for a Disneyland Trip for two nights. We stayed in a two bedroom suite as there was six of us. It was reasonably well appointed and clean. One of the rooms had bunk beds which the kids loved. Check in was easy and quick. The drive to Disneyland was only a few minutes away. We would definitely stay here gain.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to post this review. Sounds like you had a great time in our spacious two bedroom suite. The low score of two does not reflect the positive comments you posted. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future.

Summary: Stayed here the other night as a Category 5 Reward stay and was pleasantly surprised. Property is definitely newer in an area with a Hyatt, Homewood Suites, Marriott Suites, Hampton Inn, Embassy Suites & Hilton Garden Inn.  Parking is $10/day/car.   Service by the check-in agent was friendly. My request for a room on a higher floor, away from the elevator was honored.  The suite was quiet with a full kitchen, living room, and bedroom. Mattress was comfortable and the toilet was a little off as it seemed to have been leaking?!?  The suite has been remodeled with a stainless steel fridge and flat screen tv.  Breakfast was decent and had a vast selection including real eggs, hard boiled eggs, sausage, waffles, biscuits, along with the regular complimentary items!  Wifi & full
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like you. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website!

Summary: A great hotel. We had a two bedroom suite, with a King bed in one room, with its own bathroom, and two Queen beds in the other room, with its own bathroom, and a full kitchen with a nice TV/couch area in between the two.  Although there were lots of kids in the hotel at the time, our room was always quiet.  We were able to cook breakfast in our own room, although there was a breakfast provided, it was quite crowded and chaotic.  I have many food allergies, so this was not something I was interested in anyway.  Some family members did go down to grab fresh fruit to carry with us for the day.   We were about a 2km (1.6 mile) walk from the gates to the Disney park.  We walked there everyday without difficulty.  On the third evening, we took a cab back to the hotel for less than
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review. It's always nice to have a little extra room to unwind after a long day at Disneyland and we're glad that you and your family had the same experience in the two bedroom suite. Having a full kitchen with stove top, oven, and full-size refrigerator is an added value especially for those with special dietary needs. Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Words fail this place just fantastic in particular for families
Summary: My wife, son 18 daughter 12 and myself stayed at the Residence inn for 10 nights from the 7th December.  I do not haved enough superlatives to describe our stay.  I am going to try break my review down into areas that I find valuable. STAFF- the most friendliest, helpfull and welcoming hotel staff we have come accross.  We had travelled on the Carnival Miracle for a week prior and arrived late morning.  Our room was ready and we were able to check in straight away without even asking.  Any request was quickly met with (we only had one a flat remote battery) and you are greated every time you leave or enter the hotel A+. ROOM - We stayed in a 2 bedroom room on the 6th floor with views of the fireworks from Disneyland.  Whilst we were close to Harbor BLVD we heard no traffic and
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from someone that has stayed at our hotel for 10 nights. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family.  Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: Prior to checking in our vehicle was broken into at our previous hotel and some of our luggage was stolen. We arrived super upset and without a stitch of clothing for our 2 children. Alejandra the front desk attendant was awesome!! She was able to check us in a little early and directed us to the most affordable shopping. Our room was spotless and up to date. I don't think I've ever stayed at a cleaner hotel. While there we enjoyed the manager's reception which consisted of 3 full dinners. The first night we enjoyed a nacho bar and a whole build your own ice cream bar. The other night we enjoyed hamburger and hotdogs. This clearly saved us a ton of $$ because we basically only had to pay for lunches. While there we had to deal with insurance issues regarding the break in of our
Manager Response: I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people like Alejandra working at this hotel. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. I’m glad that you enjoyed our newly renovated suites the new stainless steel appliance give the kitchen a clean and contemporary feel. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: First FAMILY (7 of us) trip to Disney Land
Summary: We loved staying at this Residence Inn!  The suite was perfect for our family of 7, even with bunk beds for the boys!  The kids were thrilled and we all had a great time.  The hotel is family friendly, clean and beautiful.  The Breakfasts are superb!   After a full day at Disney or California Adventure we were all ready to go home...and that is what our suite felt like...HOME.    It was the first time we have been able to take our kids to Disney, so it was super special!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review. Whether traveling with a family of 7 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area. Thanks for sharing the pictures!

Summary Heading: The perfect hotel for large families
Summary: We recently stayed here for 6 nights and we are a family with four kids.  This was a great place for us.  We had a suite that had one king bed, two queens, a sofabed and two bathrooms.  Having two bathrooms is essential for us or we wouldn't leave the hotel until late morning.  The room was spacious and very clean and includes a full kitchen. While we found our room on the fourth floor a tad noisy, it wasn't anything we couldn't handle.    Another plus to this hotel is the free hot breakfast every morning.  This is much more than a continental breakfast and has foods such as scrambled eggs, sausage, make your own waffles (seriously, these are the best waffles we've tasted) and a variety of cold cereals, fruits and oatmeal.  The one thing that eeked us out a bit was the communal
Manager Response: I definitely agree with you we are great for families. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is the best value in Anaheim. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Can’t wait to have your family come back hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: My 3 year old already wants to come back.... to the hotel!
Summary: My 3 year old keeps asking when we are going back to the hotel with the bunk beds and for a Mickey TV Waffle breakfast :)    We will definitely return to Disneyland - and definitely to this specific hotel! We have previously stayed at other Marriott hotels when we are in the area - but this one blows the others away!  The front desk staff isn't just nice - they went out of their way to make our stay unforgettable - their recommendations were non-rehearsed and helpful. (Been Platinum Marriott for years, I know the difference!)  We arrived after a 7 hour car ride with 2 kids... and the relief I felt with the front desk was awesome - the room was perfect, the baby's crib was delivered immediately.  The bunk bed room was perfect for the little guy as well. Breakfast had a great
Manager Response: We are glad we made a good impression on your 3 year old. We can’t wait to have him back soon. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is the best value in Anaheim. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website! Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.

Summary: There are so many good things to mention about staying at this Residence Inn.  The beds are heavenly.  The room is quiet from outside and hallway noise.  The employees at the hotel are very attentive and take care of problems immediately.  They have a great breakfast and they always have coffee available.  The pool, jacuzzi, and bbq area are family friendly.  The gym is small but we had no trouble working out because there was usually only one other person in there with us. There is one downside and that is the parking. When the hotel is extremely crowded they have to open the back gate and you have to park in the lot that is very far away. We had to do this twice and it was not fun. We had an issue where someone forgot to tell us the protocol and we had to pay for that parking.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. We are delighted that you found our staff helpful and friendly. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: This was our family's first time at Disneyland. The front desk was wonderful. They made us feel very special. We loved the free breakfast which had a wide variety of protein and carbs as well as fresh fruit! There were times when the kids even got balloons. We loved this place and we will be back.
Manager Response: We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future. Thank you for noticing the effort of our staff members. My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Fantastic!! 3rd time to Disney first time here will be back!
Summary: We normally stay at Howard Johnson accross from Park. It is great for little ones but rooms are dated there. We have a 12 and 14 year old and if I had younger kids again I would come back to Residence INN. We rented a car and was super easy to find paid extra for GPS but was worth it. When we checked in we were greated so warmly by Chantel. She was so friendly and helpful throughout our stay with maps and lots of info she gave us. The hotel is awesome you have a huge area to have a full breakfast buffet that is included. They have a room another room just for smaller kids to sit and watch a disney movie and the screen is as large as the wall thought that was wonderful for families. They have a nice poo and big hot tub was great to have coming back from park. Our son and daughter
Manager Response: I could not agree more. We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 5 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. The people that work at this hotel are an exceptional group and greatly appreciate you noticing their efforts. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We love this hotel! We arrived early and were tired from a very long flight. So we truly appreciate the staff at the front desk for accommodating us early as well. We were three adults and one 5 y.o kid in a two bedroom (each having it's own bathroom and TV) suite. Therefore space was more than ample for us.  We stayed for 6 days. It felt like home away from home. I love the full kitchen! We were able to cook steak and chicken pops we got from Target (which was just across the street). The location of the hotel was more than convenient. It was close to a lot of restaurants and a few blocks away from shopping outlets. The shuttle to and from disneyland was likewise a great plus. But what really made our stay completely enjoyable were the staff. They were all friendly and very
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. We are delighted that you found our staff helpful and friendly. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Good room, a little worn, excellent lobby and pool/recreation area
Summary: Very skeptical of this hotel when we booked it since it's basically shoehorned into the old parking lot of the Hyatt Alicante next door.  With the busy location there is some street noise.  We needed a two bedroom suite for the family - room layout was great but wasn't as clean as other hotels we've visited.  A big issue for us is that the forced air unit is in the master bedroom so it sounds like an airplane taking off every time the A/C comes on.  Room overall was a little worn, ready for some updates.  On the plus side it has a full kitchen with an oven - don't see those in the newer Residence Inn properties.  Lobby is great, breakfast area has a kids area that is very convenient, BBQ/pool/basketball area outside is very inviting.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced during you stay with us, and we thank you for letting us know. Thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back as our guest.

Summary: I took my 3 adults kids to Disneyland the weekend of November 8th. We got a 1 bedroom suite that had 2 queen beds in the bedroom and a sofa sleeper in the living room, full kitchen, even had a dishwasher. I got to the hotel early in the morning ( I knew my room wouldn't be ready) and the friendly staff took our luggage and locked it up for us and we headed to the park which is only a mile away. They had an amazing breakfast that included sausage, eggs, crossaints, waffles, pastries. The hotel is walking distance to Outback Steakhouse, Oggi's Pizza and Brewery, Red Robin and Target. There is a nice size heated pool and hot tub, basketball court and ping pong table. I had called ahead to make a request and I had mentioned that I was coming for my birthday and when I got in the
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience on your recent stay. Our staff goes out of their way on a daily basis to make every stay special. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We hope to see you soon again!

Summary: Stayed here on two separate occasions, my wife and I and our 3 daughters. The Staff are incredible and the manager Bill Evans is great guy who was super helpful. This place is ideal for families who are visiting Disneyland or any other theme parks in the area, it has everything you need.The breakfast is fantastic as we were up early and into the day with minimum fuss, i would recommend the Waffles!! I cooked up some Steaks that I got at Target for dinner one night on the BBQ downstairs and had the Salad with it that the management had put on one night.Bill the even came out and chatted while I cooked, he recommended i become a Marriott rewards member as I travel to Anaheim often for work.Not only will I be back I doubt I'll stay anywhere else in Anaheim.So listen up all you
Manager Response: I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people like Bill working at this hotel. Our staff genuinely cares about our guest's experience and we will always go out of our way to ensure that every guest has a great memorable stay. Both our daily breakfast buffet and the evening manager’s reception are an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: The thermostat kept reverting to 67F and refused to heat the room above 73 (which didn't feel like 73) The bedding is sparse, no quilt, just a thick blanket which isn't up to the task on a cold night (or where the thermostat refuses to heat the room) I was initially placed into a room on the main road, which is noisy well into the night and early next morning.  I raised the issue with the front desk and they were able to quickly move me to a 2 room suite overlooking the parking (and nightly fireworks show!)  Only one elevator worked when I arrived and I saw that the maintenance man was out twice in the week to fix it.  I don't think this is helped when 15+ people try to cram in instead of waiting as happened to me when a group of asian teens were making their way downstairs.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We apologize that you had such an experience and assure you that this is not the typical stay at this hotel. We were all surprised and disappointed that we let the issue with your air conditioning unit get to that point.  We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We have always trusted Residence Inn to provide us with a homestead when on vacation and this was our first stay here at their Anaheim Resort property. Once again it was all good. From the comfortable suite to rest our Disneyland weary bodies to the friendly, helpful staff and great breakfasts each morning we couldn't haven't have asked for better.
Manager Response: We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website!

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights with our family of 6 in a two bedroom family suite. We had 2 adults and 4 young children.  We have travelled to the area 2-3 times a year for the last 10 years to vacation and have stayed at a number of hotels in this area. We were able to get an outstanding rate here thanks to their best rate guarantee (see their website for details). We paid $85/night for a two bedroom, two bathroom family suite. The suite was large and spacious. Fully equipped kitchen was fantastic. Some things have been updated and renovated but some furniture pieces were quite old, worn, and dated. The bunk bed in the kids room was old and dirty. My child dropped her toy behind the bed, I looked over to see garbage and other things that had been dropped by previous guests that
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We pride ourselves in providing our guests with a trouble free stay and unfortunately we fell short this time. I apologize for the inconveniences you and your family experienced. Please be assured that our team takes the feedback seriously and we are making changes to address some of your concerns.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with family
Summary: Great hotel with very friendly service. Booked two-bedroom suite on 8th floor. Great room equipment; very clean.  Pool area also clean and with heated pool no problem to swim in November.  Reception personel was very friendly asking for our special needs.   Breakfast out of big variety with good food; only with plastic plates, forks, etc. a lot of garbage is unnecessarily produced every day which is not very environmental thinking.  But otherwise excellent.
Manager Response: We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Thanks for the 5 star rating we truly appreciate your recommendation. Hope to have you and your family back soon.

Summary: As mentioned in my past reviews, we have stayed at the Residence Inn Marriott Anaheim Resort Area Garden Grove facility many times over the years.   For my latest trip (and I had not been to the facility for nearly exactly a year) I was on my own and I stayed in a corner room facing the pool area.  (I think it was room #711)  The room was suggested to me by Mr. James Hererra and was one of the best I have ever stayed in at the facility.  Over the past year there had been extensive renovations at the facility and my suite was essentially "brand new".  It was clean, spacious, and very quiet with the daily cleaning staff doing an excellent job while I was away.  When I arrived at the front desk to check-in I was thrilled to see that Mr. Walter Maldonado had returned to work at the
Manager Response: Keith thank you for the great review! It’s always a pleasure having you as our guest. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website!

Summary: We stayed in a 2 bedroom, 2 bath, kitchenette suite.  Our family of four had plenty of room to spread out.  We didn't end up using the kitchenette but the fridge was handy to store lots of snacks!  The staff was fantastic.  They helped us with a tv that did not work properly, gave us info on taxis, ect.  Each encounter was friendly and helpful.  Wonderful breakfasts in the morning!  Our room was on the seventh floor and we were able to see the fireworks at Disney each night!  The room was in awesome shape and looked even better than the online photos!  Kim Grabas
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Having a full equipped kitchen is an extra value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: i was so impressed with this hotel, the manager james went out of his way for my daughters 7th birthday, he made it so special.  i was so impressed that im planning to come back and stay first week of december for a disneyland trip!!! thanks so much to james and his staff for making her birthday so special!!!! YOU ROCK!!! The Glidden Family!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. I absolutely agree with you we do have a great staff and we are fortunate to have each and every one of them. I’m glad that we were able to make your daughter’s birthday a little extra special. Can’t wait to have you back!

Summary: As a party of seven we stayed here 6 nights in a 2 bedroom 2 bathroom suite, with a sleeper sofa, our room was comfortable and freshly made up each day, breakfast was served daily down stairs, and there was also an evening meal Monday to Thursday nights which was small but enough, both of which was included in the cost, we also had a hire car and while the web site said parking was $10 a day we were not charged at all. Although it is a fair way away from disneyland, ( we drove each day) there is a range of restaurants and shops within walking distance, target, Walgreen red robin, Taco Bell Pizza Hut etc.
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience on your recent stay. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon

Summary: We just returned from an 8 night stay here. We are a family of 4 and stayed in a room with 2 separate bedrooms. The first bedroom had a king bed, the 2nd room had 2 twins. The twin beds were both very uncomfortable. Each room has its own attached bathroom. One thing to note-the 2nd room/bathroom does not have a closet-just a small dresser. It also does not have a hair dryer. The larger bedroom has both of these though so we just shared. Our room was on the top (8th) floor and overlooked the pool. It was a very quiet location. Parking was easy and we never had an issue finding a spot.  The hotel staff were very friendly. The breakfast was a nice way to start the day. It is very crowded though. The staff does their best to keep it clean and re-stock items as they run out. We used
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future.

Summary: My husband, myself and our 2 boys (ages 4 1/2 and 15 months) stayed at this hotel for a trip to Disneyland. We had a 2 bedroom suite (there was a bunkbed in the 2nd bedroom that both boys adored). The hotel is geared towards kids and Disney. The shuttle stops right outside the hotel and was very prompt and reliable. The room has a full kitchen with a full size refrigerator which is really helpful when travelling with kids. The hotel staff are used to children and the pool and hot tub and kiddie pool were very nice. Our room faced the pool and since we were jetlagged from the East Coast we kept going to sleep very early so noise from the pool was an issue but the pool closes early..so unless you're trying to go to sleep very early (8PM) it shouldn't be a problem.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. I’m glad that you were able to use the fully equipped kitchen to prepare meals, and snacks for your family. I definitely agree with you we are great for families our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is the best value in Anaheim. Thanks for being our guest!

Summary: This is our second stay at the Residence Inn.  The hotel is clean with good services.  Breakfast was very good and the staff helpful.  Having the laundry was helpful and overall we had another great holiday here.   As a tip look out for the alarm clocks as people set them to go off in the middle of the night!!
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like you. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. We hope that you and your family return soon.

Summary: Arrived in Anaheim for first visit to Disneyland. This hotel was wonderful. Anything you wanted or needed they were willing to assist. Two bedroom room provided plenty of room for a family of four.The breakfast buffet was very good and the shuttle to Disneyland made getting back and forth a breeze. The staff was very helpful and went out the way to assist us.The on site laundry also was a big help when traveling. This may not be a 5 star resort, but the cleanliness and the staff were 5 star plus.Thanks for making our first visit to your area a great one.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us during your recent trip to Anaheim. Our housekeeping staff works hard everyday to keep our hotel clean. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your suite. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary: Second stay here it just gets better each time! We stayed here 2 yrs ago & loved it. Going back this time was like going home! Huge % of staff are still there including house keeping. VERY reasonable price. Perfect for a family of 5 we had 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom with 1 king, 2 queen and double fold out couch. Extremely friendly & Helpful! Walter on front desk late pm is wonderful and so helpful, our daughter dropped her iPod & smashed screen he found a place with a good rep to get it fixed for us and was only $50 over night! $170 & 2 weeks in NZ! Free Breakfast a godsend, managers snack at night most nights was dinner my hubby recons it saved us approx $1600 on food! Beautiful food, great pool, recently renovated, CLEAN, excellent laundry facilities. Very close to Disney, target
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 5 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.  Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We hope to see you as a guest again very soon.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for the first time in May '13.  We picked the Residence Inn on past positive experience at other hotels in the chain and we were not disappointed.  We chose a 2-bedroom suite with 1 king and 2 queen beds and it was perfect for our family of 4 adults and 2 toddlers.  Breakfast each morning was pretty extensive and with our family saved us a lot of money.  While we were never back in time to enjoy the evening social hour, the menu looked good.  The location was great!  Close enough to Disneyland but far enough away to get out of the Anaheim madness and just across the street from Target for any last minute needs and to stock our fridge.  What we enjoyed most about the room was the space.  It was large enough so that we all had an area to sit and relax
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. You are absolutely right about the value and money that can be saved by enjoying our complementary hot breakfast buffet and evening meals. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary Heading: Kept our family comfortable and happy
Summary: We spent 6 nights here Oct 12-18 and overall we are big Residence Inn fans. This hotel was generally good/average. Our first impression of the staff upon check-in was they were polite, but not overly welcoming, probably since there are so many amusement park people coming and going they get dazed. We got our room and it was perfect for our family. Everything was clean. The hair dryer was broken and we got a temporary loaner. The halls seemed a bit grungy and there were obvious signs of wear and tear on the place. No big deal but it is noticeable. One of the 2 elevators was out of commission for the first 2 days and the wait times were pretty outrageous and frustrating. Quite a few guest complaining amongst each other. But the second elevator was fixed by Monday and it made a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review. We are always looking to improve the service to our guest and we will take your suggestions to help us get better. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future hope you have an even better experience next time.

Summary: I wanted to thank you for the wonderful stay your Inn provided for our vacation. We had a two room/two bath suite from 10/17-10/20. My husband is a Marriott Gold Elite Rewards member so we are accustomed to Marriott properties. Your establishment is one of the best. The building is beautiful but it's the people that make the difference. Your staff is to be congratulated! The breakfast Ladies are lovely and always smiling. The front desk staff is efficient, knowledgeable and warm and friendly. The housekeepers are thorough and friendly. You would be quite proud of the service we received throughout our stay. Thanks so much and kudos to all, Barbara V.
Manager Response: I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people working at this hotel. Our staff genuinely cares about our guest's experience and we will always go out of our way to ensure that every guest has a great memorable stay. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: My family of 5 (3 kids, 2 adults) plus my sister stayed in the Kids Suite last June. Large hotel room w/ 2 rooms (1 w/ a king & the other a bunk for the kids) & 2 bathrooms plus a full kitchen!! And a living room w/ a pullout couch. Clean & nice accommodations. Hotel offers a free breakfast and dinner! The day we took a break from Disneyland, we swam & enjoyed a free BBQ dinner! The entire family enjoyed our stay. Is too far from the parks to walk. We decided to drive instead of paying for the ART shuttle since we had a voucher for free parking at Disneyland. Great hotel would stay again!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Being one mile away from Disneyland we are a popular hotel among families. Our staff works hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel October 2013. Found the room to be very accommodating and clean. Pleasantly surprised by the breakfast offerings and even more surprised by the "Social Hour" that served dinner items. This saved our family a lot of money on the food budget. Staff was very friendly. Enjoyed the pool, spa, gym and sport court. Laundry facilities came in very handy after our trip to the beach. Overall a great place to stay, kids loved it! Agree with TravelbearAZ, the hallways looked like they were never vacuumed during our four night stay, and the noise was a slight issue. The freezer in the room did not keep things completely frozen but were still able to have ice, but the ice cream we stored in it did not completely freeze. We would come back again.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We have a rotating menu that changes daily. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future.

Summary Heading: OK, could have been much better, bad hotel management of shuttle to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at this hotel on their first day!  That was years ago. We stayed there this month, October 11-13.  We remembered how convenient it was with kids.  The hotel was a bit grungy.  On top of that, their shuttle service to Disneyland was horrible.  It was always late. One morning, it did not even show up. My husband and daughter ended up walking to Disneyland!  That evening, the shuttle was late again.  The shuttle belonging to another hotel felt sorry for me and the kids, so they dropped us off in the parking lot of another hotel.  We walked to our hotel.  The next morning, the shuttle was over 20 minutes late.  You wait for the shuttle out on Harbor Blvd.  Everyone in line was upset, kids crying, getting restless, needing to go pee.  I just waited.  One guy went into the
Manager Response: To say that your experience is concerning would be an understatement. We apologize that you had such an experience and assure you that this is not the typical stay at this hotel. We understand that the shuttle service is very important to our guest and will evaluate and ensure that the service and standards are being met. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: This a nice Residence Inn to stay at. Room is immaculately clean. However, then interior hallways are a bit on the grungy side. After two nights of staying, the second floor hallways are yet to be vacuumed. Same bits of paper remain on the carpet. I would expect there to be a bit of scraps of paper and micro-trash on the carpet given the traffic of families going to Disneyland, but I'd not expect the same pieces of paper remaining in the same place day after day. Only other note would be that you have to decide whether you want to hear some traffic(though windows are dual paned) or you want listen music over pool courtyard. North facing rooms would probably be the quietness as they overlook the parking lot.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a try. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. We are always looking to improve we will evaluate our current cleaning methods and make the necessary changes in efforts to keep our hallways clean. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel in September 2013. The suites were perfect for families. There is a shuttle  to Disneyland right out front. The breakfast was good and included. I would stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: I definitely agree with you we are great for families. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is the best value in Anaheim. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website!

Summary: Nice stay!! Rooms are good and the breakfast was good too!! One night they had BBQ hotdog, burgers. they were always on top of everything with the exception of day the maid came in made the bed, left towels but forgot everything else. Beds were a little hard for me...Wish they had a business center that did not charge for use of the computers (35 cents per minute is a bit much! plus it costs to print anything!!) More for vacationers than business people.
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. I apologize for failing to properly service your room and hope we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: This was a fantastic hotel.  Everything was great except 2 things.  Only 2 elevators will keep you waiting several minutes during peak hours.  Also, pet friendly hotel that doesn't limit which floors have pets so we had tons of fleas in our room.
Manager Response: Thank you for putting us in the category of “really good hotel”. We make every effort to keep our pet friendly rooms on the second and third floor. In addition we do have a detailed cleaning check list that we complete upon the checkout of each room. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed for 8 days in October of 2013. It was our third time staying near Disneyland ( first two at the Stabridge and the Best Western Plus Park Place ). The Residence was hands down the best. The room was spacious, well appointed and clean. It was bright, the beds were comfy, the bathroom very well designed ( toilet and shower separate from the sink and counter - which comes in handy ) and the kitchen was very nice with granite countertops and full size stainless steel appliances. And quiet! could not believe how little you hear outside of your room. The pool area was nice. The location was good ( can walk to Disney in about 25 mins, but we usually took the shuttle. restaurants, Target with grocery and liquor stores just across the street. Shuttles to other places come to the
Manager Response: I’m so excited to hear you wouldn’t stay anywhere else. We want to earn your business and have you stay every time you visit the area. You are absolutely right about the value and money that can be saved by enjoying our complementary hot breakfast buffet and evening meals. I absolutely agree with you; we do have a great staff and we are fortunate to have each and every one of them. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary: We arrived around 1 PM on a rainy Wednesday to attend the Bon Jovi concert that night at the Honda Center.   The desk clerk was friendly and had a room available for us immediately.  However, it was on the ground floor facing Harbor Blvd., but as we were there for only one night, we accepted.  The room was spacious, clean and well equipped.  The Air Conditioning worked well.  The shower pressure and hot water were great.  The toilets are a bit  low for anybody who has knee problems.  Bed was comfortable.  The road outside was noisy, but with earplugs and the curtains drawn, it wasn't a concern.  There was a bus stop and sidewalk outside the room window, so we had to keep the curtains drawn for privacy. TVs were nice and had an excellent selection of cable channels.  This is the
Manager Response: I hope you had a great time at the Bon Jovi concert. It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like you. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. Thanks for being our guest!

Summary Heading: I dont know why this isn't rated number 1... it is #1 in my book!
Summary: Our family has stayed at this location for years. It has yet to disappoint.  the rooms are ALWAYS clean and well maintained. The pool area is always clean. There is even a small kiddie pool, bbq area and sports court.  it serves a full breakfast, which is always fully stocked. Sure they run out of stuff but it is quickly replenished. Eggs, hot fresh waffles, cold cereal, juice, sausage ,fresh seasonal fruit and the list goes on. Then there is always their social hour on select weeknights. This is always Awesome! Again top notch staff running this area. The staff is always more than accommodating. I have yet to ask for something and not get anything less than superb service. The rooms are large and well equipped. Comfortable beds and room darkening curtains that actually work.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Both our daily breakfast buffet and the evening manager’s reception are an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We are delighted that you found our staff helpful and friendly. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Wow. This place never disappoints . Top notch
Summary: We have stayed here for years. Just when you thought it couldn't get any better .... It does !  Great breakfast , great rooms, social hour is the bomb.  Seriously this place cannot be place cannot be beat.  This is the place for the whole family. Young and old alike.  Breakfast area can get busy in the morning but the food is always hot and never runs out!  Again I can't say enough about the friendliness of the staff. A+
Manager Response: Thank you for giving the high grade of A+! I’m glad to hear that you had an awesome stay. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website! Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.

Summary: My wife and I stayed three nights in the Residence Inn during September.  The rooms are very large, well appointed and clean.  There's free wifi (with a better connection than most other places we've stayed), and the included breakfast was basic but good.  There is a pay-laundry on site (which was reasonably priced), and plenty of parking (which was an extra $10/day).  The hotel is well situated, within a couple of miles of Disneyland.  There's a half-hourly shuttle ($5 for the day) that runs between it and the hotel.  There are also numerous restaurants and shops within an easy walk.  The front desk staff were extremely welcoming and eager to provide assistance and recommendations.    Overall this hotel represented excellent value for money.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. We are centrally located with many dinning options with in walking distance. We are thrilled that you found our staff helpful and friendly.  Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: The hotel is very convenient for families . 10 min far from Disney .There is a shuttle bus for Disney. There are a lot of restaurants within a walking distance . Also Target is the other side from the road. The room is very spacious with a living room . The breakfast is very delicious and there are a lot of varieties . Free parking + Free Wi-FI The front desk stuff are very supportive , friendly and helpful . They respond to any request or question in a friendly way . They supported even in getting a plug for my mobile charger , booking starline tours in Hollywood , promote good restaurants , hypermarket , etc...... For shopping you can visit South coast plaza or fashion island (both are 20 min from the hotel by car ) In general this is the best hotel I stayed in during my visit
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. We are centrally located with many dinning options with in walking distance.  Your recommendations are great and I’m sure it will help many families plan accordingly and get the most out of their So-Cal vacation. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: Chose this airport as a last night stop pior to flying home from LAX. Two queen bed in a suite room.room was comfortable and clean.  Every night they have a complementary mel,this night it was a BBQ and I had a hot dog and cheeseburger prior to going out for a meal at the Olive Garden!  Couldn't resist it although it spoilt my Olive Garden meal ha ha. Decent breakfast next morning prior to leaving. This hotels caters well for families with plenty of facilities or the kids Combine this with the complementary dining and this old be real value for families. Free wireless throughout but $ 10 parking. Go try this hotel don't think you will be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. You are absolutely right about the value and money that can be saved by enjoying our complementary hot breakfast buffet and evening meals. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary Heading: Convenient, kid-friendly, but lacks customer service -- oh, my.
Summary: The last thing you want happen when you spend $1,400 dollars on a hotel room rental for six days is to be surprised that your car’s paint job was severely compromised by a faulty, errant water sprinkler that showered a car with hard water spots.  That was my experience late last week after a family vacation in Anaheim.   Rewind the last two times I stayed here.  It was awesome.  My wife loved it.  The kids were fully accommodated and my mother in law was able to stay in the same suite because of their awesome, spacious rooms.  We have been to Disneyland three of the past five years and this has been our spot.    Flash forward to last week.  Not only was the pool closed for a week, unbeknownst to us since no one adequately communicated that this amenity would be out-of-service, I
Manager Response: Although Trip Advisor has proven to be a fantastic tool, allowing travelers to review hotels and their services, the review that you have chosen to write clearly indicates there were extenuating circumstances involved that you chose not to mention in your reviews on Trip Advisor and other social media. Several attempts have been made to seek resolution for the issues experienced, both from the hotel directly as well as involving Marriott’s Customer Care, however a resolution has proven elusive. While we may not agree with your decision to post the reviews you did, we do recognize the privacy and confidentiality of our guests and believe that this is not the venue to discuss the intricacies of your stay. Our continued goal is to provide excellent customer service for our guests and resolve any issues that may arise.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for a week with my two teenaged nephews in June 2013. We loved this hotel! Our room had two bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a kitchen. Plenty of room for everyone to be comfy. The room was in good shape, nicely furnished, and clean. Paul Mitchell shampoos were a high-class touch that I hadn't expected. The hotel is smaller than many of the Anaheim Resort Area hotels, so is easier to navigate and less crowded. The pool and hot tub were clean and refreshing. The fitness room and laundry rooms were great. We enjoyed the breakfasts and the evening snacks, which, for us, served as dinner on a couple of nights (pasta, tacos, salad). The evening snacks are not provided every night, so check with the front desk. Speaking of the front desk, I was pleased that
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. Residence Inn Anaheim Resort is centrally located with access to all Southern California attractions. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Southern California. Our housekeeping staff is grateful for the gratitude you left for them, it’s a generous gesture. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website!

Summary: We stayed at this Residence Inn for 3 night in September for a short trip to Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm.  We stayed in their biggest suite, the king with 2 queens.  The room was nice and clean and very accommodating for our group of 6.  The breakfast selections at this Residence Inn is better than any other Residence Inn that I have stayed in.  They have plenty of seating and food selection.  There are also a handful of restaurants within a 3 to 5 minute walk to choose from, Red Robin, Outback Steakhouse, Buca Di Beppo, Joe's Crab Shake, and a pizza place.  I wished they had more than 2 elevators, sometimes in the morning you may wait several minutes to get one or get one that is not full of guests going down to eat breakfast.
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family.   Thanks for recommending us it is an honor to received such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like your self.

Summary Heading: Convenient location and value for money
Summary: We travelled and stayed in the resort for 15 days.   The location is great. Walking distance to supermarkets and outback. Short driving distance to Disney. Price was good.   Free coffee and tea served daily at the lobby. Lots of kids around. Convenient laundry facilities. If I am not wrong, it is 24 hour.   The only drawback is that the hotel is a bit dated. The bed is also not the most comfortable. However when we stayed there, we walked around the surrounding hotels and it does appear that this is one of the best if not the best!
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from someone that has stayed at our hotel for 15 nights. We are centrally located with many dinning options with in walking distance.  Your recommendations are great and I’m sure it will help many families plan accordingly and get the most out of their So-Cal vacation. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: Hotel was very nicely kept. We arrived in Anaheim around 12 pm after driving from Vegas and the front desk was nice enough to let us check in early. Hotel was located less than 2 miles from Disney which was great! There is also an ART transportation bus that picks up the local hotels and takes them to disney for a small fee, but we did see plenty of people walking to Disney. Breakfast was nice, ample food, just make sure you get down there in time because the staff will begin to clean up promptly. Unfortunately parents were letting their children roam the hotel without any supervision (a big pet peeve of mine).
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We believe we are the ideal choice for anyone visiting Disneyland and are happy that you agree. I’m glad we were able to meet your early check in request it always nice to be able to unpack before heading over to Disney. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website!

Summary: This place was awesome. Moved here after an aweful night somewhere else! This place was clean, staff was great, breakfast was awesome, pool awesome, grill area awesome! 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom suite was a great fit for the 7 of us! Totally worth staying here!! Close to Disneyland!
Manager Response: I’m glad to hear that you had an awesome stay.   Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website!

Summary Heading: Great stay and visit to Disney
Summary: We stayed at this hotel August 21-23, 2013 with 3 kids (age range 5-10) and 2 adults.  This hotel was a great choice for visiting Disney.  The breakfast in the morning had a great variety to please everyone.  In the evenings, the hotel provided a managers event with snacks - on Thursday night there was a full BBQ :)  The BBQ included hot dogs, hamburgers, veggie burgers (!!!), potato salad, pasta salad, corn on the cob, and watermelon.  We returned to the hotel from Disney for a break and were pleasantly surprised that the BBQ was there for dinner.  We were upgraded from a one-bedroom room to a two-bedroom room with bunk beds!  We took the shuttle (stopped right in front of the hotel) to and from Disney - very convenient  - would recommend knowing the schedule for the shuttle
Manager Response: We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Thanks for the 5 star rating we truly appreciate your recommendation. Hope to have you and your family back soon.

Summary Heading: Great for family time and business
Summary: Common areas very well kept, friendly staff at front desk and in buffet in the morning--even when busy.  Good reasonably priced food close by (walking distance).  If you need a break away from kids--and of course have someone to watch yours--nice bar in the Hyatt next door and a convenient gate from the pool area of the RI to the other hotel.  Pool clean, lots of chairs, kiddy wading pool and a hot tub.  Ping pong table and tons of guest towels.  Noticed they even have swing chairs for disabled individuals to get into the pool or the spa.  Had a few mechanical issues but hotel staff were fast to react and resolve when they could.  I was here for business but my daughter and her kids came to enjoy the Disney parks--they are close by this property.  Overall I give this property a
Manager Response: Thanks for recommending us it is an honor to received such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like your self. Our staff works hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland.

Summary: We had 7 adults, 6 kids and had 3 king, kids bunk bed suites.  We all loved the rooms; the size, comfort, and two bedrooms, each with it's own bathroom.  A little over a mile from Disneyland but transportation is available.  The pool area was nice and the breakfast, although a little frantic with all the people, was good.  There is a kitchen in the room which is also convenient. The rooms had recently been renovated and the staff was very friendly.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Our family suites with the bunk beds are spacious and a big hit with the kids. We are thrilled that you found our staff helpful and friendly.  Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: Stayed here with my family of five. We loved the room with kitchen. Very clean. Loud until midnight outside the room, and the air conditioner was located in the master bedroom and was also extremely loud. The huge breakfast was great, the staff was friendly, and we are likely to stay here again.will probably go during a less crowded travel season, however.
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We booked into this hotel as part of a Disney package. Residence Inn is generally a favourite for our family (couple, plus 3 teenagers), but this one was not among the top tier. Carpet a little dated but other furnishings okay. Comfortable bed as always. Two elevators very busy, and I couldn't find convenient stairs (they are apparently outside the building). The breakfast was not my style, but kept the kids happy and filled. The evening food service was a nice surprise and filled a gap for busy Disney goers. The main problem was the noise and busy-ness - just one of those things with lots of younger kids and Disney-fueled excitement I guess. On the other hand, that meant there was a decent laundromat on site, which turned out handy.
Manager Response: We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Economical for business travelers, great for families
Summary: It's a short walk from this property to the convention center and with a full kitchen and free parking, it is an economical choice for business travelers attending meetings at the convention center.  It's not at the 4-5 star level of the hotels in the area, so there's no restaurant/bar at the property and the appointments aren't as nice.  However, it's good for the price - just make sure you're paying $15-20+ less per night than the other hotels nearer to the convention center, so check before booking. I didn't have the breakfast, it was just too hectic in the breakfast room, even quite early, with families and vacationers, so I can't comment on it. Very pleasant staff. And they dropped off cookies the second day I was there, quite a nice touch.  I found it nearly impossible to
Manager Response: Thanks for the nice review. You are absolutely correct we are a great value and we are located with in walking distance to the Anaheim convention center. We do not have a restaurant however we offer a daily breakfast buffet that included in your rate. In addition we also offer an evening reception that includes food and drinks. Thank you for being our guest!

Summary Heading: We enjoyed our room here, and would stay here again!
Summary: This was a great room to have with our 4 kids.  Lots of room, had two separate bedrooms, and bathrooms.  Pretty clean, nice little kitchen area with provides dishes.  Several washers downstairs.  We enjoyed staying here!  I will say it was super busy and full up, but didnt here a lot of noise due to the rooms being far from door.
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. . Having a full equipped kitchen is an extra value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thanks for posting the pictures I really appreciate it hope to see you soon.

Summary: Stayed in a two bedroom suite, one had two queen size beds and the other one had a bunk bed.   Since we were on the top floor, we could see the fireworks at night.  Having the shuttle bus take us to and from Disneyland was very convenient for a small fee.  Front desk personnel was friendly and very helpful.  The reason for the 4 stars vs. 5 is because the second bedroom did not have a window plus the breakfast room was very crowded and noisy.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Our family suites with the bunk beds are spacious and a big hit with the kids. We’re delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed the fireworks view, and Disney shuttle service. We are thrilled that you found our staff helpful and friendly.  Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Started out terrible, but got better...
Summary: I planned this trip with teenage daughters a long time ago, and I reserved a very specific room. When I checked in late, it was gone. They gave me a suite that had bunk beds. My daughters were not thrilled (to say the least) either.   The room was not cleaned a couple days until I ask them (we were gone majority of day). I wasn't happy housekeeping.  Another issue occurred when I requested round trip limo/sedan service to a concert. As the driver dropped us off, he said we're on our own to get ride back. The hotel didn't communicate the instructions. It's not a high end place, so I can't expect to much for this type of service.   The breakfast is complete zoo. The hotel appeared to have 10 people packed into some of their suites (not sure if they can control this). It is a
Manager Response: I’m sorry to hear that you stay started on a bad note. We have four different configurations of the two bedroom suite, and I’m sorry that we failed to give you the room you expected. We regret if you found the car service to be inconvenient I will share your comments with the management team. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: The best Residence Inn I have stayed at
Summary: I am Marriott Platinum and I stay in the range of Marriott hotel brands. For vacation with family I prefer the space and kitchen comforts of a Residence inn and this one didn't disappoint. The staff were all very friendly, and the property was clean and spacious. The little touches, such as the attentive staff, evening snacks, the shopping service etc  made this a great choice. The room was well provisioned and clean and cosy. The pool was larger than we expected and was a nice place to relax after a morning in the parks. The breakfast was varied and well stocked. Lets face it - in hotels with families and free breakfasts it can be like a rodeo at times, so it was great to see this Residence Inn seem to take pride in keeping it clean, stocked and orderly - there is enough room
Manager Response: It means a great deal to me to receive positive comments from a Marriott Platinum Elite member. My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Residence Inn stay for Disneyland vacation.
Summary: This was our first time at the Residence Inn in Anaheim. We typically stay at the Staybridge Suites in Anaheim and were told the Residence Inn is very comparable. Turns out the Residence Inn is! It's actually a quite nice hotel that is very close to Disneyland. The suites are not as large as the ones at the Staybridge but they are clean and beds are comfortable. The staff is nice and the dining area is nice. The free breakfast got pretty busy and messy but the staff worked pretty hard to keep things clean and the food stocked. There is free Wi-Fi and 2 flat-screen TVs in the suites. My only gripe is the $10 per day parking fee however the fee was waived because we mentioned 1 of our TVs was damaged and unwatchable. Overall a very nice hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We believe we are the ideal choice for anyone visiting Disneyland and are happy that you agree. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We normally stay at the Disneyland Hotel for vacation. We didn't plan this trip as it was the result of the death of a family member. We decided to stop and spend a few days at Disneyland with the family after spending a week on the east coast honoring our loved one. I wanted to keep everyone together  and the Residence Inn has a terrific two bedroom family suite , with a kitchen and dining area, wifi, that I thought would be perfect for us. It was. Location was convenient, accommodations were spacious, nice flat screens in each room, and the kitchen is completely equipped if you would like to make meals.  The complimentary breakfast is a hot buffet breakfast that changes slightly each day. We went down and brought it back up to our accommodations so we could eat privately as a
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to be part of your family memories. Hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We usually now always stay at residence inn garden grove. we found this hotel about 6yrs ago when we had a problem with another hotel in area,we switced and were happy,weve been going back ever since.The staff is great and friendly,the hotel is pet friendly when we take our 2 small dogs,and its clean,great breakfast,bbqs,theres not really nothing wrong with the hotel.Itcan be a wait on some days waiting for elevator,but its not bad it goes fast.The rooms that have 2 bedroom suites,2 bathrooms is great,alot of room to move around,and its nice having the 2nd bathroom w/3girls,u know how that can be in mornings.i give the hotel 5 stars even though the elevators can be crowded at times,thats minor when someones looking for somewhere to stay thats nice,clean,friendly staff and good
Manager Response: We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Thanks for the 5 star rating we truly appreciate your recommendation. Hope to have you and your family back soon.

Summary Heading: Clean large rooms, fair price, great location
Summary: Clean large rooms, fair price, great location Rooms – had 2 beds and separate living room, very clean and spacious Price – very fair for being a mile form Disneyland Location – a quick 5 min taxi ride to Disney.  Did not bother with driving, it was so quick by taxi.   Plus the bus tickets for 4 cost more than the round trip taxi.  Easy 30 min drive to Laguna Beach.  Other beaches were closer.  Free breakfast – Gets very crowded after 8 am.  But did sustain us and get us going early.
Manager Response: Thanks for recommending us it is an honor to received such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like your self. Our staff works hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland.

Summary: We couldn't say enough about how good our 8 night stay was at the end of July. The family room we had, although a little dated, had plenty of room for the wife, 2 teenage kids and myself. Free WIFI and wired internet services made life easy and the complimentary breakfasts and manager's dinners were great especially for those on a tight budget. Nothing was a problem for the staff and the hotel has a great bustling friendly energy. We will certainly be returning in the near future.  Although the ART was available to shuttle us back and forth to the Disney Parks and so on, as a family we found it more convenient (and less costly) to catch a taxi pretty much everywhere. As we discovered they are lined up pretty well all day at the Hyatt (at the rear of the hotel) and a short stroll
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Your recommendations are great and I’m sure it will help many families plan accordingly and get the most out of their So-Cal vacation. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: Had a thoroughly enjoyable stay. Stayed here with my mum and my 3 kids. My sister was also here with her family. The pool was nice although I noticed someone with swollen feet remove his bandages an get not the spa which was totally gross.  Reception staff, housekeepers and fen the maintenance men were totally fantastic, friendly and helpful. This was nice as we found the service people in the Anaheim area were generally unfriendly and curt, it was nice to come to the hotel and an atmosphere of hospitality. Would definitely stay here again.   The area was good for Disneyland only and the drive to universal studios was far too long.  Enjoyed the discovery science museum and the shopping at the outlets..
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. We are delighted that you found our staff helpful and friendly. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, up to smallest details
Summary: We are staying at the Residence Inn right now, and so happy about it! We already spent 3 nights out of our werk here, so I think I can sum it up quite well.
