The suites are great for families - full kitchen, very functional and beautiful design for the living and sleeping area. House keeping is very good - the room gets great cleaning everyday and every request get a quick and helpful response. Upper floors Disney side have a great view of the Disney fireworks. Only 2 cons about the room: We are a family of 6 with 4 young children. According to the hotel the one bedroom suite will fit 6. Well, it will, but there is very little storage area, so we have to partly live out of our suitcases. Also - and this is the main reason I took 1 star of the perfect 5 - the sofabed is so bad to
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. You are absolutely right about the value and money that can be saved by enjoying our complementary hot breakfast buffet and evening meals. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary Heading: Great for families and very clean
Summary: I stayed at this property after 4th of July weekend.  It was wonderful for my 3 daughters and I to have our own rooms and bathrooms.  It was quiet and well kept despite the large flow of  guests with kids.  The staff was well informed about the area/attractions and accomodating.  Parking was a bit of a squeeze at times but that did not detract from our stay.
Manager Response: Having a suite with two separate bathrooms is great. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Clean, friendly staff, excellent value, and included breakfast, you can not go wrong with this home away from home. Manager's reception dinners Monday - Thursday, excellent hot breakfast with decent variety really helps to balance the budget. The staff is happy to have you, you see Frank the manager more than you ever see any other hotel manager, and he is genuinely thrilled to have you as his guest. We have stayed here anytime we are in the area, with 2 young kids in tow, and we will continue to do so. We generally do a 1 room suite which is perfect, but they have 2 room suites for those with older kids or more guests. The pools are clean, and there is a great toddler pool for the little ones, the hot tub is great after a day at Disney. My only complaint if there was one, is
Manager Response: Our staff works hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Sometimes a warehouse is where it's at
Summary: We recently stayed at the Marriott Residence Inn in Garden Grove (down Harbor Blvd from the Main Gate of Disneyland).  We booked a two bedroom suite for three nights to accommodate my wife and I along with our 10 year old daughter and her girl friend.  We were familiar with the Residence Inn concept and had previously stayed at the Residence Inn located in Anaheim (closer to the Disney parks). This property gives the impression of a warehouse for Disney visitors.  Perhaps that is too severe an interpretation but not far off what the designers imagined.  The blocky high rise with minimal grounds and spartan style is almost avoiding any semblance of a resort property.  But when the point is to maximize the family's Disney entertainment and shopping experience this lodging fits the
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Our outdoor courtyard is popular area were you can play basketball or have a quick game of ping pong. We hope that you and your family return soon.

Summary Heading: Very good for the area, well worth a stay
Summary: Clean suites with everything you will need for a stay in the area, not just doing the Disney thing, tho they have a shuttle of course.  Breakfast was a bit of a bunfight like other hotels around the area, and the choice was a little varied each day, some days were much better than others.  On plus not many people talk about is that the washing facilities were superb.  While I hate paying to park, it was only $10, but really at that price i expect it costs more to administer.  My only gripe was the elevators.... two for a hotel of this size is just crazy. At checkout time you would really struggle to get yourself down and out at any reasonable speed.  IMHO, this is the best of the hotels like this in the area that we have tried, stay here if you can.
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like you. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website!

Summary: Good hotel, well located, clean and nice complimentary breakfast. Service was impeccable as well. The only very minor inconvenient is that there is not enough elevators...as I said Nothing to be worried about.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and your referral to other families visiting Disneyland. We believe we are the ideal choice for anyone visiting Disneyland and are happy that you agree. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We stayed here while in LA - visited Disney as well as other LA locations.  Amazingly large suite with two bedrooms, two baths, full kitchen and sitting area.  Very clean and well appointed.  Amazing breakfast - the real deal with proteins, hot and cold items, big variety.  Be sure to take advantage of the M-Th evening "snack"!  We made it dinner the two nights we were back at the hotel in time.  I would most definitely stay here again; great value for the price.
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. Residence Inn Anaheim Resort is centrally located with access to all Southern California attractions. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Southern California. I Hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: We had some issues with house keeping so we brought it to Jennifer Hernandez the front desk supervisor and she went above and beyond to accommodate us and exceeded our expectations on how she resolved our issue! Also special recognition to Sasan a wonderful server in their restraunt who provided excellent service and remembered who we were and what room we were from and welcomed us each morning. Jennifer and Sasan made our stay a pleasant one and we would reccomend this hotel to everyone!
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the opportunity to fix the service failure you initially encountered. My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary Heading: An ideal place to stay w/ kids!!
Summary: I did a lot of research on hotels around Disneyland area that were family friendly with a fully equipped kitchen for cooking our meals. In most cases the hotels with kitchens were extended stay hotels that did not have very good reviews in terms of cleanliness and hygiene. Residence inn pretty much checked off everything on my list even though it was a little pricey. I really wondered if it was too good to be true.  I was really impressed with the hotel amenities- the kitchen was fully equipped with good quality appliances, rooms were very clean and the pool view just added to our great experience. The staff is very friendly and welcoming. The hotel is conveniently located near a Vons where we purchased our groceries. Disneyland is 2 miles away which allowed us to get back to
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you. Having a full equipped kitchen is an extra value especially when you are traveling with a family. Guest with dietary needs find our fully equipped kitchen perfect for preparing snacks or even a full meal. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Before we found this Hotel, we tried so many different Hotels in the Disneyland Area.  Once since we found it, I ventured to a different property, and regretted it the entire stay.  A lot of the people we talk to want to "Stay across the street from Disneyland"  BIG MISTAKE!  The last place we stayed across the street with free breakfast, we got 1 strip of bacon, 1 table spoon on scrambled egg, and stale pastries.   Breakfast the Residence Inn, is AWESOME! Something for everyone! Some of my kids make their own waffles, some have egg, sausage, etc., some have cereal.  We all get what we want, and in the amount we want.  With a family of Seven, this type of breakfast at a Denny's or IHOP would add at least $100 per day to our trip!  All the staff is friendly, and make us feel very
Manager Response: I’m so excited to hear you had a perfect stay with us. We want to earn your business and have you stay every time you visit the area. You are absolutely right about the value and money that can be saved by enjoying our complementary hot breakfast buffet and evening meals. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: We took the family here for a nice Disney Vacation. We booked a two bedroom suite with bunk beds. The rooms were very clean. The pools were clean and the dinner's they served were great. The breakfast in the morning was filling. My kids loved to make waffles. If you do get a room with a bunk bed please make sure you inspect the ladder for slip resistant strips. My daughter slipped and fell of the ladder and fully dislocated her elbow. The slip resistant strips were completely worn down. The hotel was helpful about the accident and gave my daughter $40 in store credits for the gift shop. However they stated we would receive an accident report but failed to send us one.
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. I’m sorry to hear that your daughter had an accident and I hope she is doing well. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Another Stay at the Residence Inn
Summary: Once again the Residence Inn was a great place to stay.  The staff is so accommodating and they actually gave us a room at the end of the hall so it was pretty quiet.  It is such a busy time in Anaheim that I usually dread being there, but being at the end of the hall really gave us our own sanctuary to return to.  Also, you should know that the hotel has updated its decor and appliances since we stayed there 6 months ago... the carpeting, couch, bathroom vanities, and kitchen appliances were all new and very nice.   The only reason why I didn't give the hotel 5 stars was that the bed was so awful that I didn't sleep for 3 nights.  Upon laying down, I would sink so far into the center that I almost had to ask my wife for help to get out.  I don't understand how a hotel that gets
Manager Response: Our staff works hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. I appreciate you noticing the renovation updates I think the new colors and stainless steal appliance really make the room look more contemporary. We hope that you and your family return soon.

Summary: This hotel without a doubt is the best hotel I've stayed in in California. When you walk inside, it is bright and lively. The workers are eager to please. If you forget to get your friend or family member a gift, they have a giftshop near the entrance with dinky tourist toys.   The pool is big. The outside space is nice. The hotel is close to restaurants and stores.   The rooms are clean and well kept. Very cozy, never had trouble getting to sleep.  Close to Disneyland. You could walk if you really didn't mind.   Favorite thing for me: The breakfast. Without a doubt the best breakfast I've ever had at a hotel. Beats a lot of restaurants too.
Manager Response: Our hot daily breakfast buffet offers a variety of food like scramble eggs, sausage, fresh fruit and hot oatmeal. The most popular item on the breakfast buffet is our waffle station were you can create your own waffle and top it off with some whip cream or strawberries. Thank you for noticing the efforts of our wonderful cleaning staff we are all committed to making the experience of every guest a memorable one. Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We had an excellent stay with our two grown daughters and niece.  The only downside was when we first checked in we were in a two room suite where the second room was a twin room - tiny with no closet! We upgraded (for a modest amount) to a 2 room suite with 2 queens!!!! Highly recommend choosing the latter unless you have small children who don't need closet space!  The front desk staff had goodies for us with a handmade card and cookies the last night! So sweet.  Kristen took care of us beautifully:)  We loved the convenient location to everywhere as well as the free breakfast and having a full kitchen!  We will definitely stay here when we come back to Anaheim:)
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing the effort of our staff members. My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We spent three nights at this property in June.  Although we did not make great use of the kitchen, we did make use of the full-size refrigerator and the extra space provided by a kitchen/dining area.  Front desk people were very helpful.  The breakfast buffets are very good with a large seated eating area.  They don't seem to mind you taking your breakfast back to the room.  There are also evening "snacks" which are often good enough to make a meal of.  I appreciated the large laundry facility and the good assortment of kid's entertainment options (pool, ping pong, a half basketball court and a game room).  The parking is a little limited for the size of the hotel.  Arrive after 10 PM and you're really scrounging for a space.  Parking is $10/day, although we didn't get charged,
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family.  We are delighted that you found our staff helpful and friendly. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We are currently staying at this location and everything from the amenities to the staff to the rooms is 100%! This will be the only place we stay when we come back. In particular the manager, Frank knows what customer service is all about! 2 thumbs up all the way!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. The people that work at this hotel are an exceptional group and greatly appreciate you noticing their efforts. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: This property rocks!  The staff really takes great care of their guests!  They work hard to ensure that every detail is covered to make your stay is comfortable.  Very clean and comfortable hotel.  Great rooms.  Great food.  Great pool!  I will definitely stay here again!!!  Andy, Salt Lake City, Utah
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending us. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. We hope that you and your family return soon.

Summary: I had called the Marriott 800 number since I am a member to make a reservation at the Residence inn across from Disneyland.  By mistake they booked me in Garden Grove.  I was concerned with being too far from Disney and having to take a shuttle.  We were traveling with 4 adults and twin 2 1/2 year olds.  I really needed to have the suite with full kitchen.  The accommodations were outstanding.  As was suggested on Trip Advisor we requested a high floor at the end of the hall.  It enabled us to have a quieter experience so that the boys wouldnt be disturbed.  We also requested two pack and plays and they were delivered as requested.  The staff was outstanding.  Every question was answered with details and they truly were interested in us having a great experience.  We decided to
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending us. We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. We hope that you and your family return soon.

Summary: The Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area is a very nice property. The hotel has been recently remodeled and the rooms are in excellent condition. My family and I stayed in a two bedroom-2 bath unit and really enjoyed all of the space. Staff at the hotel are genuinely interested in their guests experience and it shows. The breakfast offered a wide variety of options, including healthy ones, and the evening dinners were much better than I expected. ART shuttle service to and from the Disneyland Resort was good enough; however, we did experience a couple of waits around 30 minutes. However, you can also catch the shuttle for route 3 if you don't mind a short walk. We took advantage of the hotel pool (which was heated to a very comfortable temperature,) the basketball court, and hot
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean.  My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. Thanks for your suggestions about the hot tub we are always looking for ways to improve the experience our guest have at our hotel. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: The room has everything we need, extra suite for Grandma and my girl loves climbing the ladder on the double bed and kept her very entertained. Every room has it own TV, kitchen is fully equipped with a huge fridge for us to chill our drinks and most importantly we have a great view of the 930pm fireworks at Disney. Ask for room 710 or 810, you wont be disappointed with the view. If you have a car and have 2nd thought if you want to drive to Disney - DONT. The parking fee at Disney is 15USD, the shuttle from Residence Inn to Disney is just 3 stops away which is less than 10mins and on the way back, it's shorter round the block and Residence Inn is the 1st stop from Disney so will be back in less than 5 mins. The queue to get the car in Disney is very long and does not help that
Manager Response: Our family suites with the bunk beds are spacious and a big hit with the kids. We’re delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed our suite, and Disney shuttle service. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Clean, friendly and close to Disney
Summary: On a recent trip to the Disneyland Resort, I had the opportunity to stay at the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area.  In a sea of chain hotels and motels, the Residence Inn was a great choice for me and is definitely a place I would stay at again.    The Residence Inn is located about a mile or so south of the Disneyland Resort right on Harbor Blvd, so it offers easy access after a long day at The Happiest Place On Earth.  Getting to the parks is equally simple- turn right out of the parking lot, right on Chapman, right on West Rd and straight into the Resort.  It really doesn’t get much easier than that.  The hotel is also located right across the street from a Target department store to stock up on items for the week.  And if you need something quickly on your way out the door
Manager Response: Thanks for recommending us it is an honor to received such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like your self. Your recommendations are great and I’m sure it will help many families plan accordingly and get the most out of their So-Cal vacation. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: As an Australian family, we were a little unsure of what to expect of US hotels as this was a first trip Stateside.  We were all very happy with the sryle of our room, with a seperate bedroom and bathroom and TV for the children ( aged 11 and 14) and another full ensuite of the main bedroom.  The beds were very comfortable and the room was serviced very well each day.  On arrival the staff greeted us and gave a few options to beat the jeg lag after a 15 hour flight, and I must particularly mention Kristin who was more than helpful when ever I bombarded her with questions.  It is a little far to walk to Disneyland but the cab fare was less than $10 or you could use the ART transport, for convenience we chose the cab option.  We enjoyed  staying in the less busy edge of Anaheim
Manager Response: I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people like Kristen working at this hotel. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. I’m glad that you enjoyed our newly renovated suites the new stainless steel appliance give the kitchen a clean and contemporary feel. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We booked a 2 bedroom suite for 6 of us. One with king size bed and the other with two queens at very good rates. Breakfast buffet style is available daily, serving a good variety of breakfast food to pump up your energy level before hitting the Disney parks. DIY waffles, bagels, muffins, breads, yoghurt, fruits, eggs, bacon, juices, coffee, tea etc. You can even have a coffee or tea to go at the lobby counter. Such a generous gesture. Parking is quite limited but no bug issue as they had an agreement with the neighbouring Hyatt to allow note guest to park there but remember to get parking coupon from the reception. RI is just a 5 mins drive to the toy story parking lot where you can hop on a shuttle bus to take you to Disney parks. Parking fee is usd15 a day. Overall we had a
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. You are absolutely right about the value and money that can be saved by enjoying our complementary hot breakfast buffet and evening meals. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: We had a two bedroom suite. Daughter loved having her own bedroom, own tv and own bathroom. Too far to walk to Disney though. Had to take shuttle. Probably pick closer hotel next time. Across the street form Target and restaurants. Good Free Breakfast Buffet. Good soundproofing.
Manager Response: Family fun is important I’m glad to hear your recent visit was excellent. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Our family of five stayed here for a three day trip to disneyland. For the two queen and sofa bed room. We appreciated an early check in and a room with a nice view of the fireworks. Had a BBQ the first night and also dinner another night which was really nice. Great breakfasts with lots of variety. The breakfast area gets pretty crazy later in the morning, but since we wanted to get to disneyland early we only experienced that our last day. Staff was very friendly and responsive for the most part. We booked through AAA (got a good price), who had asked if we were celebrating anything which we were - our sons birthday. The hotel brought balloons and cookies to the room as a gift. A nice touch. The room was clean and it was so nice to have a kitchen to make meals in. (We brought
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Being one mile away from Disneyland we are a popular hotel among families. Our staff works hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel when we visited disneyland. The staff is helpful, the breakfast is good and the rooms are just right - we stayed in the 2 bedroom suite which is just about the size of a regular 2 bedroom apartment. We were 4 adults and a 3 year old and it was very comfortable.  Residence Inn offers the grocery pick up service, which is unbelievably convenient.  There is a target which is 1 minute away by car so you can stock up yourself as well.  Finally, and this is the best part about this hotel - the Anaheim Resort Transit buses stop right outside the hotel so if you are going to disneyland, you can park your car here and take the bus straight to the entrance of the park.
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: The 2 br 2 ba suite with bunk beds was invaluable, it made the stay so much easier.  The rooms are really nice, they look just like the pictures -full kitchen with dining table, (small) living room, 2 bedrooms with in-suite baths (with plenty of shelf space), and a tv in every room. Everything seemed new and clean and in excellent condition.  A good testament to that is that we walked around barefoot and the bottoms of our feet never got dirty. The beds were extremely comfortable, firm with a soft top.  They provided multiple types of pillows for you to choose from.    The only inconveniences are: the air conditioner in the master br is really loud, but not a big deal at all; the soap and shampoo/conditioner are really cheap, such that I would choose to bring my own soap next
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review. Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Thanks for recommending us it is an honor to received such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like your self. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: We stayed for 5 nights with kids.  The daily breakfast and evening weekday dinner were very nice and convenient.  While we had a car and didn't use the ART shuttle to Disneyland, there was a stop adjacent to the property.  Nice rooms with full kitchen, friendly staff, convenient location.  Pool, hot-tub  & basketball area were also good.  Will stay there again.
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. I’m glad that you enjoyed our newly renovated suites the new stainless steel appliance give the kitchen a clean and contemporary feel. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We are a small family with a 4 yr old son. We like to have the convenience of a full kitchen and refrigerator and microwave.  It is great to have these amenities and be so close to Disney Parks.  Did not use free breakfast or the pool but the rooms feel like they are newly renovated and servie staff is friendly.  Great value.
Manager Response: My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you. Having a full equipped kitchen is an extra value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: I have a family of six, which can be a challenge to book hotels for.  I called the property directly and was told that they had a room with two bunk beds, aka one bed for each child and a king in a separate bedroom, two bathrooms.  Based specifically on that representation, we booked the room. When we arrived, there was only one bunk bed.  We were informed by the desk that the room that was described to me over the phone didn't exist at their property.  They moved us to a double queen with a bunk bed, enough beds to sleep everyone, but we were sharing with the kids...not the plan.  The manager explained that the sleeping spaces included the pull out sofa bed, but that's not what we were sold on.  Property didn't offer any other concession for the deceptive booking practices.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We apologize that you had such an experience and assure you that it was not our intension to miss represent the numbers of beds we have in our guest rooms. We are in the process of updating our rooms and hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great staff and newly renovated rooms!
Summary: Beautiful brand new rooms! Really enjoyed the breakfast and warm smiles from the staff. Everyone was friendly and so welcoming. Rooms were spotless and very comfortable. Also very convenient location to the ART shuttle to Disneyland. Thank you for making our trip so memorable!
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean.  My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.

Summary Heading: Not a romantic getaway...great for families!
Summary: The suites are a bit small & the furniture was arranged strangely to fit in. If your room is on the Harbor Blvd side...you had better have earplugs. It is very loud. The buffet breakfast was more extensive than at most residence Inns, but there are kid's everywhere. With the proximity to Disneyland, it is to be expected...we had hoped for a little  more quiet experience.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Being one mile away from Disneyland we are a popular hotel among families. There are times of the year like February, September and early November when we tend to slow down a bit. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We are a family of 4 on a Disney vacation.  Our 6 yr old was so excited about the bunk beds and TV in their own room! And our 16 month old slept just like he was at home in the pack in play the hotel provided. This in of itself made the trip. But on top of that, the hotel room was very nice, it was like staying in an apartment. The kitchenette was stocked with everything we needed to cook our meals, and they even offer a grocery service, although we didn't use it, it was nice to know it was available. We had purchased pre-marinated meat and used the grills by the pool, fortunately they also had all the tools to grill, as we didn't even think to pack those. We really enjoyed the breakfast each morning, the variety was very good, and everyone left full.  There is also a laundry
Manager Response: Our family suites with the bunk beds are spacious and a big hit with the kids. Having a full equipped kitchen is an extra value I’m sure you prepared some yummy meals for your family. I’m glad you found our team courteous and helpful we are all committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. I must say Spiderman is one of my favorite super heroes.  Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We used this hotel for our Southern California base, all started very well on check in, the staff were freindly and exceptionally helpful, offering advice all the time and nothing was too much trouble, everytime we returned we were greeted by a staff member.  The room, a King + 2 Queen bed 2 bedroom suite was prefect for our group of 3, and worked out similar price to 2 rooms at a lesser hotel (or motel) The free breakfast was really good always fresh fruit and hot food, there was plenty of room in the dinning room or outside (where I dinned mostly) There was juice and softdrink as well as tea and coffee.  A real bonus was free dinner as well on weekdays, we only made it back once but it was perfect, simple food like make your own tacos/barritos but it was free and there was
Manager Response: Our spacious two bed room two bathroom suite is definitely a great value. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We had such a fun time at Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area. It, truly, felt like a respite. The family was occupied with their activities. We could walk to restaurants and cook in our kitchenette when we felt like it. I love their complimentary breakfast buffet (every morning).  I heard they had free dinner Monday through Thursday. What a great place!! Excellent rating! 100%
Manager Response: Family fun is important I’m glad to hear your recent visit was excellent. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Everything was fabulous on our 4 night adults only Mother's Day trip!  I booked directly through Marriott and had requested a high floor 2 bedroom suite near the elevator.  I also noted that we would likely have a late check-in, since we were driving down from the San Francisco area.  We were running later than expected, so I called at 10p when we were about 2 hours away.  The person who answered the phone (sad to say I don't recall her name) was great and reassured me that our room was still ready and available.  We arrived around 12:30a and I was concerned that we wouldn't get the type of room I requested since it was so late.  However, not only did we get what I requested, but the room was so much nicer than expected!  The 2nd bedroom had two double beds (I was expecting
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this kind review. Residence Inn Anaheim Resort is centrally located with access to all Southern California attractions. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. I Hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: We stayed at this property for 6 nights in October for a Disney trip. We stayed in the 1 bedroom suite and my brother's family had a 2 bedroom suite. The staff were very nice and accommodating and the property was clean. The ART had a stop just outside of the hotel so travel back and forth to the parks was very simple. I don't mind staying a bit further from the parks to get a room that is significanlty bigger than a standard hotel room. Having a kitchen was helpful as well, mainly for the large fridge. There is a Walmart accross the street and restaurants less than a block away. The only fallback was that the rooms were a little dated but that's to be expected at most Anaheim area hotels. We would stay here again anytime.
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from someone that has stayed at our hotel for 6 nights. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. Having a full equipped kitchen is an extra value I’m sure you prepared some yummy meals for your family.  Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: Very nice suites at a good price. We got a two-bedroom suite and the kids loved their room with bunk beds and their own bathroom. Breakfast was included (very good selection - eggs, sausage, waffles, toast, bagels, cereal, oatmeal, yogurt, fruit - though the eggs were a bit disappointing) and on week nights, dinner too (recommend taco night and BBQ night)! I found it strange (and upsetting) that everything was served on styrofoam plates with disposable cutlery. And there didn't seem to be any recycling or compost. If this bothers you as much as it did me, I suggest bringing dishes from your suite for these meals (also much more pleasant to eat with).  There's a nice pool area and the staff is very nice. Disneyland is only a short bus ride away, though the bus schedule is not
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We have a rotating menu that changes daily. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future.

Summary: Stayed 4 nights April 29 - May 3  Room 202  Had a great stay, clean, fresh room. 2 bed room suite was great  Food was good, my kid loved the waffles   Sergio front desk great help, and everyone else including housekeeping thx you all Will always stay here from now on.
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing the efforts of our staff we work hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel. It's always nice to have a little extra room to unwind after a long day at Disneyland and we're glad that you and your family had the same experience. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We stayed at the hotel in November - 3 of us including our 3 year old daughter. The hotel has a good location, friendly staff and good breakfast. They try hard to organize evening events (like all Residence Inns) for guests. It feels safe to be here and Disneyland and other attractions are easily reachable. They could do a somewhat better job with the frozen food availability after 9 PM. We had one surprising experience - my wife left a pullover behind in the eating area during breakfast on the day we checked out. We forgot about it, but then I clearly remembered having seen it on the chair. While returning from San Diego after a week, we called up to see if we could get it back but strangely we got less than clear answers and no trace of the pullover. This must be have been a
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We are looking to stretch the hours of operations to our gift shop past 9pm. I’m sorry that we were unable to locate your lost sweater. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Perfect Location for families staying at Disney!
Summary: Pros:  *Staff was amazing *Breakfast was awesome (huge selection, great layout for speedy lines, great area for kids to eat at) *Rooms were super clean, and the cleaning staff was amazing *Beds were super comfy *we could see the fireworks from our room *Close to stores and restaurants  Cons: *elevators are crazy slow *parking can be tough to find spots
Manager Response: Thanks for recommending us it is an honor to received such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like your self. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We checked in the morning of Sunday, April 27th for 3 nights.  There were no rooms of our type available for early check in (it was after all, only 10 am) so we were able to store our bags until our room was ready while we headed to Disneyland.  We had a 2 bedroom  2 bath suite which included a kitchen and small living area.  Overall, a great experience with this hotel.  I am very picky about where I stay and frankly I have no complaints.  The hotel was very clean, updated, comfortable beds and the staff was very accommodating.  The breakfast buffet was a nice addition and had many choices including hot and cold options.  My only complaint is that all the plate ware was Styrofoam and cutlery were plastic which produces an obscene amount of trash to add to our landfills.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review. It's always nice to have a little extra room to unwind after a long day at Disneyland and we're glad that you and your family had the same experience in the two bedroom suite. We are always looking to improve our breakfast and we will take your suggestions to help us get better. Thank you for noticing the efforts of our wonderful cleaning staff we are all committed to making the experience of every guest a memorable one. Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Just got home from 5 nights at a great family Disney adventure!  You will be comfortable saying here as there is so much value for a family.  Oversized room with a FULL kitchen, good beds, FREE hot breakfast with many fresh choices(something for everyone), super helpful staff(thanks Kristen and Sergio), and minutes to Disneyland. You will either need a car, ART shuttle in front, or a very good pair of walking shoes. MON - THUR also includes a meal reception from 530-700 that changes daily from baked potato bar, burger and dog grill, nachos, Italian and more(also at no additional charge. There were many families eating. Not high end gourmet, but really good N/C perk! Nice pool, many delivery choices, and across the street from decent eateries. No bar but several across the
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 5 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.  Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We hope to see you as a guest again very soon.

Summary: The hotel staff was very friendly.  We had reserved a one bedroom suite, but were able to upgrade to a two bedroom suite for a very fair price.  It was well worth it.  The second room had bunk-beds, a kid's size table and chairs, and even a kids size bathroom.  The sinks were even a little lower for kids to reach.  I wouldn't expect that kind of detail from a residence inn.  The rooms had recently been renovated with new carpets, tvs and furniture.  The kitchens were well stocked with the essentials, and a short call to get some extra towels that were promptly delivered.  The kitchen table was big enough for four/five people.  We requested a crib/pack-and-play for the youngest child.  Unlike many hotels, they actually had (clean) sheets and blankets that fit in the
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: We switched hotels about a week before our trip, and VERY happy we did!
Summary: We just got back from our 4 night stay and we had a great time, we had originally booked another hotel that was near this hotel and after reading reviews we decided to change our reservations to this hotel! We had a king suite room and felt like it had plenty if room for our family of four although you would be pressed for room above 4 people, the room was clean and from what we gathered the appliances are all new (the fridge still had the protective barrier on it) we stayed on the 5th floor our view was pretty much blocked by palm trees, but consedering we left home in a snow storm we can't complain about palm trees blocking our view!!!  The breakfast was really nice although it does get crazy after 8-8:30, we never ate the dinner they had but it was a nice option to have, We
Manager Response: We are glad you switched hotels too. We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. Thanks for sharing the pictures of our newly renovated suites. We hope that you and your family return soon.

Summary Heading: Front desk staff really made this a superb experience!
Summary: The place itself was very comfortable and clean. The food was great and delicious. But what really made our stay such a great experience was the staff - specifically those at front desk! Sergio, Samuel, Ray, Alejandra and Katrina were extremely helpful and friendly throughout our whole stay. Being a party of 17 - which included an infant, a toddler, kids, teens, adults and elders - you can just imagine the chaos from switching rooms, getting breakfast, purchasing park tickets! I'm sure it was a hassel to tend to my parties needs but they did it without question. We really felt like they personally went out of their way to accommodate our needs and we are truely grateful for their hospitality!
Manager Response: I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people working at this hotel. Our staff genuinely cares about our guest's experience and we will always go out of our way to ensure that every guest has a great memorable stay. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: For the price vs the local competition, its the BEST.
Summary: First, the cons: Elevators in the morning, super busy breakfast (read chaotic) and mattresses weren't on par with other Marriott properties.  Pros: Heated Pool, Decent Breakfast despite the # of people, Love being on the ART route, friendly helpful staff, room for 4 adults and 3 kids, and the price.  I'm sure their are nicer properties, or bigger rooms (probably not) or ones closer to the park, or have a better breakfast, or are cheaper, but you won't find them all in one spot. For a Disneyland stay, this is the spot. Plus, at less than $200 a night for 2 bedrooms and a kitchen...your crazy if you think you can do better than that for this level of quality.
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Our recent renovation has caused extra congestion in our elevators we expect to be completed by May 23rd. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Not the worst place I have stayed
Summary: The time we spent at Disneyland completely overshadowed the floaters in my toilet when I checked in or the used bar of soap that was stuck to my shower curtain.  That did make me question the cleanliness of the rest of the room though. I stayed in a two bedroom two bath suite with a full kitchen.  It was comfortable enough for my family of four.  The a/c in the room with me and my husband was so loud the room would shake when it was on.  The complimentary breakfast was just okay, but nice to have if you are on a budget. They also offer a light meal in the evening Mon-Thurs, and it also was just mediocre.  There is a shuttle stop right outside the hotel to catch the little bus that will take you to Disneyland, and that was very convenient.  The staff was nice and polite.  My
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us during your recent trip to Disneyland. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel after checking out early of a hotel close by where we had a really poor experience.  This place was fantastic and just what we needed to finish off our stay in Anaheim.  The rooms was fantastic.  It was cosy for 5 of us in a one bedroom suite but it worked fine and we were out a lot of the time anyway.  The pool, basketball court, table tennis table etc were great for the kids.  The breakfast had a good variety and it was always easy to get a table.  The staff were very professional and were always looking at ways to help.  They arranged our late check out for us which was so kind as we had a very late international flight.  I would defintitely recommend this place to  anyone looking at visiting Anaheim.  Other positives for us were - free parking, family
Manager Response: Thanks for recommending us it is an honor to received such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like your self. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Could be the perfect place for a family holiday in Anaheim
Summary: It is not easy for a family of two adults and four children to find hotel accommodation to fit them (at least without having to get adjoining rooms). The residence inn does almost everything brilliantly and has family rooms with two queens and a bunk. The staff are great, the facilities are great, the breakfast is great, they even do a complimentary light dinner with your accommodation. The rooms are large and have a complete kitchen and separate lounge/sitting area. There are three TVs in the suite. I even ended up using the sofa bed which was not very comfortable but fine. There are only two things I do not love and one comment. 1. It is not really close enough to Disneyland to walk. Not a problem for us but thought people should know.  2. Parking is $10 potter night. That is
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to Southern California. We do have several different configurations of the two bedroom suite some include bunk-beds our most popular is the king bed in the master bedroom and two queens in the secondary room. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Best Hotel Stay with the Family Ever!!!
Summary: We recently took our family to Disneyland for spring break. We researched for months trying to find a hotel that was big enough for our party of 6, served breakfast and was close. We finally decided on the Res Inn and were so happy. Not only did we get a 2 bedroom suite with full kitchen and two bathrooms there was so much more. The hotel had a pool, basketball hoop, ping tables, full breakfast everyday and the best part which was a surprise they serve a light dinner every night which saved us a ton of $. After spending all day at the resort we didn't want to cook or hardly go out so it was awesome. Also kudos to the friendly girls at the front desk.. you rock. Will recommend to everyone I know:)
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 6 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.  Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We hope to see you as a guest again very soon.

Summary Heading: Glad we decided to switch hotels
Summary: We actually had a reservation at the Residence Inn Maingate in Anaheim because it is just a short walk to Disneyland and that was our whole reason for going. When we arrived at the Maingate Marriott we were very disappointed, the area did not seem very safe and the room was dark, very out-dated decor, and smelled of smoke. They offered a different room but it looked exactly the same. My husband called Marriot Rewards (we were using our rewards points for our stay) and they offered to move us to another Residence Inn up the street. It was a little farther from Disneyland but just a quick 10 minute drive (they also have a bus that stops out front every 30 min and is only $5 per person). We were much happier with this Marriott, it was newer and had a nice pool (though we didn't
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to Southern California. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Booked 2 nights in a 2 bedroom suite for a visit to Disneyland.  We were a group of 5, with 2 in each bedroom (double bunk in the 2nd) and 1 on the sofa bed.  The hotel is a very short walk to several family restaurants, a liquor store and a good sized shopping mall, and a $10 cab ride to the Orange County designer outlets (Simon Mall).  We also walked both ways to Disneyland - a solid 15 minute walk but all on flat ground.  The hotel included a free serve-yourself breakfast with a decent variety of foods, that included waffle makers which were a huge hit with the kids.  There's also a pool and a small fitness centre.
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us that we are your hotel of choice when visiting Disney. It's always nice to have a little extra room to unwind after a long day at Disneyland and we're glad that you and your family had the same experience. Sounds like you took advantage of the full equipped kitchen and used it to prepare snack or a full meal. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We left a not so good hotel because we decided to extend out stay and got to this hotel hours before the check in time.  The room we had reserved wasn't ready so they gave us a free upgrade to a huge and gorgeous room.  The breakfast is awesome and it has extended hours for those that like to sleep in a bit.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary: Although the location if the hotel was convenient to Disneyland and walking distance to a few restaurants and Target (food and other necessities), it was the toilets that completely disappointed us.   We had two in our room, and when I went to use the one in the master bedroom, we were disgusted to see someone already did and left their waste behind. Housecleaning should have seen this, but I just flushed it and left it at that.   Later we all discovered that anything with substance plugged the toilet, and required multiple flushes over 40-45 minutes to clear. Considering the cost of this hotel, one would think they would have decent plumbing.   Asides for that, breakfasts were moderate and overrun with young kids. Never anywhere to sit and when found, everything was sticky with
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced during you stay with us, and we thank you for letting us know. Thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back as our guest.

Summary: We're just back from five days in Anaheim, including visits to Disneyland, Universal Studios, and Seaworld (buy a CityPass!).  We are a family of 5, with 3 teens - and the Residence Inn proved to be the perfect place for us.  Having actual bedrooms, 2 baths, and a kitchen was well worth the cost of our room.  The breakfast buffet and weeknight manager's dinners saved us so much money vs. eating in the park.  We bought a 5-day pass on the ART shuttle, hopped on the bus right at the hotel, and rode the bus to the park each morning.  By late afternoon everyone is ready for a break, we'd hop the bus back to the hotel and eat dinner there, maybe take a swim, rest, or play a little basketball. Then back to the park for a few hours in the evening. We only purchased snacks at
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent trip to Disneyland! We’re delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed our suite, and Disney shuttle service. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Our Thursday night outdoor BBQ is one of my favorite events it gives me an opportunity to get to know our guest.  We hope to see you and your family again very soon

Summary: I had booked a family vacation through a travel site.  Two days before our trip, I realized I had booked a hotel much farther from Disney than we wanted.  I searched all over for a room set up as a suite.  Being spring break, most places were sold out or charging outrageous prices.  Then I found Residence Inn.  It was right in the location we wanted to be and a price I could live with.  The property is nice and clean. It offers a variety of ammenities that are wonderful for a family, such as free breakfast, laundry facilities, close to ART line (bus for Disney), and a nice pool.  The rooms are compact, but offer enough space for a family of 5 to function.  Pros:  Best part of the stay was housekeeping.  The room we came back to nightly felt like we were just checking in.  Though
Manager Response: My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you. We are a non smoking hotel and have designated areas outside for smokers. I’m sorry that you encounter the smell of smoke on your floor we try our best to ensure that all guest respect and follow our nonsmoking policy. I can assure you that this was an isolated situation and hope we can serve you again in the near future.

Summary: This is a very family friendly hotel, nearby Disneyland, access to shuttle service, friendly staff, breakfast, pool and more. If you are in the are, planning a Disneyland trip with the family, this is a great hotel.   Things I Liked - Convenience. Close to Disneyland and bus stop. - Staff. Family friendly. - Breakfast. All the fixings for kids and included with room.  Things to Improve - Poor network speeds. Very slow WiFi in rooms. Not ideal for business visit. - Tight on parking. Late arrivals from Disneyland will require parking somewhere else. Annoying after a full day at the park.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. We are delighted that you found our staff helpful and friendly. We will be increasing our Wifi bandwidth during the week of April 15; I hope this drastically improves the speed. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We stayed here while vacationing at Disneyland. Absolutely LOVED it. The staff was wonderful. Price was reasonable and rooms were great. The pool was heated. And there was a BBQ area by the pool for guest use. We had a room with the kitchen. Perfect for a family with 4 kids. Full size refrigerator, microwave and stove. The housekeeping was top of the line. We came back to a spotless room every day.
Manager Response: Thank you for fantastic review! We're thrilled that you and your family had such a great time on your vacation with us. Our newly renovated pool is heated year round it’s great to see so many families enjoying it. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Exceptional service and top notch staff!
Summary: This is the second time my family has stayed at the residence inn during our Disneyland vacation and like the first trip it was a great time.  However, what makes a great trip is a great hotel and great staff.  The staff at the residence inn are second to none.  We have stayed in some of the nicest resorts and hotels across the country and the service here at the residence inn ranks at the top!  Sergio was the main manager on duty that we dealt the most with and every single time we needed something he was more than willing to assist us.  Great sense of humor as well as wonderful food recommendations.  My wife still talks about the Market Broiler.  Being a platinum elite member they did everything they could to make sure my stay was satisfactory and they exceeded that in every
Manager Response: I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people like Sergio working at this hotel. Our staff genuinely cares about our guest's experience and we will always go out of our way to ensure that every guest has a great memorable stay. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: wonderful stay, great service and location
Summary: Went to Disneyland with family and rented a 2 bedroom suite. Very clean and staff were very helpful and friendly. Close to everything and recommend to anyone with family wanting to go to Disneyland or baseball or Honda Stadium (Ducks hockey). We I had a fantastic holiday and this place was better than we expected....thanks so much.
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like you. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: Our family has stayed here on numerous occasions and, once again, we had a wonderful stay. We are a family of 7 and this hotel is a perfect fit for us. Frank and the staff are extremely friendly. We love having breakfast and the occasional light supper taken care of for us( this helps save us the cost of 2 meals on some days). We visit Disneyland regularly and have stayed in hotels near Disney, in Garden Grove, and Buena Park and we find this hotel is, by far, the best. The rooms are clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 5 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.  Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back as our guest.

Summary: This was our second time staying in this area. We had previously stayed at the Courtyard Marriott which is much closer to Disneyland. Our primary reason for being here was not Disneyland this time around, however we did go for an afternoon.  We found a great deal on the Marriott Web Site for this hotel and had never tried this brand of Marriott. I felt it was a great choice. Our room had a small kitchenette and a separate bedroom. The bedroom was stuffed with the bed. It was a very tight squeeze with our suitcases.  There was a complimentary breakfast with was more than we had expected and an afternoon snack if you were there. Again there was more variety available than I had expected!  I really liked this hotel, my only complaint is that we did choose to walk to a lot of
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: I usually stay at Embassy Suites but they didn't have any rooms available so I stayed at Residence Inn.  I was impressed with the room and how clean and nice it was.  The staff was very polite and helpful.   If you plan on cooking meals it's great they come with a fully equipped kitchen.  I rate the Embassy Suites breakfast a  10 and Residence Inn a 5.  The food has no flavor at all.  But if you don't mind the bland food then it's a good place to stay with the family very comfortable.  I personally don't think it's walking distance but there is a trolley that runs around every 20 to 30 minutes.  If the food was better I would definitely stay there instead of Embassy Suites because Residence Inn has Queen size beds not full size beds.  More comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a try. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. We are always looking to improve our breakfast and we will evaluate our current spread and make the necessary changes in efforts to improve. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Marginal hotel experience near Disneyland in Anaheim
Summary: First the good... - the rooms were recently re-modelled and everything in it was really nice and clean. We had a two bedroom suite. There was more than enough room for the four of us - the location is very good because it is about 1 mile from Disneyland - the front staff were very nice  Now the bad - it cost over $300/night albeit during March Break. It didn't represent great value to me. If the room was around $200 per night (which i think is what it was worth), then perhaps i would have given it a higher rating - my biggest complaint is that i booked the room over 2 months in advance and i specifically asked for a quiet room. Well, they put us in room 207. There is literally a LOUD air conditioner that runs 24/7 right outside your window. It sounded like a freight train. Avoid
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We apologize that you had such an experience and assure you that this is not the typical stay at this hotel. Our rates are based on the demands of the local markets they can range from $99 to $339 depending of the event in the area or time of year that you visit. We are always looking to improve our breakfast and we will take your suggestions to help us get better. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: I am a Marriott Rewards Platinum customer.  Most of my Marriott stays are at Residence Inn’s since you feel like you are at home.  It’s nice to have a place to spend time at that you can cook a light meal or even bring your dog if you want to.  This particular property is one of the better Residence Inn’s that I have stayed at.  It’s a great value for families going to Disney.  I saw so many out of state SUV’s with folks unpacking coolers and all kinds of stuff to make their week enjoyable.  There is a Target across the street for anything that you forgot! I bought food for the nights when there was no dinner reception and still had food left over.  I also like the idea of being able to make myself a midnight snack if I want to have it in the room.  The staff at the hotel works
Manager Response: It means a great deal to me to receive positive comments from a Marriott Platinum Elite member. My staff and I are committed to making every guest stay a memorable one. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: NO FRILLS, BUT GOOD VALUE FOR YOUR MONEY
Summary: We stayed here 2 nights and visited Universal Studios.  The hotel is basic in its appearance, but it really does offer a lot of ammenities that we felt were excellent.  The pool is very nice as was the hot tub.  the basketball court was a nice added touch and gave us something to do with the kids.  we liked the fact that they have washers and dryers too.  rooms had just gone through a major overhaul and although not luxurious, were certainly nicely done and gave us all that we needed.  nice to have the 2 bedroom unit, the kids liked the bunkbeds too.  we didn't use the kitched, but it looked nice. breakfast in the morning was superb!   better than the club level disneyland hotel!!! GREAT value for your $$
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Our pool is popular attractions we keep it heated year round and always have plenty of pool towels. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We had a very relaxing stay at this hotel after a day at Disneyland. Our room was very clean and there's a free breakfast! The double room suite setting we had during our stay was the best!! The kids were so relaxed and had their own bathroom, so we're not cramped. We'll definitely be back to this hotel.
Manager Response: Having two bathrooms in your suite is a plus when you have kids. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: This hotel really made the difference for my family on a recent Disneyland trip.  Not only was it clean, the breakfast was great, had  a basketball hoop and pools. The staff was VERY friendly and helpful. The room was great for us! Would recommend this place to everyone!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. Our staff works hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel thank you for noticing our efforts. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great hotel with lots of hospitality
Summary: We recently stayed here for a trip to Disney Land. We got the "bunk bed" suite for our family of 6 (13,11, 8, 5 yr old kids) and it was ideal.  We took advantage of the delicious free breakfast every morning. And the breakfast was a full meal, eggs, make-your-own-waffles, sausage and biscuits, etc.  this probably saved me $60+ each day!  The hotel has a very nice, clean pool, a little kiddie splash pool and a hot tub, all of which my family enjoyed after a long day at Disney and California Adventure. In addition, there is a nice little half court basketball court to get a little more of a cardio workout.   There is a nice looking fitness center, but we didn't have the chance to try it out.   The hospitality of the staff was second to none.  They took the time to chat up our kids
Manager Response: The people that work at this hotel are an exceptional group and greatly appreciate you noticing their efforts. You are absolutely right about the value and money that can be saved by enjoying our complementary hot breakfast buffet and evening meals. Thanks for recommending us it is an honor to received such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like your self. I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: Really the best hotel experience ever for our large family visiting Disneyland!  Excellent off-season pricing.  Great hot breakfast (kid-friendly w/ balloons!), easy dining late evening.  Brand-new remodel.  Stylish and fresh-smelling big rooms.  Kleenex that wasn't sandpaper.  The best beds ever.  Lovely views, nice neighborhood w/ a Target nearby.  Front door bus transit quicker and easier than driving ourselves 1.5 miles to Disneyland (hate hotel shuttles b/c must wait wait wait).  No street or central air noise!
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. I’m glad that you enjoyed our newly renovated suites the new stainless steel appliance give the kitchen a clean and contemporary feel. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent management and friendly staff, great location
Summary: the best in u.s. very clean, all new facility, free hot breakfast, close to restaurants, shopping, Disney.  Excellent staff! on site movies, adult and kid pools, nice view of mountain from higher floor, big rooms. Professional management and staff. On site parking, free shuttle service to many attractions.
Manager Response: We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website! Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. We hope that you and your family return soon.

Summary: All my interactions with Marriott employees seem to be excellent. However, Alejandra at the Marriott Residence Inn Anaheim Garden Grove was top-notch. She helped me understand specific nuance about the Anaheim Residence Inn to help our stay (vacation) to be even better than expected. She provided above-and-beyond service-with-a-smile that can be rare in any business environment, but even harder in a fast-paced, high-intensity environment.
Manager Response: I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people like Alejandra working at this hotel. Our staff genuinely cares about our guest's experience and we will always go out of our way to ensure that every guest has a great memorable stay. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We have used this hotel for 4 years as a winter get-a-way for a monthly stay.  The staff all treat us as family.  The location is central to all of Southern California and being close to I5 allows us to see all the beaches and hundreds of sites as day trips. Access to Disney land is in front of the Hotel with bus service every 15 minutes.  The service is great and the complex is super clean.  The free hot buffet breakfast is nutrtional and the ethnic buffet appitiizer evenings are a major cost savings..  The pool area and patio has 2 bar-b-ques that the  staff look after for you.  This Hotel is a must to consider for an enjoyable holiday. Wayne Korb
Manager Response: Mr. Korb it was a pleasure having your family stay with. It only been a few days and I miss our daily morning chats. It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from someone that has stayed at our hotel for an extended time. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: This hotel is by far the most family friendly we have ever stayed at.  Staff very very friendly and accomodating.  The breakfast buffet was perfect, great select of food .  Rooms were spacious clean and comfortable.  We had a light bulb blow out , mentioned it to the front desk and it was repaired in 30 mins along with a note apologizing and 1/2 cookies.  We will definately stay here again.
Manager Response: Friendly and accommodating is what our staff strives to deliver everyday. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Full breakfast every morning and very pleasant and helpful staff.  Seven adults stayed in a suite with king bed, 2 queens and pull out couch.  Beds were excellent just pull out couch was not great for an adult- mattress thin and not comfortable.  When our flight was cancelled and we had to stay two more nights they were happy to oblige and even gave us a better rate!  It is close to Disney but a fair walk especially when you walk all day at Disney, but they do have a shuttle if you don't have a rental car.  This is the second time we have stayed here as a family and we' d do it again.  It's a great place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing the efforts of our staff we work hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel. It's always nice to have a little extra room to unwind after a long day at Disneyland and we're glad that you and your family had the same experience. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: You're Making the Right Decision if you Stay Here
Summary: This hotel was wonderful!  The staff was friendly and polite from beginning to end and so very accomodating.  The location was great for what I needed to do.  It's only a few miles from Disneyland and the Convention Center.  The rooms are gorgeous and spacious.  I wished I could have stayed an extra night or two.  We had a full kitchen, 2 queen beds, living room with a sofabed, a nice view of the pool, and FREE BREAKFAST.  This hotel is great for families visiting the area.  The hotel is pet friendly and very accomodating to children.  I would definitely recommend this hotel as well as stay again.  Parking costs $10 per day but you will receive a parking pass for your vehicle upon check-in.
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.  Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Always a great stay with great service!
Summary: We stay here every year!  It is the best location with the best service.  The rooms are clean and newly remodeled.  The hotel staff always goes above and beyond to make our stay perfect.  We love the morning breakfast and the manager's reception in the afternoon.  See you again next year!
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us that we are your hotel of choice when visiting Disney. We are happy that you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and clean. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again hope to see you soon.

Summary: We stayed at the Residence Inn Garden Grove during February 15-18, 2013.    The hotel is currently being renovated, but we never heard any noise or endured any issues.  The construction takes place during the daytime, so while you're enjoying yourself at Disneyland, they are hammering and handling the loud stuff.    We were on the 7th floor, and had a view of Harbor Blvd.  The grounds are well maintained, and there is a large Target store very close by.    The food at breakfast was good, and well-stocked.  They had bread for toasting, muffins, yogurt, cereal, waffles, lots of urns of coffee...and plenty of seating for the people in a hurry that want to grab a bite and head out.    We were a group of three families, with one small 3-year old.  One family brought a small dog.  the
Manager Response: Thanks for recommending us it is an honor to received such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like your self. It's always nice to have a little extra room to unwind after a long day at Disneyland and we're glad that you and your family had the same experience. I apologize for the inconveniences you and your family experienced, our current renovation has taken up some of our parking spaces. We have made arrangement with The Hyatt next door to assist us with over flow parking and are hoping to have the renovation completed soon. Thank you for noticing the efforts of our managers we are all committed to making the experience of every guest a memorable one.

Summary: We stayed here from Dec 8 - 14, 2012. This was our first family holiday in the US and we were very impressed. We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite with our 4 children aged 2 - 11yrs. It was clean and well-maintained, service from all staff was excellent. The manager was friendly and helpful. My little boy was not well and they even sent up a get well pack for free with soup and chips and a get well card:) Location was great with the shuttle direct to Disneyland right at the door. Kids had a wonderful time. Light bar snacks were a great easy dinner for the kids. Only criticism would be that we found the free breakfast to be very unhealthy, but maybe that is because we are from Australia, and we are used to lower fat and higher fibre options like muesli and fresh fruit. Highly recommend
