Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from an international traveler like you. Having two bathrooms in your suite is a plus when you have kids. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. We are always looking to improve our breakfast and we will take your suggestions to help us get better. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future hope you have an even better experience next time.

Summary: We've stayed at several properties in the Anaheim area, but none compare to the Residence Inn. The staff made us feel right at home from the moment we arrived. With 6 kids, our newly remodeled room felt like home and our view (8th floor facing Disney) allowed us to watch the fireworks on Sunday night. A full, hot breakfast and dinner (social hour) were excellent amenities. With a kitchen in our 3-room suite, we cooked a few dinners and late night snacks - everything was clean and ready to use. Outside, we enjoyed basketball on their court, a dip in the pool, kid's wading pool... and the large hot tub. Great after a hard day at Disneyland. Want to BBQ? They have two large built-in barbecues and preparation area. Don't look any further - stay at the Residence Inn Garden Grove on
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. The hotel has began renovating all guest rooms carpet, stainless steel appliances, counter tops and paint are only a few of our upgrades. Our Anaheim weather often makes it for a great BBQ night. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: This was our second stay at this property and it just couldn't be better for families.  (We have a 2 year old) the room we had was a 2 bedroom (one room with 2 twin beds) and the other a king, with a full kitchen. They offer free breakfast every morning and it is a great perk. Hot food, fresh fruit, daily menu changes, and a separate kids eating area decorated with Disney characters that the kids love.  At night they offer free dinner with daily menu changes as well. GREAT VALUE when you consider how much money you normally spend on food while visiting Disneyland. It's a quick bus ride to the Park, and the staff is excellent. We stayed a week, and the hotel was going thru complete room renovations, and although we did hear a little bit of hammering and worker noise, it was
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.  Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family.  Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: We absolutely loved Residence Inn (Resort Area). We visited from Feb 7 till the 13  and I must say it was perfect all around with no complaints here. The location was perfect the property was kid friendly and my boys loved the Disney theme all around them. The room was perfect with lots of space and very clean!!!! (That is a must for me) The complimentary breakfast was a hit with the boys as well especially as the breakfast area included kid size tables and chairs with Disney channel on for them to watch on a big screen. Also each morning staff was handing out balloons which was a perfect unexpected touch that helped make this trip that much more special. The staff was very helpful and friendly, I felt like I was truly at home. Our next trip to Disneyland may not be for another
Manager Response: We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website! The comments regarding the great customer service is very kind and we're thankful you had a great stay. Thank you for noticing the efforts of our wonderful cleaning staff we are all committed to making the experience of every guest a memorable one. Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Best Experience Ever at an Anaheim Hotel!!
Summary: My family and I needed a hotel in the Anaheim area for a long term stay (5 months). I have stayed at a number of hotels in the area--including a similar property across the street. By far this is the best hotel. The room, food, service, and especially the staff are fantastic!   Everyone at the front desk were very friendly and always greeted by name. The entire staff was very courteous and helpful if ever a need came up. I especially appreciate the royal treatment given to us by the manager, Frank Palacios, who remembered our birthdays, gave us cookies and other unexpected gifts (and a very nice touch when we departed), spent time getting to know us, and more...very refreshing to have such wonderful treatment at a hotel!   I really have nothing but the highest recommendation for
Manager Response: Darryl it was a pleasure having your family as our guest. It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from some one who spent over five months with us. The people that work at this hotel are an exceptional group and greatly appreciate you noticing their efforts. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your suite. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary Heading: The Good and Not so Good
Summary: I stayed 5 days while attending a trade show at the Anaheim Convention Center. Other reviews led me to believe this would be an excellent stay.   The good: Check-in was smooth and the front desk was consistently helpful, professional and gracious. The first night I was in a king room. The street noise kept me up most of the night. (not so good.)The front desk kindly switched me to a QQ room away from the street. Breakfast was excellent each morning. The hotel is under renovation, but I heard almost no construction noise and I was there during some of the stated "construction hours". I wondered if I'd hear a lot of kids, but I did not. I suspect the hotel tries to segregate families from business travelers and that was certainly appreciated. A couple of the nights there was an
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We apologize that you had such an experience and assure you that this is not the typical stay at this hotel. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize for the cleaning issues you encountered. As you mentioned in your review we are currently renovating all of our guest rooms this includes, new sofas and chairs. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel in early November 2012; overall we had a good experience. The hotel is a little far from Disneyland, while we did walk it one day, for anyone with little kids or not in good shape I would take the bus or find some other way to get to Disneyland. We used our rental car after the first day as parking is only $15 with in and out privileges. Service was good and they even let us print off our boarding passes and Disney passes from the front desk computer.  Hotel Rooms: A little dated and need of a refresh (carpet worn, etc.), however for the price and size we could easily overlook this. The room was kept clean so no complaints there. We did have a well sized room that included two bedrooms (one with a double bed and another with bunk beds). The room also
Manager Response: When traveling with a family value is important. The ART shuttle system is a convenient way to get to Disneyland it recently has expanded to other parks and places of interest around town. The hotel has began renovating all guest rooms carpet, stainless steel appliances, counter tops and paint are only a few of our upgrades. I can’t wait to have you back to see our newly renovated hotel!

Summary: This is the hotel that I usually stay in for the annual NAMM Show.  I just got back today and I just have to say that this is a descent hotel but there were some things about it that were just plain irritating and you just don't want to have to deal with while you are traveling. 1) THERE WAS NO HOT WATER in the room. My room and its shower had, at best, luke warm water that just felt warm enough not be cold. 2) The pool doesn't open til 8am but all the surrounding pools open at 6am - forget an early morning swim before your mtg. 3) I had to get my plastic room key - rekeyed at least 4 times while I was there. It locked me out and I had to go back downstairs. 4) The hotel store is open during very limited hours.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced during you stay with us, and we thank you for letting us know. I’m surprise to hear about the hot water we are equipped to handle twice the amount needed for our size. I will certainly have our engineer inspect out hot water system to ensure its working properly. We are working on expanding our gift shop hours currently its open from 7am-9:30pm with a one hour lunch break in the middle. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Wonderful location, close to shops, restaurants & bus trip to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here to visit Disney land and it was great. Across the road was Target & bus stop out the fron to disneyland. Pool was great & free breakfast and dinner most nights was ideal with kids. The  childrens rooms were colourful, double bunk, small table & chairs & tv & en suite. Our room was just lovely with en suite also. Definitely recommend !
Manager Response: We are centrally located with plenty of food options around. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: we stayed a this hotel for the tinkerbell half marathon and the service was great.  everyone at the front desk went out of their way to make sure our stay was great.  The morning buffett was great, changed up everyday, with a lot of choices.  grandmother and kids loved the waffle makers, had them everyday.  not a long trip from disney, buses were slow sometimes but still effective.  morning of half marathon, food was provided at 3:00 am. wow!!! and still made it back in time to get the buffett.  starbucks next door and other places to eat, even a taget with in 100 yards.  house keeping done everyday. stove and other applicances out dated.. but hotel is starting renovations and updating..
Manager Response: Congratulations in completing the Tinkerbelle marathon! I absolutely agree with you; we do have a great staff and we are fortunate to have each and every one of them. I hope to have you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great for shows at the Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: ... since it's very close to it. We're usually staying in a two bedroom suite for the NAMM show, since five years, and I have nothing bad to say about this hotel at all, except maybe that the fitness center could be better equipped. All in all, we'll surely be back.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. Our hotel is currently going through a renovation that includes all new exercise equipment. I can’t wait to have you back so that you can try out our upgraded exercise room. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: The residence Inn in Garden Grove is the best resort experience we have had in many years.  Located a short distance from Disneyland and California Adventure Land, (hop on the ART bus or drive a mile to Disney's Woody parking lot and take a quick bus ride), this resort is clean and has all the amenities of home plus resort amenities including a heated pool, large jacuzzi, kiddy wading pool, basketball court, two large gas barbecues, an outdoor fire pit and an awesome hot buffet breakfast.  Rooms have a fully stocked kitchen and full size refrigerator.  Our room had a bedroom with two queens and a full bath with tub plus another bedroom across from the kitchen with bunks and its own bath/tub combo.  Target and Von's market are close by.  There are many restaurants within walking
Manager Response: I could not agree more. We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 5 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. The people that work at this hotel are an exceptional group and greatly appreciate you noticing their efforts. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: Ok but probably won't stay again.
Summary: Family of six stayed one night.  We selected this property based on availability and decent reviews. We arrived early, room not ready so we drove to the Toy Story parking lot and took the shuttle to the park.  We returned after 5pm and checked in. We had one of the largest rooms, two bedroom suite with sofa bed.  Upon arrival we noticed the kitchen area was not very clean, crumbs and a dish in the microwave still had cheese residue on it.  Since we were only staying one night we did not report this, just avoided using any of the dishes.  We ate out at Buca nearby, and avoided the scrum for the potato bar in the dining area. We did use the laundry facility which was acceptable.  Rooms seem worn beyond the hotel's age.  Big LCD tv's were good. We didn't try the breakfast, we left
Manager Response: We appreciate your very direct feedback and will follow-up on your impressions to ensure we offer the best stay possible for all of our guests. We expect to provide a clean and comfortable suite with everything in working order and apologize that this was not your experience. We are currently renovating our guest suite it includes carpet, kitchen counter tops, new kitchen appliances, all new upholstery, and many other new updated furniture. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed with 2 children 13 and 11 and the very best thing about the hotel is the size of the family rooms. 2 beds and 2 baths is very unusual and you really do get great space.  It really is a family hotel and the food reflects this. It is plentiful and tasty rather than of a high quality and varied. I have a real issue with plastic cutlery and plates and whist the rooms and facilities are great we were still paying NZ$200 a night so it was not budget.  The service was however fantastic and nothing was too much trouble, we were even able to stay in our room until 4pm without any extra cost.   The pool, sports court and spar were great clean and well cared for. the Gym was a bit tired with a couple of the TV's and water machines not working but the machines were all in good
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott.  The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.  We hope to see you as a guest again very soon

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay whilst visiting Disney
Summary: We stayed in a two bed rm for our visit to disneyland and LA. the management of this hotel can not help you anymore! They go out of there way to assist any way they can. The hotel is clean in good repair, plus you can save a fortune by not staying across the road from disneyland but is only a short trip by a bus (two blocks) which runs every twenty minutes and picks up and drops of out the front of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent trip to Disneyland! We’re delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed our suite, and Disney shuttle service. We hope to see you and your family again very soon

Summary: Sergio checked us in with such a warm welcome and a bag full of cookies!  Fantastic room.  Jacuzzi was huge.  Lots of tv channels.  Free, fast internet.  Many restaraunts within walking distance.  Awesome complimentary breakfast too!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. We hope that you and your family return soon.

Summary Heading: Perfect Place to Stay for Your Disney Adventure
Summary: We stayed here Jan 1 - Jan 5 in room 528. It was perfect for our family of 4. The breakfast downstairs was always hot and ready to go. The pool and hot tub was just what we needed after a long day of Disney. The greatest surprise of all was the wonderful housekeeping staff. Everyday our room was taken care of so well. They even made up the children's beds with their stuffed animals. We really felt cared for by them. Thank you for helping our vacation be even better!
Manager Response: When traveling with a family value is important. Our hot daily breakfast buffet offers a variety of food like scramble eggs, sausage, fresh fruit and hot oatmeal. The most popular item on the breakfast buffet is our waffle station were you can create your own waffle and top it off with some whip cream or strawberries. Thank you for noticing the efforts of our wonderful cleaning staff we are all committed to making the experience of every guest a memorable one. Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: This is a good, clean hotel, and it is well-suited for families. The common areas and the rooms are very clean, and everything is well-maintained. The one bedroom suites have a decent-sized living room, but the bedrooms are quite small. The beds are adequate but a bit hard, the towels plentiful but a bit rough. The bathrooms, though clean, are in need of remodeling. The grout and surfaces are showing their age, and there was no fan in the bathroom. The fan on the heater/ac, however, was quite loud, and the heater blew cool air for a long time before heating up  Housekeeping and the front desk were very good.  Though the hotel was said to be sold out, there was never trouble getting an elevator nor too big a crowd at breakfast. The food at the breakfast is varied and abundant,
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing the efforts of our cleaning staff we work hard everyday to provide a clean and enjoyable hotel. We are schedule to begin a renovation of our rooms in January this will address most of the items you mentioned.  It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like you. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Residence Inn I always feel its home away from home. This hotel is really awesome, its right on ART line, so going to Disney is soooo much easy. They have awesome breakfast, which doesnt repeat for a week, plus light dinner Mon-Thus. The rooms are clean, kitchen has everything if you want to cook, and grocery stores not far away. I believe there is one secret, if you do get up early, you can watch beautiful sunrise, what an awesome experience is that. The reception people were awesome, I got both early checkin as well as late checkout. They even stored our baggage as our flight was late in the night. Not sure when we will get back to Disney again, but if we do, you bet, will definitely stay here only. Keep up the good standard.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. We have a rotating menu that changes daily. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future.

Summary: Sergio at the front desk was awesome.  A real example of "customer service".  I arrived around 10 p.m. with a group of teenagers for a Disney trip.  He understood my needs and even gave me a tour of the available rooms.  Upon selecting one of the suites with twin beds, Sergio was the man and upgraded to the queen beds.  Are you kidding?  Who does this anymore?  On top of that, he hooked me up by not charging me the parking fee.  I guess he knows how it can be with excited teenagers.  In addition to the great room, the evening social and the buffet breakfast was great!  Overall a great experience with this hotel and the staff.  Definitely on the return list.
Manager Response: We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website! The comments regarding the great customer service is very kind and we're thankful you had a great stay. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Just what we were looking for
Summary: For families looking for a convenient, clean, spacious and reasonably priced hotel close to Disneyland, I would highly recommend the Residence Inn Anaheim Resort Area. We booked through Disney and had our Disneyland tickets included in the package, which made the stay extraordinarily good value! The kids had a room with bunk beds (always a winner), the adults had a room with a king and there was a separate lounge/kitchen and two bathrooms. Breakfast was complimentary, but don't expect 5 star food - it was just ok for us as a family looking for healthier options. We used the ART to get to Disneyland and the stop is just outside the hotel ... great for the journey home after a huge day.
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience on your recent stay. Our staff goes out of their way on a daily basis to make every stay special. We are always looking to improve our breakfast and we will take your suggestions to help us get better. We hope to see you soon again!

Summary: I like this place , nice rooms its just a few blocks from Disney parking areas and a shuttle (ART) runs to the front gate of Disney also  . the rooms were nice , we stayed three nights.it had a kitchenette but we found out they had buffet breakfast every morning. also a social  hour in the evening to where they served a different meal every day. very nice staff.clean rooms,
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent trip to Disneyland! We’re delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed our suite, Disney shuttle service, and breakfast. We hope to see you and your family again very soon.

Summary: As always the stay here was comfortable, relaxing, enjoyable and an overall fun vacation. This time we stayed for about 9 days! Wow, it was awesome. First, I would like to give the Manager and the front desk staff a very grateful "thank you" from our family for making the most of our time away from home and making it a welcoming one. Next I'd like to say we are a food loving family so it's important to all of us that breakfast be hot, hearty and fresh and that's exactly what you get every morning here at Residence Inn. Mon-Fri the Manger's special is more than adequate offering anything from burgers and hot dogs, to baked potato bar and hot soups and salads. It is very filling and satisfying after a long day running back and forth from Disneyland to California Adventure, whew,
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from someone that has stayed at our hotel for 9 nights. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Our recently renovated pool area is a popular area were kids can play and adults can relax in our oversize Jacuzzi. Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: Our first visit to Disneyland and we were really pleased with our stay. First thing to say that the reception staff were first rate ( more about that later).   We managed to get a suite on the 8th floor at one end so it was extremely quiet. We arrived about 1.00am so it was straight to bed. Our daughter loved the bunk bed in her room and as usual our Marriott bed was top notch. It was only in the morning that we noticed the very strong cooking smell that permeated the kitchen / sitting room. Over the next day or so, cleaning staff tried to get rid of it but to no avail, despite sprays and carpet cleaners. It just wouldn't go, so we asked to move rooms. This is when we met Sergio, he was superb and a real credit to Marriott. He spent over an hour trying to sort the issue in terms
Manager Response: I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people like Sergio working at this hotel. Our staff genuinely cares about our guest's experience and we will always go out of our way to ensure that every guest has a great memorable stay. We hope to see you and your family again very soon.

Summary: The 2 bedroom/2bath suite was great for 7 of us very comfortably.  Kitchen was perfect although we only used the fridge.  Beds were great. Clean, comfortable; especially liked the complimentary breakfast bar which included eggs, potatoes, meats and fruits, as well as the normal breads, waffle maker, cereals.  It was a very large area for the breakfast, which with a busy holiday week, never felt too crowded.  The ART shuttle worked perfectly, never waiting more than 20 minutes.  The pool was warm and very clean.  All in all, it was a great time for our family!
Manager Response: You are absolutely correct we are great for families. Our over size suites allow you to spread out after a long day at Disney. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Excellent service, beautiful suites, friendly staff and atmosphere, delicious breakfast and suppers and the Stott Family says: "thank you Sergio for all your help, always remembered!" HIGHLY RECOMMEND =]
Manager Response: Thank you Stott’s family for being our guest! The people that work at this hotel are an exceptional group and greatly appreciate you noticing their efforts. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your suite. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary: We are just finishing up our five night stay here.  It is a good family hotel.  It is clean and has a good selection of food for breakfast in the morning.  My girls loved having their own bunk bed room.  It is not nearly as large as what it appeared in the pictures, but our family of 5 was comfortable.  My main complaint was that our king bed mattress was probably the worst bed I have ever slept it.  It was sqeaky each time you moved and was all worn out.  It was worse than the pull out mattress.  I layed on the bunk bed and that was surprisingly  very comfortable.  My daughter even commented how her bed was more comfortable than her one at home!  My husband would take some talking into to come back here again just for that reason, but for the price I would.  I was so beat after
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 5 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.  I’m sorry you found the bed uncomfortable we are schedule for a full room renovation in early 2013. Can’t wait to have your family come back and experience our new upgraded furniture. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: Front desk staff was awesome when I checked in.  The rooms were clean. Everything in the room and building looked new and well maintained.  The free breakfast was very good and very filling. I highly recommend this hotel for families.  The facility is designed for families going to Disneyland.  Restaurants in walking distance.
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like you. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. We hope that you and your family return soon

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights on our Disneyland visit and we are very very happy. Pros: Clean and spacious rooms Helpful staff Free breakfast and more items to choose Free wifi... Not fast but good enough for browsing  2TVs - 1 in bed room and other in Living room... I think they are LG Beds are clean and comfortable They have full kitchen  Cons: Compact parking space and $10 for parking when they don't have enough parking spots I stayed in room 306 and I see some water left in the center of tub after shower.  I love to stay here again if I get the same deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us during your recent trip to Anaheim. Our housekeeping staff works hard everyday to keep our hotel clean. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your suite. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary Heading: Always "Home Away From Home" Place to Stay
Summary: My wife and I have stayed numerous places from Long Island, Cleveland, Green Bay, Iron Mountain, Shreveport, Las Vegas to places in California and several times in this Res Inn Anaheim Resort over the course of this year alone.  This place is the cleanest and serves the best complimentary meals, Breakfast or manager's reception.  All the front desk staff, Joslyn, Sergio, Joe and others are all great and make us feel at home right away.  The Managers are real friendly, hospitable  and accommodating.  Room are spacious, comfortable, very functional and clean. Full kitchen is great too. Managers reception is always good for a complimentary dinner, baked potato bar with ceasar's salad and sodas (light desserts included).  Looking forward to breakfast in the morning! The chef's are
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words it was truly a pleasure having you as our guest. The people that work at this hotel are an exceptional group and greatly appreciate you noticing their efforts. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: My husband, myself and my 10 year old daughter stayed at this Hotel for a week.  We had stayed at various hotels in Canada and America.  Although it is not as modern as some of the places we stayed at it has  a lovely family feel.  Our room was lovely and clean, spacious, had all the appliances and gear we needed to cook.  The swimming pool is great and the hotel is only a 20-30 min walk (depending on how tired your kids are) to Disneyland.  The staff were really friendly and helpful.  We had lots of questions and needed help arranging shuttles, tours and other bits and pieces.  Nothing was too much trouble.  An added bonus is the free breakfast and dinner on selected days of the week.  Only complaint about it is ther could be some healthier options esp with the evening meal
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience on your recent stay. Our staff goes out of their way on a daily basis to make every stay special. We are always looking to improve our breakfast and we will take your suggestions to help us get better. We hope to see you soon again!

Summary: Here at the Residence Inn right now, and loving our stay.  Sergio at the front desk was great, and made us feel at home right away.  Room isn't fancy, but it's not the Ritz.  Very functional and clean.  Beds are comfy, nice toiletries.  Two bedroom suite is awesome with a bunk bed in the kids room as well as a sleeper sofa in the living room.  Full kitchen is great too.  Pool was very comfortable on a cool November evening and the hot tub was nice and warm to heat up in.    Managers reception was good for a complimentary dinner, baked potato bar with ceasar salad and sodas.  Looking forward to breakfast in the morning!  Location is convenient to Disneyland, and talked to people who headed back to the hotel for a nap/swim and are headed back later.  There is a shuttle, but I
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. The people that work at this hotel are an exceptional group and greatly appreciate you noticing their efforts. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: The hotel is about a 30 min. walk from Disneyland.  We used ART each time, so we were glad we had purchased a ticket for our 4-day stay.  The breakfast was outstanding, with so many offerings.  The room was cozy for the 6 of us, but we were hardly there. The hideabed was a typical hideabed with a few pokes from springs. The pool area was a big attraction each evening and was very nice.
Manager Response: Thank You for your response, we appreciate the feedback. We do pride our selves on having one of the nicest pools around. The pool is heated to 85 degrees and the children's pool & jacuzzi is just as popular. A lot of our guests do take a mid-day Disney break and enjoy the pool around the same time as our afternoon social hour Monday through Thursday.Thank You again for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Lots of kids (for better or worse) and as expected
Summary: Stayed in early November and it was busier than I was expecting. The breakfast has more selection than a continental brekfast, but the food was just OK...and it was pretty crowded. The service at the hotel was top-notch. We were pretty easy customers though so we didnt' have much need to test the service. The shuttle to Disneyland was very convenient. it was quite clean. The beds weren't the most compfortable....but about what I woudl expect from this level of hotel. We stayed in a 2-bedroom suite, one of onyl a few hotels that offer 2 actual bedrooms (many advertise a suite but one bedroom is actually the living romo with pull out couch, for example)The value was great.
Manager Response: Thank You for for staying with us and taking the time to review us on trip advisor. Our breakfast does have many different hot & cold items to choose from and we rotate them as much a possible. Our guests do find the ART shutle is very convient with it stopping right on Harbor Blvd. Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you again, hopefully soon!

Summary: We came here for our last stop of our vacation to celebrate our daughter's birthday. I ask for help and  James Herera is awesome! He went to extra mile and help us to get the cakes and balloons ready in our room! Thanks also to Joe and jenelle from the front desk! Surely will recommend and will comeback. Thanks for the good experience!
Manager Response: Thank You for sharing your experience at our hotel on trip advisor. We are always happy to help celebrate with our guests whatever the occasion may be. I am happy to hear you had a wonderful time and your daughter had a very memroable birthday. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: My husband & I took three 9 year olds to Disneyland. We wanted the kids to each have their own bed & we wanted to have a king bed for ourselves. We also wanted to have 2 bathrooms. It took a bit of searching to find something that matched our criteria, that was priced reasonably & had good ratings. Boy, we sure lucked out with this hotel. What a fantastic find! We all slept comfortably in a 2 bedroom suite. One room had a bunk bed, the other had a king size bed. There was also a pullout sofa bed in the living area. A kitchenette & small living area separated the bedrooms. There were 2 full bathrooms, adjoining each of the bedrooms. The hotel & rooms were clean. The kids had fun cooling off in the pool every afternoon. The buffet breakfast was ok. The real surprise was that they
Manager Response: When traveling with a family value is important. Our hot daily breakfast buffet offers a variety of food like scramble eggs, sausage, fresh fruit and hot oatmeal. The most popular item on the breakfast buffet is our waffle station were you can create your own waffle and top it off with some whip cream or strawberries. Our most popular evening event is Thursday, we offer hamburgers hot dogs and fresh veggies to go along with it.  Can’t wait to have your family come back! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: My family and I love this place! Reasonable prices for two bedroom, two bath, breakfast in the morning, laundry area, and overall friendly staff. They accommodate as best as they can. The next time I go there I have to make sure I bring them Mac nuts.
Manager Response: Mahalo, for posting this review. Whether traveling with a family of 5 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area. A hui hou!

Summary Heading: This is one of the best places to stay
Summary: I throughly enjoyed my stay here, I stayed here three nights from Oct 26-29   the rooms are very large, the beds are fabulous, it is amazingly quiet in the rooms , the breakfast iin the morning are terrific, staff here is very friendly and very helpful,   The rooms are spotlessly clean.....the ART stops right outside the hotel......this place has everything and more than what you are looking for in a place
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback here on trip advisor. Many of our guests are pleased to see how large our breakfast is and how much money they save by being able to feed their family and start the day off with a great meal. Thank You again for choosing to stay with us.

Summary: I don't usually leave reviews, but after reading several before our trip, I had to leave one today. Some travellers complained about the staff, the food, and the comfort of this hotel, which had me worried.  When we arrived, the staff was cheerful and helpful. Our room was clean and stocked properly for 4 people, we had 6. The sleeper sofa mattress was, however, pretty bad. One call downstairs, and we had another mattress stacked on top of the first with clean, fresh bedding.  We got the extra towels and pillows we wanted.  We then discovered 2 of the boys had forgotten toothbrushes and razors.....no problem!  We got those, toothpaste, extra shampoo and conditioner for the girls, and, they were thinking ahead, extra tp!  The breakfast was warm and plentiful.  The coffee was hot
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 6 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. The people that work at this hotel are an exceptional group and greatly appreciate you noticing their efforts. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Our family have stayed at the Residence Inn Garden Grove on 12 occasions since 2007.  For my most recent visit I was travelling alone.  I was amazed that all 3 staff members at the front desk recalled me and greeted me by name (as it was 10 months since my last stay) and truly made me feel welcome after a tiring trip.  I chose a 1 bedroom suite (#524) at the recommendation of the Operations Manager - Mr. James Herrera - and I found the unit to be in excellent condition, very clean, and quiet.  I had 3 minor service requests during my stay and for each I simply called the front desk and a staff member showed up at my suite door within 5 minutes!  All of the staff that I had met in the past recognized me and asked if there was anything they could do to make my stay more enjoyable.
Manager Response: I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people like James working at this hotel. Our staff genuinely cares about our guest's experience and we will always go out of our way to ensure that every guest has a great memorable stay. Thank you for recommending our hotel we hope to see you and your family again very soon.

Summary: We stayed in their 2 bed 2 bath kids suite; room 702. It was very nice, clean and quiet. All the beds were comfortable and the full size kitchen was an added bonus. We were able to see the fireworks from our window. The breakfast and light dinner were a nice plus. There was a lot of other travels and the dining room could get crowded but, the staff did an excellent job keeping the buffet stocked and they were always very helpful. The hotel is the first stop on ART shuffle stop to Disneyland and the pick up location is right out side the hotel parking lot. The shutter made it easy to get to and from Disneyland and it was nice to have a place to crash mid-day and at the end. Of the day. We will return again!
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like you. Having two bathrooms in your suite is a plus when you have kids. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. The ART shuttle system is a convenient way to get around town most recently ART shuttle has expanded to Knott’s Berry Farm and Medieval Times. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: NO AMC channel. Mimimal HD channels. Kid friendly.
Summary: Definitely a kids friendly hotel n resort area. NO AMC channel, a shame and very limited HD channels. What hotel had 1/2 HD channels and 1/2 analog? Pricing is good and staff very friendly. Parking limited due to tree cutting but that is for short time frame.  No alcohol even at Manager's Toast time at 5PM.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced during you stay with us, and we thank you for letting us know. We currently have 40 TV channels and will definitely look into expanding and adding additional popular channels. Thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back as our guest.

Summary Heading: Residence Inn always keeps me happy!
Summary: Their 2 bedroom 2 bath suite is very nice! Fits 8 people, has a full kitchen and I got it for 170 with AAA.  We actually stayed here after a Catalina trip.  Its in a good location, parking is easy, and it had the Best breakfast!  I'm more of a hilton person but Residence Inn always impresses me.  Clean rooms and good comfy beds.  Our room had 3 tvs in it.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to Southern California. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Our family of 5 (2 Adults, 3 children -15,12,11) stayed in September and loved our stay. Room with kitchenette had everything we needed.The bunk room had an ensuite, which the girls loved. It was the perfect place to start our holiday and after a long day at Disneyland it was nice to come back to a spacious comfortable room.The breakfast was great with loads of variety. The pool was being maintained while we were there but we were told we could use next doors hotel pool if need be however our long days at Disney meant we didn't get the chance. $10 pp for a 3 day shuttle pass to Disney (bought from hotels gift shop) collects you right outside hotel. A safe walk to Disney takes about 20 min. Target across the road was very convenient for groceries.  No complaints and would
Manager Response: Thank you for fantastic review! We're thrilled that you and your family had such a great time on your vacation with us. Our pool renovation is now complete and its great to see so many families enjoying it. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland.

Summary: I stayed here with a girlfriend and two kids for 5 days and really enjoyed the property. The rooms are clean and spacious, the breakfast is great and although there is no restaurant, there are plenty of places that will deliver to the hotel. The shuttle to Disney is right outside and super easy to use. I don't like the parking fee, but that in and of itself isn't a reason not to choose this hotel.
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like you. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. The ART shuttle system is a convenient way to get around town most recently ART shuttle has expanded to Knott’s Berry Farm and Medieval Times. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Our family of 5 stayed here for the first week of October 2012 (Parents with 2 teens & a 10yr old) This place is perfect for families. It was very clean and tidy and had a well stocked gift shop, gym, basketball court & table tennis table.  Our room was spacious with 2 bedrooms (comfortable beds), 2 bathrooms, a full kitchen (although no pots and pans for cooking) & a lounge with a pull-out sofa bed. It also had 3 flat-screen televisions (not that we had time for watching TV!) The free breakfasts were amazing. There was a huge variety of hot and cold breakfast food, that changed every day we were there. There was also a complimentary manager's reception from 5-7pm Mon-Thurs which included a light meal snacks and drinks. We had no problems with the airconditioning or free wifi as
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 5 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.  Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family.  Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: I stayed here last week, and really enjoyed it. It has a little kitchen, with stove, full fridge, table, micro, coffee maker and dishes. (dishwasher too). The two queen beds were very comfortable,  a friend slept on the fold out couch, and got a great night's sleep. It includes a full breakfast in the morning. I loved the potato pancakes. Lots to choose from,  larger than most places who offer breakfast.   I liked that the window in the bedroom opened up a little for fresh air. (and the view was nice too). The room was very clean and up to date. There are two flat screen tv's. It was pretty quiet.  I had actually booked and spent one night at the Marriott suites a block up, but didn't like the room there, (so I moved to this place).The Marriott suites was a little more in price
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us during your recent trip to Anaheim. Our housekeeping staff works hard everyday to keep our hotel clean. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your suite. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary: Went the Los Angeles for a vacation on Labour Day. Stayed at this hotel for 1 week. The staff were friendly and the location was great. Short 5 minute drive to Disneyland( parking cost the same amount as passes on the ART would have cause there was 4 of us). Breakfast everymorning was plentiful, just wish the times were later and they didnt clean up the minute the time was up. Only complaint was that they didnt offer juices etc through out the day. They took the caps off the faucets after the breakfast was over so you couldn't have some. For the amount we were paying they could afford to give us free soda's etc. Otherwise room was very comfortable, we had a 2 bedroom suite with 2 seperate ensuite bathrooms. Rooms were cleaned daily and it was very comfortable. All in all a good
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review. We're glad you and your family had a good stay over the busy Labor Day holiday. We are always looking to improve our breakfast and we will take your suggestions to help us get better. We hope to see you again next year!

Summary Heading: Clean, good breakfast and an OK room
Summary: My family and I stayed here and the first thing we noticed when we stepped into the room was the smell of potatoes.. Even though the room was really clean. We only had one remote for three TV's and when we asked for two more they only brought up one. Also, even after the worker had programmed the remote It didn't turn on the TV. So we had only one remote for three TV's and you can imagine how hard that was with three kids and me and my wife. On the other hand though, the breakfast was outstanding. They had the most variety I had ever seen, the food was different all three mornings we were there and the food was really good...even the eggs. The worst part overall though was the parking. We had to park ten minutes away at the Hyatt because they didn't have enough parking in their
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We pride ourselves in providing our guests with a trouble free stay and unfortunately we fell short this time. I apologize for the inconveniences you and your family experienced. Please be assured that our team takes the feedback seriously and we are making changes to address some of your concerns.

Summary Heading: My Favorite place to stay when visiting Disneyland! Great for big Families!
Summary: We stayed here for the second time from Sept 21-24. We were here for a family trip to Disneyland. We decided to return because of a good expierence with the first visit and I'm so glad we did. We were not disappointed! First of all the location is great for visiting Disneyland. The rooms are beautiful and very clean and spacious. We stayed in a one bedroom suite with two queens in private bedroom and a sleeper sofa in living room. This worked out great for our family of six. All suites have a fully equipped  kitchen which makes it great for cooking meals and saving money. Also full size refrigerator was perfect for all of our drinks, snacks milk etc..there is also free hot breakfast included evety morning. We all just loved it. Kids enjoyed waffels with strawberries every
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether traveling with a family of 6 or even more, the additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. I’m glad that you were able to use the fully equipped kitchen to prepare yummy snacks for your family. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Our family recently returned from an amazing trip to Disneyland for our grandson's first birthday.  We were greeted by friendly staff and very comfortable in our two bedroom suite.  It was clean and welcoming, our grandsons loved the bunk beds!   For seven days it was our "home away from home" with one big exception...housekeeping!  We loved returning back to our suite from a long day of fun to see that the room that we left in a mess was completely transformed into a spotless clean room.  Our housekeeper was the best, she was attentive to every detail and most important honest.  After checking out for an eary morning flight I returned home and realized I forgot a very expensive item in the bathroom drawer!  I was panicked and called the front dest at 2:00am.  I spoke to a very
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience on your recent stay. Our staff goes out of their way on a daily basis to make this a special vacation for all of our guests and we're thrilled that you and your family had such a wonderful stay. I’m glad that we were able to return your lost items to you. We hope to see you and your family again very soon.

Summary: First impresions are always important, whether you like it or not, thats the way things are. We arrived on Saturday sep 15 around 4 pm to check in for a 6 nights stay. We had prepayed our entire stay on a 2 bedroom suite with our credit card. We were greated by Shannon at the hotel's front desk. I told her that this was our first time at Anaheim and we were celebrating my daughter's birthday the next day and so I would really appreciate a nice suite. She was very efficient and said she was giving us a very nice suite overlooking the pool on the 6th floor. We went upstairs to our suite and as soon as we looked through the window we said: "Are you kidding ??? there is NO POOL !!! our "nice view" was a view of an empty pool full of workers with all kind of machines and noise. The
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We apologize that you had such an experience and assure you that this is not the typical stay at this hotel. I would like the privilege to follow-up with you in more detail to prevent this from happening again as well as resolve this with you at your earliest convenience.

Summary Heading: Great Location for Disney; So so for Business
Summary: This hotel is an upscale version of the Residence Inn chain with a heavy Disney twist.  The parking is limited and crowded, and because there is a shuttle to Disneyland, the lot remains busy during the day.  The lobby area is clean and inviting, and the front desk staff is helpful. I was upgraded to a suite, but not one that I wanted;  I had reserved a king bed, and the upgrade was into a two bedroom two queen and bunk bed room.  That was quickly resolved, however, and I was upgraded to a two bedroom king suite.    The rooms are not updated yet to the new stylings, but the room was very clean and the beds are comfortable.  The bathrooms were also clean, and the kitchen area was well stocked.    The breakfast choices were good,and the food was tasty.  Lots of kids around, with
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us during your recent trip to Anaheim. Our housekeeping staff works hard everyday to keep our hotel clean. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your suite. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary: We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite last week. Staff were friendly and helpful, especially the night desk clerk who cheerfully checked us in at 2am after our flight from New York was delayed by 4 hours. Breakfast was fine by Anaheim standards, with a few hot options, protein, pure OJ, yoghurts,  pancakes and fresh waffles (very popular).  The room was clean and comfortable, with 3 TVs and well-equipped kitchen (which we didn't really use). Beds were comfortable. It's not 5 star luxury, but comfortable and quiet. We used the ART shuttle to get to and from the parks, and it was pretty much as convenient as any hotel shuttle (in our experience). Generally, I would prefer to stay within a short walk of the parks for convenience, but having the space of the 2 bedroom suite at a reasonable
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like you. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel last weekend and we had a great stay!  Sergio, at the front desk, was very friendly and helpful when we checked in.  The rooms were clean and spacious.  The complimentary breakfast buffett was excellent!!! My son loved the waffles and toppings which were available every morning.  The two-bedroom unit with bunk beds were a dream come true for my twin boys!  They had their own room with a t.v., table and their own bathroom.  It also gave us some peace and quiet.  The queen beds were so comfortable...even better than our beds at home.  Overall, I would say our experience at the Residence Inn Garden Grove was PERFECT.  We will definitely be staying there from now on.
Manager Response: I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people like Sergio working at this hotel. Our staff genuinely cares about our guest's experience and we will always go out of our way to ensure that every guest has a great memorable stay. Thank you for recommending our hotel.

Summary: We stayed here in early September and it was a good choice for us. A separate roo m for the kids and all tha amenities for a pleasant stay while visiting the parks. Breakfast was fine as were the free dinners. Things that caused a problem was the air conditioning vent which was in the main bedroom and sounded like a jet engine, it also came off the rear of the property and amplified the voices and noise of the people playing basketball until nearly 11 pm on at least two nights, clearly not ideal when you have tired parents and kids trying to get to sleep. Also the pool was shut down on the second day we were there, it would have been nice to know this in advance, there were other pools at other hotels you could use, but it really wasn't worth the effort. Overall a good choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced during you stay with us, and we thank you for letting us know. Thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back as our guest.

Summary Heading: Great stay!!!!Breakfast was awesome, the food selection was good, very friendly staff, and the front desk was great!!!
Summary: Check in was quick,easy, and very helpful. The front desk staff was so enthusiastic ( said hello and goodbye every time we passed the desk) and helped out with every situation. The breakfast was so efficient and the crew was so helpful, friendly, and always had a smile on their faces. The social hour was good to but not as good as breakfast. The hotel is very clean and the rooms are tidy but IMO they need an upgrade at this property. Besides that everything else was great!!!
Manager Response: We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website! The comments regarding the great customer service is very kind and we're thankful you had a great stay. We hope to see you again next year!

Summary Heading: Don't know what the complaints are about!!
Summary: We are staying here now and cannot understand the complaints. Breakfast is included and to our surprise, the hotel puts on an evening theme dinner which has been fantastic. Breakfast and dinner have saved us an average of $200 per day. You have Target, bottleshops and outlets across the road so everyone is accommodated from the shopping wife to someone who needs a drink after many hours with the kids. The bus sometimes takes longer to arrive but if you plan your day properly, it doesn't matter. Depending on how many people get on the bus at each stop, it may take up to half an hour, but meeting locals and tourists more than makes up for it. The beds are comfortable and the staff are helpful. The air conditioning does work and well, you could ski in my friends room as his wife is
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. Both our daily breakfast buffet and the evening manager’s reception are an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. The people that work at this hotel are an exceptional group and greatly appreciate you noticing their efforts. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your suite. Thank you for your recommendation of the hotel, and we hope you will visit us again.

Summary: We have stayed at Garden Grove Resident Inn approximately one time per week for the past year.  My husband Chief Judge Mason Harrell has been the acting chief judge in Anaheim.  Since the very first day we arrived, we were greeted, welcomed, and known by name.  The Manager, Mr. Frank Palacios, has speered-headed our marvelous treatment during all of our stays.  Other employees, such as Sergio, Chantell, Jesselyn, Roger etc. have followed Frank's example of magnificent hospitality and superb and thorough care of us as customers.  I see their treatment of all the children who come to Disneyland nearby as just plain marvelous! Certainly great examples of top Marriott care.                             Thank you,                           Judge and Mrs. Mason D. Harrell, Jr.
Manager Response: Having you as our guest has been wonderful!  I’m going to miss our great conversations. We can’t wait to have you back soon with all the grandkids. Thanks for the great comments.

Summary: Check-in was efficient and the room was clean.  Internet speed was not high speed by any means but was adequate.  The evening social hour included a hamburger and hot dog dinner by the pool, which was perfect for the kids and a wonderful surprise for mom and dad... (who were wondering where they were going to go for dinner at the time).   Downside was a bath tub which took 30 mins to drain and a breakfast which does not stand-up to other residence inns around the country. (the food was not re-filled very quickly and the staff did not clean spills etc. which were all over the counters for 30+ mins)  the disney "movie room" playing the disney channel was a nice plus and  appreciated by both mom and dad and the kids.  Would return.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review. It's always nice to have a little extra room to unwind after a long day at Disneyland and we're glad that you and your family had the same experience. We are always looking to improve our breakfast and we will take your suggestions to help us get better. We are grateful that you indicated you will return again in the future.

Summary: Staff at the front desk was very friendly and helpful. Rooms were satisfactorily cleaned each day. Quality of breakfast was great. It was very convenient to have the bus stop in front of the hotel going to Disneyland Parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to Southern California. We are thrilled that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel and look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Our Vehicle was broken into in this parking lot.
Summary: Our 2007 Yukon was broken into on our 2nd night at this motel and our 3rd row folding seats were stolen. All we got from management was "I'm sorry" and they called the cops for us. We paid $10 a night extra to park in their parking lot and the security guard saw nothing. Apparently this theft us common is this area. A heads up would have been nice instead of just the usual sign saying to lock your car and take your belongings. Never thought of my 3rd row seats as "valuables". Definately NEVER staying at this motel again.
Manager Response: We sincerely regret the theft that occurred as we strive to make every guest's stay with us an enjoyable one. While this is a rare event, we work closely with the Garden Grove Resort Police as do all of the hotels in this area to prevent such crimes. In working with the police, they have told us that leaving valuables in plain view in your vehicle should be avoided both day and night. Locking your windows and doors is strongly recommended. We are truly sorry for what happened to you during your stay at our hotel.

Summary: We spent 5 days at the residence inn from 08/10 - 08/14    and had a great stay. We stayed in a 2 bedrooms suite, the master room was nice with a king bed and a spacious bathroom, the kids has single beds ( some rooms have 2 queens beds ) and their own smaller bathroom. The kitchen was nice . The housekeeping was great, they did the washing up of the cofee pot every day! the free bkfst is very nice and they allow you to bring some in your room, it is served until 9.30 ( 10.00 on week-end).  The pool is nice, a bit small but this is common in California . The jacuzzi is a  nice feature  even if it was boiling hot in Anaheim. Very easy to reach disneyland : 5 minutes drive or 10 min with the Art bus. Check-in and check-out were a breeze. No assistance with the luggages but
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day.  Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We love staying at Marriott Hotels and especially Residence Inns because we have 4 children. We have stayed at this Residence Inn several times in the past but after our last stay we will not be back there again.   The first night we were there our air conditioner stopped working. They were quick to send someone in to repair it, which was great. However, after working on it for over an hour and then declaring it fixed, it still wasn't cooling the room. We called again to notify them and again the repairmen came. We were tired from a long day of travel and Disneyland and just wanted to go to bed. Even our children were asking when they could go to sleep!   After another hour they decided to replace the entire unit. At this point we were beginning to wonder if they brought their
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We apologize that you had such an experience and assure you that this is not the typical stay at this hotel. We were all surprised and disappointed that we let the issue with your air conditioning unit get to that point.  We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: I can't even begin to say how wonderful this hotel is. We went this month, about two weeks ago, our first family trip to Disneyland. I had read a bunch of great reviews on this hotel, which I honestly doubted. I really always believed that hotel employees wrote most if not almost all the reviews for this hotel. It wasn't until I experienced it first hand. The moment we walked in, mind you- with four young children, we were treated kindly. It was like staying at the house of true family. The food was great, the employees were extremely friendly and happy, and the room, a children's suite with bunkbeds, was awesome. As a matter of fact, I sent pictures via text to all my family and friends- I was so excited about the size of the suite. We never once felt like we were staying at a
Manager Response: We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website! The comments regarding the great customer service is very kind and we're thankful you had a great stay. We hope to see you again next year!

Summary: Good hotel but a bit far from Disneyland.  The ART is right out front but does not seem to run as often as it should to make it more convenient. It takes about 15-20 minutes to  get to Disneyland and a little less on the return ride as the hotel is the first stop (which was great after a long day).   We had a 1bdrm suite with a full kitchen which was great for making some meals.  There was a free breakfast buffet and during the week is a small evening meal which can reduce the cost of eating at a restaurant.  The breakfast is bigger than most free ones with several hot items and waffle making stations.  More fruit would have made it even better.  The pool was nice and refreshing after a long hot day.  There are several restaurants nearby as well as Target across the street to
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and share your experience during your recent stay. I’m glad that you were able to use the fully equipped kitchen to prepare meals, and snacks for your family. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Another Disney trip equals another Marriott hotel stay. We would have it no other way. We stayed in this Residence Inn for 4 nights. Again completely satisfied to the fullest. It meet all our needs. You would think with all the amenities that this Residence Inn provides it would be at a higher price point. Its amazing how in this economy they are able to offer such first class service , amenities such as breakfast, manager week day special(food), a full kitchen w/separate living room bedroom, at such a reasonable rate. The rooms were clean  , the staff from the front desk to the maids were so friendly and always greeted us with a smile. The hotel had a basketball court, ping pong table, movies for little ones in the lobby ,  these little extra's allow us adults to enjoy some
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review. The additional space enhances your trip by giving you room to relax after a long day. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest!

Summary Heading: Pretty much just like every Residence Inn.
Summary: If you're not familiar with Marriott Residence Inn you should do some research on their website or read other Tripadvisor reviews. The service, amenities, and rooms in this place are similar to most Residence Inn locations worldwide.   Now, the specific notes about this hotel:  - The value for money is excellent at this location.   - There are nearby stores and various restaurants (from local fast food to large chain steakhouses). These are within walking distance.  - The shuttle service to Disney (operated by Anaheim Resort Transit) is impractical and inefficient. Despite this, the fares are cheap if you're buying multiple days for a small family and then it is cost efficient even if you ride the bus only twice.  - Disney is walk-able, though your definition of "walking
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us during your recent trip to Disneyland. We regret if you found the ART shuttle service to be inconvenient I will share your comments with the ART shuttle management team. We will review our complimentary meals and continue to improve the experience for all of our guests. On behalf of my entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not exceptional. We hope that we can have another opportunity at your business on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: This is a nice hotel, but absolutely terrible management,  They will change your reservation on you without notice, and try to collect money for absolutely no reason. This place is a joke, wE stayed here for an entire month and the AC broke about 4 time during the 1st week. SLow internet, unconfortable beds, rude management, cheap furniture and decor, lack of care by hotel staff, im so frustrated with this place I dont even want to waste my time to even write this review anymore.
Manager Response: Although Trip Advisor has proven to be a fantastic tool, allowing travelers to review hotels and their services, the review that you have chosen to write clearly indicate there were extenuating circumstances involved that you chose not to mention in your reviews on Trip Advisor and other social media. Several attempts have been made to seek resolution for the issues experienced, both from the hotel directly as well as involving Marriott’s Customer Care, however a resolution has proven elusive. While we may not agree with your decision to post the reviews you did, we do recognize the privacy and confidentiality of our guests and believe that this is not the venue to discuss the intricacies of your stay. I am truly interested in finding a resolution to the situation and welcome the opportunity to do so.

Summary: I found the Residence Inn a great family hotel. If you want value for money then stay here! When looking around for hotels to accommodate our family, 2 adults and 3 kids, I found it to be really expensive, until I found the Residence Inn. The pool is beautiful, it has a kids games room, free WIFI and the daily buffet breakfast is included in your stay. The staff are really friendly and very helpful. The hotel is really clean too. It's close to a lot of Restaurants, every night we were within walking distance of a different restaurant. We were able to buy shuttle bus tickets to Disneyland and it picked us up just outside the hotel. When we come back to Anaheim we'll stay at the Residence Inn again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. We hope that you and your family return soon.

Summary: This hotel was great. We especially loved the breakfast every morning which saved us money being that we were feeding 4 kids and 2 adults.  The 1bdrm suite with full kitchen was awesome and clean. Plenty of room for all of us. The shuttle was convienent and the drivers were awesome. We will most likely be staying there again on our next Disney vacation!!
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review. We feel that no hotel in the area caters to large families like the Residence Inn by Marriott. I’m glad that you were able to use the fully equipped kitchen to prepare snacks for your family. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Thank you for being our guest! Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: excellent propery and close to disneyland
Summary: so glad we stayed here.  I had a family party of 11 and they all loved staying here.  the rooms and staff could not be better. we stayed here a total of three nights and loved every minute of our stay.  the free breakfast was excellent and the evening light dinner was a nice touch. this is the place to stay when going to disneyland. this place is A+++++++++++++ all the way.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words it was truly a pleasure having you as our guest. You are absolutely right about the value and money that can be saved by enjoying our complementary hot breakfast buffet; over 3 nights that really adds up. Thank you for grading us so high I hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary Heading: Best alternative for our stay in the area
Summary: We rented a house in anaheim hills, but the day before we arrived the owner informed use that the groundfloor was flooded and that the house wasnt usable anymore. The ownert tried alternative house, but there wasnt much left anymore. So he offered us a stay at the residence inn, so we would have a kitchen, living room and two seperate bedrooms. At first we had to adjust ourselves, but the staff's friendlyness made us feel at home very quickly. Epecially Colleen was very helpful and charming  to the boys ;))! The main highlights for us: super staff, great breakfast, we already miss the waffles, the bbq on the rhursday, reallyyyy good and ofcourse playing basketball, which was a new experiencer for my boys.  So again thank you for the stay and would strongly recommend the
Manager Response: I am very lucky to have a staff full of great people like Colleen working at this hotel. Our staff genuinely cares about our guest's experience and we will always go out of our way to ensure that every guest has a great memorable stay. Thank you for recommending our hotel.

Summary Heading: Staff is very friendly and nice
Summary: Stayed here for three nights two days from Sunday Night through Wednesday morning.  Overally pretty nice.    Highlights:  Kids loved the little 1ft wading pool they just had a blast with it.  Breakfast is good with enough choices for kids and adults.  People working at front counter are all super super nice very good staff they really will help and always say Hello with a smile on their face.  Parking is good, its more tight as you first pull in but as you go towards the back its less tight, always enough open spaces not to worry about it.  Room was good with a nice bed, the sofa mattress was a bit lumpy but not super bad.  Negatives:  For me being a light sleeper I was woken up many times be staying in room #124, its close to the pool area and has people coming in and out and
Manager Response: We can't tell you how much we appreciate you taking the time to share such an experience on this website! The comments regarding the great customer service is very kind and we're thankful you had a great stay. Our pool area gets heavy usage and sometimes it can get noisy our pool hours are 8am-10pm. I’m sorry for the inconvenience next time we will get you a room away from the pool. See you next year!

Summary: This hotel is very  Clean. The breakfast was good and had different selection each morning. There is also a snack time of an evening. One night was nachos with a sundaebar and the other was bbq. They have clean grills.for guest use and a nice quiet pool area. Youcan shuttle to.Disney fromthe parking lot.  This is an excellent hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review. We're glad you and your family had a good stay over the busy summer. We hope to see you again next year!

Summary: My family and I stayed here for 3 nights for vacation. I am a Marriott Rewards general member.  Location: The hotel is located south of Disneyland along with a bunch of other hotels up and down Harbor Blvd. It is clearly a tourist area - lots of hotels and restaurants. This is a very good location if you are going to Disneyland. It's not within reasonable walking distance, but there are shuttle buses you can catch (for a fee) every 20 minutes. It was easy to access nearby freeways (I-5 and 22) to go to other areas in LA. Parking was a bit tight, especially during check-in, but there are plenty of spaces in the lot. Notice that you will be charged $10 per night for parking. They did not disclose this at check-in, but fortunately I knew about this beforehand.  Check-In: We arrived
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this kind review. Residence Inn Anaheim Resort is centrally located with access to all Southern California attractions. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. I especially enjoyed the details and how you elaborated on different areas of the hotels. Thanks for recommending us it is an honor to received such a positive review from a seasoned traveler like your self. I Hope to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: We stayed here for 8 nights.  We combined a family vacation with a basketball tournament.  The only real glitch we had was when our team showed up  few days after we had.  There was a mixup on rooms and they had to scramble to find some of our group a room.  That being said, they more than apologized to our group and even went as far as leaving cookies in all of the rooms of our group with a note of apology.    Quite a hike to get to Disneyland, but we utilized the local ART transportation system (once we got it figured out).  ART costs $4 per day per person and you can ride any line as many times as you like.  The hotel was in a great location with the ART system picking up and dropping off right outside the front door.  The facility was very clean which is a big deal to me.
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive such a positive review from someone that has stayed at our hotel for 8 nights. Your review touched on many of the reasons that we are the best choice for a hotel stay during a visit to Disneyland. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family.  Thank you for being our guest!

Summary: We stayed for 14 days here, the Residence Inn Garden Grove is tops! First, you are greeted with the warmest and happiest people behind a front desk..Thanks Jessilyn! Great rooms, flat screen tv's.
